./  ADD  SSI=81661012,NAME=IFCSXXXA
         TITLE 'IFCSXXXA / SUM TABLE - LINKNAME=IFCS2400,ALIASES=IFCS32C00065042
               11,IFCS3540'                                             00095042
         SPACE 2                                                        00130042
*  LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO            * 00195042
         MACRO                                                          00260042
&NAME    LINE  &DATA,&LABEL,&SKIP=                                      00325042
.*                            THIS MACRO ESTABLISHES THE MARGINS OR     00390042
.*                                 COLUMN SETTINGS FOR EACH LINE. IT    00455042
.*                                 GENERATES NECESSARY CARRIAGE CONTROL 00520042
.*                                 ENTRIES. LASTLY IT DETERMINES THE    00585042
.*                                 NUMBER OF ENTRIES ASSOCIATED WITH    00650042
.*                                 THE PREVIOUS LINE AND STORES THAT #  00715042
.*                                 INTO THE APPROPRIATE BYTE.           00780042
.*                                 &DATA(1) - CHARACTER POSITION TO     00845042
.*                                 BEGIN DATA.                          00910042
.*                                                                      00975042
.*                                 &DATA(2) - # OF SPACES BETWEEN       01040042
.*                                 SUCCESSIVE DATA COLUMN STARTING      01105042
.*                                 CHARACTERS.                          01170042
.*                                                                      01235042
.*                                 &LABEL(1) - CHARACTER POSITION       01300042
.*                                 TO BEGIN LABELS.                     01365042
.*                                                                      01430042
.*                                 &LABEL(2) - # OF SPACES BETWEEN      01495042
.*                                 LINE'S LABEL STARTING CHARACTERS.    01560042
.*                                                                      01625042
.*                                 &SKIP= - # OF LINES TO ADVANCE       01690042
.*                                 CARRIAGE TO BEGIN NEXT PRINTED LINE. 01755042
.*                                                                      01820042
.*                                 NEW ENTRIES ARE GENERATED ONLY WHEN  01885042
.*                                 NECESSARY. OMISSION OF ITEMS MEANS   01950042
.*                                 THEY HAVE NOT CHANGED SINCE PREVIOUS 02015042
.*                                 SETTINGS. A LINE MACRO IS REQUIRED   02080042
.*                                 FOR EACH PRINTED LINE. IF NO SETTING 02145042
.*                                 CHANGES ARE REQUIRED ALL OPERANDS    02210042
.*                                 ARE OMITTED IN WHICH CASE ONLY THE   02275042
.*                                 # OF ENTRIES FOR THE PREVIOUS LINE   02340042
.*                                 FIRST MACRO INSTRUCTION ISSUED FOR   02405042
.*                                 THE SUBJECT LINE.                    02470042
         GBLA  &DB,&DT,&LB,&LT,&NRENTS                                  02535042
         GBLA  &LASTCC,&INITIAL                                         02600042
         GBLC  &NRENTSX                                                 02665042
         GBLC  &CARRCON                                                 02730042
         GBLB  &TEST                                                    02795042
         LCLA  &S                                                       02860042
&NAME    DS    0C                                                       02925042
         AIF   (&INITIAL EQ 0).FIRSTLN                                  02990042
         LINEND                                                         03055042
         AGO   .NTFIRST                                                 03120042
.FIRSTLN ANOP                                                           03185042
&NRENTSX SETC  'N&SYSNDX'                                               03250042
&INITIAL SETA  1                                                        03315042
&LASTCC  SETA  1                                                        03380042
N&SYSNDX EQU   *                                                        03445042
.NTFIRST ANOP                                                           03510042
         DC    AL1(0)                                                   03575042
         AIF   ('&DATA(1)' EQ '').CKDTABS                               03640042
         AIF   ('&DATA'(1,1) NE '(').SLABEL                             03705042
         AIF   (&DATA(1) EQ &DB).CKDTABS                                03770042
&DB      SETA  &DATA(1)                                                 03835042
         AGO   .AA                                                      03900042
.CKDTABS AIF   ('&DATA(2)' EQ '').NCDATA                                03965042
         AIF   (&DATA(2) EQ &DT).NCDATA                                 04030042
         AGO   .CC                                                      04095042
.AA      AIF   ('&DATA(2)' EQ '').BB                                    04160042
         AIF   (&DATA(2) EQ &DT).BB                                     04225042
.CC      ANOP                                                           04290042
&DT      SETA  &DATA(2)                                                 04355042
.BB      DC    XL2'FFFE'                                                04420042
         DC    FL1'&DB'                                                 04485042
         DC    FL1'&DT'                                                 04550042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                04615042
.NCDATA  ANOP                                                           04680042
         AIF   ('&LABEL(1)' EQ '').CKLTABS                              04745042
         AIF   ('&LABEL'(1,1) NE '(').SLABEL                            04810042
         AIF   (&LABEL(1) EQ &LB).CKLTABS                               04875042
&LB      SETA  &LABEL(1)                                                04940042
         AGO   .AAA                                                     05005042
.CKLTABS AIF   ('&LABEL(2)' EQ '').NCLABEL                              05070042
         AIF   (&LABEL(2) EQ &LT).NCLABEL                               05135042
         AGO   .CCC                                                     05200042
.AAA     AIF   ('&LABEL(2)' EQ '').BBB                                  05265042
         AIF   (&LABEL(2) EQ &LT).BBB                                   05330042
.CCC     ANOP                                                           05395042
&LT      SETA  &LABEL(2)                                                05460042
.BBB     DC    XL2'FFFF'                                                05525042
         DC    FL1'&LB'                                                 05590042
         DC    FL1'&LT'                                                 05655042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                05720042
.NCLABEL ANOP                                                           05785042
         AIF   ('&SKIP' EQ 'E').EJECT                                   05850042
         AIF   ('&SKIP' EQ '').TESTOFF                                  05915042
.CONT    ANOP                                                           05980042
         AIF   (&TEST EQ 0).AB                                          06045042
         AIF   (&SKIP EQ &LASTCC).TESTOFF                               06110042
&S       SETA  &SKIP                                                    06175042
         ORG   &CARRCON+3                                               06240042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&S),AL.3(1)                                 06305042
         ORG                                                            06370042
&LASTCC  SETA  &S                                                       06435042
.SLABEL  ANOP                                                           06500042
.TESTOFF ANOP                                                           06565042
&TEST    SETB  0                                                        06630042
         AGO   .DD                                                      06695042
.EJECT   DC    XL2'FFFB'                                                06760042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                06825042
         DC    X'8B'              SKIP TO CHANNEL 1                     06890042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&LASTCC),AL.3(1)                            06955042
&TEST    SETB  1                                                        07020042
         AGO   .DD                                                      07085042
.AB      AIF   (&SKIP EQ &LASTCC).NOCHANG                               07150042
A&SYSNDX DC    XL2'FFFB'                                                07215042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&SKIP),AL.3(1)                              07280042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&SKIP),AL.3(1)                              07345042
&LASTCC  SETA  &SKIP                                                    07410042
&TEST    SETB  1                                                        07475042
&CARRCON SETC  'A&SYSNDX'                                               07540042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                07605042
.DD      ANOP                                                           07670042
.NOCHANG ANOP                                                           07735042
         MEND                                                           07800042
         EJECT                                                          07865042
         SPACE 2                                                        07930042
*  ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO* 07995042
         MACRO                                                          08060042
&NAME    ROUTINE &LOGITEM,&RNAME                                        08125042
         GBLC  &DSECT,&CSECT                                            08190042
         GBLC  &ITEM(1000)                                              08255042
         GBLA  &SHIFT(1000),&ITEMNBR                                    08320042
         GBLA  &NRENTS                                                  08385042
         LCLA  &ISHIFT,&NDX                                             08450042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           08515042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   08580042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      08645042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  08710042
         MNOTE *,'LOG ITEM NOT DEFINED'                                 08775042
         MEXIT                                                          08840042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           08905042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             08970042
&NAME    DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'D'                           09035042
         DC    AL.4(&ISHIFT),AL.12(&RNAME-&CSECT)                       09100042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                09165042
         MEND                                                           09230042
*  DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO        * 09295042
         SPACE 2                                                        09360042
         MACRO                                                          09425042
&NAME    DSGEN &X1,&X2,&X3,&X4,&X5,&X6,&X7,&X8,&X9,&X10,&X11,&X12,&X13,X09490042
               &X14,&X15,&X16,&X17,&X18,&X19,&X20,&X21,&X22,&X23,&X24, X09555042
               &X25,&X26,&X27,&X28,&X29,&X30,&X31,&X32                  09620042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES ONE DSECT WORD       09685042
.*                                 FORMATTED FOR THE SUBJECT LOG RECORD 09750042
.*                                 EACH OPERAND HAS TWO SUB LISTS. THE  09815042
.*                                 FIRST IS THE NAME OF THE LOG ITEM    09880042
.*                                 WHILE THE SECOND IS THE # OF BITS TO 09945042
.*                                 ALLOCATE FOR THIS ITEM. ITEMS MUST   10010042
.*                                 BE DEFINED CONTIGUOUSLY WITHOUT GAPS 10075042
.*                                 UNUSED BIT GROUPS MUST BE GIVEN      10140042
.*                                 DUMMY NAMES. THE NAMES PROVIDED FOR  10205042
.*                                 THE LOG ITEMS MAY THEN BE USED IN    10270042
.*                                 THE CONVERSION MACRO INSTRUCTIONS.   10335042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000)                                               10400042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000)                         10465042
         LCLC  &SYMBOL                                                  10530042
         LCLA  &OP,&COUNT,&BYTE                                         10595042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           10660042
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    10725042
&ITEMNBR SETA  &ITEMNBR+1                                               10790042
&SYMBOL  SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP,1)'                                        10855042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,2)' NE '').OK1                            10920042
         MNOTE *,'NULL BIT COUNT FIELD'                                 10985042
         MEXIT                                                          11050042
.OK1     ANOP                                                           11115042
         AIF   ('&SYMBOL' NE '').OK                                     11180042
         MNOTE 'LOG ITEM SYMBOL NOT PROVIDED'                           11245042
         AGO   .CNT                                                     11310042
.OK      ANOP                                                           11375042
         AIF   ('&SYMBOL'(1,1) EQ '''').CNT                *TEMP*       11440042
&SYMBOL  EQU   *+&BYTE                                                  11505042
&ITEM(&ITEMNBR)  SETC '&SYSLIST(&OP,1)'                                 11570042
&BITS(&ITEMNBR) SETA &SYSLIST(&OP,2)                                    11635042
&SHIFT(&ITEMNBR) SETA &COUNT-&BYTE*8                                    11700042
.CNT     ANOP                                                           11765042
&COUNT   SETA  &COUNT+&SYSLIST(&OP,2)                                   11830042
&BYTE    SETA  &COUNT/8                                                 11895042
         AIF (&OP LT N'&SYSLIST).LOOP                                   11960042
         AIF   (&COUNT NE 32).NOT32                                     12025042
&NAME    DS    4C                                                       12090042
         MEXIT                                                          12155042
.NOT32   AIF   (&COUNT NE 64).ERR                                       12220042
&NAME    DS    8C                                                       12285042
         MEXIT                                                          12350042
.ERR     MNOTE '**BIT COUNT FIELDS DO NOT TOTAL 32 OR 64**'             12415042
         MEND                                                           12480042
         MACRO                                                          12545042
         LINEND                                                         12610042
.*                            THIS MACRO IS USED ONLY BY THE LINE       12675042
.*                                 MACRO TO SET THE NUMBER OF ENTRIES   12740042
.*                                 ASSOCIATED WITH EACH LINE.           12805042
         GBLA  &NRENTS                                                  12870042
         GBLC &NRENTSX                                                  12935042
         ORG   &NRENTSX                                                 13000042
         DC    FL1'&NRENTS'                                             13065042
         ORG                                                            13130042
&NRENTS  SETA  0                                                        13195042
B&SYSNDX EQU   *                                                        13260042
&NRENTSX SETC  'B&SYSNDX'                                               13325042
         MEND                                                           13390042
         SPACE 2                                                        13455042
         EJECT                                                          13520042
*  LABEL MACRO     LABEL MACRO     LABEL MACRO     LABEL MACRO        * 13585042
         SPACE 2                                                        13650042
         MACRO                                                          13715042
&NAME    LABEL &LABEL1,&LABEL2,&LABEL3,&LABEL4,&LABEL5,&LABEL6,        C13780042
               &LABEL7,&LABEL8                                          13845042
.*                            THIS MACRO ALLOWS UP TO ACHT LABELS TO    13910042
.*                                 BE SPECIFIED FOR A GIVEN LINE. THE   13975042
.*                                 LABELS SHOULD BE ENCLOSED IN QUOTA-  14040042
.*                                 TION MARKS. THE COLUMN AND LINE END  14105042
.*                                 CONTROLS WILL BE INSERTED BY THE     14170042
.*                                 MACRO. OMITTED OPERANDS MEAN NO      14235042
.*                                 LABEL REQUIRED FOR RESPECTIVE        14300042
.*                                 COLUMN. THIS MACRO WILL ALSO ALERT   14365042
.*                                 THE PROGRAMMER TO EXACTLY WHERE THE  14430042
.*                                 TABLE MUST BE BROKEN IF NECESSARY    14495042
.*                                 TO AVOID EXCEEDING THE MAXIMUM LIMIT 14560042
         GBLC &LABELS(2000)                                             14625042
         GBLC  &LBL(100)                                                14690042
         GBLA  &LBLCTR(100)                                             14755042
         GBLA  &LABELNR                                                 14820042
         GBLA  &NRENTS,&LPTR                                            14885042
         LCLC  &MARGIN,&TACK                                            14950042
         LCLC  &TEXT                                                    15015042
         LCLA  &OP,&K,&START,&NRCHAR,&REMAIN                            15080042
&MARGIN  SETC  '*'                                                      15145042
         AIF   ('&NAME' EQ '').LOOPOUT                                  15210042
&LPTR    SETA  &LPTR+1                                                  15275042
&LBL(&LPTR) SETC '&NAME'                                                15340042
&LBLCTR(&LPTR) SETA &LABELNR+1                                          15405042
.LOOPOUT ANOP                                                           15470042
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    15535042
&K       SETA  K'&SYSLIST(&OP)                                          15600042
         AIF (&K GE 2).NORM                                             15665042
&K       SETA  2                                                        15730042
.NORM    ANOP                                                           15795042
&START   SETA  2                                                        15860042
         AIF (&OP LT N'&SYSLIST).NOTLAST                                15925042
&MARGIN  SETC  '$'                                                      15990042
.NOTLAST ANOP                                                           16055042
&NRCHAR  SETA  8                                                        16120042
&TACK    SETC  ''                                                       16185042
.LOOPIN  ANOP                                                           16250042
&REMAIN  SETA  &K-&START                                                16315042
         AIF (&REMAIN GE 8).MORE                                        16380042
&TACK    SETC  '&MARGIN'                                                16445042
&NRCHAR  SETA  &REMAIN                                                  16510042
.MORE    ANOP                                                           16575042
&TEXT    SETC  ''                                                       16640042
         AIF (&REMAIN EQ 0).ENDTEXT                                     16705042
&TEXT    SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP)'(&START,&NRCHAR)                          16770042
.ENDTEXT ANOP                                                           16835042
&LABELNR SETA  &LABELNR+1                                               16900042
&LABELS(&LABELNR) SETC '&TEXT'.'&TACK'                                  16965042
&START   SETA  &START+8                                                 17030042
         AIF ('&TACK' EQ '').LOOPIN                                     17095042
         AIF ('&TACK' EQ '*').LOOPOUT                                   17160042
         MEND                                                           17225042
         SPACE 2                                                        17290042
         MACRO                                                          17355042
         LSTART                                                         17420042
.*                            THIS MACRO IS ISSUED WHEN THE LABEL AREA  17485042
.*                                 OF THE TABLE IS TO BEGIN.            17550042
         GBLC &LABELS(2000)                                             17615042
         GBLA  &LABELNR                                                 17680042
         GBLC  &LBL(100)                                                17745042
         GBLA  &LBLCTR(100)                                             17810042
         LCLA  &NDX,&CTR                                                17875042
         LINEND                                                         17940042
&CTR     SETA  1                                                        18005042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           18070042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   18135042
         AIF   (&LBLCTR(&CTR) NE &NDX).NOLBL                            18200042
&LBL(&CTR) DC  C'&LABELS(&NDX)'                                         18265042
&CTR     SETA  &CTR+1                                                   18330042
         AGO   .LOOPCTL                                                 18395042
.NOLBL   ANOP                                                           18460042
         DC    C'&LABELS(&NDX)'                                         18525042
.LOOPCTL AIF   (&NDX LT &LABELNR).LOOP                                  18590042
         MEND                                                           18655042
         SPACE 2                                                        18720042
*  BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO  * 18785042
         SPACE 2                                                        18850042
         MACRO                                                          18915042
         BIN   &LOGITEM,&SKIP$OR                                        18980042
.*                                 &LOGITEM - NAME OF ITEM IN LOG       19045042
.*                                      RECORD DSECT                    19110042
.*                                 &SKIP$OR - NBR OF SPACES TO SKIP ON  19175042
.*                                 MULTIPLE PRINT OR NBR OF SPACES      19240042
.*                                      TO BACK UP FROM COLUMN FOR      19305042
.*                                      START OF PRINTING. THE LETTER   19370042
.*                                      B PRECEEDS THE NUMBER (B5) IF   19435042
.*                                      THE LATTER IS DESIRED. OMISSION 19500042
.*                                      OF THIS OPERAND FORCES OPTION 2 19565042
.*                                      WITH BACKUP SPACING EQUAL TO    19630042
.*                                 THE NUMBER OF BITS IN THE ITEM       19695042
.*                                 DEFINITION (VIA MACRO 'DSGEN').      19760042
.*                            A LIMIT OF 15 BITS IS IMPOSED FOR THE     19825042
.*                                 TOTAL NUMBER OF BITS TO PRINT.       19890042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000)                                               19955042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000),&NRENTS                 20020042
         GBLC  &DSECT                                                   20085042
         LCLB  &B                                                       20150042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&K                                   20215042
         LCLA  &TEMP,&T                                                 20280042
         LCLC  &S                                                       20345042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           20410042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   20475042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      20540042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  20605042
         MNOTE *,'YOU BLEW IT'                                          20670042
         ROUTINE DUM,SKIPPER                                            20735042
         MEXIT                                                          20800042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           20865042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             20930042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              20995042
&T       SETA  &IBITS-1                                                 21060042
&B       SETB  0                                                        21125042
         AIF   ('&SKIP$OR' EQ '').BACKUP                                21190042
&K       SETA  K'&SKIP$OR                                               21255042
&B       SETB  ('&SKIP$OR'(1,1) EQ 'B')                                 21320042
&S       SETC  '&SKIP$OR'(&B+1,&K-&B)                                   21385042
&T       SETA  &S                                                       21450042
.BACKUP  ANOP                                                           21515042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                21580042
&TEMP    SETA  &ISHIFT                                                  21645042
A&SYSNDX DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'&TEMP'                       21710042
         AIF (&IBITS EQ 1 AND &B EQ 0).OUT                              21775042
         ORG   A&SYSNDX                                                 21840042
&B       SETB  1                                                        21905042
         DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'C'                           21970042
         DC    BL.1'&B',AL.7(&T),AL.4(&IBITS),FL.4'&ISHIFT'             22035042
.OUT     ANOP                                                           22100042
         MEND                                                           22165042
         EJECT                                                          22230042
*  HEX MACRO     HEX MACRO     HEX MACRO    HEXN MACRO     HEX MACRO  * 22295042
         SPACE 2                                                        22360042
         MACRO                                                          22425042
         HEX   &LOGITEM,&SKIP$OR,&BYTES                                 22490042
.*                            THIS MACRO FACILITATES GENERATION OF THE  22555042
.*                                 TABLE ENTRIES SPECIFYING HEX TYPE    22620042
.*                                 CONVERSIONS.                         22685042
.*                            &LOGITEM - NAME OF DATA ITEM TO BE        22750042
.*                                 CONVERTED                            22815042
.*                            &SKIP$OR - NUMBER OF SPACES TO SKIP ON    22880042
.*                                 MULTIPLE PRINT OR NBR OF SPACES TO   22945042
.*                                 BACK UP FROM COLUMN FOR START OF     23010042
.*                                 PRINTING. THE LETTER B PRECEEDS THE  23075042
.*                                 NUMBER (B8) IF THE LATTER OPTION IS  23140042
.*                                 DESIRED. OMISSION OF THIS OPERAND    23205042
.*                                 FORCES OPTION 2 WITH BACKUP SPACING  23270042
.*                                 EQUAL TO THE NUMBER OF BYTES SPECI-  23335042
.*                                 FIED BY THE NEXT OPERAND (TWICE THIS 23400042
.*                                 NUMBER IF SUFFIX IS EXPLICITLY OR    23465042
.*                                 IMPLICITLY B).                       23530042
.*                            &BYTES - NUMBER OF TOTAL INPUT BYTES TO   23595042
.*                                 PROCESS. THIS NUMBER IS SUFFIXED     23660042
.*                                 WITH AN L,R, OR B TO STIPULATE       23725042
.*                                 PRINTING OF THE LEFT HALF, RIGHT     23790042
.*                                 HALF, OR BOTH HALVES OF THE BYTE     23855042
.*                                 RESPECTIVELY. OMISSION OF THIS       23920042
.*                                 OPERAND DEFAULTS TO B WITH THE NUM-  23985042
.*                                 BER OF BYTES EQUAL TO THE ITEM LNGTH 24050042
.*                            A NEW ENTRY IS GENERATED ONLY WHEN NECES- 24115042
.*                                 SARY. THIS MACRO MUST BE THE FIRST   24180042
.*                                 MACRO INSTRUCTION ISSUED FOR THE     24245042
.*                                 SUBJECT LINE(S).                     24310042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000),&DSECT                                        24375042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000),&NRENTS                 24440042
         LCLB  &B                                                       24505042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&K,&T,&CODE,&BYTESP                  24570042
         LCLC  &S,&LETTER                                               24635042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           24700042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   24765042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      24830042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  24895042
         MNOTE *,'LOG ITEM NOT DEFINED'                                 24960042
         MEXIT                                                          25025042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           25090042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             25155042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              25220042
&CODE    SETA  1                                                        25285042
&K       SETA  K'&BYTES                                                 25350042
         AIF   (&IBITS-(&IBITS/4)*4 EQ 0).OK                            25415042
         MNOTE *,'BIT LENGTH SPECIFICATION INCONSISTENT WITH CONTROL'   25480042
         MEXIT                                                          25545042
.OK      AIF   ('&BYTES' EQ '').USEDEFN                                 25610042
&LETTER  SETC  '&BYTES'(&K,1)                                           25675042
&S       SETC  '&BYTES'(1,&K-1)                                         25740042
&BYTESP  SETA  &S                                                       25805042
         AIF   ('&LETTER' EQ 'B').BOTH                                  25870042
         AIF   (&ISHIFT EQ 0 OR &ISHIFT EQ 4).OK2                       25935042
.ERR     MNOTE *,'DATA NOT ALLIGNED ON HEX OR BYTE BOUNDARY'            26000042
         MEXIT                                                          26065042
.USEDEFN ANOP                                                           26130042
&BYTESP  SETA  &IBITS/8                                                 26195042
.BOTH    AIF   (&ISHIFT NE 0).ERR                                       26260042
&CODE    SETA  3                                                        26325042
&T       SETA  &BYTESP*2-1                                              26390042
&S       SETC  '&T'                                                     26455042
.OK2     AIF   (&ISHIFT EQ 0).L                                         26520042
&CODE    SETA  2                                                        26585042
.L       ANOP                                                           26650042
&B       SETB  1                                                        26715042
         AIF   ('&SKIP$OR' EQ '').BACKUP                                26780042
&K       SETA  K'&SKIP$OR                                               26845042
&B       SETB  ('&SKIP$OR'(1,1) EQ 'B')                                 26910042
&S       SETC  '&SKIP$OR'(&B+1,&K-&B)                                   26975042
.BACKUP  ANOP                                                           27040042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                27105042
         DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'A'                           27170042
         DC    BL.1'&B',FL.7'&S',FL.4'&BYTESP',FL.4'&CODE'              27235042
.OUT     ANOP                                                           27300042
         MEND                                                           27365042
         MACRO                                                          27430042
         SPECIAL  &ROUTINE,&PARAM,&SPACE=                               27495042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES A SPECIAL ROUTINE    27560042
.*                                 ENTRY TO BE PROCESSED BY THE SUM. M. 27625042
.*                            &ROUTINE - SYMBOL ON SPECIAL ROUTINE EWT. 27690042
.*                            &PARAM - AN 8 BIT BINARY REPRESENTATION   27755042
.*                                 TO OCCUPY THE 'MASK' FIELD BUT TO BE 27820042
.*                                 INTERPRETED AS AN ARGUMENT OF THE    27885042
.*                                 SPECIAL ROUTINE.                     27950042
.*                            &SPACE - THE NUMBER OF 2BYTE COUNTERS TO  28015042
.*                                 ALLOCATE FOR REQUIRED PROCESSING.    28080042
         GBLC  &CSECT                                                   28145042
         GBLA  &COUNTR                                                  28210042
         LCLA  &ADD                                                     28275042
         DC    AL1(128)                                                 28340042
         DC    BL.8'&PARAM'                                             28405042
         DC    AL2(&ROUTINE-&CSECT)                                     28470042
         DC    AL2(&COUNTR)                                             28535042
&ADD     SETA  1                                                        28600042
         AIF   ('&SPACE' EQ '').NORM                                    28665042
&ADD     SETA  &SPACE                                                   28730042
.NORM    ANOP                                                           28795042
&COUNTR  SETA  &COUNTR+&ADD                                             28860042
         MEND                                                           28925042
         MACRO                                                          28990042
         SUM   &LOGITEM,&MASK                                           29055042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES A NORMAL EDIT ENTRY  29120042
.*                                 FOR PROCESSING BY THE SUMMARY MODULE 29185042
.*                            &LOGITEM - NAME OF DATA ITEM TO BE SUMMED 29250042
.*                            &MASK - BYTE MASK FOR BITS TO BE TESTED.  29315042
.*                                 THIS OPERAND SHOULD BE OMITTED FOR   29380042
.*                                 SINGLE BIT ITEMS IN WHICH CASE THE   29445042
.*                                 MASK WILL BE SET ACCORDING TO THE    29510042
.*                                 OFF BYTE BIT DISPLACEMENT OF THE     29575042
.*                                ITEM AS DEFINED BY THE MACRO 'DSGEN'  29640042
         GBLA  &COUNTR,&ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000)                29705042
         GBLC  &ITEM(1000),&DSECT                                       29770042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&M,&BITNBR                           29835042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           29900042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   29965042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      30030042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  30095042
         MNOTE *,'LOGITEM NOT FOUND'                                    30160042
         MEXIT                                                          30225042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           30290042
         DC    AL1(0)                                                   30355042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             30420042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              30485042
         AIF   ('&MASK' EQ '').FORM                                     30550042
         DC    B'&MASK'                                                 30615042
         AGO   .ITEM                                                    30680042
.FORM    ANOP                                                           30745042
&BITNBR  SETA  &ISHIFT-7                                                30810042
&BITNBR  SETA  0-&BITNBR                                                30875042
&M       SETA  1                                                        30940042
.LOOP2   ANOP                                                           31005042
         AIF   (&BITNBR EQ 0).GOTIT                                     31070042
&M       SETA  &M*2                                                     31135042
&BITNBR  SETA  &BITNBR-1                                                31200042
         AGO   .LOOP2                                                   31265042
.GOTIT   ANOP                                                           31330042
         DC    AL1(&M)                                                  31395042
.ITEM    DC    AL2(&LOGITEM-&DSECT)                                     31460042
         DC    AL2(&COUNTR)                                             31525042
&COUNTR  SETA  &COUNTR+1                                                31590042
         MEND                                                           31655042
         GBLC  &DSECT,&CSECT                                            31720042
&CSECT   SETC  'IFCSXXXA'                                               31785042
&DSECT   SETC  'XXXA'                                                   31850042
IFCSXXXA CSECT                                                          31915042
*              OBR SUM TABLE                                            31980042
*                                                                       32045042
*              DEVICE CODE=8001 DEVICE TYPE=2400  ALIAS=IFCS2400        32110042
*                                                                       32175042
XXXA     DSECT                                                          32240042

IFCSXXXA CSECT                                                          36660042

         USING *,R9                                                     36790042
         DC    A(ENTRIES)               PTR TO ENTRIES                  36855042
         DC    A(PEDIT)                 PTR TO EDIT SECTION OF SUM TBL  36920042
REG8     DC    F'0'                     R8 SAVE AREA CURRENT ENTRY      36985042
SCSIZE   DC    H'190'                   NO OF 2 BYTE CNTRS TO GETS21021 37050042

R1       EQU   1                                                        37180042

R15      EQU   15                                                       38090042
*                                                                       38155042
*        SPECIAL ROUTINE SECTION   R2=PTR TO LOGREC R9=BASE ADDR        38220042
*                                  R3=PTR TO BUM COUNTER                38285042
*                                                                       38350042
*        VOLUME SER      3 CNTRS ARE VOL SER  1 COUNTER THE NUMBER      38415042
*                                             R3 POINTS TO COUNTER      38480042
SETVOLS  TM    XSW,HEX20                IS THIS A SHORT RECORD?  S21021 38545042
         BCR   1,R14                    YES, NO VOLSER, RETURN   S21021 38610042
         STM   R5,R8,XSAVE              SAVE REGS                S21021 38675042
         CLC   XDEVT2(L2),H3211         TEST FOR 3211            S20202 38740042
         BE    RETURNV                  BRANCH                   S20202 38805042
         LA    R5,L10              LOOP COUNT                           38870042
         LR    R6,L3               SET COUNTER PTR                      38935042
SETVOL1  CLC   L0(L6,R6),ZEROS     IS COUNTER EMPTY                     39000042
         BE    SETVOL2             BR-YES                               39065042
         CLC   L0(L6,R6),XVOL1          DOES THIS SER MATCH             39130042
         BE    SETVOL3             YES                                  39195042
         LA    R6,L8(R6)           BUMP TO NEXT SLOT                    39260042
         BCT   R5,SETVOL1          LOOP                                 39325042
         B     RETURNV             ALL FULL IGNORE                      39390042
SETVOL2  MVC   L0(L6,R6),XVOL1     STORE NEW VOLUME SER                 39455042
SETVOL3  LH    R7,L6(R6)           ADD                                  39520042
         LA    R7,L1(R7)               1                                39585042
         STH   R7,L6(R6)                TO COUNTER                      39650042
RETURNV  LM    R5,R6,XSAVE                AND                           39715042
         BR    R14                          RETURN                      39780042
XFAILCCW EQU   *                                                        39845042
         TM    XSW,HEX20                IS THIS A SHORT RECORD?  S21021 39910042
         BCR   1,R14                    YES, NO CCW, RETURN      S21021 39975042
*                                                                       40040042
         STM   R14,R12,L12(R13)         SAVE REGS                       40105042
         SR    R7,R7                                                    40170042
         IC    R7,XFCCWCC               PICK UP FAILING CCW CODE        40235042
         B     COMMON                                                   40300042
*                                                                       40365042
*                                                                       40430042
XDATE1   STM   R14,R15,L12(R13)         SAVE R14 & R 15          S21021 40495042
         BAL   R14,EXPANDER             BAL TO EXPAND REC        S21021 40560042
         STM   R0,R12,L20(R13)          SAVE REMAINDER OF REGS   S21021 40625042
         CLC   XDATE(L4),HEX00         IS DATE ZERO                     40690042
         BE    RETURN                   BR-ZERO                         40755042
         CLC   L0(L4,R3),HEX00          IS LOW DATE ZERO                40820042
         BNE   XDATE2                   BR-NO                           40885042
         MVC   L0(L4,R3),XDATE          MOVE IN DATE                    40950042
XDATE2   EQU   *                                                        41015042
         CLC   XDATE(L4),L0(R3)         CHECK FOR LOW DATE              41080042
         BL    SAVELOW                  LOWER SAVE IT                   41145042
         CLC   XDATE(L4),L4(R3)         CHECK FOR HI                    41210042
         BNH   RETURN                   BR-NOT HI                       41275042
SAVEHI   MVC   L4(L4,R3),XDATE          MOVE HI DATE                    41340042
         B     RETURN                                                   41405042
SAVELOW  MVC   L0(L4,R3),XDATE          MOVE LOW DATE                   41470042
         B     RETURN                                                   41535042
*                                                                S21021 41600042
*                                       ROUTINE TO SUM SDR CNTRS S21021 41665042
*                                                                S21021 41730042
SDR1L    IC    R15,SDR1                                          S21021 41795042
SDRLEFT  SLL   R15,L24                  SHIFT OFF UNUSED BITS    S21021 41860042
SDRADD   SRL   R15,L28                  MOVE IT BACK FOR ADD     S21021 41925042
         AH    R15,L0(R3)               ADD IN COUNTER           S21021 41990042
         STH   R15,L0(R3)               SAVE RESULT              S21021 42055042
         BR    R14  RETURN                                       S21021 42120042
SDR1R    IC    R15,SDR1                 PICK UP COUNTER          S21021 42185042
SDRRIGHT SLL   R15,L28                  SHIFT OFF UNUSED BITS    S21021 42250042
         B     SDRADD                                            S21021 42315042

COMMON   SR    R1,R1                                                    48620042
         L     R8,REG8             GET CURRENT PTR                      48685042
         IC    R1,L1(R8)           PICK UP NUMBER OF ITERATIONS         48750042
         LR    R5,R1               PLACE VALUE IN R5                    48815042
         SLL   R5,L2               MULTIPLY BY 2                        48880042
         AR    R5,R3               SET PTR TO POS PAST CTRS HOLDING     48945042
*                                  DATA - SUM COUNTER                   49010042
         LH    R4,HEXFF            PICK UP FULL FLG                     49075042
LOOP1    CH    R4,L0(R3)           IS THIS COUNT EMPTY                  49140042
         BNE   STORE               BR-YES NOT FFFF                      49205042
         CH    R7,L2(R3)           IS DATE EQUAL TO STORED              49270042
         BE    BUMP                YES                                  49335042
         LA    R3,L4(R3)           BUMP DATA PTR                        49400042
         LA    R5,L2(R5)           BUMP SUM PTR                         49465042
         BCT   R1,LOOP1            LOOP TILL DONE                       49530042
         B     RETURN              FULL RETURN                          49595042
STORE    STH   R4,L0(R3)           STORE FFFF FLAG                      49660042

         STH   R7,L2(R3)           STORE DATA                           49790042
         LA    R6,L1(R6)           BASED ON R5                          49855042
         STH   R6,L0(R5)                                                49920042

SETST1   STM   R5,R8,XSAVE              SAVE                     S20202 61360042
         CLC   L0(L2,R4),H3211          TEST FOR 3211            S20202 61425042
         BNE   IS3540                                          @Y30OPDP 61490042
         LA    R5,SENS3211              POINT AT SENSE LABELS    S21021 61555042
         ST    R5,YLABELP                                        S20202 61620042
         B     RETURNA                                           S20202 61685042

         BNE   RETURNA                                         @Y30OPDP 61705042
         LA    R5,SENS3540                                     @Y30OPDP 61715042
         ST    R5,YLABELP                                      @Y30OPDP 61725042
         B     RETURNA                                         @Y30OPDP 61735042
*                                                                S20202 61750042
*                                                                       61815042
SETVOL   MVC   L0(L6,R3),L0(R4)         MOV VOL LABEL TO LINE           61880042
         BR    R14                                                      61945042
CHKVOL   CLC   L0(L6,R4),YZERO          IS COUNTER IN USE               62010042
         BCR   L7,R14                   BR YES                          62075042
         SR    R15,R15                  DON'T PRINT LINE         S21021 62140042
         BR    R14                      RETURN                   S21021 62205042
CONVERT  STM   R5,R8,XSAVE              SAVE REGS                       62270042
         LH    R5,L0(R4)                PICK UP COUNT                   62335042
CONV1    CVD   R5,WORK                  CONVERT IT TO DEVIMALP          62400042
         UNPK  L0(L4,R3),WORK+L5(L3)    UNPACK IT      XA02745/YA02991  62465042
         MVZ   L3(L1,R3),L0(R3)         MOVE ZONE      XA02745/YA02991  62525042
RETURNA  LM    R5,R8,XSAVE              RESTORE REGS                    62595042
         BR    R14                                                      62660042
*                                                                       62725042
SKIPPER  BR    R14                      RETURN                          62790042
*                                                                       62855042
SETDATE  UNPK  WORK(L8),L0(L4,R4)       PACK DATE                       62920042
         MVZ   WORK+L7(L1),WORK         MOVE ON ZONE                    62985042
         MVC   L0(L3,R3),WORK+L5        MOVE DATE TO PRINT LINE         63050042
         MVC   L5(L2,R3),WORK+L3        MOVE YEAR TO PRINT LINE         63115042
         BR    R14                                                      63180042
*                                                                       63245042
CONVCC1  CLC   L0(L2,R4),HEXFFFF        IS THIS COUNTER EMPYT           63310042
         BCR   L8,R14                   NO TI IS FULL                   63375042
         SR    R15,R15                  STOP LINE PRINTING              63440042
         BR    R14                      RETURN                          63505042
*                                                                       63570042
*        FREEE COUNTERS AREA LAST THING DONE                            63635042
*                                                                       63700042
FREECTR  STM   R14,R12,L12(R13)         SAVE ALL REGS                   63765042
         LR    R12,R13                  SAVE SAVE AREA ADDR             63830042
         LA    R13,FSAVE                POINT TO MY SAVE                63895042
         ST    R12,L4(R13)              SET CHAINING POINTERS           63960042
         ST    R13,L8(R12)                                              64025042
         L     R3,L4(R2)                PICK UP POINTER TO NEXT COUNTER 64090042
         ST    R3,L28(R12)              SAVE POINTER IN REG SAVE        64155042
         LH    R0,SIZE                  PICK UP SIZE OF AREA            64220042
         LR    R1,R2                    SET ADDRESS                     64285042
         FREEMAIN R,LV=(0),A=(1)                                        64350042
         LTR   R3,R3                    ANY MORE COUNTERS               64415042
         BZ    RETURN0                  NO  RETURN                      64480042
         LA    R5,PENTRY+L10            POINT TO TOP ENTRY - 4          64545042
         ST    R5,YR9PTR                                                64610042
         LA    R5,LABELS-L1               POINT TO FIRST LABEL - 1      64675042
         ST    R5,YLABELP               STORE IT IN TABLE               64740042
RETURN0  L    R13,L4(R13)               PICK UP &                       64805042
         LM    R14,R12,L12(R13)         RESTOR E REGS                   64870042
         BR    R14                                                      64935042
SETDEV   STM   R5,R8,XSAVE              SAVE REGS                S21021 65000042
         LA    R6,DEVTABLE                                       S20202 65065042

         BE    SDEVFND                                           S20202 65260042
         LA    R6,L6(R6)                                         S20202 65325042

SETCPUNO STM   R5,R8,XSAVE              SAVE REGS                S21021 65780042
         SR    R5,R5                    CLEAAR R5                S21021 65845042
         IC    R5,0(R4)                 PICK UP                  S21021 65910042
         SLL   R5,R8                      CPU TYPE               S21021 65975042
         IC    R5,L1(R4)                    FIELD                S21021 66040042
         LTR   R5,R5                    IS TI ZERO?              S21021 66105042
         BNZ   RETURNA                  NO, LINE IS GOOD, RETURN S21021 66170042
         LA    R6,L64                   ELSE, BACK UP DATA PTR   S21021 66235042
         SR    R3,R6                    TO PUT IN NEW INFO       S21021 66300042
         MVC   0(L6,R3),SHARED          SAY MODEL SHARED       @Z427VLS 66365042

         LA    R6,FREELAB          DONE                        @XA15970 66608001

SETSTAT  DS    0H                                                S21021 66625042
         STM   R5,R8,XSAVE              SAVE REGS                S21021 66690042
         LA    R5,STATSECT-4            PNT TO EDITS FOR STATS   S21021 66755042
         ST    R5,YR9PTR                LET EREP KNOW            S21021 66820042
         LA    R5,STATLABS+1            PNTR FOR STAT LABELS     S21021 66885042
         ST    R5,YLABELP               SET FOR EREP             S21021 66950042
         LA    R5,L17(R5)               BUMP PAST FIRST LABEL    S21021 67015042
         LA    R6,L3            NUMBER OF ENTRIES              @XA15970 67080001
         LA    R8,STLBLIST              POINT TO FIRST LABEL ENTRS21021 67145042
STLBCOMP CLC   0(L2,R4),0(R8)           IS THIS THE DEVICE TYPE  S21021 67210042
         BE    STLBLTFD                 YES, GO MOVE LABELS      S21021 67275042
         LA    R8,L18(R8)               NO, BUMP TO NEXT         S21021 67340042
         BCT   R6,STLBCOMP              NOT DONE, GO BACK        S21021 67405042
         LA    R8,STLBDFLT              DONE, USE DEFAULT        S21021 67470042
STLBLTFD DS    0H                  LABELS FOUND                  S21021 67535042
         LA    R8,L2(R8)                USE LABELS               S21021 67600042
         LA    R7,L16(R8)               DETERMINE END POINT      S21021 67665042
         ST    R7,STLBLEND              SAVE FOR COMPARE         S21021 67730042
STLABLP  DS    0H                                                S21021 67795042
         CLI   0(R8),XFF                IS THIS 'NOT USED'       S21021 67860042
         BE    STLBLNUS                 YES, LABEL = 'NOT USED'  S21021 67925042
         SR    R7,R7                    CLEAR R7                 S21021 67990042
         IC    R7,0(R8)                 GET INDEX TO LABEL       S21021 68055042
         MH    R7,HW13                  MULTIPLY TO GET LABEL    S21021 68120042
         A     R7,STLBTBAD              SET TO LABEL             S21021 68185042
         MVC   L0(L13,R5),L0(R7)        MOVE IN LABEL            S21021 68250042
         B     STLBL001                                          S21021 68315042
STLBLNUS DS    0H                                                S21021 68380042
         MVC   L0(L13,R5),STLBNTUS      'NOT USED' LABEL         S21021 68445042
STLBL001 DS    0H                                                S21021 68510042
         LA    R5,L14(R5)               BUMP R5                  S21021 68575042
         LA    R7,STLBTABL              GET PROPER LABEL         S21021 68640042
         LA    R8,L1(R8)                POINT TO NEXT INDEX      S21021 68705042
         C     R8,STLBLEND              AT END OF LIST?          S21021 68770042
         BNE   STLABLP                  NO, CONTINUE             S21021 68835042
         B     RETURNA                                           S21021 68900042

         DC    C'$$$$$$'                                       @Y30OPDP 72981042
