         LINE                                                    S21021 95030042
         ROUTINE    YDUM1,FREECTR                                       95095042
         LABEL      ' '                                                 95160042
         DC    X'FF'                                                    95225042
         DC    XL6'00'                                                  95290042
         DC    C'$'                                                     95355042
LABELS   EQU   *                                                        95420042
         LSTART                                                         95485042
         END                                                            95550042
./  ADD  SSI=63170073,NAME=IFCSXXXB
         SPACE 2                                                        00050042
*  LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO            * 00100042
         MACRO                                                          00150042
&NAME    LINE  &DATA,&LABEL,&SKIP=                                      00200042
.*                            THIS MACRO ESTABLISHES THE MARGINS OR     00250042
.*                                 COLUMN SETTINGS FOR EACH LINE. IT    00300042
.*                                 GENERATES NECESSARY CARRIAGE CONTROL 00350042
.*                                 ENTRIES. LASTLY IT DETERMINES THE    00400042
.*                                 NUMBER OF ENTRIES ASSOCIATED WITH    00450042
.*                                 THE PREVIOUS LINE AND STORES THAT #  00500042
.*                                 INTO THE APPROPRIATE BYTE.           00550042
.*                            &DATA(1) - CHARACTER POSITION TO BEGIN    00600042
.*                                 DATA.                                00650042
.*                            &DATA(2) - # OF SPACES BETWEEN SUCCESSIVE 00700042
.*                                 DATA COLUMN STARTING CHARACTERS.     00750042
.*                            &LABEL(1) - CHAR. POS. TO BEGIN LABELS.   00800042
.*                            &LABEL(2) - # SPACES BETWEEN LINE'S LABEL 00850042
.*                                 STARTING CHARACTERS.                 00900042
.*                            &SKIP= - # OF LINES TO ADVANCE CARRIAGE   00950042
.*                                 TO BEGIN NEXT PRINTED LINE.          01000042
.*                            NEW ENTRIES ARE GENERATED ONLY WHEN       01050042
.*                                 NECESSARY. OMISSION OF ITEMS MEANS   01100042
.*                                 THEY HAVE NOT CHANGED SINCE PREVIOUS 01150042
.*                                 SETTINGS. A LINE MACRO IS REQUIRED   01200042
.*                                 FOR EACH PRINTED LINE. IF NO SETTING 01250042
.*                                 CHANGES ARE REQUIRED ALL OPERANDS    01300042
.*                                 ARE OMITTED IN WHICH CASE ONLY THE   01350042
.*                                 # OF ENTRIES FOR THE PREVIOUS LINE   01400042
.*                                 IS COMPUTED. THIS MACRO MUST BE THE  01450042
.*                                 FIRST MACRO INSTRUCTION ISSUED FOR   01500042
.*                                 THE SUBJECT LINE                     01550042
         GBLA  &DB,&DT,&LB,&LT,&NRENTS                                  01600042
         GBLA  &LASTCC,&INITIAL                                         01650042
         GBLC  &NRENTSX                                                 01700042
         GBLC  &CARRCON                                                 01750042
         GBLB  &TEST                                                    01800042
         LCLA  &S                                                       01850042
&NAME    DS    0C                                                       01900042
         AIF   (&INITIAL EQ 0).FIRSTLN                                  01950042
         LINEND                                                         02000042
         AGO   .NTFIRST                                                 02050042
.FIRSTLN ANOP                                                           02100042
&NRENTSX SETC  'N&SYSNDX'                                               02150042
&INITIAL SETA  1                                                        02200042
N&SYSNDX EQU   *                                                        02250042
.NTFIRST ANOP                                                           02300042
         DC    AL1(0)                                                   02350042
         AIF   ('&DATA(1)' EQ '').CKDTABS                               02400042
         AIF   (&DATA(1) EQ &DB).CKDTABS                                02450042
&DB      SETA  &DATA(1)                                                 02500042
         AGO   .AA                                                      02550042
.CKDTABS AIF   ('&DATA(2)' EQ '').NCDATA                                02600042
         AIF   (&DATA(2) EQ &DT).NCDATA                                 02650042
         AGO   .CC                                                      02700042
.AA      AIF   ('&DATA(2)' EQ '').BB                                    02750042
         AIF   (&DATA(2) EQ &DT).BB                                     02800042
.CC      ANOP                                                           02850042
&DT      SETA  &DATA(2)                                                 02900042
.BB      DC    XL2'FFFE'                                                02950042
         DC    FL1'&DB'                                                 03000042
         DC    FL1'&DT'                                                 03050042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                03100042
.NCDATA  ANOP                                                           03150042
         AIF   ('&LABEL(1)' EQ '').CKLTABS                              03200042
         AIF   (&LABEL(1) EQ &LB).CKLTABS                               03250042
&LB      SETA  &LABEL(1)                                                03300042
         AGO   .AAA                                                     03350042
.CKLTABS AIF   ('&LABEL(2)' EQ '').NCLABEL                              03400042
         AIF   (&LABEL(2) EQ &LT).NCLABEL                               03450042
         AGO   .CCC                                                     03500042
.AAA     AIF   ('&LABEL(2)' EQ '').BBB                                  03550042
         AIF   (&LABEL(2) EQ &LT).BBB                                   03600042
.CCC     ANOP                                                           03650042
&LT      SETA  &LABEL(2)                                                03700042
.BBB     DC    XL2'FFFF'                                                03750042
         DC    FL1'&LB'                                                 03800042
         DC    FL1'&LT'                                                 03850042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                03900042
.NCLABEL ANOP                                                           03950042
         AIF   ('&SKIP' NE '').CONT                                     04000042
         AIF   (&TEST EQ 0).NOCHANG                                     04050042
&S       SETA  &LASTCC                                                  04100042
         AGO   .DEFAULT                                                 04150042
.CONT    ANOP                                                           04200042
         AIF   (&TEST EQ 0).AB                                          04250042
&S       SETA  &SKIP                                                    04300042
.DEFAULT ANOP                                                           04350042
         ORG   &CARRCON+3                                               04400042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&S),AL.3(1)                                 04450042
         ORG                                                            04500042
&LASTCC  SETA  &S                                                       04550042
&TEST    SETB  0                                                        04600042
         AGO   .DD                                                      04650042
.AB      AIF   (&SKIP EQ &LASTCC).NOCHANG                               04700042
A&SYSNDX DC    XL2'FFFB'                                                04750042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&SKIP),AL.3(1)                              04800042
         DC    FL1'9'                                                   04850042
&LASTCC  SETA  &SKIP                                                    04900042
&TEST    SETB  1                                                        04950042
&CARRCON SETC  'A&SYSNDX'                                               05000042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                05050042
.DD      ANOP                                                           05100042
.NOCHANG ANOP                                                           05150042
         MEND                                                           05200042
         EJECT                                                          05250042
         SPACE 2                                                        05300042
*  ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO* 05350042
         MACRO                                                          05400042
&NAME    ROUTINE &LOGITEM,&RNAME                                        05450042
         GBLC  &DSECT,&CSECT                                            05500042
         GBLC  &ITEM(1000)                                              05550042
         GBLA  &SHIFT(1000),&ITEMNBR                                    05600042
         GBLA  &NRENTS                                                  05650042
         LCLA  &ISHIFT,&NDX                                             05700042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           05750042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   05800042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      05850042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  05900042
         MNOTE *,'LOG ITEM NOT DEFINED'                                 05950042
         MEXIT                                                          06000042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           06050042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             06100042
&NAME    DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'D'                           06150042
         DC    AL.4(&ISHIFT),AL.12(&RNAME-&CSECT)                       06200042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                06250042
         MEND                                                           06300042
*  DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO        * 06350042
         SPACE 2                                                        06400042
         MACRO                                                          06450042
&NAME    DSGEN                                                          06470042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES ONE DSECT WORD       06490042
.*                                 FORMATTED FOR THE SUBJECT LOG RECORD 06510042
.*                                 EACH OPERAND HAS TWO SUB LISTS. THE  06530042
.*                                 FIRST IS THE NAME OF THE LOG ITEM    06550042
.*                                 WHILE THE SECOND IS THE # OF BITS TO 06570042
.*                                 ALLOCATE FOR THIS ITEM. ITEMS MUST   06590042
.*                                 BE DEFINED CONTIGUOUSLY WITHOUT GAPS 06610042
.*                                 UNUSED BIT GROUPS MUST BE GIVEN      06630042
.*                                 DUMMY NAMES. THE NAMES PROVIDED FOR  06650042
.*                                 THE LOG ITEMS MAY THEN BE USED IN    06670042
.*                                 THE CONVERSION MACRO INSTRUCTIONS.   06690042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000)                                               06710042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000)                         06730042
         LCLB  &ONLY1,&CTIND                                            06750042
         LCLA  &START1,&START2,&END1,&END2                              06770042
         LCLC  &SYMBOL,&EQUSYM                                          06790042
         LCLA  &OP,&COUNT,&BYTE,&EQUCNT                                 06810042
         ACTR  100000                                                   06830042
.START   AIF   (N'&SYSLIST(&OP+1) LT 3).LOOP                            06850042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP+1,3)' EQ 'EQU').LOOP     TEST FOR EQU     06870042
  AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP+1,3)' EQ '' AND '&SYSLIST(&OP+1,4)' EQ '').ERR1  06890042
  AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP+1,3)' EQ '' OR '&SYSLIST(&OP+1,4)' EQ '').ERR1   06910042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP+1,3)' GT '&SYSLIST(&OP+1,4)').ERR3        06930042
&START1  SETA  &SYSLIST(&OP+1,3)        GET START COUNT OF 1            06950042
&START2  SETA  &SYSLIST(&OP+1,4)        GET FIRST END COUNT             06970042
         AGO   .SET2A                   BRANCH AROUND                   06990042
.ERR1    MNOTE '**FIRST SYMBOL CONCATENATION INCOMPLETE**'              07010042
         MEXIT                                                          07030042
.SET2A   AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP+1,5)' EQ ''AND '&SYSLIST(&OP+1,6)' EQ '' X07050042
               ).SET2                   TEST FOR NO SECOND              07070042
  AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP+1,5)' EQ '' OR '&SYSLIST(&OP+1,6)' EQ '').ERR2   07090042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP+1,5)' GT '&SYSLIST(&OP+1,6)').ERR3        07110042
&END1    SETA  &SYSLIST(&OP+1,5)        GET START COUNT OF 2            07130042
&END2    SETA  &SYSLIST(&OP+1,6)        GET END COUNT OF 2              07150042
         AGO   .LOOP                                                    07170042
.SET2    ANOP                                                           07190042
&ONLY1   SETB  1                        INDICATE ONLY ONE CONCATENATION 07210042
         AGO   .LOOP                                                    07230042
.ERR2    MNOTE '**SECOND SYMBOL CONCATENATION INCOMPLETE**'             07250042
         MEXIT                                                          07270042
.ERR3    MNOTE '**START GREATER THAN END CONCATENATION**'               07290042
         MEXIT                                                          07310042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           07330042
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    07350042
         AIF   (&OP GT N'&SYSLIST).DONE      TEST IF ALL DONE           07370042
&ITEMNBR SETA  &ITEMNBR+1                                               07390042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,2)' NE '').OK1                            07410042
         MNOTE '**NULL BIT COUNT FIELD**'                               07430042
         MEXIT                                                          07450042
.OK1     ANOP                                                           07470042
&SYMBOL  SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP,1)'                                        07490042
         AIF   ('&SYMBOL' NE '').OK                                     07510042
*              *****     LOG ITEM SYMBOL NOT PROVIDED     *****         07530042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,3)' NE 'EQU').CNT                         07550042
         AGO   .START                   GET NEXT                        07570042
.OK      AIF   (N'&SYSLIST(&OP) LT 3).NO3    TEST FOR OLD FORMAT        07590042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,3)' EQ 'EQU').EQU   TEST FOR EQU          07610042
         AIF   (&ONLY1).OK2             TEST FOR ONLY ONE CONCAT        07630042
&SYMBOL  SETC  '&SYMBOL.&START1.&END1'       GET 1 AND 2 CONCAT         07650042
         AGO   .NO3                     BRANCH AROUND                   07670042
.OK2     ANOP                                                           07690042
&SYMBOL  SETC  '&SYMBOL.&START1'        GET 1 CONCATENATED              07710042
.NO3     ANOP                                                           07730042
&SYMBOL  EQU   *+&BYTE                                                  07750042
&ITEM(&ITEMNBR) SETC '&SYMBOL'          GET LABEL IN GLOBAL             07770042
&BITS(&ITEMNBR) SETA &SYSLIST(&OP,2)                                    07790042
&SHIFT(&ITEMNBR) SETA &COUNT-&BYTE*8                                    07810042
.CNT     ANOP                                                           07830042
&CTIND   SETB  1                        SET COUNT INDICATOR             07850042
&COUNT   SETA  &COUNT+&SYSLIST(&OP,2)                                   07870042
&BYTE    SETA  &COUNT/8                                                 07890042
         AIF   (N'&SYSLIST(&OP) LT 3).START  TEST FOR OLD FORMAT        07910042
         AIF   (&ONLY1).TSTST           TEST FOR ONLY ONE CONCAT        07930042
         AIF   (&END1 EQ &END2).TSTST   TEST FOR SECOND END             07950042
&END1    SETA  &END1+1                  INCREMENT COUNT                 07970042
&OP      SETA  &OP-1                    DECREMENT INCREMENT             07990042
         AGO   .LOOP                    GENERATE NEXT                   08010042
.TSTST   ANOP                                                           08030042
         AIF   (&START1 EQ &START2).LPDONE   TEST FOR END               08050042
         AIF   (&ONLY1).NSET1           TEST FOR ONLY ONE CONCAT        08070042
&END1    SETA  &SYSLIST(&OP,5)          RE-INIT SECOND START COUNT      08090042
.NSET1   ANOP                                                           08110042
&OP      SETA  &OP-1                    DECREMENT INDEX                 08130042
&START1  SETA  &START1+1                INCREMENT FIRST COUNT           08150042
         AGO   .LOOP                    GO DO NEXT                      08170042
.LPDONE  ANOP                                                           08190042
&ONLY1   SETB  0                        CLEAR INDICATOR                 08210042
         AGO   .START                   GO TEST FOR MORE SUB-LISTS      08230042
.DONE    AIF   (&COUNT-&COUNT/8*8 NE 0).ERR  TEST FOR MULTIPLE OF EIGHT 08250042
         AIF   (&CTIND EQ 0).END        NO DS IF NO COUNT               08270042
&COUNT   SETA  &COUNT/8                 GET NUMBER OF BYTES             08290042
&NAME    DS    &COUNT.C                                                 08310042
.END     MEXIT                                                          08330042
.ERR     MNOTE '**BIT COUNT FLDS DO NOT TOTAL MULTIPLE OF 8**'          08350042
         MEXIT                                                          08370042
.EQU     AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,4)' NE '').EQU1     TEST FOR NULL LABEL   08390042
.ERR4    MNOTE '**EQU OPERAND OMITTED OR NOT FOUND**'                   08410042
         MEXIT                                                          08430042
.EQU1    AIF   (&SYSLIST(&OP,2) LT 16).EQU2  COUNT OVER FIFTEEN         08450042
*****               THE FOLLOWING STATEMENT                *****        08470042
*****     NUMBER OF BITS EXCEED 15 - DO NOT USE AS BIN     *****        08490042
.EQU2    ANOP                                                           08510042
&EQUCNT  SETA  0                        CLEAR COUNTER                   08530042
&EQUSYM  SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP,4)'        GET EQU OPERAND                 08550042
.EQULOP  ANOP                                                           08570042
&EQUCNT  SETA  &EQUCNT+1                INCREMENT INDEX                 08590042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&EQUCNT)' EQ '&EQUSYM').EQUOUT  LABEL FOUND?     08610042
         AIF   (&EQUCNT EQ &ITEMNBR).ERR4    ALL TESTED?                08630042
         AGO   .EQULOP                  NO-GET NEXT                     08650042
.EQUOUT  ANOP                                                           08670042
&ITEM(&ITEMNBR) SETC '&SYMBOL'          GET LABEL NAME                  08690042
&BITS(&ITEMNBR) SETA &SYSLIST(&OP,2)    GET NUMBER OF BITS              08710042
&SHIFT(&ITEMNBR) SETA &SHIFT(&EQUCNT)   GET SHIFT COUNT                 08730042
&SYMBOL  EQU   &EQUSYM                  THIS SYMBOL EQUATED             08750042
         AGO   .START                   RETURN FOR NEXT                 08770042
         MEND                                                           08790042
         MACRO                                                          08850042
         LINEND                                                         08900042
.*                            THIS MACRO IS USED ONLY BY THE LINE       08950042
.*                                 MACRO TO SET THE NUMBER OF ENTRIES   09000042
.*                                 ASSOCIATED WITH EACH LINE.           09050042
         GBLA  &NRENTS                                                  09100042
         GBLC &NRENTSX                                                  09150042
         ORG   &NRENTSX                                                 09200042
         DC    FL1'&NRENTS'                                             09250042
         ORG                                                            09300042
&NRENTS  SETA  0                                                        09350042
B&SYSNDX EQU   *                                                        09400042
&NRENTSX SETC  'B&SYSNDX'                                               09450042
         MEND                                                           09500042
         SPACE 2                                                        09550042
         EJECT                                                          09600042
*  LABEL MACRO     LABEL MACRO     LABEL MACRO     LABEL MACRO        * 09650042
         SPACE 2                                                        09700042
         MACRO                                                          09750042
&NAME    LABEL &LABEL1,&LABEL2,&LABEL3,&LABEL4,&LABEL5,&LABEL6,        C09800042
               &LABEL7,&LABEL8                                          09850042
.*                            THIS MACRO ALLOWS UP TO ACHT LABELS TO    09900042
.*                                 BE SPECIFIED FOR A GIVEN LINE. THE   09950042
.*                                 LABELS SHOULD BE ENCLOSED IN QUOTA-  10000042
.*                                 TION MARKS. THE COLUMN AND LINE END  10050042
.*                                 CONTROLS WILL BE INSERTED BY THE     10100042
.*                                 MACRO. OMITTED OPERANDS MEAN NO      10150042
.*                                 LABEL REQUIRED FOR RESPECTIVE        10200042
.*                                 COLUMN. THIS MACRO WILL ALSO ALERT   10250042
.*                                 THE PROGRAMMER TO EXACTLY WHERE THE  10300042
.*                                 TABLE MUST BE BROKEN IF NECESSARY    10350042
.*                                 TO AVOID EXCEEDING THE MAXIMUM LIMIT 10400042
         GBLC &LABELS(2000)                                             10450042
         GBLC  &LBL(100)                                                10500042
         GBLA  &LBLCTR(100)                                             10550042
         GBLA  &LABELNR                                                 10600042
         GBLA  &NRENTS,&LPTR                                            10650042
         LCLC  &MARGIN,&TACK                                            10700042
         LCLC  &TEXT                                                    10750042
         LCLA  &OP,&K,&START,&NRCHAR,&REMAIN                            10800042
&MARGIN  SETC  '*'                                                      10850042
         AIF   ('&NAME' EQ '').LOOPOUT                                  10900042
&LPTR    SETA  &LPTR+1                                                  10950042
&LBL(&LPTR) SETC '&NAME'                                                11000042
&LBLCTR(&LPTR) SETA &LABELNR+1                                          11050042
.LOOPOUT ANOP                                                           11100042
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    11150042
&K       SETA  K'&SYSLIST(&OP)                                          11200042
         AIF (&K GE 2).NORM                                             11250042
&K       SETA  2                                                        11300042
.NORM    ANOP                                                           11350042
&START   SETA  2                                                        11400042
         AIF (&OP LT N'&SYSLIST).NOTLAST                                11450042
&MARGIN  SETC  '$'                                                      11500042
.NOTLAST ANOP                                                           11550042
&NRCHAR  SETA  8                                                        11600042
&TACK    SETC  ''                                                       11650042
.LOOPIN  ANOP                                                           11700042
&REMAIN  SETA  &K-&START                                                11750042
         AIF (&REMAIN GE 8).MORE                                        11800042
&TACK    SETC  '&MARGIN'                                                11850042
&NRCHAR  SETA  &REMAIN                                                  11900042
.MORE    ANOP                                                           11950042
&TEXT    SETC  ''                                                       12000042
         AIF (&REMAIN EQ 0).ENDTEXT                                     12050042
&TEXT    SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP)'(&START,&NRCHAR)                          12100042
.ENDTEXT ANOP                                                           12150042
&LABELNR SETA  &LABELNR+1                                               12200042
&LABELS(&LABELNR) SETC '&TEXT'.'&TACK'                                  12250042
&START   SETA  &START+8                                                 12300042
         AIF ('&TACK' EQ '').LOOPIN                                     12350042
         AIF ('&TACK' EQ '*').LOOPOUT                                   12400042
         MEND                                                           12450042
         SPACE 2                                                        12500042
         MACRO                                                          12550042
         LSTART                                                         12600042
.*                            THIS MACRO IS ISSUED WHEN THE LABEL AREA  12650042
.*                                 OF THE TABLE IS TO BEGIN.            12700042
         GBLC &LABELS(2000)                                             12750042
         GBLA  &LABELNR                                                 12800042
         GBLC  &LBL(100)                                                12850042
         GBLA  &LBLCTR(100)                                             12900042
         LCLA  &NDX,&CTR                                                12950042
         LINEND                                                         13000042
&CTR     SETA  1                                                        13050042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           13100042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   13150042
         AIF   (&LBLCTR(&CTR) NE &NDX).NOLBL                            13200042
&LBL(&CTR) DC  C'&LABELS(&NDX)'                                         13250042
&CTR     SETA  &CTR+1                                                   13300042
         AGO   .LOOPCTL                                                 13350042
.NOLBL   ANOP                                                           13400042
         DC    C'&LABELS(&NDX)'                                         13450042
.LOOPCTL AIF   (&NDX LT &LABELNR).LOOP                                  13500042
         MEND                                                           13550042
         SPACE 2                                                        13600042
*  BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO  * 13650042
         SPACE 2                                                        13700042
         MACRO                                                          13750042
         BIN   &LOGITEM,&SKIP$OR                                        13800042
.*                                 &LOGITEM - NAME OF ITEM IN LOG       13850042
.*                                      RECORD DSECT                    13900042
.*                                 &SKIP$OR - NBR OF SPACES TO SKIP ON  13950042
.*                                 MULTIPLE PRINT OR NBR OF SPACES      14000042
.*                                      TO BACK UP FROM COLUMN FOR      14050042
.*                                      START OF PRINTING. THE LETTER   14100042
.*                                      B PRECEEDS THE NUMBER (B5) IF   14150042
.*                                      THE LATTER IS DESIRED. OMISSION 14200042
.*                                      OF THIS OPERAND FORCES OPTION 2 14250042
.*                                      WITH BACKUP SPACING EQUAL TO    14300042
.*                                 THE NUMBER OF BITS IN THE ITEM       14350042
.*                                 DEFINITION (VIA MACRO 'DSGEN').      14400042
.*                            A LIMIT OF 15 BITS IS IMPOSED FOR THE     14450042
.*                                 TOTAL NUMBER OF BITS TO PRINT.       14500042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000)                                               14550042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000),&NRENTS                 14600042
         GBLC  &DSECT                                                   14650042
         LCLB  &B                                                       14700042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&K                                   14750042
         LCLA  &TEMP,&T                                                 14800042
         LCLC  &S                                                       14850042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           14900042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   14950042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      15000042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  15050042
         MNOTE *,'YOU BLEW IT'                                          15100042
         ROUTINE DUM,SKIPPER                                            15150042
         MEXIT                                                          15200042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           15250042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             15300042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              15350042
&T       SETA  &IBITS-1                                                 15400042
&B       SETB  0                                                        15450042
         AIF   ('&SKIP$OR' EQ '').BACKUP                                15500042
&K       SETA  K'&SKIP$OR                                               15550042
&B       SETB  ('&SKIP$OR'(1,1) EQ 'B')                                 15600042
&S       SETC  '&SKIP$OR'(&B+1,&K-&B)                                   15650042
&T       SETA  &S                                                       15700042
.BACKUP  ANOP                                                           15750042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                15800042
&TEMP    SETA  &ISHIFT                                                  15850042
A&SYSNDX DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'&TEMP'                       15900042
         AIF (&IBITS EQ 1 AND &B EQ 0).OUT                              15950042
         ORG   A&SYSNDX                                                 16000042
&B       SETB  1                                                        16050042
         DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'C'                           16100042
         DC    BL.1'&B',AL.7(&T),AL.4(&IBITS),FL.4'&ISHIFT'             16150042
.OUT     ANOP                                                           16200042
         MEND                                                           16250042
         EJECT                                                          16300042
*  HEX MACRO     HEX MACRO     HEX MACRO    HEXN MACRO     HEX MACRO  * 16350042
         SPACE 2                                                        16400042
         MACRO                                                          16450042
         HEX   &LOGITEM,&SKIP$OR,&BYTES                                 16500042
.*                            THIS MACRO FACILITATES GENERATION OF THE  16550042
.*                                 TABLE ENTRIES SPECIFYING HEX TYPE    16600042
.*                                 CONVERSIONS.                         16650042
.*                            &LOGITEM - NAME OF DATA ITEM TO BE        16700042
.*                                 CONVERTED                            16750042
.*                            &SKIP$OR - NUMBER OF SPACES TO SKIP ON    16800042
.*                                 MULTIPLE PRINT OR NBR OF SPACES TO   16850042
.*                                 BACK UP FROM COLUMN FOR START OF     16900042
.*                                 PRINTING. THE LETTER B PRECEEDS THE  16950042
.*                                 NUMBER (B8) IF THE LATTER OPTION IS  17000042
.*                                 DESIRED. OMISSION OF THIS OPERAND    17050042
.*                                 FORCES OPTION 2 WITH BACKUP SPACING  17100042
.*                                 EQUAL TO THE NUMBER OF BYTES SPECI-  17150042
.*                                 FIED BY THE NEXT OPERAND (TWICE THIS 17200042
.*                                 NUMBER IF SUFFIX IS EXPLICITLY OR    17250042
.*                                 IMPLICITLY B).                       17300042
.*                            &BYTES - NUMBER OF TOTAL INPUT BYTES TO   17350042
.*                                 PROCESS. THIS NUMBER IS SUFFIXED     17400042
.*                                 WITH AN L,R, OR B TO STIPULATE       17450042
.*                                 PRINTING OF THE LEFT HALF, RIGHT     17500042
.*                                 HALF, OR BOTH HALVES OF THE BYTE     17550042
.*                                 RESPECTIVELY. OMISSION OF THIS       17600042
.*                                 OPERAND DEFAULTS TO B WITH THE NUM-  17650042
.*                                 BER OF BYTES EQUAL TO THE ITEM LNGTH 17700042
.*                            A NEW ENTRY IS GENERATED ONLY WHEN NECES- 17750042
.*                                 SARY. THIS MACRO MUST BE THE FIRST   17800042
.*                                 MACRO INSTRUCTION ISSUED FOR THE     17850042
.*                                 SUBJECT LINE(S).                     17900042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000),&DSECT                                        17950042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000),&NRENTS                 18000042
         LCLB  &B                                                       18050042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&K,&T,&CODE,&BYTESP                  18100042
         LCLC  &S,&LETTER                                               18150042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           18200042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   18250042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      18300042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  18350042
         MNOTE *,'LOG ITEM NOT DEFINED'                                 18400042
         MEXIT                                                          18450042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           18500042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             18550042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              18600042
&CODE    SETA  1                                                        18650042
&K       SETA  K'&BYTES                                                 18700042
         AIF   (&IBITS-(&IBITS/4)*4 EQ 0).OK                            18750042
         MNOTE *,'BIT LENGTH SPECIFICATION INCONSISTENT WITH CONTROL'   18800042
         MEXIT                                                          18850042
.OK      AIF   ('&BYTES' EQ '').USEDEFN                                 18900042
&LETTER  SETC  '&BYTES'(&K,1)                                           18950042
&S       SETC  '&BYTES'(1,&K-1)                                         19000042
&BYTESP  SETA  &S                                                       19050042
         AIF   ('&LETTER' EQ 'B').BOTH                                  19100042
         AIF   (&ISHIFT EQ 0 OR &ISHIFT EQ 4).OK2                       19150042
.ERR     MNOTE *,'DATA NOT ALLIGNED ON HEX OR BYTE BOUNDARY'            19200042
         MEXIT                                                          19250042
.USEDEFN ANOP                                                           19300042
&BYTESP  SETA  &IBITS/8                                                 19350042
.BOTH    AIF   (&ISHIFT NE 0).ERR                                       19400042
&CODE    SETA  3                                                        19450042
&T       SETA  &BYTESP*2-1                                              19500042
&S       SETC  '&T'                                                     19550042
.OK2     AIF   (&ISHIFT EQ 0).L                                         19600042
&CODE    SETA  2                                                        19650042
.L       ANOP                                                           19700042
&B       SETB  1                                                        19750042
         AIF   ('&SKIP$OR' EQ '').BACKUP                                19800042
&K       SETA  K'&SKIP$OR                                               19850042
&B       SETB  ('&SKIP$OR'(1,1) EQ 'B')                                 19900042
&S       SETC  '&SKIP$OR'(&B+1,&K-&B)                                   19950042
.BACKUP  ANOP                                                           20000042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                20050042
         DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'A'                           20100042
         DC    BL.1'&B',FL.7'&S',FL.4'&BYTESP',FL.4'&CODE'              20150042
.OUT     ANOP                                                           20200042
         MEND                                                           20250042
         MACRO                                                          20300042
&NAME    SPECIAL  &ROUTINE,&PARAM,&SPACE=                        XM9111 20350042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES A SPECIAL ROUTINE    20400042
.*                                 ENTRY TO BE PROCESSED BY THE SUM. M. 20450042
.*                            &ROUTINE - SYMBOL ON SPECIAL ROUTINE EWT. 20500042
.*                            &PARAM - AN 8 BIT BINARY REPRESENTATION   20550042
.*                                 TO OCCUPY THE 'MASK' FIELD BUT TO BE 20600042
.*                                 INTERPRETED AS AN ARGUMENT OF THE    20650042
.*                                 SPECIAL ROUTINE.                     20700042
.*                            &SPACE - THE NUMBER OF 2BYTE COUNTERS TO  20750042
.*                                 ALLOCATE FOR REQUIRED PROCESSING.    20800042
         GBLC  &CSECT                                                   20850042
         GBLA  &COUNTR                                                  20900042
         LCLA  &ADD                                                     20950042
&NAME    DC    AL1(128)                                          XM9111 21000042
         DC    BL.8'&PARAM'                                             21050042
         DC    AL2(&ROUTINE-&CSECT)                                     21100042
         DC    AL2(&COUNTR)                                             21150042
&ADD     SETA  1                                                        21200042
         AIF   ('&SPACE' EQ '').NORM                                    21250042
&ADD     SETA  &SPACE                                                   21300042
.NORM    ANOP                                                           21350042
&COUNTR  SETA  &COUNTR+&ADD                                             21400042
         MEND                                                           21450042
         MACRO                                                          21500042
         SUM   &LOGITEM,&MASK                                           21550042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES A NORMAL EDIT ENTRY  21600042
.*                                 FOR PROCESSING BY THE SUMMARY MODULE 21650042
.*                            &LOGITEM - NAME OF DATA ITEM TO BE SUMMED 21700042
.*                            &MASK - BYTE MASK FOR BITS TO BE TESTED.  21750042
.*                                 THIS OPERAND SHOULD BE OMITTED FOR   21800042
.*                                 SINGLE BIT ITEMS IN WHICH CASE THE   21850042
.*                                 MASK WILL BE SET ACCORDING TO THE    21900042
.*                                 OFF BYTE BIT DISPLACEMENT OF THE     21950042
.*                                ITEM AS DEFINED BY THE MACRO 'DSGEN'  22000042
         GBLA  &COUNTR,&ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000)                22050042
         GBLC  &ITEM(1000),&DSECT                                       22100042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&M,&BITNBR                           22150042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           22200042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   22250042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      22300042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  22350042
         MNOTE *,'LOGITEM NOT FOUND'                                    22400042
         MEXIT                                                          22450042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           22500042
         DC    AL1(0)                                                   22550042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             22600042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              22650042
         AIF   ('&MASK' EQ '').FORM                                     22700042
         DC    B'&MASK'                                                 22750042
         AGO   .ITEM                                                    22800042
.FORM    ANOP                                                           22850042
&BITNBR  SETA  &ISHIFT-7                                                22900042
&BITNBR  SETA  0-&BITNBR                                                22950042
&M       SETA  1                                                        23000042
.LOOP2   ANOP                                                           23050042
         AIF   (&BITNBR EQ 0).GOTIT                                     23100042
&M       SETA  &M*2                                                     23150042
&BITNBR  SETA  &BITNBR-1                                                23200042
         AGO   .LOOP2                                                   23250042
.GOTIT   ANOP                                                           23300042
         DC    AL1(&M)                                                  23350042
.ITEM    DC    AL2(&LOGITEM-&DSECT)                                     23400042
         DC    AL2(&COUNTR)                                             23450042
&COUNTR  SETA  &COUNTR+1                                                23500042
         MEND                                                           23550042
         GBLC  &DSECT                                                   23600042
         GBLC  &CSECT                                                   23650042
&CSECT   SETC  'IFCSXXXB'                                               23700042
&DSECT   SETC  'XXXB'                                                   23750042
         TITLE 'IFCSXXXB-SUMMARY TABLE FOR 3420 TAPES'                  23800042
IFCSXXXB CSECT                                                          23850042
XXXB     DSECT                                                          23900042
         DSGEN (CLASSRC,8),(SYSREL,8),(SWITCHES,16),(SPARES,32)         23950042
         DSGEN (DATE,32),(TIME,32)                                      24000042
         DSGEN (SPARE1,8),(CPUSER,24),(CPUID,16),(SPARE2,16)            24050042
         DSGEN (JOBID,64)                                               24100042
         DSGEN (COMMCODE,8),(DATAADDR,24),(FLAGS,8),(RESERVED,8),      C24150042
               (CCWCOUNT,16)                                            24200042
         DSGEN (CSWKEY,8),(COMMADDR,24),(ATTEN,1),(STATMOD,1),         C24250042
               (CONTUEND,1),(BUSY,1),(CHANEND,1),(DEVEND,1),           C24300042
               (UNITCHK,1),(UNITEXEP,1),(PCI,1),(WRNGLENG,1),          C24350042
               (PROGCHK,1),(PROTCHK,1),(DATACHK,1),(CNTLCHK,1),        C24400042
               (IFCTLCHK,1),(CHAINCHK,1),(CSWCOUNT,16)                  24450042
         DSGEN (DDCOUNT,8),(SECONCUA,24),(DEVTYPE,32)                   24500042
         DSGEN (SDRCOUNT,8),(PRIMCUA,24),(IORETRYS,16),(SNSBYTES,16)    24550042
         DSGEN (VOLID,48),(BLKLENG,16)                                  24600042
         DSGEN (DUM2,32),(TEMPRDS,8),(TEMPWRTS,8),(SIOCNT,16)           24650042
         DSGEN (PERMRDS,8),(PERMWRTS,8),(NOISEBLK,8),(MODESET,8)        24700042
         DSGEN (ERASEGPS,16),(CLNRACTS,16)                              24750042
         DSGEN (DUM3,8),(NOISE,8),(RWVRC,8),(MTELRCR,8)                 24800042
         DSGEN (EDCCRC,8),(ENVCKVRC,8),(OVERRUN,4),(SKEWCHK,4),        C24850042
               (CCOMPARE,4),(WRTTRVRC,4)                                24900042
         DSGEN (PEIDCHK,1),(MASKEXP,6),(PARITY,1),(TRKINERR,8),        C24950042
               (WRTTMCHK,4),(STRDCHK,4),(PARTREC,4),(EXCPAMB,4)         25000042
         DSGEN  (ORDROP,4),(FEEDTHRU,4),(EXP,4),(EARLBGRD,4),          C25050042
               (EARLNDRD,4),(SLBGRD,4),(SLWNDRD,4),(VELRETRY,4),       C25100042
               (EXP2,4),(VELCHNG,4),(EXP3,8),(BACKWARD,8),             C25150042
               (BUSOCHK,4),(ALUHRDER,4)                                 25200042
         DSGEN (SNB000,1),(SNB001,1),(SNB002,1),(SNB003,1),(SNB004,1), C25250042
               (SNB005,1),(SNB006,1),(SNB007,1),(SNB010,1),(SNB011,1), C25300042

         DSGEN (SNB040,1),(SNB041,1),(SNB042,1),(SNB043,1),(SNB044,1), C25600042

               (SNB057,1),(SNB060,1),(SNB061,1),(SNB062,1),(SNB063,1), C25750042

               (SNB071,1),(SNB072,1),(SNB073,1),(SNB074,1),(SNB075,1), C25850042

         DSGEN (SNB080,1),                                             C25950042
               (SNB081,1),(SNB082,1),(SNB083,1),(SNB084,1),(SNB085,1), C26000042

         DSGEN (SNB120,1),(SNB121,1),(SNB122,1),(SNB123,1),(SNB124,1), C26350042

               (TUSERIAL,16),(SNB170,1),(SNB171,1),                    C26450042

               (SNB205,1),(SNB206,1),(SNB207,1),(SNB210,1),(SNB211,1), C26800042

               (SNB236,1),(SNB237,1)                                    27050042
IFCSXXXB CSECT                                                          27100042
         USING XXXB,R2                                                  27150042
         USING *,R9                                                     27200042
*                                                                     * 27250042
*                  SUMMARY MODULE FOR DEVICE 3420                     * 27300042
*                                                                     * 27350042
         DC    A(ENTRIES)                                               27400042
         DC    A(PEDIT)                                                 27450042
REG8     DC    F'0'                                                     27500042
SCSIZE   DC   H'280'                                                    27550042
R0       EQU   0                                                        27600042
R1       EQU   1                                                        27650042
R2       EQU   2                                                        27700042
R3       EQU   3                                                        27750042
R4       EQU   4                                                        27800042
R5       EQU   5                                                        27850042
R6       EQU   6                                                        27900042
R7       EQU   7                                                        27950042
R8       EQU   8                                               @Z427VLS 27970042
R9       EQU   9                                                        28000042
R12      EQU   12                                                       28050042
R13      EQU   13                                                       28100042
R14      EQU   14                                                       28150042
R15      EQU   15                                                       28200042
L0       EQU   0                                                        28250042
L1       EQU   1                                                        28300042
L2       EQU   2                                                        28350042
L3       EQU   3                                                        28400042
L4       EQU   4                                                        28450042
L5       EQU   5                                                        28500042
L6       EQU   6                                                        28550042
L8       EQU   8                                                        28600042
L9       EQU   9                                               @Z427VLS 28620042
L10      EQU   10                                                       28650042
L12      EQU   12                                                       28700042
L16      EQU   16                                                       28750042
L20      EQU   20                                              @Z427VLS 28770042
L24      EQU   24                                                       28800042
L28      EQU   28                                                       28850042
DISMOUNT EQU   X'84'                                                    28900042
F0       EQU   X'F0'                                                    28950042
FF       EQU   X'FF'                                                    29000042
*                                                                     * 29050042
* THIS ROUTINE WILL PUT A HIGH AND LOW DATE INTO THE COUNTER AREA.    * 29100042
* THE FIRST TIME IT PUTS THE SAME DATE IN BOTH AREAS.  WITH EACH NEW  * 29150042
* RECORD A COMPARE IS DONE FOR A LOWER AND HIGHER DATE.               * 29200042
*                                                                     * 29250042
SETDATES CLC   L0(L4,R3),ZEROES   IS DATE IN COUNTER AREAS ZEROES       29300042
         BNE   CHKLO                                                    29350042
         MVC   L0(L4,R3),DATE     MOVE DATE TO LO AREA                  29400042
         MVC   L4(L4,R3),DATE     MOVE DATE TO HI AREA                  29450042
         B     RETURN                                                   29500042
CHKLO    CLC   L0(L4,R3),DATE     IS LOW DATE LOWER THAN RECORD DATE    29550042
         BL    CHKHI              YES CHECK HIGH                        29600042
         MVC   L0(L4,R3),DATE     NO - MOVE IN RECORD DATE              29650042
CHKHI    CLC   L4(L4,R3),DATE     IS HIGH DATE HIGHER THAN RECORD DATE  29700042
         BH    RETURN             YES- RETURN                           29750042
         MVC   L4(L4,R3),DATE     NO- MOVE IN RECORD DATE               29800042
RETURN   BR    R14                RETURN                                29850042
DEVICE   MVC   L0(L4,R3),DEV3420  MOVE IN DEVICE TYPE                   29900042
         ST    R5,SAVE5           SAVE REGISTER FOR CALLING PGM         29950042
         BR    R14                                                      30000042
SAVE5    DC    F'0'                                                     30050042
DEV3420  DC    CL4'3420'                                                30100042
*                                                                     * 30150042
* THIS ROUTINE WILL KEEP TRACK OF UP TO 10 VOLUME LABELS AND THE      * 30200042
* NUMBER OF OCCURRENCES .  EACH ENTRY CONSISTS OF 8 BYTES-6 BYTES FOR * 30250042
* THE VOLUME LABEL AND 2 BYTES FOR THE COUNTER.                       * 30300042
VOLUMES  STM   R5,R7,STOREREG     SAVE REGISTERS                 XM9111 30350042
         MVC   L2(L2,R3),SNSBYTES PUT SENSE COUNT IN SUM AREA    XM9111 30430042
         LR    R5,R3              GET BUFFER POINTER            SA58784 30510042
         TM    SWITCHES+L1,DISMOUNT IS THIS A DISMOUNT RECORD    XM9111 30590042
         BZ    SETUP              NO CHK FOR TU SERIAL NUMBER    XM9111 30670042
         OI    SHORTSW,FF         TURN ON DISMOUNT INDICATOR     XM9111 30750042
         B     UPPTR              DO NOT MOVE TU SERIAL          XM9111 30830042
SETUP    CLC    SNSBYTES(L2),NINER ARE THERE NINE SENSE BYTES   SA58784 30910042
         BNH   UPPTR              IF NINE SENSE BYTES NO TU SER SA58784 30990042
         MVC   L0(L2,R5),TUSERIAL MOVE THE TAPE UNIT SERIAL TO CNTR     31100042
UPPTR    LA    R5,L4(R5)          INCREMENT PAST CURRENT COUNTER XM9111 31150042
         LA    R6,L10             PUT # OF VOLUME ENTRIES IN REG        31200042
VOLZERO  CLC   VOLID(L6),ZEROES   IS VOLID IN RECORD HEX ZEROES         31250042
         BE    GOBACK             YES DO NOT PUT IN TABLE               31260042
         CLC   L0(L6,R5),ZEROES   IS THIS SPACE HEX ZEROES       XM9025 31270042
         BNE   COMPVOL            NO GO TO COMPARE VOLUME LABELS        31300042
         MVC   L0(L6,R5),VOLID    PUT IN NEW LABEL                      31350042
UPCOUNT  LH    R7,L6(R5)          GET COUNTER FOR LABEL                 31400042
         LA    R7,L1(R7)          INCREMENT COUNTER                     31450042
         STH   R7,L6(R5)          PUT UPDATED COUNTER BACK              31500042
         B     GOBACK                                                   31550042
COMPVOL  CLC   L0(L6,R5),VOLID    DOES VOLID = RECORD VOLID             31600042
         BE    UPCOUNT            YES GO TO INCREMENT COUNT             31650042
         LA    R5,L8(R5)          NO GO TO NEW LABEL ENTRY              31700042
         BCT   R6,VOLZERO         ARE 10 ENTRIES EXHAUSTED              31750042
GOBACK   LM    R5,R7,STOREREG     RESTORE REGISTERS                     31800042
         BR    R14                RETURN                                31850042
*                                                                     * 31900042
* THIS ROUTINE WILL PUT FAILING CCW'S INTO A COUNTER AREA AND KEEP    * 31950042
* ACCOUNT OF THE NUMBER OF OCCURRENCES. THE MAXIMUM NUMBER OF CCW'S   * 32000042
* IS 24. EACH ENTRY IS 4 BYTES LONG-FIRST BYTE IS THE CCW, SECOND     * 32050042
* BYTE IS UNUSED AND THE LAST TWO BYTES ARE THE COUNTER.              * 32100042
*                                                                     * 32150042
FAILCCW  STM   R5,R7,STOREREG     SACE REGISTERS                 XM9111 32200042
         TM    SWITCHES+L1,DISMOUNT CHK FOR DISMOUNT RECORD      XM9111 32220042
         BZ    LDPTR              NO CCW FOR DISMOUNT RECORD     XM9111 32240042
         LA    R5,SKIPDIS-6       DO NOT SUM SENSE INFO          XM9111 32260042
         ST    R5,REG8            UPDATE SUM ENTRY POINTER       XM9111 32280042
         B     RETURN2            RETURN CONTROL                 XM9111 32300042
LDPTR    LR    R5,R3              GET POINTER TO SUM AREA        XM9111 32320042
         LA    R6,L24             PUT # OF CCW ENTRIES IN REG           32400042
CCWZERO  CLI   L0(R5),L0          IS CCW ENTRY ZERO                     32450042
         BNE   COMPCCW            NO GO TO COMPARE CCW'S                32500042
         MVC   L0(L1,R5),COMMCODE MOVE CCW TO CCW TABLE                 32550042
CCWCNT   LH    R7,L2(R5)          GET COUNT FROM CCW TABLE              32600042
         LA    R7,L1(R7)          INCREMENT THE COUNT                   32650042
         STH   R7,L2(R5)          PUT NEW COUNT BACK IN TABLE           32700042
         B     RETURN2            GO BACK TO PROCESSING                 32750042
COMPCCW  CLC   L0(L1,R5),COMMCODE DOES CCW IN TABLE=RECORD CCW          32800042
         BE    CCWCNT             YES INCREASE COUNT                    32850042
         LA    R5,L4(R5)          NO INCREMENT TABLE ENTRY POINTER      32900042
         BCT   R6,CCWZERO         ARE 24 ENTRIES EXHAUSTED              32950042
RETURN2  LM    R5,R7,STOREREG     RESTORE REGISTERS                     33000042
         BR    R14                RETURN                                33050042
*                                                                     * 33100042
* THE NEXT ROUTINES WILL TAKE THE COUNTERS FROM THE RECORD AND        * 33150042
* ADD THEM TO THE COUNTER AREAS.  HALF BYTE COUNTERS ARE ISOLATED AND * 33200042
* THEM ADDED. DEVICE DEPENDENT COUNTERS ARE ADDED ONLY FOR DISMOUNT   * 33250042
* RECORDS.                                                            * 33300042
*                                                                     * 33350042
NOISERTN SR    R5,R5              CLEAR REGISTER                        33400042
GOON     IC    R5,NOISE           GET QUANTITY TO BE ADDED              33450042
ADD      AH    R5,L0(R3)          ADD HALFWORD COUNTER TO IT            33500042
         STH   R5,L0(R3)          STORE SUM BACK IN COUNTER AREA        33550042
         L     R5,SAVE5           RELOAD REGISTER FIVE                  33600042
         BR    R14                RETURN                                33650042
RWVRCRTN SR    R5,R5              CLEAR REGISTER                        33700042
         IC    R5,RWVRC           GET QUANTIT TO BE ADDED               33750042
         B     ADD                GO TO ADD THE COUNTER                 33800042
MTERTN   SR    R5,R5              CLEAR REGISTER                        33850042
         IC    R5,MTELRCR         GET QUANTITY TO BE ADDED              33900042
         B     ADD                GO TO ADD THE COUNTER                 33950042
EDCRTN   SR    R5,R5              CLEAR REGISTER                        34000042
         IC    R5,EDCCRC          GET QUANTITY TO BE ADDED              34050042
         B     ADD                GO TO ADD THE COUNTER                 34100042
ENVRTN   SR    R5,R5              CLEAR REGISTER                        34150042
         IC    R5,ENVCKVRC        GET QUANTITY TO BE ADDED              34200042
         B     ADD                GO TO ADD THE COUNTER                 34250042
LEFTHALF SRL   R5,L4              ISOLATE THE LOW ORDER BITS OF HI BYTE 34300042
         B     ADD                GO TO ADD THE COUNTER                 34350042
RGHTHALF SLL   R5,L28             SHIFT OUT LOW BITS OF HIGH BYTE       34400042
         SRL   R5,L28             SHIFT BYTE BACK TO HIGH POSITION      34450042
         B     ADD                GO TO ADD COUNTER                     34500042
OVERRTN  SR    R5,R5              CLEAR REGISTER                        34550042
         IC    R5,OVERRUN         GET QUANTITY TO BE ADDED              34600042
         B     LEFTHALF           GO TO ISOLATE THE LEFT HALF BYTE      34650042
SKEWRTN  SR    R5,R5              CLEAR REGISTER                        34700042
         IC    R5,OVERRUN         GET QUANTITY TO BE ADDED              34750042
         B     RGHTHALF           GO TO ISOLATE RIGHT HALF OF BYTE      34800042
CCOMPRTN SR    R5,R5              CLEAR REGISTER                        34850042
         IC    R5,CCOMPARE        GET QUANTITY TO BE ADDED              34900042
         B     LEFTHALF           GO TO ISOLATE THE LEFT HALF BYTE      34950042
WRTTRRTN SR    R5,R5              CLEAR REGISTER                        35000042
         IC    R5,CCOMPARE        GET QUANTITY TO BE ADDED              35050042
         B     RGHTHALF           GO TO ISOLATE THE RIGHT HALF BYTE     35100042
WRTTMRTN SR    R5,R5              CLEAR REGISTER                        35150042
         IC    R5,WRTTMCHK        GET QUANTITY TO BE ADDED              35200042
         B     LEFTHALF           GO TO ISOLATE THE LEFT HALF BYTE      35250042
STRDRTN  SR    R5,R5              CLEAR REGISTER                        35300042
         IC    R5,WRTTMCHK        GET QUANTITY TO BE ADDED              35350042
         B     RGHTHALF           GO TO ISOLATE THE RIGHT HALF BYTE     35400042
PARTRTN  SR    R5,R5              CLEAR REGISTER                        35450042
         IC    R5,PARTREC         GET QUANTITY TO BE ADDED              35500042
         B     LEFTHALF           GO TO ISOLATE THE LEFT HALF BYTE      35550042
EXCRTN   SR    R5,R5              CLEAR REGISTER                        35600042
         IC    R5,PARTREC         GET QUANTITY TO BE ADDED              35650042
         B     RGHTHALF           GO TO ISOLATE RIGHT HALF BYTE         35700042
IBGRTN   SR    R5,R5              CLEAR REGISTER                        35750042
         IC    R5,ORDROP          GET QUANTITY TO BE ADDED              35800042
         B     LEFTHALF           GO TO ISOLATE LEFT HALF BYTE          35850042
FEEDRTN  SR    R5,R5              CLEAR REGISTER                        35900042
         IC    R5,ORDROP          GET QUANTITY TO BE ADDED              35950042
         B     RGHTHALF           GO TO ISOLATE RIGHT HALF BYTE         36000042
CRCCKRTN SR    R5,R5              CLEAR REGISTER                 S99223 36010042
         IC    R5,EXP             GET QUANTITY TO BE ADDED       S99223 36020042
         B     LEFTHALF           GO TO ISOLATE LEFT HALF BYTE   S99223 36030042
EARLBRTN SR    R5,R5              CLEAR REGISTER                        36050042
         IC    R5,EXP             GET QUANTITY TO BE ADDED              36100042
         B     RGHTHALF           GO TO ISOLATE RIGHT HALF BYTE         36150042
EARLERTN SR    R5,R5              CLEAR REGISTER                        36200042
         IC    R5,EARLNDRD        GET QUANTITY TO BE ADDED              36250042
         B     LEFTHALF           GO TO ISOLATE LEFT HALF BYTE          36300042
SLWBRTN  SR    R5,R5              CLEAR REGISTER                        36350042
         IC    R5,EARLNDRD        GET QUANTITY TO BE ADDED              36400042
         B     RGHTHALF           GO TO ISOLATE RIGHT HALF BYTE         36450042
SLWERTN  SR    R5,R5              CLEAR REGISTER                        36500042
         IC    R5,SLWNDRD         GET QUANTITY TO BE ADDED              36550042
         B     LEFTHALF           GO TO ISOLATE LEFTHALF BYTE           36600042
VELRRTN  SR    R5,R5              CLEAR REGISTER                        36650042
         IC    R5,SLWNDRD         GET QUANTITY TO BE ADDED              36700042
         B     RGHTHALF           GO TO ISOLATE RIGHT HALF BYTE         36750042
CRECTRTN SR    R5,R5              CLEAR REGISTER                 S99223 36760042
         IC    R5,EXP2            GET QUANTITY TO BE ADDED       S99223 36770042
         B     LEFTHALF           GO TO ISOLATE LEFT HALF BYTE   S99223 36780042
VELCRTN  SR    R5,R5              CLEAR REGISTER                        36800042
         IC    R5,EXP2            GET QUANTITY TO BE ADDED              36850042
         B     RGHTHALF           GO TO ISOLATE RIGHT HALF BYTE         36900042
CBCRTN   SR    R5,R5              CLEAR REGISTER                 S99223 36907042
         IC    R5,EXP3            GET QUANTITY TO BE ADDED       S99223 36914042
         B     LEFTHALF           GO TO ISOLATE LEFT HALF BYTE   S99223 36921042
CRCIRTN  SR    R5,R5              CLEAR REGISTER                 S99223 36928042
         IC    R5,EXP3            GET QUANTITY TO BE ADDED       S99223 36935042
         B     RGHTHALF           GO TO ISOLATE RIGHT HALF BYTE  S99223 36942042
TRDSRTN  TM    SHORTSW,FF         IS THIS A DISMOUNT ENTRY              36950042
         BCR   8,R14              NO-DO NOT ADD TO COUNTER              37000042
         SR    R5,R5              CLEAR REGISTER                        37050042
         IC    R5,TEMPRDS         GET NUMBER OF TEMP READ ERRORS        37100042
         B     ADD                GO TO ADD TO COUNTER                  37150042
TWRTSRTN TM    SHORTSW,FF         IS THIS A DISMOUNT RECORD             37200042
         BCR   8,R14              NO-DO NOT ADD TO COUNTER              37250042
         SR    R5,R5              CLEAR REGISTER                        37300042
         IC    R5,TEMPWRTS        GET NUMBER OF TEMPORARY WRITE ERRORS  37350042
         B     ADD                GO TO ADD THEM TO COUNTER             37400042
SIORTN   STM   R5,R6,STOREREG+4   SAVE REGISTERS                        37450042
         TM    SHORTSW,FF         IS THIS A DISMOUNT ENTRY              37500042
         BCR   8,R14              NO-DO NO ADD TO COUNTER               37550042
         XC    STOREREG(L4),STOREREG ZERO AREA                          37600042
         MVC    STOREREG+L2(L2),SIOCNT GET SIO COUNT FROM RECORD        37630042
         L     R5,STOREREG        PUT IT INTO A REGISTER                37660042
         MVC   STOREREG(L4),L0(R3) GET COUNTER ON BOUNDARY              37690042
         L     R6,STOREREG        GET COUNTER INTO REGISTER             37720042
         AR     R5,R6             ADD THE QUANTITIES                    37750042
         ST    R5,STOREREG        PUT COUNTER BACK ON BOUNDARY          37780042
         MVC   L0(L4,R3),STOREREG PUT IT BACK IN COUNTER AREA           37810042
         LM    R5,R6,STOREREG+4   RELOAD REGISTERS                      37900042
         BR    R14                RETURN                                37950042
DDNOISER TM    SHORTSW,FF         IS THIS A DISMOUNT RECORD             38000042
         BCR   8,R14              NO- DO NO ADD COUNTERS                38050042
         SR    R5,R5              CLEAR REGISTER                        38100042
         IC    R5,NOISEBLK        GET NOISE COUNTER                     38150042
         B     ADD                GO TO ADD TO COUNTER AREA             38200042
ERASERTN TM    SHORTSW,FF         IS THIS A DISMOUNT ENTRY              38250042
         BCR   8,R14              NO-DO NOT ADD COUNTERS                38300042
         XC    STOREREG(L4),STOREREG CLEAR AREA                         38350042
         MVC   STOREREG+L2(L2),ERASEGPS                 XA02814/YA04216 38360042
         L     R5,STOREREG        PUT NUMBER INTO REG                   38370042
         B     ADD                GO TO ADD TO COUNTER                  38400042
CLNRRTN  TM    SHORTSW,FF         IS THIS A DISMOUNT ENTRY              38450042
         BCR   8,R14              NO-DO NOT ADD TO COUNTER              38500042
         LH    R5,CLNRACTS        LOAD THE COUNTER TO BE ADDED          38550042
         XC    STOREREG(L4),STOREREG CLEAR AREA                         38560042
         MVC   STOREREG+L2(L2),CLNRACTS GET QUANTITY TO BE ADDED        38570042
         L     R5,STOREREG        PUT QUANTITY INTO REG                 38580042
         NI    SHORTSW,L0         TURN OFF DISMOUNT RECORD SWITCH       38600042
         B     ADD                RETURN                                38650042
BACKRTN  SR    R5,R5              CLEAR REGISTER                        38700042
         IC    R5,BACKWARD        GET COUNTER TO ADD                    38750042
         B     ADD                GO TO ADD THE COUNTER                 38800042
BUSRTN   SR    R5,R5              CLEAR REGISTER                        38850042
         IC    R5,BUSOCHK         GET COUNTER TO ADD                    38900042
         B     LEFTHALF           GO ISOLATE COUNTER AND ADD            38950042

         IC    R5,BUSOCHK         GET COUNTER TO ADD                    39050042
         B     RGHTHALF           GO TO ISOLATE THE COUNTER AND ADD     39100042
