         BR    R14                                                      80509042
*                                                              @Z40NIVS 80514042
NORETVOL LM    R4,R8,XSAVEV                                    @Z40NIVS 80524042
         SR    R15,R15                                         @Z40NIVS 80534042
         BR    R14                                             @Z40NIVS 80544042
*                                                              @Z40NIVS 81220042
*        ROUTINE TO SAVE CHANEL AND CONTROL UNIT FOR SUBSYSTEM @Z40NIVS 81258042
*                                                              @Z40NIVS 81260042
CUAN0    STM   R5,R8,XSAVE         SAVE WORK REGS              @Z40NIVS 81262042
         LA    R5,L10              LOAD DECREMENT FOR R3       @Z40NIVS 81264042
         SR    R3,R5               PNT TO START OF PRNT LI     @Z40NIVS 81266042
         MVC   CUANR+ONE(L3),L1(R3) MOVE CHANEL AND CU         @Z40NIVS 81268042
         SR    R15,R15             CLR FOR NO PRINT            @Z40NIVS 81270042
         B     RETURN              RETURN                      @Z40NIVS 81272042
*                                                              @Z40NIVS 81274042
*        SORT FOR VOLID TO PUT HIGHEST ERROR RATE  FIRST       @Z40NIVS 81276042
*                                                              @Z40NIVS 81278042
SORTV0   STM   R5,R8,XSAVE         SAVE WORK REG               @Z40NIVS 81280042
         ST    R4,SRTSAV           SAVE REG 4                  @Z40NIVS 81282042
         ST    R4,CNTDN2           SAVE VOL PNTR FOR PRT       @Z40NIVS 81284042
SORTV1   SR    R8,R8               CLR REG 8 FOR SWITCH        @Z40NIVS 81286042
         L     R4,SRTSAV           SET 4 TO START OF SUM       @Z40NIVS 81288042
         LA    R5,L30(R4)          SET 5 TO NEXT REC           @Z40RIVS 81290042
         LA    R7,L49              SET 7 TO NO.REC-1           @Z40NIVS 81292042
SORTV2   CLC   L0(L6,R5),ZEROS     IS THERE A VOLID            @Z40NIVS 81294042
         BE    SORTV4              NO BR TO TEST SW            @Z40NIVS 81296042
         CLC   L12(L2,R4),L12(R5)  TEST FOR HIGH COUNT         @Z40NIVS 81298042
         BNH   SORTV3              BRCH IF HIGH REC FIRST      @Z40NIVS 81300042
         LA    R8,L15              SET MOVE SWITCH             @Z40NIVS 81302042
         XC    L0(L30,R4),L0(R5)   RECORD                      @Z40RIVS 81304042
         XC    L0(L30,R5),L0(R4)   SWAP                        @Z40RIVS 81306042
         XC    L0(L30,R4),L0(R5)   FOR SORT                    @Z40RIVS 81308042
SORTV3   LA    R4,L30(R4)          POINT TO NEXT REC           @Z40RIVS 81310042
         LA    R5,L30(R5)          POINT TO NEXT REC+1         @Z40RIVS 81312042
         BCT   R7,SORTV2           MORE TO TEST                @Z40NIVS 81314042
SORTV4   LTR   R8,R8               TEST PASS SWITCH            @Z40NIVS 81316042
         BZ    RETURN              ALL REC TESTED/MOVED        @Z40NIVS 81318042
         B     SORTV1              CONTINUE TO TEST/MOVE       @Z40NIVS 81320042
*                                                              @Z40NIVS 81322042
**  ROUTINE TO PRINT 50 VOLID SUM ENTRIES                      @Z40NIVS 81324042
*                                                              @Z40NIVS 81326042
CNTDN0   STM   R5,R8,XSAVE         SAVE THE REGS               @Z40NIVS 81328042
         SR    R5,R5               CLEAR REG                   @Z40NIVS 81330042
         L     R5,CNTDN3           LOAD WITH 50                @Z40NIVS 81332042
         BCT   R5,CNTDN1           BRANCH FOR 50               @Z40NIVS 81334042
CNTDN5   SR    R15,R15             CLEAR FOR NO PRINT          @Z40NIVS 81336042
         B     RETURN              RETURN                      @Z40NIVS 81338042
CNTDN1   ST    R5,CNTDN3           SAVE R 5                    @Z40NIVS 81340042
         L     R5,CNTDN2           GET CNTDN VALUE             @Z40NIVS 81342042
         LA    R5,L30(R5)          INCREMENT BY 30             @Z40RIVS 81344042
         CLC   L0(L6,R5),ZEROS     TESTFOR VOLID EQ ZERO       @Z40NIVS 81346042
         BE    CNTDN5              BRANCH NONE TO PRNT         @Z40NIVS 81348042
         ST    R5,CNTDN2           PUT IT BACK                 @Z40NIVS 81350042
         LA    R5,SUMTA3-4         GET LINE ADDRESS            @Z40NIVS 81352042
         L     R6,ASUMTA4          GET LABEL ADDRESS           @Z40NIVS 81354042
         STM   R5,R6,YR9PTR        MAKE THEM CURRENT           @Z40NIVS 81356042
         B     RETURN              RETURN                      @Z40NIVS 81358042
         SPACE 1                                               @Z40NIVS 81360042
*                                                              @Z40NIVS 81362042
*        ROUTINE TO DETERMINE IF NECESSARY TO EDIT FLTYSYM     @Z40NIVS 81364042
*                                                              @Z40NIVS 81366042
FLTTST0  STM   R5,R8,XSAVE         SAVE WORK REGS              @Z40NIVS 81368042
         LA    R4,L42(R4)          INCREMENT TO FIRST REC      @Z427VLS 81370042
         CLC   L0(L4,R4),ZEROS     ARE SYM AND CUA ZERO        @Z40NIVS 81372042
         BNE   FLTTST1             NO CONTINUE                 @Z40NIVS 81374042
         LA    R7,SUMTAC-4         YES, PICK UP NEW LINE       @Z40NIVS 81376042
         L     R8,ASUMTAD          AND LABEL ADDRESSES         @Z40NIVS 81378042
         STM   R7,R8,YR9PTR        TO START FROM               @Z40NIVS 81380042
FLTTST1  B     RETURN              RETURN                      @Z40NIVS 81382042
*                                                              @Z40NIVS 81384042
*       ROUTINE FOR SORTING THE FAULT SYMPTOM ENTERIES         @Z40NIVS 81386042
*                                                              @Z40NIVS 81388042
FLTSRT0  STM   R5,R8,XSAVE         SAVE WORK REGS              @Z40NIVS 81390042
         ST    R4,FLTSRT8          SAVE PNTR TO EDIT AREA      @Z40NIVS 81392042
         SR    R6,R6               CLEAR FOR SW                @Z40NIVS 81394042
FLTSRT1  LA    R4,L42(R4)          INCREMENT TO FIRST REC      @Z427VLS 81396042
         SR    R7,R7               CLR MOVE SWITCH             @Z40NIVS 81398042
         LA    R8,L50              SET R8 TO NUM REC           @Z40NIVS 81400042
FLTSRT2  CLC   L44(L2,R4),ZEROS    IS DEV ADDR ZERO            @Z427VLS 81402042
         BE    FLTSRT6             END REC AREA                @Z40NIVS 81404042
         LTR   R6,R6               IS THIS FIRST SORT          @Z40RIVS 81406042
         BZ    FLTSRT3             YES GO TO CUA SORT          @Z40RIVS 81408042
         CLC   L0(L2,R4),L42(R4)   COMPARE SYM CODE            @Z427VLS 81410042
         BNH   FLTSRT4             BRCH IF ASCENDING           @Z40RIVS 81412042
         B     FLTSRT35            DECENDING GO SWAP           @Z40RIVS 81414042
FLTSRT3  CLC   L2(L2,R4),L44(R4)   COMP CUA/SYM                @Z427VLS 81416042
         BNH   FLTSRT4             BRCH IF ASCENDING ORDER     @Z40RIVS 81418042
FLTSRT35 XC    L0(L42,R4),L42(R4)  SWAP REC                    @Z40RIVS 81420042
         XC    L42(L42,R4),L0(R4)  PUT IN ASCENDING            @Z40RIVS 81422042
         XC    L0(L42,R4),L42(R4)  ORDER                       @Z40RIVS 81424042
         LA    R7,L15              TURN MOVE SWITCH ON         @Z40RIVS 81426042
FLTSRT4  LA    R4,L42(R4)          INCREMENT FOR NEXT TEST     @Z427VLS 81428042
         BCT   R8,FLTSRT2          GO MAX 50 PASSES            @Z40RIVS 81430042
FLTSRT6  LTR   R7,R7               MOVE SWITCH SET             @Z40RIVS 81432042
         BZ    FLTSRT7             GO TO END                   @Z40RIVS 81434042
         L     R4,FLTSRT8          RESET R4 TO START           @Z40RIVS 81436042
         B     FLTSRT1             GO CYCLE ONCE MORE          @Z40RIVS 81438042
FLTSRT7  L     R4,FLTSRT8          NO RESTORE R4               @Z40RIVS 81440042
         LTR   R6,R6               IS THIS FIRST SORT          @Z40RIVS 81442042
         BNZ   FLTSRT9             NO  GO TO COMPLETION        @Z40RIVS 81444042
         LA    R6,L15              YES SET SORT SWITCH         @Z40RIVS 81446042
         B     FLTSRT1             SORT ON SYM CODE            @Z40RIVS 81448042
FLTSRT9  MVC   L0(L42,R4),L42(R4)  MOVE FIRST REC TO EDIT      @Z427VLS 81450042
         LA    R4,L42(R4)          INCREMENT R4 BY REC LENGTH  @Z427VLS 81452042
         ST    R4,FLTMOV2          KEEP USE BY MOVE RTNE       @Z40RIVS 81454042
         LA    R6,L48              SET REG 6 TO NUM REC        @Z40RIVS 81456042
         ST    R6,FLTMOV6          KEEP USE BY MOVE RTNE       @Z40RIVS 81458042
         B     RETURN                                          @Z40RIVS 81460042
         SPACE 1                                               @Z40RIVS 81462042
**                                                             @Z40RIVS 81464042
**       ROUTINE TO MOVE NEXT REC FROM SUM AREA TO EDIT AREA TO PRINT   81466042
**                                                             @Z40RIVS 81468042
FLTMOV0  STM   R5,R8,XSAVE         SAVE WORK REG               @Z40RIVS 81470042
         L     R5,FLTMOV2          PICK UP PNTR LAST REC       @Z40RIVS 81472042
         LA    R5,L42(R5)          POINT TO NEW REC            @Z427VLS 81474042
         ST    R5,FLTMOV2          SAVE PNTR                   @Z40RIVS 81476042
         CLC   L2(L2,R5),ZEROS     IS REC EQ ZERO              @Z40RIVS 81478042
         BE    FLTMOV3             BRNCH PREPARE NEW EDIT      @Z40RIVS 81480042
FLTMOV1  MVC   L0(L42,R4),L0(R5)   MOVE NEW REC TO EDIT        @Z427VLS 81482042
         LA    R7,SUMTA7-L4        BACK UP LINE AND            @Z40RIVS 81484042
         L     R8,ASUMTA8          LABEL POINTER TO            @Z40RIVS 81486042
         STM   R7,R8,YR9PTR        PRINT NEXT REC              @Z40RIVS 81488042
         L     R6,FLTMOV6          SET R6 TO NUM REC T         @Z40RIVS 81490042
         BCT   R6,FLTMOV7          REDUCE COUNT BY ONE         @Z40RIVS 81492042
         B     FLTMOV3             END FIRST SECTION           @Z40RIVS 81494042
FLTMOV7  ST    R6,FLTMOV6          SAVE NUM REC REMAIN         @Z40RIVS 81496042
         SR    R15,R15             CLR FOR NO PRINT            @Z40RIVS 81498042
FLTMOV3  B     RETURN              GO PRINT NEXT RECORD        @Z40RIVS 81500042
         EJECT                                                 @Z40RIVS 81502042
**                                                             @Z40RIVS 81504042
**       EDIT CYCLE TO PRINT 16 SUM COUNTERS                   @Z40RIVS 81506042
**                                                             @Z40RIVS 81508042
EDTFA0   STM   R5,R8,XSAVE         SAVE WORK REGS              @Z40RIVS 81510042
         L     R7,EDTFA4           GET COUNTER                 @Z40RIVS 81512042
EDTFA1   L     R5,EDTFA5           PICK UP LAST PRT            @Z40RIVS 81514042
         LA    R5,L32(R5)          INCREMENT TO NEXT           @Z40RIVS 81516042
         ST    R5,EDTFA5           SAVE LAST REC PRT           @Z40RIVS 81518042
         OC    L28(L2,R5),L28(R5)  TEST CUA                    @Z40RIVS 81520042
         BNZ   EDTFA2              BRCH IF NO REC INFO         @Z40RIVS 81522042
         BCT   R7,EDTFA1           REDUCE REC CNTR             @Z40RIVS 81524042
         B     RETURN              RETURN                      @Z40RIVS 81526042
EDTFA2   BCT   R7,EDTFA3           REDUCE REC CNTR             @Z40RIVS 81528042
         B     RETURN              RETURN                      @Z40RIVS 81530042
EDTFA3   MVC   L0(L32,R4),L0(R5)   MOVE REC TO PRNT            @Z40RIVS 81532042
         ST    R7,EDTFA4           SAVE REC NO                 @Z40RIVS 81534042
         LA    R7,SUMTA1-L4        LOAD LINE ADDR-4            @Z40RIVS 81536042
         L     R8,ASUMTA2          LABEL POINTER TO ADDR-1     @Z40RIVS 81538042
         STM   R7,R8,YR9PTR        STORE NEW PNTR              @Z40RIVS 81540042
         SR    R15,R15             CLEAR FOR NO PRNT           @Z40RIVS 81542042
         B     RETURN              RETURN                      @Z40RIVS 81544042
EDTFA6   STM   R5,R8,XSAVE         SAVE WORK REG               @Z40RIVS 81546042
         L     R7,EDTFA4           PICK UP NO. REC T           @Z40RIVS 81548042
         LR    R5,R4               LOAD SUM AREA PNTR          @Z40RIVS 81550042
EDTFA7   LA    R5,L32(R5)          INCRM TO REC AREA           @Z40RIVS 81552042
         ST    R5,EDTFA5           SAVE PNTR                   @Z40RIVS 81554042
         OC    L28(L2,R5),L28(R5)  TEST FOR CUA                @Z40RIVS 81556042
         BNZ   EDTFA8              GO MOVE REC                 @Z40RIVS 81558042
         BCT   R7,EDTFA7           NO CUA TEST NEXT REC        @Z40RIVS 81560042
         LA    R7,L1               NO REC SET R7 TO ONE        @Z40RIVS 81562042
         ST    R7,EDTFA4           STORE TO PRNT ZERO          @Z40RIVS 81564042
         ST    R4,EDTFA5           SET TO START OF SUM AREA    @Z40RIVS 81566042
         B     RETURN              NO REC                      @Z40RIVS 81568042
EDTFA8   ST    R7,EDTFA4           SET TO NO. REC T            @Z40RIVS 81570042
         MVC   L0(L32,R4),L0(R5)   MOVE FIRST REC TO PRNT      @Z40RIVS 81572042
         B     RETURN                                          @Z40RIVS 81574042
**                                                             @Z40RIVS 81576042
**       ROUTINES TO INCREMENT OR DECREMENT PRNT LINE PNTR     @Z40RIVS 81578042
**                                                             @Z40RIVS 81580042
REPNT0   BCTR  R3,R0               REDUCE PRNT LINE PNTR       @Z40RIVS 81582042
         BR    R14                 RETURN                      @Z40RIVS 81584042
REPNT1   LA    R4,L4               SET REG4 TO FOUR            @Z40RIVS 81586042
         SR    R3,R4               REDUCE PRNT LINE PNTR       @Z40RIVS 81588042
         BR    R14                 RETURN                      @Z40RIVS 81590042
REPNT2   LA    R4,L3               SET REG4 TO THREE           @Z40RIVS 81592042
         SR    R3,R4               REDUCE PRNT LINE PNTR       @Z40RIVS 81594042
         BR    R14                 RETURN                      @Z40RIVS 81596042
REPNT3   LA    R3,L15(R3)          INCR PRNT LINE PNTR +15     @Z40RIVS 81598042
         BR    R14                 RETURN                      @Z40RIVS 81600042
**                                                             @Z40RIVS 81602042
**       ROUTINE TO MOVE DATE TO FAULT SYMPTOM PRINTLINE       @Z40RIVS 81604042
**                                                             @Z40RIVS 81606042
FLTSYDA  UNPK  XSAVE(L8),L1(L3,R4) UNPACK THE DATE             @Z40RIVS 81608042
         MVC   L0(L3,R3),XSAVE+L5  MOVE JULIAN DATE            @Z40RIVS 81610042
         MVI   L3(R3),SLASH        MOVE SEPARATOR              @Z40RIVS 81612042
         MVC   L4(L2,R3),XSAVE+L3  MOVE YEAR                   @Z40RIVS 81614042
         LA    R4,L4               LOAD R4 WITH 4              @Z427VLS 81616042
         SR    R3,R4               REDUCE PRINT LINE PNTR      @Z40RIVS 81618042
         BR    R14                 RETURN                      @Z40RIVS 81620042
**                                                             @Z40RIVS 81622042
**       ROUTINE TO PREPARE TO CONVERT OCCUR COUNT TO PRINTABLE         81624042
**       FORMAT AND BLANK LEADING ZERO ON DEVICE ADDRESS FAULT SUM      81626042
**                                                             @Z40RIVS 81628042
GETOCCUR STM   R5,R8,XSAVE         SAVE WORK REG               @Z40RIVS 81630042
         LA    R5,L20              BLANK OUT                   @Z40RIVS 81632042
         LR    R6,R3               LEADING ZERO                @Z40RIVS 81634042
         SR    R6,R5               ON DEVICE                   @Z40NIVS 81638042
         MVI   L0(R6),BLANK        ADDRESS                     @Z40NIVS 81640042
         ICM   R6,L15,L0(R4)       LOAD CNT                    @Z40NIVS 81642042
         LR    R5,R3               SET PRINT LINE PNTR         @Z40NIVS 81646042
         BAL   R8,CONVH3           USE STANDARD ROUTINE        @Z40NIVS 81648042
         B     RETURN              RETURN                      @Z40NIVS 81650042
*                                                              @Z40NIVS 81652042
*        ROUTINE TO REFORMAT TIME IN FAULT SYMPTOM OUTPUT      @Z40NIVS 81654042
*                                                              @Z40NIVS 81656042
HREDIT0  STM   R5,R8,XSAVE         SAVE WORK REGS              @Z40NIVS 81658042
         LA    R5,L10              SET REG5 TO 10              @Z427VLS 81660042
         SR    R3,R5               DECR PRNT LINE PNTR         @Z40NIVS 81662042
         MVC   READYP(L6),L0(R3)   SAVE FORMATED OUTPUT        @Z40NIVS 81664042
         MVI   L0(R3),COLON        MOVE IN SEPERATOR CHAR      @Z40NIVS 81666042
         MVC   L1(L2,R3),READYP    MOVE MIN TO PRNT LINE       @Z40NIVS 81668042
         MVI   L3(R3),COLON        MOVE IN SEPERATOR CHAR      @Z40NIVS 81670042
         MVC   L4(L2,R3),READYP+TWO  MOVE SEC TO PRNT LINE     @Z40NIVS 81672042
         MVI   L6(R3),COLON        MOVE IN SEPERATOR CHAR      @Z40NIVS 81674042
         MVC   L7(L2,R3),READYP+FOUR  MOVE THOU TO PRNT LINE   @Z40NIVS 81676042
         B     RETURN              RETURN                      @Z40NIVS 81678042
*                                                              @Z40NIVS 81680042
*        ROUTINE TO BLANK OUT LEADING ZERO ON DEVICE ADDR      @Z40NIVS 81682042
*                                                              @Z40NIVS 81684042
NOPRNTT  STM   R5,R8,XSAVE         SAVE WORK REGS              @Z40NIVS 81686042
         LA    R5,L6               LOAD DECRMT INTO REG 5      @Z40NIVS 81688042
         LR    R6,R3               LOAD PRNT LINE INTO R6      @Z40NIVS 81690042
         SR    R6,R5               BACK UP PRNT LINE PNTR      @Z40NIVS 81692042
         MVI   L0(R6),BLANK        BLANK OUT ZERO              @Z40NIVS 81694042
         LA    R3,L2(R3)           INCREMENT LINE PNTR         @Z40RIVS 81695042
         B     RETURN              RETURN                      @Z40NIVS 81696042
*                                                              @Z40NIVS 81698042
*        ROUTINE TO CALCULATE MEGABYTES READ AND SETUP FIELD   @Z40NIVS 81700042
*        FOR SORT FOR THE VOLID SUMMATION                      @Z40NIVS 81702042
*                                                              @Z40NIVS 81704042
SETUP0   STM   R5,R8,XSAVE         SAVE WORK REGS              @Z40NIVS 81706042
         LA    R8,L50              LOAD NO. OF SUM REC         @Z40NIVS 81708042
SETUP1   CLC   L0(L6,R4),ZEROS     IS VOLID ZERO               @Z40NIVS 81710042
         BE    SETUP5              GO TO RETURN                @Z40NIVS 81712042
         MVC   READYP(L4),L18(R4)  MOVE RETRY CNT              @Z40NIVS 81714042
         L     R5,READYP           LOAD RETRY COUNT            @Z40NIVS 81716042
         MVC   READYP+L2(L6),L12(R4) MOVE BYTES READ           @Z40NIVS 81718042
         LH    R6,READYP+L2        LOAD OVERFLOW BYTES         @Z40NIVS 81720042
         L     R7,READYP+L4        LOAD BYTES READ             @Z40NIVS 81722042
         SRDL  R6,L20              CONVERT TO MEGABYTES        @Z40NIVS 81724042
         ST    R7,SETUP7           SAVE FOR MOVE               @Z40NIVS 81726042
         MVC   L14(L4,R4),SETUP7   MOVE MEGABYTES TO REC       @Z40NIVS 81728042
         CR    R7,R5               COMPARE RETRY TO MEGA       @Z40NIVS 81730042
         BNL   SETUP2              MEGABYTES IS HIGH           @Z40NIVS 81732042
         MVC   L12(L2,R4),ZEROS    MOVE IN ZEROS               @Z40NIVS 81734042
         B     SETUP4              GO AGAIN                    @Z40NIVS 81736042
SETUP2   LTR   R5,R5               TEST FOR NO RETRY CNT       @Z40NIVS 81738042
         BZ    SETUP6              GO SET UP FOR SORT          @Z40NIVS 81740042
         SR    R6,R6               CLR REG 6 FOR DIV           @Z40NIVS 81742042
         DR    R6,R5               RETRY INTO MEGABYTES        @Z40NIVS 81744042
         ST    R7,SETUP7           SAVE MEGA/RETRY             @Z40NIVS 81746042
SETUP3   MVC   L12(L2,R4),SETUP7+L2 MOVE IN FOR SORT           @Z40NIVS 81748042
SETUP4   LA    R4,L30(R4)          INCREMENT TO NEXT REC       @Z40RIVS 81750042
         BCT   R8,SETUP1           DECREMENT REC CNT           @Z40NIVS 81752042
SETUP5   B     RETURN              RETURN                      @Z40NIVS 81754042
SETUP6   OI    SETUP7+L2,SORTFLG   SET UP FOR SORT             @Z40NIVS 81756042
         B     SETUP3              GO TO MOVE SORT FIELD       @Z40NIVS 81758042
*                                                              @Z40NIVS 81760042
*                                                              @Z40NIVS 81762042
THEEND   STM   R14,R12,L12(R13)        SAVE ALL REGS           @Z40NIVS 81764042
         LR    R12,R13                 SAVE THE SAVE ADDRESS   @Z40NIVS 81766042
         LA    R13,FSAVE               POINT TO MY SAVE        @Z40NIVS 81768042
         ST    R12,L4(R13)             SET CHAINING POINTERS   @Z40NIVS 81770042
         ST    R13,L8(R12)                                       S21926 81780042
         L     R3,L4(R2)               PICK UP POINTER TO NEXT COUNTER  81838042
         ST    R3,L28(R12)             SAVE POINTER IN REG SAVE  S21926 81896042
         LH    R0,SIZE                 PICK UP SIZE OF AREA      S21926 81954042
         LR    R1,R2                   SET ADDRESS               S21926 82012042
         FREEMAIN R,LV=(0),A=(1)                                 S21926 82070042
         LTR   R3,R3                   ANY MORE COUNTERS         S21926 82128042
         BZ    RETURNO                 NO RETURN                 S21926 82186042
         LA    R5,PENTRY+L10       POINT TO TOP ENTRY LESS 4            82244042
         LA    R6,LABELS-L1        POINT TO FIRST LABEL LESS 1          82314042
         STM   R5,R6,YR9PTR        STORE IT IN TABLE                    82384042
RETURNO  L     R13,L4(R13)             PICK UP &                 S21926 82476042
         LM    R14,R12,L12(R13)        RESTORE REGS              S21926 82534042
         BR    R14                                                      82592042
*                                                                       82650042
SIZE     DC    H'5776'                                         @Z427VLS 83636042
         DS    0D                                                       83694042
XSAVE    DC    5F'0'                                                    83752042
XSAVE1   EQU   XSAVE                                                    83762042
XSAVEV   EQU   XSAVE                                                    83772042
FSAVE    DS    18F                                                      83810042
*                                                                       83868042
EMCUA1   DC    X'00'                                           @Z40RIVS 83871042
EMCUA    DC    H'0'                                            @Z40RIVS 83874042
RECTST4  DC    F'0'                                            @Z40NIVS 83878042

TFAULT7  DC    F'0'                                            @Z40NIVS 83908042

         SPACE 2                                                        84158042

         SPACE 2                                                        84594042

         LINE  ,(1,1),SKIP=2                                   @Z40NIVS 96330042
         ROUTINE YDUMA,SKIPPER                                 @Z40NIVS 96336042
         LABEL 'XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXC96342042
               XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX' 96348042
         LINE  ,(1,1)                                          @Z40NIVS 96354042
         ROUTINE YDUMA,THEEND                                  @Z40NIVS 96360042
         LABEL ' '                                             @Z40NIVS 96366042
         DC    X'FF'                                                    96396042
         DC    XL2'0000'                                                96454042
         DC    XL2'0018'                                                96512042
         DC    XL2'0000'                                                96570042
*                                                                       96628042
         DC    C'$'                                                     96686042
LABELS   EQU   *                                                        96744042
         LSTART                                                         96802042
         END                                                            96860042
./  ADD  SSI=63170072,NAME=IFCSXXXD
         TITLE 'IFCSXXXD - SUMMARY TABLE - LINKNAME=IFCST002, ALIASES=IC00055042
               FCST012,IFCS2305'                                        00110042
         SPACE 2                                                        00165042
*  LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO            * 00220042
         MACRO                                                          00275042
&NAME    LINE  &DATA,&LABEL,&SKIP=                                      00330042
.*                            THIS MACRO ESTABLISHES THE MARGINS OR     00385042
.*                                 COLUMN SETTINGS FOR EACH LINE. IT    00440042
.*                                 GENERATES NECESSARY CARRIAGE CONTROL 00495042
.*                                 ENTRIES. LASTLY IT DETERMINES THE    00550042
.*                                 NUMBER OF ENTRIES ASSOCIATED WITH    00605042
.*                                 THE PREVIOUS LINE AND STORES THAT #  00660042
.*                                 INTO THE APPROPRIATE BYTE.           00715042
.*                            &DATA(1) - CHARACTER POSITION TO BEGIN    00770042
.*                                 DATA.                                00825042
.*                            &DATA(2) - # OF SPACES BETWEEN SUCCESSIVE 00880042
.*                                 DATA COLUMN STARTING CHARACTERS.     00935042
.*                            &LABEL(1) - CHAR. POS. TO BEGIN LABELS.   00990042
.*                            &LABEL(2) - # SPACES BETWEEN LINE'S LABEL 01045042
.*                                 STARTING CHARACTERS.                 01100042
.*                            &SKIP= - # OF LINES TO ADVANCE CARRIAGE   01155042
.*                                 TO BEGIN NEXT PRINTED LINE.          01210042
.*                            NEW ENTRIES ARE GENERATED ONLY WHEN       01265042
.*                                 NECESSARY. OMISSION OF ITEMS MEANS   01320042
.*                                 THEY HAVE NOT CHANGED SINCE PREVIOUS 01375042
.*                                 SETTINGS. A LINE MACRO IS REQUIRED   01430042
.*                                 FOR EACH PRINTED LINE. IF NO SETTING 01485042
.*                                 CHANGES ARE REQUIRED ALL OPERANDS    01540042
.*                                 ARE OMITTED IN WHICH CASE ONLY THE   01595042
.*                                 # OF ENTRIES FOR THE PREVIOUS LINE   01650042
.*                                 IS COMPUTED. THIS MACRO MUST BE THE  01705042
.*                                 FIRST MACRO INSTRUCTION ISSUED FOR   01760042
.*                                 THE SUBJECT LINE                     01815042
         GBLA  &DB,&DT,&LB,&LT,&NRENTS                                  01870042
         GBLA  &LASTCC,&INITIAL                                         01925042
         GBLC  &NRENTSX                                                 01980042
         GBLC  &CARRCON                                                 02035042
         GBLB  &TEST                                                    02090042
         LCLA  &S                                                       02145042
&NAME    DS    0C                                                       02200042
         AIF   (&INITIAL EQ 0).FIRSTLN                                  02255042
         LINEND                                                         02310042
         AGO   .NTFIRST                                                 02365042
.FIRSTLN ANOP                                                           02420042
&NRENTSX SETC  'N&SYSNDX'                                               02475042
&INITIAL SETA  1                                                        02530042
N&SYSNDX EQU   *                                                        02585042
.NTFIRST ANOP                                                           02640042
         DC    AL1(0)                                                   02695042
         AIF   ('&DATA(1)' EQ '').CKDTABS                               02750042
         AIF   (&DATA(1) EQ &DB).CKDTABS                                02805042
&DB      SETA  &DATA(1)                                                 02860042
         AGO   .AA                                                      02915042
.CKDTABS AIF   ('&DATA(2)' EQ '').NCDATA                                02970042
         AIF   (&DATA(2) EQ &DT).NCDATA                                 03025042
         AGO   .CC                                                      03080042
.AA      AIF   ('&DATA(2)' EQ '').BB                                    03135042
         AIF   (&DATA(2) EQ &DT).BB                                     03190042
.CC      ANOP                                                           03245042
&DT      SETA  &DATA(2)                                                 03300042
.BB      DC    XL2'FFFE'                                                03355042
         DC    FL1'&DB'                                                 03410042
         DC    FL1'&DT'                                                 03465042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                03520042
.NCDATA  ANOP                                                           03575042
         AIF   ('&LABEL(1)' EQ '').CKLTABS                              03630042
         AIF   (&LABEL(1) EQ &LB).CKLTABS                               03685042
&LB      SETA  &LABEL(1)                                                03740042
         AGO   .AAA                                                     03795042
.CKLTABS AIF   ('&LABEL(2)' EQ '').NCLABEL                              03850042
         AIF   (&LABEL(2) EQ &LT).NCLABEL                               03905042
         AGO   .CCC                                                     03960042
.AAA     AIF   ('&LABEL(2)' EQ '').BBB                                  04015042
         AIF   (&LABEL(2) EQ &LT).BBB                                   04070042
.CCC     ANOP                                                           04125042
&LT      SETA  &LABEL(2)                                                04180042
.BBB     DC    XL2'FFFF'                                                04235042
         DC    FL1'&LB'                                                 04290042
         DC    FL1'&LT'                                                 04345042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                04400042
.NCLABEL ANOP                                                           04455042
         AIF   ('&SKIP' NE '').CONT                                     04510042
         AIF   (&TEST EQ 0).NOCHANG                                     04565042
&S       SETA  &LASTCC                                                  04620042
         AGO   .DEFAULT                                                 04675042
.CONT    ANOP                                                           04730042
         AIF   (&TEST EQ 0).AB                                          04785042
&S       SETA  &SKIP                                                    04840042
.DEFAULT ANOP                                                           04895042
         ORG   &CARRCON+3                                               04950042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&S),AL.3(1)                                 05005042
         ORG                                                            05060042
&LASTCC  SETA  &S                                                       05115042
&TEST    SETB  0                                                        05170042
         AGO   .DD                                                      05225042
.AB      AIF   (&SKIP EQ &LASTCC).NOCHANG                               05280042
A&SYSNDX DC    XL2'FFFB'                                                05335042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&SKIP),AL.3(1)                              05390042
         DC    FL1'9'                                                   05445042
&LASTCC  SETA  &SKIP                                                    05500042
&TEST    SETB  1                                                        05555042
&CARRCON SETC  'A&SYSNDX'                                               05610042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                05665042
.DD      ANOP                                                           05720042
.NOCHANG ANOP                                                           05775042
         MEND                                                           05830042
         EJECT                                                          05885042
         SPACE 2                                                        05940042
*  ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO* 05995042
         MACRO                                                          06050042
&NAME    ROUTINE &LOGITEM,&RNAME                                        06105042
         GBLC  &DSECT,&CSECT                                            06160042
         GBLC  &ITEM(1000)                                              06215042
         GBLA  &SHIFT(1000),&ITEMNBR                                    06270042
         GBLA  &NRENTS                                                  06325042
         LCLA  &ISHIFT,&NDX                                             06380042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           06435042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   06490042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      06545042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  06600042
         MNOTE *,'LOG ITEM NOT DEFINED'                                 06655042
         MEXIT                                                          06710042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           06765042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             06820042
&NAME    DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'D'                           06875042
         DC    AL.4(&ISHIFT),AL.12(&RNAME-&CSECT)                       06930042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                06985042
         MEND                                                           07040042
         MACRO                                                          07095042
&NAME    LABEL &LABEL1,&LABEL2,&LABEL3,&LABEL4,&LABEL5,&LABEL6,        C07150042
               &LABEL7,&LABEL8                                          07205042
.*                            THIS MACRO ALLOWS UP TO ACHT LABELS TO    07260042
.*                                 BE SPECIFIED FOR A GIVEN LINE. THE   07315042
.*                                 LABELS SHOULD BE ENCLOSED IN QUOTA-  07370042
.*                                 TION MARKS. THE COLUMN AND LINE END  07425042
.*                                 CONTROLS WILL BE INSERTED BY THE     07480042
.*                                 MACRO. OMITTED OPERANDS MEAN NO      07535042
.*                                 LABEL REQUIRED FOR RESPECTIVE        07590042
.*                                 COLUMN. THIS MACRO WILL ALSO ALERT   07645042
.*                                 THE PROGRAMMER TO EXACTLY WHERE THE  07700042
.*                                 TABLE MUST BE BROKEN IF NECESSARY    07755042
.*                                 TO AVOID EXCEEDING THE MAXIMUM LIMIT 07810042
         GBLC &LABELS(2000)                                             07865042
         GBLC  &LBL(100)                                                07920042
         GBLA  &LBLCTR(100)                                             07975042
         GBLA  &LABELNR                                                 08030042
         GBLA  &NRENTS,&LPTR                                            08085042
         LCLC  &MARGIN,&TACK                                            08140042
         LCLC  &TEXT                                                    08195042
         LCLA  &OP,&K,&START,&NRCHAR,&REMAIN                            08250042
&MARGIN  SETC  '*'                                                      08305042
         AIF   ('&NAME' EQ '').LOOPOUT                                  08360042
&LPTR    SETA  &LPTR+1                                                  08415042
&LBL(&LPTR) SETC '&NAME'                                                08470042
&LBLCTR(&LPTR) SETA &LABELNR+1                                          08525042
.LOOPOUT ANOP                                                           08580042
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    08635042
&K       SETA  K'&SYSLIST(&OP)                                          08690042
         AIF (&K GE 2).NORM                                             08745042
&K       SETA  2                                                        08800042
.NORM    ANOP                                                           08855042
&START   SETA  2                                                        08910042
         AIF (&OP LT N'&SYSLIST).NOTLAST                                08965042
&MARGIN  SETC  '$'                                                      09020042
.NOTLAST ANOP                                                           09075042
&NRCHAR  SETA  8                                                        09130042
&TACK    SETC  ''                                                       09185042
.LOOPIN  ANOP                                                           09240042
&REMAIN  SETA  &K-&START                                                09295042
         AIF (&REMAIN GE 8).MORE                                        09350042
&TACK    SETC  '&MARGIN'                                                09405042
&NRCHAR  SETA  &REMAIN                                                  09460042
.MORE    ANOP                                                           09515042
&TEXT    SETC  ''                                                       09570042
         AIF (&REMAIN EQ 0).ENDTEXT                                     09625042
&TEXT    SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP)'(&START,&NRCHAR)                          09680042
.ENDTEXT ANOP                                                           09735042
&LABELNR SETA  &LABELNR+1                                               09790042
&LABELS(&LABELNR) SETC '&TEXT'.'&TACK'                                  09845042
&START   SETA  &START+8                                                 09900042
         AIF ('&TACK' EQ '').LOOPIN                                     09955042
         AIF ('&TACK' EQ '*').LOOPOUT                                   10010042
         MEND                                                           10065042
*  DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO        * 10120042
         SPACE 2                                                        10175042
         MACRO                                                          10230042
&NAME    DSGEN &X1,&X2,&X3,&X4,&X5,&X6,&X7,&X8,&X9,&X10,&X11,&X12,&X13,X10285042
               &X14,&X15,&X16,&X17,&X18,&X19,&X20,&X21,&X22,&X23,&X24, X10340042
               &X25,&X26,&X27,&X28,&X29,&X30,&X31,&X32                  10395042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES ONE DSECT WORD       10450042
.*                                 FORMATTED FOR THE SUBJECT LOG RECORD 10505042
.*                                 EACH OPERAND HAS TWO SUB LISTS. THE  10560042
.*                                 FIRST IS THE NAME OF THE LOG ITEM    10615042
.*                                 WHILE THE SECOND IS THE # OF BITS TO 10670042
.*                                 ALLOCATE FOR THIS ITEM. ITEMS MUST   10725042
.*                                 BE DEFINED CONTIGUOUSLY WITHOUT GAPS 10780042
.*                                 UNUSED BIT GROUPS MUST BE GIVEN      10835042
.*                                 DUMMY NAMES. THE NAMES PROVIDED FOR  10890042
.*                                 THE LOG ITEMS MAY THEN BE USED IN    10945042
.*                                 THE CONVERSION MACRO INSTRUCTIONS.   11000042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000)                                               11055042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000)                         11110042
         LCLC  &SYMBOL                                                  11165042
         LCLA  &OP,&COUNT,&BYTE                                         11220042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           11275042
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    11330042
&ITEMNBR SETA  &ITEMNBR+1                                               11385042
&SYMBOL  SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP,1)'                                        11440042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,2)' NE '').OK1                            11495042
         MNOTE *,'NULL BIT COUNT FIELD'                                 11550042
         MEXIT                                                          11605042
.OK1     ANOP                                                           11660042
         AIF   ('&SYMBOL' NE '').OK                                     11715042
         MNOTE 'LOG ITEM SYMBOL NOT PROVIDED'                           11770042
         AGO   .CNT                                                     11825042
.OK      ANOP                                                           11880042
         AIF   ('&SYMBOL'(1,1) EQ '''').CNT                *TEMP*       11935042
&SYMBOL  EQU   *+&BYTE                                                  11990042
&ITEM(&ITEMNBR)  SETC '&SYSLIST(&OP,1)'                                 12045042
&BITS(&ITEMNBR) SETA &SYSLIST(&OP,2)                                    12100042
&SHIFT(&ITEMNBR) SETA &COUNT-&BYTE*8                                    12155042
.CNT     ANOP                                                           12210042
&COUNT   SETA  &COUNT+&SYSLIST(&OP,2)                                   12265042
&BYTE    SETA  &COUNT/8                                                 12320042
         AIF (&OP LT N'&SYSLIST).LOOP                                   12375042
         AIF   (&COUNT NE 32).NOT32                                     12430042
&NAME    DS    4C                                                       12485042
         MEXIT                                                          12540042
.NOT32   AIF   (&COUNT NE 64).ERR                                       12595042
&NAME    DS    8C                                                       12650042
         MEXIT                                                          12705042
.ERR     MNOTE '**BIT COUNT FIELDS DO NOT TOTAL 32 OR 64**'             12760042
         MEND                                                           12815042
         MACRO                                                          12870042
         LINEND                                                         12925042
.*                            THIS MACRO IS USED ONLY BY THE LINE       12980042
.*                                 MACRO TO SET THE NUMBER OF ENTRIES   13035042
.*                                 ASSOCIATED WITH EACH LINE.           13090042
         GBLA  &NRENTS                                                  13145042
         GBLC &NRENTSX                                                  13200042
         ORG   &NRENTSX                                                 13255042
         DC    FL1'&NRENTS'                                             13310042
         ORG                                                            13365042
&NRENTS  SETA  0                                                        13420042
B&SYSNDX EQU   *                                                        13475042
&NRENTSX SETC  'B&SYSNDX'                                               13530042
         MEND                                                           13585042
         MACRO                                                          13640042
         LSTART                                                         13695042
.*                            THIS MACRO IS ISSUED WHEN THE LABEL AREA  13750042
.*                                 OF THE TABLE IS TO BEGIN.            13805042
         GBLC &LABELS(2000)                                             13860042
         GBLA  &LABELNR                                                 13915042
         GBLC  &LBL(100)                                                13970042
         GBLA  &LBLCTR(100)                                             14025042
         LCLA  &NDX,&CTR                                                14080042
         LINEND                                                         14135042
&CTR     SETA  1                                                        14190042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           14245042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   14300042
         AIF   (&LBLCTR(&CTR) NE &NDX).NOLBL                            14355042
&LBL(&CTR) DC  C'&LABELS(&NDX)'                                         14410042
&CTR     SETA  &CTR+1                                                   14465042
         AGO   .LOOPCTL                                                 14520042
.NOLBL   ANOP                                                           14575042
         DC    C'&LABELS(&NDX)'                                         14630042
.LOOPCTL AIF   (&NDX LT &LABELNR).LOOP                                  14685042
         MEND                                                           14740042
         SPACE 2                                                        14795042
*  BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO  * 14850042
         SPACE 2                                                        14905042
         MACRO                                                          14960042
         BIN   &LOGITEM,&SKIP$OR                                        15015042
.*                                 &LOGITEM - NAME OF ITEM IN LOG       15070042
.*                                      RECORD DSECT                    15125042
.*                                 &SKIP$OR - NBR OF SPACES TO SKIP ON  15180042
.*                                 MULTIPLE PRINT OR NBR OF SPACES      15235042
.*                                      TO BACK UP FROM COLUMN FOR      15290042
.*                                      START OF PRINTING. THE LETTER   15345042
.*                                      B PRECEEDS THE NUMBER (B5) IF   15400042
.*                                      THE LATTER IS DESIRED. OMISSION 15455042
.*                                      OF THIS OPERAND FORCES OPTION 2 15510042
.*                                      WITH BACKUP SPACING EQUAL TO    15565042
.*                                 THE NUMBER OF BITS IN THE ITEM       15620042
.*                                 DEFINITION (VIA MACRO 'DSGEN').      15675042
.*                            A LIMIT OF 15 BITS IS IMPOSED FOR THE     15730042
.*                                 TOTAL NUMBER OF BITS TO PRINT.       15785042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000)                                               15840042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000),&NRENTS                 15895042
         GBLC  &DSECT                                                   15950042
         LCLB  &B                                                       16005042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&K                                   16060042
         LCLA  &TEMP,&T                                                 16115042
         LCLC  &S                                                       16170042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           16225042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   16280042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      16335042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  16390042
         MNOTE *,'YOU BLEW IT'                                          16445042
         ROUTINE DUM,SKIPPER                                            16500042
         MEXIT                                                          16555042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           16610042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             16665042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              16720042
&T       SETA  &IBITS-1                                                 16775042
&B       SETB  0                                                        16830042
         AIF   ('&SKIP$OR' EQ '').BACKUP                                16885042
&K       SETA  K'&SKIP$OR                                               16940042
&B       SETB  ('&SKIP$OR'(1,1) EQ 'B')                                 16995042
&S       SETC  '&SKIP$OR'(&B+1,&K-&B)                                   17050042
&T       SETA  &S                                                       17105042
.BACKUP  ANOP                                                           17160042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                17215042
&TEMP    SETA  &ISHIFT                                                  17270042
A&SYSNDX DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'&TEMP'                       17325042
         AIF (&IBITS EQ 1 AND &B EQ 0).OUT                              17380042
         ORG   A&SYSNDX                                                 17435042
&B       SETB  1                                                        17490042
         DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'C'                           17545042
         DC    BL.1'&B',AL.7(&T),AL.4(&IBITS),FL.4'&ISHIFT'             17600042
.OUT     ANOP                                                           17655042
         MEND                                                           17710042
         EJECT                                                          17765042
*  HEX MACRO     HEX MACRO     HEX MACRO    HEXN MACRO     HEX MACRO  * 17820042
         SPACE 2                                                        17875042
         MACRO                                                          17930042
         HEX   &LOGITEM,&SKIP$OR,&BYTES                                 17985042
.*                            THIS MACRO FACILITATES GENERATION OF THE  18040042
.*                                 TABLE ENTRIES SPECIFYING HEX TYPE    18095042
.*                                 CONVERSIONS.                         18150042
.*                            &LOGITEM - NAME OF DATA ITEM TO BE        18205042
.*                                 CONVERTED                            18260042
.*                            &SKIP$OR - NUMBER OF SPACES TO SKIP ON    18315042
.*                                 MULTIPLE PRINT OR NBR OF SPACES TO   18370042
.*                                 BACK UP FROM COLUMN FOR START OF     18425042
.*                                 PRINTING. THE LETTER B PRECEEDS THE  18480042
.*                                 NUMBER (B8) IF THE LATTER OPTION IS  18535042
.*                                 DESIRED. OMISSION OF THIS OPERAND    18590042
.*                                 FORCES OPTION 2 WITH BACKUP SPACING  18645042
.*                                 EQUAL TO THE NUMBER OF BYTES SPECI-  18700042
.*                                 FIED BY THE NEXT OPERAND (TWICE THIS 18755042
.*                                 NUMBER IF SUFFIX IS EXPLICITLY OR    18810042
.*                                 IMPLICITLY B).                       18865042
.*                            &BYTES - NUMBER OF TOTAL INPUT BYTES TO   18920042
.*                                 PROCESS. THIS NUMBER IS SUFFIXED     18975042
.*                                 WITH AN L,R, OR B TO STIPULATE       19030042
.*                                 PRINTING OF THE LEFT HALF, RIGHT     19085042
.*                                 HALF, OR BOTH HALVES OF THE BYTE     19140042
.*                                 RESPECTIVELY. OMISSION OF THIS       19195042
.*                                 OPERAND DEFAULTS TO B WITH THE NUM-  19250042
.*                                 BER OF BYTES EQUAL TO THE ITEM LNGTH 19305042
.*                            A NEW ENTRY IS GENERATED ONLY WHEN NECES- 19360042
.*                                 SARY. THIS MACRO MUST BE THE FIRST   19415042
.*                                 MACRO INSTRUCTION ISSUED FOR THE     19470042
.*                                 SUBJECT LINE(S).                     19525042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000),&DSECT                                        19580042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000),&NRENTS                 19635042
         LCLB  &B                                                       19690042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&K,&T,&CODE,&BYTESP                  19745042
         LCLC  &S,&LETTER                                               19800042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           19855042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   19910042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      19965042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  20020042
         MNOTE *,'LOG ITEM NOT DEFINED'                                 20075042
         MEXIT                                                          20130042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           20185042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             20240042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              20295042
&CODE    SETA  1                                                        20350042
&K       SETA  K'&BYTES                                                 20405042
         AIF   (&IBITS-(&IBITS/4)*4 EQ 0).OK                            20460042
         MNOTE *,'BIT LENGTH SPECIFICATION INCONSISTENT WITH CONTROL'   20515042
         MEXIT                                                          20570042
.OK      AIF   ('&BYTES' EQ '').USEDEFN                                 20625042
&LETTER  SETC  '&BYTES'(&K,1)                                           20680042
&S       SETC  '&BYTES'(1,&K-1)                                         20735042
&BYTESP  SETA  &S                                                       20790042
         AIF   ('&LETTER' EQ 'B').BOTH                                  20845042
         AIF   (&ISHIFT EQ 0 OR &ISHIFT EQ 4).OK2                       20900042
.ERR     MNOTE *,'DATA NOT ALLIGNED ON HEX OR BYTE BOUNDARY'            20955042
         MEXIT                                                          21010042
.USEDEFN ANOP                                                           21065042
&BYTESP  SETA  &IBITS/8                                                 21120042
.BOTH    AIF   (&ISHIFT NE 0).ERR                                       21175042
&CODE    SETA  3                                                        21230042
&T       SETA  &BYTESP*2-1                                              21285042
&S       SETC  '&T'                                                     21340042
.OK2     AIF   (&ISHIFT EQ 0).L                                         21395042
&CODE    SETA  2                                                        21450042
.L       ANOP                                                           21505042
&B       SETB  1                                                        21560042
         AIF   ('&SKIP$OR' EQ '').BACKUP                                21615042
&K       SETA  K'&SKIP$OR                                               21670042
&B       SETB  ('&SKIP$OR'(1,1) EQ 'B')                                 21725042
&S       SETC  '&SKIP$OR'(&B+1,&K-&B)                                   21780042
.BACKUP  ANOP                                                           21835042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                21890042
         DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'A'                           21945042
         DC    BL.1'&B',FL.7'&S',FL.4'&BYTESP',FL.4'&CODE'              22000042
.OUT     ANOP                                                           22055042
         MEND                                                           22110042
         MACRO                                                          22165042
         SPECIAL  &ROUTINE,&PARAM,&SPACE=                               22220042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES A SPECIAL ROUTINE    22275042
.*                                 ENTRY TO BE PROCESSED BY THE SUM. M. 22330042
.*                            &ROUTINE - SYMBOL ON SPECIAL ROUTINE EWT. 22385042
.*                            &PARAM - AN 8 BIT BINARY REPRESENTATION   22440042
.*                                 TO OCCUPY THE 'MASK' FIELD BUT TO BE 22495042
.*                                 INTERPRETED AS AN ARGUMENT OF THE    22550042
.*                                 SPECIAL ROUTINE.                     22605042
.*                            &SPACE - THE NUMBER OF 2BYTE COUNTERS TO  22660042
.*                                 ALLOCATE FOR REQUIRED PROCESSING.    22715042
         GBLC  &CSECT                                                   22770042
         GBLA  &COUNTR                                                  22825042
         LCLA  &ADD                                                     22880042
         DC    AL1(128)                                                 22935042
         DC    BL.8'&PARAM'                                             22990042
         DC    AL2(&ROUTINE-&CSECT)                                     23045042
         DC    AL2(&COUNTR)                                             23100042
&ADD     SETA  1                                                        23155042
         AIF   ('&SPACE' EQ '').NORM                                    23210042
&ADD     SETA  &SPACE                                                   23265042
.NORM    ANOP                                                           23320042
&COUNTR  SETA  &COUNTR+&ADD                                             23375042
         MEND                                                           23430042
         MACRO                                                          23485042
         SUM   &LOGITEM,&MASK                                           23540042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES A NORMAL EDIT ENTRY  23595042
.*                                 FOR PROCESSING BY THE SUMMARY MODULE 23650042
.*                            &LOGITEM - NAME OF DATA ITEM TO BE SUMMED 23705042
.*                            &MASK - BYTE MASK FOR BITS TO BE TESTED.  23760042
.*                                 THIS OPERAND SHOULD BE OMITTED FOR   23815042
.*                                 SINGLE BIT ITEMS IN WHICH CASE THE   23870042
.*                                 MASK WILL BE SET ACCORDING TO THE    23925042
.*                                 OFF BYTE BIT DISPLACEMENT OF THE     23980042
.*                                ITEM AS DEFINED BY THE MACRO 'DSGEN'  24035042
         GBLA  &COUNTR,&ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000)                24090042
         GBLC  &ITEM(1000),&DSECT                                       24145042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&M,&BITNBR                           24200042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           24255042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   24310042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      24365042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  24420042
         MNOTE *,'LOGITEM NOT FOUND'                                    24475042
         MEXIT                                                          24530042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           24585042
         DC    AL1(0)                                                   24640042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             24695042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              24750042
         AIF   ('&MASK' EQ '').FORM                                     24805042
         DC    B'&MASK'                                                 24860042
         AGO   .ITEM                                                    24915042
.FORM    ANOP                                                           24970042
&BITNBR  SETA  &ISHIFT-7                                                25025042
&BITNBR  SETA  0-&BITNBR                                                25080042
&M       SETA  1                                                        25135042
.LOOP2   ANOP                                                           25190042
         AIF   (&BITNBR EQ 0).GOTIT                                     25245042
&M       SETA  &M*2                                                     25300042
&BITNBR  SETA  &BITNBR-1                                                25355042
         AGO   .LOOP2                                                   25410042
.GOTIT   ANOP                                                           25465042
         DC    AL1(&M)                                                  25520042
.ITEM    DC    AL2(&LOGITEM-&DSECT)                                     25575042
         DC    AL2(&COUNTR)                                             25630042
&COUNTR  SETA  &COUNTR+1                                                25685042
         MEND                                                           25740042
         GBLC  &DSECT,&CSECT                                            25795042
&DSECT   SETC  'S0002'                                                  25850042
&CSECT   SETC  'IFCSXXXD'                                               25905042
*********************************************************************** 25960042
*                                                                     * 26015042
*              THIS ENTIRE MODULE IS IN SUPPORT OF  S20201            * 26070042
*                                                                     * 26125042
*********************************************************************** 26180042

*        SPECIAL ROUTINES                                               37840042

XDATE1   STM   R4,R8,XSAVE              SAVE REGS                       37950042
         LA    R5,L266(R3)              POINT TO MPL FILE SEEK CHECKS   38005042
         ST    R5,IF0                   STORE 5 IF MODUE 0 DEFAULT      38060042
         CLC   DATE(L4),HEX00           IS DATE ZERO                    38115042
         BE    RECORDCK                 BR-ZERO                         38170042
         CLC   L0(L4,R3),HEX00          IS LOW DATE ZERO                38225042
         BNE   XDATE2                   BR-NO                           38280042
         MVC      L0(L4,R3),DATE                 MOVE IN DATE           38335042
XDATE2   CLC   DATE(L4),L0(R3)          CHECK FOR LOW DATE              38390042
         BL    SAVELOW                  LOWER SAVE IT                   38445042
         CLC   DATE(L4),L4(R3)          CHECK FOR HI                    38500042
         BNH   RECORDCK                 BR-NOT HI                       38555042
SAVEHI   MVC   L4(L4,R3),DATE           MOVE HI DATE                    38610042
         B     RECORDCK                 SEE WHAT TYPE RECORD            38665042
SAVELOW  MVC   L0(L4,R3),DATE           MOVE LOW DATE                   38720042
         B     RECORDCK                 SEE WHAT TYPE RECORD            38775042
RECORDCK TM    CLASRC,H30               SEE IF IT IS AN OBR RECORD      38830042
         BO    OBRCKS                   BRANCH IF IT IS TO CHECK OBR    38885042
MODCHK   TM    SPARE1,H10             SEE IF MOD-1                      38940042
         BO    MOD1                     BR-YES                          38995042
         MVC   MODEL(L1),TWO            MOVE IN TWO                     39050042
         B     AROUND                   BR-AROUND                       39105042
MOD1     MVC   MODEL(L1),ONE            MOVE IN ONE                     39160042
AROUND   LA    R6,L26(R2)               GET TO START OF RECORD SENSE    39215042
         LA     R7,L128(R6)             GET ADDR OF END OF RECORD       39270042
         ST    R7,EOR                                                   39325042
AGAIN    L     R5,IF0                   LOAD AS IF MODULE 0             39380042
         TM    BYTE0,HE0                TEST FIRST THREE BITS           39435042
         BO    UDC                      BR IF 111                       39490042
         TM    BYTE0,HC0                TEST FIRST THREE BITS           39545042
         BO    CDC                      BR IF 110                       39600042
         TM    BYTE0,H60                TEST FIRST THREE BITS           39655042
         BO    MFC                      BR IF 011                       39710042
         TM    BYTE0,H80                TEST FIRST THREE BITS           39765042
         BO    UOC                      BR IF 100                       39820042
         TM    BYTE0,H20                TEST FIRST THREE BITS           39875042
         BO    CSR                      BR IF 001                       39930042
TEST     LA    R6,L8(R6)                BUMP R4 UP 8 TO NEW ENTRY       39985042
         CL    R6,EOR                   COMPARE IT WITH END OF RECORD   40040042
         BL    AGAIN                    GO BACK IF LESS                 40095042
         LA    R8,QUIT-L6                                               40150042
         ST    R8,REG8                                                  40205042
         LM    R4,R8,XSAVE              RESTORE REGS IF NOT             40260042
         BR    R14                      GO BACK                         40315042
MFC      SR    R7,R7                    CLEAR REG 7                     40370042
         IC    R7,BYTE1                 GET READS AND SEEKS             40425042
         ST    R6,XSAVEA                STORE R6 TEMP.                  40480042
         SR    R6,R6                                                    40535042
         SLDL  R6,L28                   PUT READS IN 6                  40590042
         SRL   R7,L28                   PUT SEEKS IN 7                  40645042
         AH    R6,MPLFRCK               ADD TOTAL READ CHECKS           40700042
         AH    R7,MPLFSCK               ADD TOTAL SEEK CHECKS           40755042
         STH   R6,MPLFRCK               STORE TOTAL READ CHECKS         40810042
         STH   R7,MPLFSCK               STORE TOTAL SEEK&CHECKS         40865042
         L     R6,XSAVEA                RELOAD R6                       40920042
         B     TEST                     GO TEST ANOTHER BLOCK           40975042
CSR      LA    R8,L1                    GET ONE IN R6                   41030042
         AH    R8,CTLUSR                ADD TOTAL CTLUSR                41085042
         STH   R8,CTLUSR                STORE TOTAL RESET COUNT         41140042
         B     TEST                     GO TEST ANOTHER BLOCK           41195042
UOC      TM    BYTE0,H08                SEE IF MODULE 0                 41250042
         BZ    MOD0                     BRANCH YES                      41305042
         LA    R5,MOD1OUX               UPDATE PTR IF ON                41360042
MOD0     SR    R8,R8                    CLEAR REG 8                     41415042
         IC    R8,BYTE1                 GET OVERRUN CHANNEL A           41470042
         AH    R8,ORCHANA               ADD TOTAL OVERRUN A             41525042
         STH   R8,ORCHANA               STORE TOTAL                     41580042
         SR    R8,R8                    CLEAR REG 6                     41635042
         IC    R8,BYTE2                 GET OVERRUN CHANNEL B           41690042
         AH    R8,ORCHANB               ADD TOTAL OVERRUN B             41745042
         STH   R8,ORCHANB               STORE TOTAL                     41800042
         SR    R8,R8                    CLEAR REG6                      41855042
         IC    R8,BYTE3                 GET MISSING AM                  41910042
         AH    R8,MISSADM               ADD TOTAL MISSING AM'S          41965042
         STH   R8,MISSADM               STORE TOTAL                     42020042
         MVC   MOVEIT(L4),BYTE4         GET BYTES READ ON FWB           42075042
         L     R8,MOVEIT                PUT IN REG 8                    42130042
         SRL   R8,L10                   DIVIDE BY 1000                  42185042
         MVC   MOVEIT(L4),BIG                                           42240042
         L     R7,MOVEIT                                                42295042
         AR    R8,R7                                                    42350042
         ST    R8,MOVEIT                                                42405042
         MVC   BIG(L4),MOVEIT                                           42460042
         B     TEST                     GO TO TEST ROUTINE              42515042
CDC      EQU   *                                                        42570042
UDC      TM    BYTE2,H08                SEE IF MODULE 0                 42625042
         BZ    TABSAVE                  BRANCH YES                      42680042
         LA    R5,MOD1OUX               UPDATE PTR IF ON                42735042
TABSAVE  L     R4,TABADDR               LOAD ADDRESS OF NEXT TABLE ENTY 42790042
         LTR   R4,R4                    TEST 4                          42845042
         BNZ   ONWARD                   BRANCH IF SOMTHING IN 4         42900042
         LA    R4,TABLE                 LOAD INITIAL PTR INTO 4         42955042
ONWARD   LA    R8,L1                    GET 1 IN REG 8                  43010042
         AH    R8,DATACKS               ADD TOTAL DATA CHECKS           43065042
         STH   R8,DATACKS               STORE TOTAL DATA CHECKS         43120042
         LA    R8,L1                    GET 1 IN REG 8                  43175042
         AH    R8,CURETRY               ADD TOTAL CU TIMES              43230042
         STH   R8,CURETRY               STORE TOTAL                     43285042
         CLC   TWENTY(L2),DATACKS       SEE IF MORE THAN 20 DATA CHECKS 43340042
         BL    TEST                     GO BACK IF MORE THAN 40         43395042
         MVC   TABYTE0(L1),BYTE0        PUT BYTE 0 IN TABLE BYTE 0      43450042
         MVC   TABYTE1(L1),BYTE3        PUT BYTE 3 IN TABLE BYTE 1      43505042
         MVC   TABYTE2(L1),BYTE4        PUT BYTE 4 IN TABLE BYTE 2      43560042
         MVC   TABYTE3(L1),BYTE5        PUT BYTE 5 IN TABLE BYTE 3      43615042
         LA    R4,L4(R4)                BUMP UP POINTER 4               43670042
         ST    R4,TABADDR               SAVE TABLE ENTRY ADDRESS        43725042
         B     TEST                     GO BACK FOR MORE                43780042
OBRCKS   TM    CUA+L2,H08               SEE IF MODULE 0                 43835042
         BZ    BACKWARD                 BRANCH YES                      43890042
         LA    R3,NAME-L6                                               43945042
         ST    R3,REG8                                                  44000042
         LA    R5,MOD1OUX               UP PTR IF ON            OX00636 44020042
BACKWARD TM    DEVTYP2+L1,H07           SEE IF MODEL 1                  44055042
         BO    MODEL2                   BRANCH AROUND IF NO             44110042
         MVC   MODEL(L1),ONE            MOVE IN ONE                     44165042
         B     NO1X                     BRANCH AROUND            S21021 44220042
MODEL2   MVC   MODEL(L1),TWO            MOVE IN TWO                     44275042
NO1X     TM    CLASRC,X32               IS IT AN OLD RECORD      S21021 44330042
         BO    NO1                      BR-YES                   S21021 44385042
         S     R2,TEN                   NO- SUBTRACT TEN         S21021 44440042
NO1      EQU   *                                                OX00636 44495042
UPWARD   TM    SNB00,H10                IS IT AN EQUIPMENT CHECK        44660042
         BZ    NO2                      BRANCH AROUND IF OFF            44715042
         LA    R8,L1                    GET 1 IN REG 8                  44770042
         AH    R8,EQUIPCK               ADD EQUIP. CHECK                44825042
         STH   R8,EQUIPCK               STORE TOTAL                     44880042
NO2      TM    SNB00,H20                IS IT A BUS OUT PARITY          44935042
         BZ    NO3                      BRANCH AROUND IF OFF            44990042
         LA    R8,L1                    GET 1 IN REG 8                  45045042
         AH    R8,BUSOUTP               ADD BUS OUTS                    45100042
         STH   R8,BUSOUTP               STORE TOTAL                     45155042
NO3      TM    SNB00,H08                IS IT A DATA CHECK              45210042
         BZ    RETURN                                                   45265042
         LA    R8,L1                    GET 1 IN REG 8                  45320042
         AH    R8,DATACKS               ADD DATA CHECKS                 45375042
         STH   R8,DATACKS               STORE TOTAL                     45430042
         TM    SNB10,H80                SEE IF PERM ERROR               45485042
         BZ    NEXT1                    BR IF NO                        45540042
         LA    R8,L1                    GET 1 IN R8                     45595042
         AH    R8,PERM                  ADD TOTAL PERMS SO FAR          45650042
         STH   R8,PERM                  STORE NEW TOTAL                 45705042
         B     OVER                     GO ON OVER CODE                 45760042
NEXT1    TM    SNB20,H40                SEE IF CORRECTABLE              45815042
         BZ    INHIBIT                  BR NO INHIBIT                   45870042
         B     CORECA                   BR TO CORRECTABLE CODE          45925042
INHIBIT  LA    R8,L1                    GET 1 IN R8                     45980042
         AH    R8,RETRYIN               ADD TOTAL RETRY INHIBITS        46035042
         STH   R8,RETRYIN               STORE NEW TOTAL                 46090042
         B     OVER                     BR OVER CODE                    46145042
CORECA   LA    R8,L1                    GET 1 IN R8                     46200042
         AH    R8,CORR                  ADD TOTAL CORRECTABLES          46255042
         STH   R8,CORR                  STORE NEW TOTAL                 46310042
OVER     EQU   *                                                        46365042
         CLC   TWENTY(L2),DATACKS       SEE IF MORE THAN 0 DATA CHECKS 46420042
         BL    RETURN                   BR-YES                          46475042
         L     R4,TABADDR               LOAD ADDR OF NEXT ENTRY MODULE1 46530042
         LTR   R4,R4                    TEST 4                          46585042
         BNZ   FORWARD                  BRANCH IF SOMETHING IN 4        46640042
         LA    R4,TABLE                 LOAD INITIAL PTR INTO 4         46695042
FORWARD  SR    R7,R7                    CLEAR R7                        46750042
         IC    R7,SNB10                 LOAD BYTE                       46805042
         SRL   R7,L7                    PERM IN BIT31                   46860042
         SR    R8,R8                    CLEAR REG 8                     46915042
         IC    R8,SNB20                 LOAD BYTE                       46970042
         SLL   R8,L25                   GET RID OF BIT 0                47025042
         SRL   R8,L31                   CORR IN BIT31                   47080042
         SLL   R8,L1                    CORR IN BIT 30                  47135042
         OR    R7,R8                    COMBINE                         47190042
         MVC   PERMCORR(L1),ZEROA       PUT IN ZEROES                   47245042
         STC   R7,PERMCORR              PUT IN TABLE CONSTANT           47300042
         OI    PERMCORR,H20                                             47355042
         MVC   TABYTE0(L1),PERMCORR                                     47410042
         MVC   TABYTE1(L1),SNB140       PUT BYTE 14 IN TABLE BYTE 1     47465042
         MVC   TABYTE2(L1),SNB50        PUT BYTE 5 IN TAB BY 2  OX00637 47520042
         MVC   TABYTE3(L1),SNB60        PUT BYTE 6 IN TAB BYT 3 OX00637 47570042
         LA    R4,L4(R4)                BUMP UP POINTER 4               47630042
         ST    R4,TABADDR               STOORE TABLE ENTRY ADDR         47685042
         B     RETURN                   GO BACK                         47740042
ADD2     TM    CLASRC,X32               IS IT AN OLD RECORD      S21021 47795042
         BO    BACK                     BR-YES                   S21021 47850042
         LA    R2,L10(R2)               NO ADD TEN               S21021 47905042
BACK     BR    R14                      GO BACK                  S21021 47960042
RETURN   LM    R4,R8,XSAVE              RESTORE REGS                    48015042
         BR    R14                      GO BACK                         48070042

CONVERT5 STM   R5,R8,XSAVE1             SAVE REGS                       60940042
         LH    R5,L0(R4)                PICK UP COUNT                   60995042
         CVD   R5,WORK                  CONVERT TO DECIMAL              61050042
         UNPK  L0(L5,R3),WORK+L5(L3)    UNPACK TO PRINT BUFF            61105042
         MVZ   L4(L1,R3),L0(R3)         PUT IN TIGHT ZONE               61160042
         B     RETURNA                  RETURN                          61215042
CONVERT  STM   R5,R8,XSAVE1             SAVE REGS                       61270042
         LH    R6,L0(R4)                PICK UP COUNT                   61325042
         BAL   R8,CONVERT2              GO TO SPECIAL CONVERT ROUTINE   61380042
         MVC   L0(L3,R3),TRANS          PUT NUMBER IN RIGHT PLACE       61435042
RETURNA  LM    R5,R8,XSAVE1             RESTORE REGS                    61490042
         BR    R14                      RETURN                          61545042
