         BL    BACK1                                                    61655042
         SR    R15,R15                                                  61710042
BACK1    BR    R14                                                      61765042
FREECTR  STM   R14,R12,L12(R13)        SAVE ALL REGS                    61820042
         LR    R12,R13                 SAVE SAVE AREA ADDR              61875042
         LA    R13,FSAVE               POINT TO MY SAVE                 61930042
         ST    R12,L4(R13)             SET CHAINING POINTERS            61985042
         ST    R13,L8(R12)                                              62040042
         L     R3,L4(R2)               PICK UP POINTER TO NEXT COUNTER  62095042
         ST    R3,L28(R12)             SAVE POINTER IN REG SAVE         62150042
         LH    R0,SIZE                 PICK UP SAZE OF AREA             62205042
         LR    R1,R2                   SET ADDRESS                      62260042
         FREEMAIN R,LV=(0),A=(1)                                        62315042
         LTR   R3,R3                   ANY MORE COUNTERS                62370042
         BZ    RETURN0                 NO RETURN                        62425042
         LA    R5,PENTRY+L10           POINT TO TOP ENTRY - 4           62480042
         ST    R5,YR9PTR                                                62535042
         LA    R5,LABELS-L1            POINT TO FIRST LABEL -1          62590042
         ST    R5,YLABEL               STORE IT IN TABLE                62645042
RETURN0  L     R13,L4(R13)             PICK UP &                        62700042
         LM    R14,R12,L12(R13)        RESTORE REGS                     62755042
         BR    R14                                                      62810042
SETCPUNO STM   R5,R8,FSAVE         SAVE WORK REGS              @Z427VLS 62814042
         SR    R5,R5               CLEAR REG 5                 @Z427VLS 62818042
         ICM   R5,X'3',0(R4)       PICKUP CPU TYPE FIELD       @Z427VLS 62822042
         BNZ   RET1                IF CPU TYPE NOT ZERO, THEN RETURN    62826042
         LA    R6,L61              AMOUNT TO BACK UP           @Z427VLS 62830042
         SR    R3,R6               BACK UP OUTPUT PTR          @Z427VLS 62834042
         MVC   0(L9,R3),SHARED     SERIAL NO. - SHARED         @Z427VLS 62838042

         BR    R14                 RETURN                      @Z427VLS 62846042
*                                                              @Z427VLS 62850042
SHARED   DC    CL9'SHARED'                                     @Z427VLS 62854042
GIGAPTR  STM   R4,R8,XSAVE1             SAVE REGS                       62865042
         ST    R4,STOR4                                                 62920042
         MVC   INTERMIX(L4),L20(R4)     GET BYTES READ ON BOUNDRY RIGHT 62975042
         L     R4,INTERMIX              LOAD R4 FOR CONVERTING          63030042
         CVD   R4,WORKAREA              CONVERT TO DECIMAL              63085042
         BAL   R8,CONVERT3              GO TO SPECIAL ROUTINE           63140042
         LA    R3,L18(R3)               BUMP UP BUFFER POINTER TO 35    63195042
         L     R5,STOR4                                                 63250042
         LH    R6,L0(R5)                LOAD NUMBER OF DATA CHECKS      63305042
         BAL   R8,CONVERT2              GO TO SPECIAL CONVERT ROUTINE   63360042
         MVC   L0(L3,R3),TRANS          PUT NUMBER IN RIGHT PLACE       63415042
         L     R5,STOR4                                                 63470042
         CLC   L0(L2,R5),ZEROES         SEE IF ZERO DATA CKS            63525042
         BE    ZEROERR                  BR IF 0  FOR NO ABEND           63580042
         SRDL  R4,L32                   MOVE DIVIDEND INTO R5           63635042
         DR    R4,R6                    GET ERROR RATE INTO R5          63690042
         CVD   R5,WORKAREA              CONVERT TO DECIMAL              63745042
         LA    R3,L10(R3)               BUMP UP BUFFER POINTER TO 45    63800042
         BAL   R8,CONVERT3              GO TO SPECIAL ROUTINE           63855042
HERE     LA    R3,L13(R3)               BUMP UP BUFFER POINTER TO 58    63910042
         LM    R4,R8,XSAVE1             RESTORE REGS                    63965042
         BR    R14                      GO BACK                         64020042
ZEROERR  LA    R3,L10(R3)                                               64075042
         MVC   L2(L3,R3),NOTAVIL        PUT IN NOT AVIAL NOTE           64130042
         B     HERE                                                     64185042
CONVERT3 OI    WORKAREA+L5,H0F          GET SIGN FOR UNPACK             64240042
         UNPK  WORK(L7),WORKAREA+L2(L4) UNPK GIGABYTES PLUS             64295042
         MVC   L0(L5,R3),WORK           GET NUMBER OF GIGABYTES         64350042
         MVC   L5(L1,R3),PERIOD         PUT IN DECIMAL POINT            64405042
         MVC   L6(L2,R3),WORK+L5        GET DIGIT ON RIGHT OF POINT     64460042
         BR    R8                       GO BACK                         64515042
SETMOD   MVC   L0(L1,R3),YMOD           PUT MODEL NO. IN PRINT BUFFER   64570042
         BR    R14                      GO BACK                         64625042
SETDATES UNPK  WORK(L8),L0(L4,R4)       UNPACK LOW DATE                 64680042
         MVZ   WORK+L7(L1),WORK         MOVE IN RIGHT ZONE              64735042
         MVC   L0(L3,R3),WORK+L5        PUT DATE IN PTR BUFF            64790042
         MVC   L5(L2,R3),WORK+L3        PUT YEAR IN PTR BUFF            64845042
         UNPK  WORK(L8),L4(L4,R4)       UNPACK HIGH DATE                64900042
         MVZ   WORK+L7(L1),WORK         MOVE IN RIGHT ZONE              64955042
         MVC   L13(L3,R3),WORK+L5       PUT DATE IN PTR BUFF            65010042
         MVC   L18(L2,R3),WORK+L3       PUT YEAR IN PTR BUFF            65065042
         BR    R14                                                      65120042
CONVERT2 CVD   R6,WORKAREA              CONVERT HEX TO DECIMAL          65175042
         UNPK  WORKAREA(8),WORKAREA(8)  UNPACK INTO SAME                65230042
         MVZ   WORKAREA+7(L1),WORKAREA+6 FIX SIGN                       65285042
         MVC   TRANS(L3),WORKAREA+5     PUT IN TRANSIENT AREA           65340042
         BR    R8                       GO BACK                         65395042
TABXRITE STM   R5,R8,XSAVE1             SAVE REGS                       65450042
         MVI   ZEROMOD,HFF              PUT IN FF FOR MODULE 1          65505042
         B     PLUS1                    GO REGULAR                      65560042
TABWRITE STM   R5,R8,XSAVE1             SAVE REGS                       65615042
PLUS1    L     R5,LASTONE               GET ADDR OF TABLE ENTRY         65670042
         LTR   R5,R5                    IS ADDR ZERO?                   65725042
         BNZ   GOON                     BRANCH IF IT IS NOT             65780042
         LA    R5,L0(R4)                LOAD R5 WITH ADDRESS 1ST TIME   65835042
GOON     CLC   L0(L4,R5),ZEROES         IS IT A ZERO ENTRY              65890042
         BE    ENDTABLE                 BR-END OF TABLE                 65945042
         SR    R6,R6                    CLEAR REG 6                     66000042
         IC    R6,L2(R5)                GET CYL IN HEX IN REG 6         66055042
         BAL   R8,CONVERT2              GO TO SPECIAL CONVERT ROUTINE   66110042
         MVC    L0(L3,R3),TRANS         GET NUMBER FROM TRANSIENT AREA  66165042
         SR    R6,R6                    CLEAR REG6                      66220042
         IC    R6,L3(R5)                GET HEAD IN HEX IN REG 6        66275042
         BAL   R8,CONVERT2              GO TO SPECIAL CONVERT ROUTINE   66330042
         MVC   L5(L3,R3),TRANS          GET NUMBER FROM TRANS AREA      66385042
         TM    L0(R5),HC0               SEE IF FIRST 3BITS ARE ZERO     66440042
         BM    RETURNA                                                  66495042
         BZ    NOCU                     IF IS-NO CU RETRIES             66550042
         SR    R6,R6                    CLEAR REG 6                     66605042
         NI    L0(R5),H1F               GET RID OF FIRST 3 BITS         66660042
         IC    R6,L0(R5)                GET NUMBER OF RETRIES FROM TAB  66715042
         BAL   R8,CONVERT2              GO TO SPECIAL CONVERT ROUTINE   66770042
         MVC   L78(L2,R3),TRANS+L1      GET NO. OF RETRIES TO BUFFER    66825042
         B     OUTERR                   GET TO END                      66880042
NOCU     TM    L0(R5),H02               SEE IF CORRECTABLE              66935042
         BZ    NO10                     BR-NO                           66990042
         MVC   L64(L1,R3),X                PUT X IN SPACE 65            67045042
         B     OUTERR                   GET OUT OF ERROR ROUTINE        67100042
NO10     TM    L0(R5),H01               SEE IF PERMANENT                67155042
         BZ    NO11                     BR-NO                           67210042
         MVC   L106(L1,R3),X               PUT X IN SPACE 107           67265042
         B     OUTERR                   GET OUT OF ERROR ROUTINE        67320042
NO11     MVC   L92(L1,R3),X                PUT X IN SPACE 93            67375042
OUTERR   TM    L1(R5),H40               IS BIT 2 ON -SPARE              67430042
         BO    NO12                     BR-YES                          67485042
         MVC   L15(L1,R3),ZERO             MOVE IN ZERO                 67540042
         B     NO13                     BR-AROUND                       67595042
NO12     MVC   L15(L1,R3),ONEA             MOVE IN ONE                  67650042
NO13     TM    L2(R5),H01               IS BIT 7 ON -COLUMN             67705042
         BO    NO14                     BR-YES                          67760042
         MVC   L25(L1,R3),ZERO             MOVE IN ZERO                 67815042
         B     NO15                     BR-AROUND                       67870042
NO14     MVC   L25(L1,R3),ONEA          MOVE IN ONE                     67925042
NO15     IC    R6,L3(R5)                ELE PRINT.                      67980042
         SLL   R6,L29                   SAVE BITS 5-7                   68035042
         SRL   R6,L29                   PUT IN LOW ORDER BITS 29-31     68090042
         BAL   R8,CONVERT2              GO TO SPECIAL CONVERT ROUTINE   68145042
         MVC   L46(L1,R3),TRANS+L2      PUT NUMBER IN SPACE 47          68200042
         TM    YMOD,H01                 TEST WHICH(MODEL-1)             68255042
         BO    MOD1OUT                  BR-MODEL 1 OUTPUT               68310042
* FOLLOWING IS CODE FOR MODEL TWO OUTPUT                                68365042
         TM    L2(R5),H02               IS SIDE ON?  BIT 6 BYTE 4-9     68420042
         BO    NO16                     BR-NO IT ISN'T                  68475042
         MVC   L20(L1,R3),A             MOVE IN A                       68530042
         B     NO17                     BR-AROUND                       68585042
NO16     MVC   L20(L1,R3),B             MOVE IN B                       68640042
NO17     TM    L2(R5),H04               IS CARDX ON?  BIT 5 BYTE 4-9    68695042
         BZ    NO18                     BR-NO IT ISN'T                  68750042
         MVC   L30(L1,R3),ONEA          MOVE IN 1  IN 31                68805042
         B     NO19                     BR-AROUND                       68860042
NO18     MVC   L30(L1,R3),ZERO          MOVE IN 0  IN 31                68915042
NO19     TM    L2(R5),H08               IS SLIDER ON?  BIT 4 BYTE 4-9   68970042
         BZ    NO20                     BR-NO IT IS'T                   69025042
         MVC   L36(L1,R3),ONEA          MOVE IN 1 IN 37                 69080042
         B     NO21                     BR-AROUND                       69135042
NO20     MVC   L36(L1,R3),ZERO          MOVE IN 0 IN 37                 69190042
NO21     SR    R6,R6                    CLEAR 6                         69245042
         IC    R6,L2(R5)                GET IN DISK BYTE                69300042
         SLL   R6,L25                   GET RID OF 1ST BIT              69355042
         SRL   R6,L29                   GET RID OF BIT 4-7              69410042
         BAL   R8,CONVERT2              GO TO SPECIAL CONVERT ROUTINE   69465042
         MVC   L41(L1,R3),TRANS+L2      GET DISK NUMBER - 1 DIGIT       69520042
         B     DONE                                                     69575042
*                                                                       69630042
MOD1OUT  TM    L1(R5),H08               IS SIDE ON  BIT 4 BYTE 3-14     69685042
         BO    NO22                     BR-NO                           69740042
         MVC   L20(L1,R3),A             MOVE IN A                       69795042
         B     NO23                     BR-AROUND                       69850042
NO22     MVC   L20(L1,R3),B             MOVE IN B                       69905042
NO23     TM    L2(R5),H04               IS SLIDER ON BIT 5 BYTE 4-9     69960042
         BZ    NO24                     BR-NO                           70015042
         MVC   L36(L1,R3),ONEA          MOVE IN 1                       70070042
         B     NO25                     BR-AROUND                       70125042
NO24     MVC   L36(L1,R3),ZERO          MOVE IN 0                       70180042
NO25     SR    R6,R6                    CLEAR 6                         70235042
         IC    R6,L2(R5)                GET IN DISK BYTE                70290042
         SLL   R6,L26                   GET RID OF 2 BITS IN FRONT      70345042
         SRL   R6,L29                   GET RID OF BITS 5-7             70400042
         BAL   R8,CONVERT2              GO TO SPECIAL CONVERT ROUTINE   70455042
         MVC   L41(L1,R3),TRANS+L2      GET DISK NUMBER - 1 DIGIT       70510042
         TM    L2(R5),H02               IS DISK HALF ON BIT 6 BYTE 4-9  70565042
         BZ    NO26                     BR-NO IT ISN'T                  70620042
         MVC   L52(L1,R3),ONEA          MOVE IN ONE                     70675042
         B     NO27                     BR-AROUND                       70730042
NO26     MVC   L52(L1,R3),ZERO          MOVE IN ZERO                    70785042
NO27     TM    L1(R5),H03               IS CARDX 'W' BITS 6-7 BYTE 3-14 70840042
         BZ    UNDIF                    YES- PUT IN W                   70895042
         BO    TWOPL                    BOTH OFF-PUT IN '2'             70950042
         TM    L1(R5),H01               IS ONLY BIT 7 ON                71005042
         BO    NO28                     BE-NO                           71060042
         MVC   L30(L1,R3),ZERO          MOVE IN           10            71115042
         B     DONE                     BR-AROUND                       71170042
UNDIF    MVC   L30(L1,R3),U             MOVE IN A 'U'                   71225042
         B     DONE                     BR-AROUND                       71280042
TWOPL    MVC   L30(L1,R3),TWOA          MOVE IN A '2'                   71335042
         B     DONE                     BR-AROUND                       71390042
NO28     MVC   L30(L1,R3),ONEA          MOVE IN           01            71445042
DONE     LA    R5,L4(R5)                                                71500042
         TM    ZEROMOD,HFF              IS MOD 1 SWITCH ON              71555042
         BO    DONE1                    BR-YES                          71610042
         ST    R5,LASTONE                                               71665042
         LA    R5,XXX1-L4                                               71720042
         ST    R5,YR9PTR                                                71775042
         L     R5,YPTR                                                  71830042
         ST    R5,YLABEL                                                71885042
         B     RETURNA                                                  71940042
DONE1    ST    R5,LASTONE               STORE ADDR OF LAST PROCESS      71995042
         LA    R5,PPP1-L4               POINT TO LINE                   72050042
         ST    R5,YR9PTR                STORE IT                        72105042
         L     R5,QPTR                  GET LABEL ADDR                  72160042
         ST    R5,YLABEL                STORE IT                        72215042
         B     RETURNA                  GO BACK                         72270042
ENDTABLE TM    ZEROMOD,HFF              IS MOD 1 SWITCH ON              72325042
         BO    ENDXABLE                 GO TO DIFFERENT EXIT            72380042
         LA    R5,XXX2-L4                                               72435042
         ST    R5,YR9PTR                                                72490042
         L     R5,YPTR                                                  72545042
         ST    R5,YLABEL                                                72600042
         B     RETURNA                                                  72655042
ENDXABLE LA    R5,PPP2-L4               POINT TO NEXT LINE              72710042
         ST    R5,YR9PTR                STORE IT                        72765042
         L     R5,QPTR                  GET NEXT LABEL PTR              72820042
         ST    R5,YLABEL                STORE IT                        72875042
         MVI   ZEROMOD,H00              PUT IN 00 FOR MODULE 0          72930042
         B     RETURNA                  GO BACK                         72985042

         LABEL ' '                                                      95590042
DUMPCODE DC    XL1'FF'                                                  95645042

         DC    C'$'                                                     95865042
LABELS   EQU   *                                                        95920042

./  ADD  SSI=63170082,NAME=IFCSXXXE
         TITLE 'IFCSXXXE- SUM TABLE - LINKNAME-IFCSXXXE'                00080042
         MACRO                                                          00160042
         CONVT                                                          00240042
         GBLC  &ITEM(1000),&DSECT                                       00320042
         GBLA  &INITIAL                                                 00400042
         GBLA  &BITS(1000),&ITEMNBR,&SHIFT(1000)                        00480042
         GBLA  &NRENTS                                                  00560042
         GBLB  &DIAGTST,&DIAGSET,&DIAGLIN                               00640042
         LCLB  &SUB                                                     00720042
         LCLA  &OP                                                      00800042
         LCLA  &OFFSET,&OUT,&IN,&IND,&IBITS,&ISHIFT                     00880042
.*                                                                      00960042
.*       CONVERT BINARY TO DECIMAL                                      01040042
.*             &NAME IS THE REFERENCE INTO THE DSECT RECORD             01120042
.*             &OUT    IS THE NUMBER OF CHARS TO BE PUT ONTO PRINT LINE 01200042
.*                                      DEFAULT IS FOUR MAXIMUM IS 8    01280042
.*             &IN       IS THE NUMBER OF BYTES AS INPUT                01360042
.*                                      ERROR DEFAULT IS 2 MAXIMUM IS 4 01440042
.*                                                                      01520042
         AIF   (&DIAGTST EQ 0).NOMSG                                    01600042
         AIF   (&INITIAL EQ 0).NOMSG                                    01680042
         AIF   (&DIAGLIN EQ 1).NOMSG                                    01760042
         MNOTE '**NO LINE ASSOCIATED WITH THIS DATA**'                  01840042
*****THE FOLLOWING GENERATED FOR TEST PURPOSES*****                     01920042
*        LINE                                                           02000042
         LINE                                                           02080042
.NOMSG   ANOP                                                           02160042
         AIF   (K'&SYSLIST(1) EQ K'&SYSLIST(1,1)).LLOP                  02240042
&SUB     SETB  1                                                        02320042
.LLOP    ANOP                                                           02400042
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    02480042
&OUT     SETA  4                        .BR NOT NULL ELSE SET TO 4      02560042
         AIF   (&SUB EQ 1).SUBA                                         02640042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(3)' EQ '').B  TEST FOR NULL INPUT             02720042
&OUT     SETA  &SYSLIST(3)             SET &OUT FROM INPUT              02800042
         AGO   .A                                                       02880042
.SUBA    AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,3)' EQ '').B                              02960042
&OUT     SETA  &SYSLIST(&OP,3)          SET &OUT FROM INPUT             03040042
.A       AIF   (&OUT GT 0 AND &OUT LT 9).B   TEST RANGE                 03120042
.AERR    MNOTE '*** BYTES OUT INCORRECTLY SPECIFIED DEFAULT USED ***'   03200042
&OUT     SETA  4                                                        03280042
.B       AIF   (&SUB EQ 1).SUBB                                         03360042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(2)' EQ '').LOOP    BRANCH IF NULL             03440042
&IN      SETA  &SYSLIST(2)              .SET &IN FROM INPUT             03520042
         AGO   .BB                                                      03600042
.SUBB    AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,2)' EQ '').LOOP                           03680042
&IN      SETA  &SYSLIST(&OP,2)          .SET &IN FROM INPUT             03760042
.BB      AIF   (&IN GT 0 AND &IN LT 5).D     TEST RANGE                 03840042
.BERR    MNOTE '*** BYTES IN INCORRECTLY SPECIFIED DEFAULT USED ***'    03920042
&IN      SETA  2                                                        04000042
         AGO   .D                                                       04080042
.LOOP    ANOP                           .LOOP TO FIND &NAME IN DSECT    04160042
&IND     SETA  &IND+1                   .SET UP LOOP COUNTER            04240042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&IND)' EQ '&SYSLIST(&OP,1)').FOUND               04320042
         AIF   (&IND LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP  .TEST FOR END OF DSECT          04400042
         MNOTE '*** LOG ITEM NOT DEFINED ***'                           04480042
         MEXIT                                                          04560042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           04640042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&IND)              .SET UP NUMBER OF BITS SPEC     04720042
         AIF   (&IBITS-((&IBITS/8)*8) EQ 0).C  .TEST FOR MULTIPLE OF 8  04800042
         MNOTE '*** DATA NOT DEFINED A MULTIPLE OF 8 BITS ***'          04880042
         MEXIT                                                          04960042
.C       ANOP                                                           05040042
&IN      SETA  &IBITS/8                 .COMPUTE NUMBER OF BYTES        05120042
         AIF   (&IN LT 1 OR &IN GT 4).BERR  .TEST RANGE B IF IN ERROR   05200042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&IND)             .SET UP FOR TEST OF BYTE BNDR   05280042
         AIF   (&ISHIFT EQ 0).D         .TEST FOR BYTE BNDRY  !R IF YES 05360042
         MNOTE '*** DATA NOT ALIGNED ON A BYTE BOUNDARY ***'            05440042
         MEXIT                                                          05520042
.*                                                                      05600042
.D       ANOP                                                           05680042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                05760042
         DC    AL.12(&SYSLIST(&OP,1)-&DSECT),AL.4(9)                    05840042
         DC    X'&IN',X'&OUT'                                           05920042
&IND     SETA  0                                                        06000042
         AIF   (&SUB EQ 0).OUTA                                         06080042
         AIF   (&OP LT N'&SYSLIST).LLOP                                 06160042
.OUTA    ANOP                                                           06240042
         MEND                                                           06320042
*  DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO        * 06400042
         SPACE 2                                                        06480042
         MACRO                                                          06560042
&NAME    DSGEN                                                          06640042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES ONE DSECT WORD       06720042
.*                                 FORMATTED FOR THE SUBJECT LOG RECORD 06800042
.*                                 EACH OPERAND HAS TWO SUB LISTS. THE  06880042
.*                                 FIRST IS THE NAME OF THE LOG ITEM    06960042
.*                                 WHILE THE SECOND IS THE # OF BITS TO 07040042
.*                                 ALLOCATE FOR THIS ITEM. ITEMS MUST   07120042
.*                                 BE DEFINED CONTIGUOUSLY WITHOUT GAPS 07200042
.*                                 UNUSED BIT GROUPS MUST BE GIVEN      07280042
.*                                 DUMMY NAMES. THE NAMES PROVIDED FOR  07360042
.*                                 THE LOG ITEMS MAY THEN BE USED IN    07440042
.*                                 THE CONVERSION MACRO INSTRUCTIONS.   07520042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000)                                               07600042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000)                         07680042
         LCLB  &ONLY1,&CTIND                                            07760042
         LCLA  &START1,&START2,&END1,&END2                              07840042
         LCLC  &SYMBOL,&EQUSYM                                          07920042
         LCLA  &OP,&COUNT,&BYTE,&EQUCNT                                 08000042
         ACTR  100000                                                   08080042
.START   AIF   (N'&SYSLIST(&OP+1) LT 3).LOOP                            08160042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP+1,3)' EQ 'EQU').LOOP     TEST FOR EQU     08240042
  AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP+1,3)' EQ '' AND '&SYSLIST(&OP+1,4)' EQ '').ERR1  08320042
  AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP+1,3)' EQ '' OR '&SYSLIST(&OP+1,4)' EQ '').ERR1   08400042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP+1,3)' GT '&SYSLIST(&OP+1,4)').ERR3        08480042
&START1  SETA  &SYSLIST(&OP+1,3)        GET START COUNT OF 1            08560042
&START2  SETA  &SYSLIST(&OP+1,4)        GET FIRST END COUNT             08640042
         AGO   .SET2A                   BRANCH AROUND                   08720042
.ERR1    MNOTE '**FIRST SYMBOL CONCATENATION INCOMPLETE**'              08800042
         MEXIT                                                          08880042
.SET2A   AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP+1,5)' EQ ''AND '&SYSLIST(&OP+1,6)' EQ '' X08960042
               ).SET2                   TEST FOR NO SECOND              09040042
  AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP+1,5)' EQ '' OR '&SYSLIST(&OP+1,6)' EQ '').ERR2   09120042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP+1,5)' GT '&SYSLIST(&OP+1,6)').ERR3        09200042
&END1    SETA  &SYSLIST(&OP+1,5)        GET START COUNT OF 2            09280042
&END2    SETA  &SYSLIST(&OP+1,6)        GET END COUNT OF 2              09360042
         AGO   .LOOP                                                    09440042
.SET2    ANOP                                                           09520042
&ONLY1   SETB  1                        INDICATE ONLY ONE CONCATENATION 09600042
         AGO   .LOOP                                                    09680042
.ERR2    MNOTE '**SECOND SYMBOL CONCATENATION INCOMPLETE**'             09760042
         MEXIT                                                          09840042
.ERR3    MNOTE '**START GREATER THAN END CONCATENATION**'               09920042
         MEXIT                                                          10000042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           10080042
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    10160042
         AIF   (&OP GT N'&SYSLIST).DONE      TEST IF ALL DONE           10240042
&ITEMNBR SETA  &ITEMNBR+1                                               10320042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,2)' NE '').OK1                            10400042
         MNOTE '**NULL BIT COUNT FIELD**'                               10480042
         MEXIT                                                          10560042
.OK1     ANOP                                                           10640042
&SYMBOL  SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP,1)'                                        10720042
         AIF   ('&SYMBOL' NE '').OK                                     10800042
*              *****     LOG ITEM SYMBOL NOT PROVIDED     *****         10880042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,3)' NE 'EQU').CNT                         10960042
         AGO   .START                   GET NEXT                        11040042
.OK      AIF   (N'&SYSLIST(&OP) LT 3).NO3    TEST FOR OLD FORMAT        11120042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,3)' EQ 'EQU').EQU   TEST FOR EQU          11200042
         AIF   (&ONLY1).OK2             TEST FOR ONLY ONE CONCAT        11280042
&SYMBOL  SETC  '&SYMBOL.&START1.&END1'       GET 1 AND 2 CONCAT         11360042
         AGO   .NO3                     BRANCH AROUND                   11440042
.OK2     ANOP                                                           11520042
&SYMBOL  SETC  '&SYMBOL.&START1'        GET 1 CONCATENATED              11600042
.NO3     ANOP                                                           11680042
&SYMBOL  EQU   *+&BYTE                                                  11760042
&ITEM(&ITEMNBR) SETC '&SYMBOL'          GET LABEL IN GLOBAL             11840042
&BITS(&ITEMNBR) SETA &SYSLIST(&OP,2)                                    11920042
&SHIFT(&ITEMNBR) SETA &COUNT-&BYTE*8                                    12000042
.CNT     ANOP                                                           12080042
&CTIND   SETB  1                        SET COUNT INDICATOR             12160042
&COUNT   SETA  &COUNT+&SYSLIST(&OP,2)                                   12240042
&BYTE    SETA  &COUNT/8                                                 12320042
         AIF   (N'&SYSLIST(&OP) LT 3).START  TEST FOR OLD FORMAT        12400042
         AIF   (&ONLY1).TSTST           TEST FOR ONLY ONE CONCAT        12480042
         AIF   (&END1 EQ &END2).TSTST   TEST FOR SECOND END             12560042
&END1    SETA  &END1+1                  INCREMENT COUNT                 12640042
&OP      SETA  &OP-1                    DECREMENT INCREMENT             12720042
         AGO   .LOOP                    GENERATE NEXT                   12800042
.TSTST   ANOP                                                           12880042
         AIF   (&START1 EQ &START2).LPDONE   TEST FOR END               12960042
         AIF   (&ONLY1).NSET1           TEST FOR ONLY ONE CONCAT        13040042
&END1    SETA  &SYSLIST(&OP,5)          RE-INIT SECOND START COUNT      13120042
.NSET1   ANOP                                                           13200042
&OP      SETA  &OP-1                    DECREMENT INDEX                 13280042
&START1  SETA  &START1+1                INCREMENT FIRST COUNT           13360042
         AGO   .LOOP                    GO DO NEXT                      13440042
.LPDONE  ANOP                                                           13520042
&ONLY1   SETB  0                        CLEAR INDICATOR                 13600042
         AGO   .START                   GO TEST FOR MORE SUB-LISTS      13680042
.DONE    AIF   (&COUNT-&COUNT/8*8 NE 0).ERR  TEST FOR MULTIPLE OF EIGHT 13760042
         AIF   (&CTIND EQ 0).END        NO DS IF NO COUNT               13840042
&COUNT   SETA  &COUNT/8                 GET NUMBER OF BYTES             13920042
&NAME    DS    &COUNT.C                                                 14000042
.END     MEXIT                                                          14080042
.ERR     MNOTE '**BIT COUNT FLDS DO NOT TOTAL MULTIPLE OF 8**'          14160042
         MEXIT                                                          14240042
.EQU     AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,4)' NE '').EQU1     TEST FOR NULL LABEL   14320042
.ERR4    MNOTE '**EQU OPERAND OMITTED OR NOT FOUND**'                   14400042
         MEXIT                                                          14480042
.EQU1    AIF   (&SYSLIST(&OP,2) LT 16).EQU2  COUNT OVER FIFTEEN         14560042
*****               THE FOLLOWING STATEMENT                *****        14640042
*****     NUMBER OF BITS EXCEED 15 - DO NOT USE AS BIN     *****        14720042
.EQU2    ANOP                                                           14800042
&EQUCNT  SETA  0                        CLEAR COUNTER                   14880042
&EQUSYM  SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP,4)'        GET EQU OPERAND                 14960042
.EQULOP  ANOP                                                           15040042
&EQUCNT  SETA  &EQUCNT+1                INCREMENT INDEX                 15120042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&EQUCNT)' EQ '&EQUSYM').EQUOUT  LABEL FOUND?     15200042
         AIF   (&EQUCNT EQ &ITEMNBR).ERR4    ALL TESTED?                15280042
         AGO   .EQULOP                  NO-GET NEXT                     15360042
.EQUOUT  ANOP                                                           15440042
&ITEM(&ITEMNBR) SETC '&SYMBOL'          GET LABEL NAME                  15520042
&BITS(&ITEMNBR) SETA &SYSLIST(&OP,2)    GET NUMBER OF BITS              15600042
&SHIFT(&ITEMNBR) SETA &SHIFT(&EQUCNT)   GET SHIFT COUNT                 15680042
&SYMBOL  EQU   &EQUSYM                  THIS SYMBOL EQUATED             15760042
         AGO   .START                   RETURN FOR NEXT                 15840042
         MEND                                                           15920042
         EJECT                                                          16000042
*  LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO            * 16080042
         SPACE 2                                                        16160042
         MACRO                                                          16240042
&NAME    LINE  &DATA,&LABEL,&SKIP=                                      16320042
.*                            THIS MACRO ESTABLISHES THE MARGINS OR     16400042
.*                                 COLUMN SETTINGS FOR EACH LINE. IT    16480042
.*                                 GENERATES NECESSARY CARRIAGE CONTROL 16560042
.*                                 ENTRIES. LASTLY IT DETERMINES THE    16640042
.*                                 NUMBER OF ENTRIES ASSOCIATED WITH    16720042
.*                                 THE PREVIOUS LINE AND STORES THAT #  16800042
.*                                 INTO THE APPROPRIATE BYTE.           16880042
.*                            &DATA(1) - CHARACTER POSITION TO BEGIN    16960042
.*                                 DATA.                                17040042
.*                            &DATA(2) - # OF SPACES BETWEEN SUCCESSIVE 17120042
.*                                 DATA COLUMN STARTING CHARACTERS.     17200042
.*                            &LABEL(1) - CHAR. POS. TO BEGIN LABELS.   17280042
.*                            &LABEL(2) - # SPACES BETWEEN LINE'S LABEL 17360042
.*                                 STARTING CHARACTERS.                 17440042
.*                            &SKIP= - # OF LINES TO ADVANCE CARRIAGE   17520042
.*                                 TO BEGIN NEXT PRINTED LINE.          17600042
.*                            NEW ENTRIES ARE GENERATED ONLY WHEN       17680042
.*                                 NECESSARY. OMISSION OF ITEMS MEANS   17760042
.*                                 THEY HAVE NOT CHANGED SINCE PREVIOUS 17840042
.*                                 SETTINGS. A LINE MACRO IS REQUIRED   17920042
.*                                 FOR EACH PRINTED LINE. IF NO SETTING 18000042
.*                                 CHANGES ARE REQUIRED ALL OPERANDS    18080042
.*                                 ARE OMITTED IN WHICH CASE ONLY THE   18160042
.*                                 # OF ENTRIES FOR THE PREVIOUS LINE   18240042
.*                                 IS COMPUTED. THIS MACRO MUST BE THE  18320042
.*                                 FIRST MACRO INSTRUCTION ISSUED FOR   18400042
.*                                 THE SUBJECT LINE                     18480042
         GBLA  &DB,&DT,&LB,&LT,&NRENTS                                  18560042
         GBLA  &LASTCC,&INITIAL                                         18640042
         GBLC  &NRENTSX                                                 18720042
         GBLC  &CARRCON                                                 18800042
         GBLB  &TEST                                                    18880042
         LCLA  &S                                                       18960042
&NAME    DS    0C                                                       19040042
         AIF   (&INITIAL EQ 0).FIRSTLN                                  19120042
         LINEND                                                         19200042
         AGO   .NTFIRST                                                 19280042
.FIRSTLN ANOP                                                           19360042
&NRENTSX SETC  'N&SYSNDX'                                               19440042
&INITIAL SETA  1                                                        19520042
N&SYSNDX EQU   *                                                        19600042
.NTFIRST ANOP                                                           19680042
         DC    AL1(0)                                                   19760042
         AIF   ('&DATA(1)' EQ '').CKDTABS                               19840042
         AIF   (&DATA(1) EQ &DB).CKDTABS                                19920042
&DB      SETA  &DATA(1)                                                 20000042
         AGO   .AA                                                      20080042
.CKDTABS AIF   ('&DATA(2)' EQ '').NCDATA                                20160042
         AIF   (&DATA(2) EQ &DT).NCDATA                                 20240042
         AGO   .CC                                                      20320042
.AA      AIF   ('&DATA(2)' EQ '').BB                                    20400042
         AIF   (&DATA(2) EQ &DT).BB                                     20480042
.CC      ANOP                                                           20560042
&DT      SETA  &DATA(2)                                                 20640042
.BB      DC    XL2'FFFE'                                                20720042
         DC    FL1'&DB'                                                 20800042
         DC    FL1'&DT'                                                 20880042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                20960042
.NCDATA  ANOP                                                           21040042
         AIF   ('&LABEL(1)' EQ '').CKLTABS                              21120042
         AIF   (&LABEL(1) EQ &LB).CKLTABS                               21200042
&LB      SETA  &LABEL(1)                                                21280042
         AGO   .AAA                                                     21360042
.CKLTABS AIF   ('&LABEL(2)' EQ '').NCLABEL                              21440042
         AIF   (&LABEL(2) EQ &LT).NCLABEL                               21520042
         AGO   .CCC                                                     21600042
.AAA     AIF   ('&LABEL(2)' EQ '').BBB                                  21680042
         AIF   (&LABEL(2) EQ &LT).BBB                                   21760042
.CCC     ANOP                                                           21840042
&LT      SETA  &LABEL(2)                                                21920042
.BBB     DC    XL2'FFFF'                                                22000042
         DC    FL1'&LB'                                                 22080042
         DC    FL1'&LT'                                                 22160042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                22240042
.NCLABEL ANOP                                                           22320042
         AIF   ('&SKIP' NE '').CONT                                     22400042
         AIF   (&TEST EQ 0).NOCHANG                                     22480042
&S       SETA  &LASTCC                                                  22560042
         AGO   .DEFAULT                                                 22640042
.CONT    ANOP                                                           22720042
         AIF   (&TEST EQ 0).AB                                          22800042
&S       SETA  &SKIP                                                    22880042
.DEFAULT ANOP                                                           22960042
         ORG   &CARRCON+3                                               23040042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&S),AL.3(1)                                 23120042
         ORG                                                            23200042
&LASTCC  SETA  &S                                                       23280042
&TEST    SETB  0                                                        23360042
         AGO   .DD                                                      23440042
.AB      AIF   (&SKIP EQ &LASTCC).NOCHANG                               23520042
A&SYSNDX DC    XL2'FFFB'                                                23600042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&SKIP),AL.3(1)                              23680042
         DC    FL1'9'                                                   23760042
&LASTCC  SETA  &SKIP                                                    23840042
&TEST    SETB  1                                                        23920042
&CARRCON SETC  'A&SYSNDX'                                               24000042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                24080042
.DD      ANOP                                                           24160042
.NOCHANG ANOP                                                           24240042
         MEND                                                           24320042
         EJECT                                                          24400042
*  ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO* 24480042
         SPACE 2                                                        24560042
         MACRO                                                          24640042
&NAME    ROUTINE &LOGITEM,&RNAME                                        24720042
         GBLA  &NRENTS                                                  24800042
         GBLC  &DSECT,&CSECT                                            24880042
&NAME    DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'D'                           24960042
         DC    AL2(&RNAME-&CSECT)                                       25040042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                25120042
         MEND                                                           25200042
         EJECT                                                          25280042
*  LABEL MACRO     LABEL MACRO     LABEL MACRO     LABEL MACRO        * 25360042
         SPACE 2                                                        25440042
         MACRO                                                          25520042
         LABEL &LABEL1,&LABEL2,&LABEL3,&LABEL4                          25600042
.*                            THIS MACRO ALLOWS UP TO FOUR LABELS TO    25680042
.*                                 BE SPECIFIED FOR A GIVEN LINE. THE   25760042
.*                                 LABELS SHOULD BE ENCLOSED IN QUOTA-  25840042
.*                                 TION MARKS. THE COLUMN AND LINE END  25920042
.*                                 CONTROLS WILL BE INSERTED BY THE     26000042
.*                                 MACRO. OMITTED OPERANDS MEAN NO      26080042
.*                                 LABEL REQUIRED FOR RESPECTIVE        26160042
.*                                 COLUMN. THIS MACRO WILL ALSO ALERT   26240042
.*                                 THE PROGRAMMER TO EXACTLY WHERE THE  26320042
.*                                 TABLE MUST BE BROKEN IF NECESSARY    26400042
.*                                 TO AVOID EXCEEDING THE MAXIMUM LIMIT 26480042
         GBLC &LABELS(1000)                                             26560042
         GBLA  &LABELNR                                                 26640042
         GBLA  &NRENTS                                                  26720042
         LCLC  &MARGIN,&TACK                                            26800042
         LCLC  &TEXT                                                    26880042
         LCLA  &OP,&K,&START,&NRCHAR,&REMAIN                            26960042
&MARGIN  SETC  '*'                                                      27040042
.LOOPOUT ANOP                                                           27120042
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    27200042
&K       SETA  K'&SYSLIST(&OP)                                          27280042
         AIF (&K GE 2).NORM                                             27360042
&K       SETA  2                                                        27440042
.NORM    ANOP                                                           27520042
&START   SETA  2                                                        27600042
         AIF (&OP LT N'&SYSLIST).NOTLAST                                27680042
&MARGIN  SETC  '$'                                                      27760042
.NOTLAST ANOP                                                           27840042
&NRCHAR  SETA  8                                                        27920042
&TACK    SETC  ''                                                       28000042
.LOOPIN  ANOP                                                           28080042
&REMAIN  SETA  &K-&START                                                28160042
         AIF (&REMAIN GE 8).MORE                                        28240042
&TACK    SETC  '&MARGIN'                                                28320042
&NRCHAR  SETA  &REMAIN                                                  28400042
.MORE    ANOP                                                           28480042
&TEXT    SETC  ''                                                       28560042
         AIF (&REMAIN EQ 0).ENDTEXT                                     28640042
&TEXT    SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP)'(&START,&NRCHAR)                          28720042
.ENDTEXT ANOP                                                           28800042
&LABELNR SETA  &LABELNR+1                                               28880042
&LABELS(&LABELNR) SETC '&TEXT'.'&TACK'                                  28960042
&START   SETA  &START+8                                                 29040042
         AIF ('&TACK' EQ '').LOOPIN                                     29120042
         AIF ('&TACK' EQ '*').LOOPOUT                                   29200042
         MEND                                                           29280042
         MACRO                                                          29360042
         LSTART                                                         29440042
.*                            THIS MACRO IS ISSUED WHEN THE LABEL AREA  29520042
.*                                 OF THE TABLE IS TO BEGIN.            29600042
         GBLC &LABELS(1000)                                             29680042
         GBLA  &LABELNR                                                 29760042
         LCLA  &NDX                                                     29840042
         LINEND                                                         29920042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           30000042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   30080042
         DC    C'&LABELS(&NDX)'                                         30160042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &LABELNR).LOOP                                  30240042
         MEND                                                           30320042
         MACRO                                                          30400042
         LINEND                                                         30480042
.*                            THIS MACRO IS USED ONLY BY THE LINE       30560042
.*                                 MACRO TO SET THE NUMBER OF ENTRIES   30640042
.*                                 ASSOCIATED WITH EACH LINE.           30720042
         GBLA  &NRENTS                                                  30800042
         GBLC &NRENTSX                                                  30880042
         ORG   &NRENTSX                                                 30960042
         DC    FL1'&NRENTS'                                             31040042
         ORG                                                            31120042
&NRENTS  SETA  0                                                        31200042
B&SYSNDX EQU   *                                                        31280042
&NRENTSX SETC  'B&SYSNDX'                                               31360042
         MEND                                                           31440042
         SPACE 2                                                        31520042
***  SUM MACRO       SUM MACRO       SUM MACRO       SUM MACRO      *** 31600042
         SPACE                                                          31680042
         MACRO                                                          31760042
         SUM   &LOGITEM,&MASK                                           31840042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES A NORMAL EDIT ENTRY  31920042
.*                                 FOR PROCESSING BY THE SUMMARY MODULE 32000042
.*                            &LOGITEM - NAME OF DATA ITEM TO BE SUMMED 32080042
.*                            &MASK - BYTE MASK FOR BITS TO BE TESTED.  32160042
.*                                 THIS OPERAND SHOULD BE OMITTED FOR   32240042
.*                                 SINGLE BIT ITEMS IN WHICH CASE THE   32320042
.*                                 MASK WILL BE SET ACCORDING TO THE    32400042
.*                                 OFF BYTE BIT DISPLACEMENT OF THE     32480042
.*                                 ITEM AS DEFINED BY THE MACRO 'DSGEN' 32560042
         GBLA  &COUNTR,&ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000)                32640042
         GBLC  &ITEM(1000),&DSECT                                       32720042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&M,&BITNBR                           32800042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           32880042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   32960042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      33040042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  33120042
         MNOTE *,'LOGITEM NOT FOUND'                                    33200042
         MEXIT                                                          33280042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           33360042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             33440042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              33520042
         AIF   (&IBITS EQ 1).FORM1      TEST FOR OLD FORM               33600042
         AIF   ('&MASK' NE '').FORM1    TEST FOR MASK                   33680042
         AIF   (&IBITS+&ISHIFT GT 8).MSG     TEST FOR MORE THAN EIGHT   33760042
         DC    AL.1(0),AL.3(&ISHIFT),AL.4(&IBITS)                       33840042
         DC    AL1(0)                                                   33920042
         AGO   .ITEM                                                    34000042
.MSG     MNOTE '**BITS GREATER THAN 8**'                                34080042
         MEXIT                                                          34160042
.FORM1   ANOP                                                           34240042
         DC    AL1(0)                                                   34320042
         AIF   ('&MASK' EQ '').FORM                                     34400042
         DC    B'&MASK'                                                 34480042
         AGO   .ITEM                                                    34560042
.FORM    ANOP                                                           34640042
&BITNBR  SETA  &ISHIFT-7                                                34720042
&BITNBR  SETA  0-&BITNBR                                                34800042
&M       SETA  1                                                        34880042
.LOOP2   ANOP                                                           34960042
         AIF   (&BITNBR EQ 0).GOTIT                                     35040042
&M       SETA  &M*2                                                     35120042
&BITNBR  SETA  &BITNBR-1                                                35200042
         AGO   .LOOP2                                                   35280042
.GOTIT   ANOP                                                           35360042
         DC    AL1(&M)                                                  35440042
.ITEM    DC    AL2(&LOGITEM-&DSECT)                                     35520042
         DC    AL2(&COUNTR)                                             35600042
&COUNTR  SETA  &COUNTR+1                                                35680042
         MEND                                                           35760042
         SPACE 3                                                        35840042
***  SPECIAL MACRO   SPECIAL MACRO   SPECIAL MACRO   SPECIAL MACRO  *** 35920042
         SPACE                                                          36000042
         MACRO                                                          36080042
         SPECIAL &ROUTINE,&PARAM,&SPACE=                                36160042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES A SPECIAL ROUTINE    36240042
.*                                 ENTRY TO BE PROCESSED BY THE SUM. M. 36320042
.*                            &ROUTINE - SYMBOL ON SPECIAL ROUTINE EWT. 36400042
.*                            &PARAM - AN 8 BIT BINARY REPRESENTATION   36480042
.*                                 TO OCCUPY THE 'MASK' FIELD BUT TO BE 36560042
.*                                 INTERPRETED AS AN ARGUMENT OF THE    36640042
.*                                 SPECIAL ROUTINE.                     36720042
.*                            &SPACE - THE NUMBER OF 2BYTE COUNTERS TO  36800042
.*                                 ALLOCATE FOR REQUIRED PROCESSING.    36880042
         GBLC  &CSECT                                                   36960042
         GBLA  &COUNTR                                                  37040042
         LCLA  &ADD                                                     37120042
         DC    AL1(128)                                                 37200042
         DC    BL.8'&PARAM'                                             37280042
         DC    AL2(&ROUTINE-&CSECT)                                     37360042
         DC    AL2(&COUNTR)                                             37440042
&ADD     SETA  1                                                        37520042
         AIF   ('&SPACE' EQ '').NORM                                    37600042
&ADD     SETA  &SPACE                                                   37680042
.NORM    ANOP                                                           37760042
&COUNTR  SETA  &COUNTR+&ADD                                             37840042
         MEND                                                           37920042
         EJECT                                                          38000042
         EJECT                                                          38080042
*  HEX MACRO     HEX MACRO     HEX MACRO    HEXN MACRO     HEX MACRO  * 38160042
         SPACE 2                                                        38240042
         MACRO                                                          38320042
         HEX   &LOGITEM,&SKIP$OR,&BYTES                                 38400042
.*                            THIS MACRO FACILITATES GENERATION OF THE  38480042
.*                                 TABLE ENTRIES SPECIFYING HEX TYPE    38560042
.*                                 CONVERSIONS.                         38640042
.*                            &LOGITEM - NAME OF DATA ITEM TO BE        38720042
.*                                 CONVERTED                            38800042
.*                            &SKIP$OR - NUMBER OF SPACES TO SKIP ON    38880042
.*                                 MULTIPLE PRINT OR NBR OF SPACES TO   38960042
.*                                 BACK UP FROM COLUMN FOR START OF     39040042
.*                                 PRINTING. THE LETTER B PRECEEDS THE  39120042
.*                                 NUMBER (B8) IF THE LATTER OPTION IS  39200042
.*                                 DESIRED. OMISSION OF THIS OPERAND    39280042
.*                                 FORCES OPTION 2 WITH BACKUP SPACING  39360042
.*                                 EQUAL TO THE NUMBER OF BYTES SPECI-  39440042
.*                                 FIED BY THE NEXT OPERAND (TWICE THIS 39520042
.*                                 NUMBER IF SUFFIX IS EXPLICITLY OR    39600042
.*                                 IMPLICITLY B).                       39680042
.*                            &BYTES - NUMBER OF TOTAL INPUT BYTES TO   39760042
.*                                 PROCESS. THIS NUMBER IS SUFFIXED     39840042
.*                                 WITH AN L,R, OR B TO STIPULATE       39920042
.*                                 PRINTING OF THE LEFT HALF, RIGHT     40000042
.*                                 HALF, OR BOTH HALVES OF THE BYTE     40080042
.*                                 RESPECTIVELY. OMISSION OF THIS       40160042
.*                                 OPERAND DEFAULTS TO B WITH THE NUM-  40240042
.*                                 BER OF BYTES EQUAL TO THE ITEM LNGTH 40320042
.*                            A NEW ENTRY IS GENERATED ONLY WHEN NECES- 40400042
.*                                 SARY. THIS MACRO MUST BE THE FIRST   40480042
.*                                 MACRO INSTRUCTION ISSUED FOR THE     40560042
.*                                 SUBJECT LINE(S).                     40640042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000),&DSECT                                        40720042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000),&NRENTS                 40800042
         LCLB  &B                                                       40880042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&K,&T,&CODE,&BYTESP                  40960042
         LCLC  &S,&LETTER                                               41040042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           41120042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   41200042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      41280042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  41360042
         MNOTE *,'LOG ITEM NOT DEFINED'                                 41440042
         MEXIT                                                          41520042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           41600042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             41680042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              41760042
&CODE    SETA  1                                                        41840042
&K       SETA  K'&BYTES                                                 41920042
         AIF   (&IBITS-(&IBITS/4)*4 EQ 0).OK                            42000042
         MNOTE *,'BIT LENGTH SPECIFICATION INCONSISTENT WITH CONTROL'   42080042
         MEXIT                                                          42160042
.OK      AIF   ('&BYTES' EQ '').USEDEFN                                 42240042
&LETTER  SETC  '&BYTES'(&K,1)                                           42320042
&S       SETC  '&BYTES'(1,&K-1)                                         42400042
&BYTESP  SETA  &S                                                       42480042
         AIF   ('&LETTER' EQ 'B').BOTH                                  42560042
         AIF   (&ISHIFT EQ 0 OR &ISHIFT EQ 4).OK2                       42640042
.ERR     MNOTE *,'DATA NOT ALLIGNED ON HEX OR BYTE BOUNDARY'            42720042
         MEXIT                                                          42800042
.USEDEFN ANOP                                                           42880042
&BYTESP  SETA  &IBITS/8                                                 42960042
.BOTH    AIF   (&ISHIFT NE 0).ERR                                       43040042
&CODE    SETA  3                                                        43120042
&T       SETA  &BYTESP*2-1                                              43200042
&S       SETC  '&T'                                                     43280042
.OK2     AIF   (&ISHIFT EQ 0).L                                         43360042
&CODE    SETA  2                                                        43440042
.L       ANOP                                                           43520042
&B       SETB  1                                                        43600042
         AIF   ('&SKIP$OR' EQ '').BACKUP                                43680042
&K       SETA  K'&SKIP$OR                                               43760042
&B       SETB  ('&SKIP$OR'(1,1) EQ 'B')                                 43840042
&S       SETC  '&SKIP$OR'(&B+1,&K-&B)                                   43920042
.BACKUP  ANOP                                                           44000042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                44080042
         DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'A'                           44160042
         DC    BL.1'&B',FL.7'&S',FL.4'&BYTESP',FL.4'&CODE'              44240042
.OUT     ANOP                                                           44320042
         MEND                                                           44400042
         SPACE 2                                                        44480042
         GBLC  &DSECT                                                   44560042
         GBLC  &CSECT                                                   44640042
&CSECT   SETC  'IFCSXXXE'                                               44720042
&DSECT   SETC  'XXXE'                                                   44800042
IFCSXXXE CSECT                                                          44880042
XXXE     DSECT                                                          44960042
         DSGEN (CLASSRC,8),(SYSREL,8),(SW,1,0,1,0,7),(SPARES,32)        45040042
         DSGEN (XDATE,32),(TIME,32)                                     45120042
         DSGEN (SPARE1,8),(CPUSER,24),(CPUID,16),(SPARE2,16)            45200042
         DSGEN (JOBID,64)                                               45280042
         DSGEN (COMMCODE,8),(DATAADDR,24),(FLAGS,8),(RESERVED,8),      C45360042
               (CCWCOUNT,16)                                            45440042
         DSGEN (CSWKEY,8),(XCSWCA,24)                                   45520042
         DSGEN (ATTEN,1),(XCSWSM,1),(XCSWCUE,1),(XCSWBSY,1),           M45600042

               (XCSWPCI,1),(XCSWSILI,1),(XCSWPC,1),(XCSWPCHK,1),       V45760042

               (XCSWCT,16)                                              45920042
         DSGEN (DDCOUNT,8),(SECONCUA,24),(XDEVT1,16),(XDEVT2,16)        46000042
         DSGEN (SDRCOUNT,8),(PRIMCUA,24),(IORETRYS,16),(SNSBYTES,16)    46080042
         DSGEN (DEVD,1,0,7,0,7)                                         46160042
         DSGEN (STATFLG,8),(CEMODE,8)                                   46240042

         ORG   SNB00                                                    46400042
         DSGEN (SNSBYT,48)                                              46480042

         DC    A(PEDIT)                                                 47760042

*        SPECIAL ROUTINE SECTION   R2=PTR TO LOGREC  R9=BASE ADDR       49280042
*                                  R3=PTR TO BUF COUNTER                49360042
XDATE1   STM   R14,R15,REGSAVE          SAVE REGS                       49440042
         STM   R5,R6,XSAVE              SAVE WORK REGS                  49520042
         LA    R5,OBRAREA               GET EXPAND AREA ADDRESS         49600042
         LR    R6,R2                    SWAP ADDRESS OF DSECT           49680042
        USING  EXPNOBR,R5                                               49760042
        USING  SHRTOBR,R6                                               49840042
         XC    OBRAREA(L108),OBRAREA    CLEAR AREA                      49920042
         TM    SW10,HEX20               TEST FOR SHORT RECORD           50000042
         BO    MOVESHRT                 YES-GO MOVE SHORT RE            50080042
         MVC   EXPNOBR(L108),SHRTOBR    MOVE RE INTACT                  50160042
         B     EXPNDRET                 SET UP FOR RETURN               50240042
*                                                                       50320042
MOVESHRT MVC   EXPNHDRA(L24),SHRTHDRA   MOVE HEADER                     50400042
         MVC   EXPNDEVA(L8),SHRTDEVA    MOVE DEVTYPE AND CUA            50480042
         MVC   EXPNSDRA(L30),SHRTSDRA   MOVE SDR AREA                   50560042
EXPNDRET ST    R2,SAVE2                 SAVE DSECT POINTER              50640042
         LR    R2,R5                    POINT R2 AT OBRAREA             50720042
         LM    R5,R6,XSAVE              GET SAVED REGS                  50800042
         STM   R0,R12,REGSAVE+L8        SAVE REMAINDER OF REGS          50880042
         LA    R5,L0(R3)                GET OUTSET POINTER RIGHT        50960042
         CLC   XDATE(L4),HEX00          IS DATE ZERO                    51040042
         BE    RETURN                   GO BACK                         51120042
         CLC   L0(L4,R3),HEX00          IS LOW DATE ZERO                51200042
         BNE   XDATE2                   BR-NO                           51280042
         MVC   L0(L4,R3),XDATE          MOVE IN DATE                    51360042
XDATE2   CLC   XDATE(L4),L0(R3)          CHECK FOR LOW DATE             51440042
         BL    SAVELOW                  LOWER SAVE IT                   51520042
         CLC   XDATE(L4),L4(R3)          CHECK FOR HI                   51600042
         BNH   RETURN                                                   51680042
SAVEHI   MVC   L4(L4,R3),XDATE          MOVE HI DATE                    51760042
         B     RETURN                                                   51840042
SAVELOW  MVC   L0(L4,R3),XDATE          MOVE LOW DATE                   51920042
RETURN   LM    R14,R12,REGSAVE          RESTORE REGS                    52000042
         BR    R14                      RETURN                          52080042
XFAILCCW EQU   *                                                        52160042
         TM    SW10,HEX20               TEST FOR SHORT RECORD           52240042
         BCR   ONE,R14                  YES-RETURN                      52320042
         STM   R14,R12,REGSAVE          SAVE REGS                       52400042
         SR    R7,R7                                                    52480042
         IC    R7,COMMCODE              PICK UP FAILING CCW CODE        52560042
         B     COMMON                                                   52640042
*                                                                       52720042
RESET2   L     R2,SAVE2                 RESET R2                        52800042
         BR    R14                                                      52880042
*                                                                       52960042
REGSAVE  DC    16F'0'                                                   53040042
*                                                                       53120042
*                                                                       53200042
COMMON   SR    R1,R1                                                    53280042
         L     R8,REG8             GET CURRENT PTR                      53360042
         IC    R1,L1(R8)           PICK UP NUMBER OF ITERATIONS         53440042
         LR    R5,R1               PLACE VALUE IN R5                    53520042
         SLL   R5,L2               MULTIPLY BY 2                        53600042
         AR    R5,R3               SET PTR TO POS PAST CTRS HOLDING     53680042
*                                  DATA - SUM COUNTER                   53760042
         LH    R4,HEXFF            PICK UP FULL FLG                     53840042
LOOP1    CH    R4,L0(R3)           IS THIS COUNT EMPTY                  53920042
         BNE   STORE               BR-YES NOT FFFF                      54000042
         CH    R7,L2(R3)           IS DATE EQUAL TO STORED              54080042
         BE    BUMP                YES                                  54160042
         LA    R3,L4(R3)           BUMP DATA PTR                        54240042
         LA    R5,L2(R5)           BUMP SUM PTR                         54320042
         BCT   R1,LOOP1            LOOP TILL DONE                       54400042
         B     RETURN              FULL RETURN                          54480042
STORE    STH   R4,L0(R3)           STORE FFFF FLAG                      54560042
BUMP     LH    R6,L0(R5)                PICK UP COUNTER                 54640042
         STH   R7,L2(R3)           STORE DATA                           54720042
         LA    R6,L1(R6)           BASED ON R5                          54800042
         STH   R6,L0(R5)                                                54880042
         B     RETURN                                                   54960042

*                                                                       68000042
FREECORE STM   R14,R12,L12(R13)                                         68080042
         LR    R12,R13                  SAVE R13 INTO R12               68160042
         LA    R13,FSAVE                                                68240042
         ST    R12,L4(R13)              SET CHAINING POINTERS           68320042
         ST    R13,L8(R12)                                              68400042
         L     R3,L4(R2)                                                68480042
         ST    R3,L28(R12)              SET IT IN SAVED REG 2           68560042
         LH    R0,SIZE                  PICK SIZE                       68640042
         LR    R1,R2                    SET POINTER                     68720042
         FREEMAIN R,LV=(0),A=(1)                                        68800042
         LTR   R3,R3                    ANY MORE AREAA TO PRINT         68880042
         BZ    RETURNO                  BR-NO                           68960042
         LA    R5,PENTRY+L10            SET POINTERS                    69040042
         ST    R5,YR9PTR                STORE                           69120042
         LA    R5,LABELS-L1             RESET ADRESS                    69200042
         ST    R5,YLABELP               STORE                           69280042
RETURNO  L     R13,L4(R13)              PICK UP REGISTER AND            69360042
         LM    R14,R12,L12(R13)         RESET REGS                      69440042
         BR    R14                      RETURN                          69520042

         MVZ   WORK+L7(L1),WORK    MOVE ON ZONE                         69680042

         SR    R5,R5                    CLEAR REG 5                     70080042

         SLL   R5,R8                     CPU TYPE                       70240042
         IC    R5,L1(R4)                    FIELD                       70320042

         BNZ   RETURNA                  NO LINE IS GOOD RETURN          70480042
         LA    R6,L64                   ELSE, BACK UP DATA POINTER      70560042

         B     RETURNA                                                  70880042

               ARE'                                                     90560042
         LINE  ,(3,),SKIP=2                                             90640042
         LABEL 'STATISTICAL DATA COUNTERS 40-55'                        90720042
         LINE  (19,29),(1,29),SKIP=1                                    90800042
