         LABEL 'N IN/RCP F','OUTB RECD','LINE MKNG','NHP G ISM'         97760042
         LINE                                                           97840042
         ROUTINE SNSUM00,FREECORE                                       97920042
         LABEL ''                                                       98000042
         DC    X'FF'                                                    98080042
         DC    XL6'00'                                                  98160042
         DC    C'$'                                                     98240042
LABELS   EQU   *                                                        98320042
         LSTART                                                         98400042
         END                                                            98480042
./  ADD  SSI=73410151,NAME=IFCSXXXF
         TITLE 'I F C S X X X F --- ARGONAUT SUMMARY SUPPORT'           00060042
         MACRO                                                          00120042
         BIN   ,                                                        00180042
.*                                 &SYSLIST(&OP,1) - NAME OF LOG ITEM   00240042
.*                                      RECORD DSECT                    00300042
.*                                 $SYSLIST(&OP,2) - NBR OF SPACES      00360042
.*                                      TO SKIP ON MULTIPLE             00420042
.*                                      PRINT OR NBR OF SPACES          00480042
.*                                      TO BACK UP FROM COLUMN FOR      00540042
.*                                      START OF PRINTING. THE LETTER   00600042
.*                                      B PRECEEDS THE NUMBER (B5) IF   00660042
.*                                      THE LATTER IS DESIRED. OMISSION 00720042
.*                                      OF THIS OPERAND FORCES OPTION 2 00780042
.*                                      WITH BACKUP SPACING EQUAL TO    00840042
.*                                 THE NUMBER OF BITS IN THE ITEM       00900042
.*                                 DEFINITION (VIA MACRO 'DSGEN').      00960042
.*                            A LIMIT OF 15 BITS IS IMPOSED FOR THE     01020042
.*                                 TOTAL NUMBER OF BITS TO PRINT.       01080042
         GBLA  &BITS(3000),&DB,&DT,&INITIAL                             01140042
         GBLA  &ITEMITR,&ITEMFST(20),&ITEMNBR,&ITEMMDX                  01200042
         GBLA  &ITEMNDX(3000),&ITEMXPT                                  01260042
         GBLA  &LABELNR,&LASTCC,&LB,&LBLCTR(100),&LPTR,&LT              01320042
         GBLA  &NRENTS,&SHIFT(3000)                                     01380042
         GBLB  &DIAGITF,&DIAGLIN,&DIAGSET,&DIAGTST,&FSW,&TEST           01440042
         GBLC  &CARRCON,&CSECT,&DSECT,&ITEM(3000)                       01500042
         GBLC  &LABELS(3000),&LBL(100),&NRENTSX                         01560042
         LCLB  &B,&SUB                                                  01620042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&ISHIFT,&K                                        01680042
         LCLA  &TEMP,&T,&OP                                             01740042
         LCLC  &S,&ARG                                                  01800042
          ACTR  500000                                                  01860042
         AIF   (&DIAGTST EQ 0).NOMSG                                    01920042
         AIF   (&INITIAL EQ 0).NOMSG                                    01980042
         AIF   (&DIAGLIN EQ 1).NOMSG                                    02040042
         MNOTE '**NO LINE ASSOCIATED WITH THIS DATA**'                  02100042
*****THE FOLLOWING GENERATED FOR TEST PURPOSES*****                     02160042
*        LINE                                                           02220042
         LINE                                                           02280042
.NOMSG   ANOP                                                           02340042
         AIF   (K'&SYSLIST(1) EQ K'&SYSLIST(1,1)).LOOP                  02400042
&SUB     SETB  1                                                        02460042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           02520042
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    02580042
&ARG     SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP,1)'                                        02640042
         ITEMFIND &ARG                                                  02700042
         AIF   (&ITEMXPT EQ 0).MEXIT                                    02760042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&ITEMXPT)                                         02820042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&ITEMXPT)                                          02880042
         AIF   (&SUB EQ 1).SUB00                                        02940042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(3)' EQ '').SETT                               03000042
&IBITS   SETA  &SYSLIST(3)                                              03060042
         AGO   .SETT                                                    03120042
.SUB00   AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,3)' EQ '').SETT                           03180042
&IBITS   SETA  &SYSLIST(&OP,3)                                          03240042
.SETT    ANOP                                                           03300042
&T       SETA  &IBITS-1                                                 03360042
&B       SETB  0                                                        03420042
         AIF   (&IBITS GT 0 AND &IBITS LT 16).SUB0                      03480042
         MNOTE '**NO. OF BITS OUTSIDE RANGE OF 1-15**'                  03540042
.MEXIT   MEXIT                                                          03600042
.SUB0    AIF   (&SUB EQ 1).SUBA                                         03660042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(2)' EQ '').BACKUP                             03720042
&K       SETA  K'&SYSLIST(2)                                            03780042
&B       SETB  ('&SYSLIST(2)'(1,1) EQ 'B')                              03840042
&S       SETC  '&SYSLIST(2)'(&B+1,&K-&B)                                03900042
         AGO   .SUBB                                                    03960042
.SUBA    ANOP                                                           04020042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,2)' EQ '').BACKUP                         04080042
&K       SETA  K'&SYSLIST(&OP,2)                                        04140042
&B       SETB  ('&SYSLIST(&OP,2)'(1,1) EQ 'B')                          04200042
&S       SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP,2)'(&B+1,&K-&B)                            04260042
.SUBB    ANOP                                                           04320042
&T       SETA  &S                                                       04380042
.BACKUP  ANOP                                                           04440042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                04500042
         AIF   (&IBITS NE 1 OR &B NE 0).BIN2                            04560042
&TEMP    SETA  &ISHIFT                                                  04620042
         DC    AL.12(&SYSLIST(&OP,1)-&DSECT),XL.4'&TEMP'                04680042
         AGO   .OUT                                                     04740042
         AIF   (&SUB EQ 1).BIN2                                         04800042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(2)' NE '').BIN3                               04860042
         AGO   .BIN2A                                                   04920042
.BIN2    AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,2)' NE '').BIN3                           04980042
.BIN2A   ANOP                                                           05040042
&B       SETB  1                                                        05100042
.BIN3    ANOP                                                           05160042
         DC    AL.12(&SYSLIST(&OP,1)-&DSECT),XL.4'C'                    05220042
         DC    BL.1'&B',AL.7(&T),AL.4(&IBITS),FL.4'&ISHIFT'             05280042
.OUT     ANOP                                                           05340042
&ITEMXPT     SETA  0                                                    05400042
         AIF   (&SUB EQ 0).OUTA                                         05460042
         AIF   (&OP LT N'&SYSLIST).LOOP                                 05520042
.OUTA    ANOP                                                           05580042
         MEND                                                           05640042
         MACRO                                                          05700042
&NAME    DSGEN ,                                                        05760042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES ONE DSECT WORD       05820042
.*                                 FORMATTED FOR THE SUBJECT LOG RECORD 05880042
.*                                 EACH OPERAND HAS TWO SUB LISTS. THE  05940042
.*                                 FIRST IS THE NAME OF THE LOG ITEM    06000042
.*                                 WHILE THE SECOND IS THE # OF BITS TO 06060042
.*                                 ALLOCATE FOR THIS ITEM. ITEMS MUST   06120042
.*                                 BE DEFINED CONTIGUOUSLY WITHOUT GAPS 06180042
.*                                 UNUSED BIT GROUPS MUST BE GIVEN      06240042
.*                                 DUMMY NAMES. THE NAMES PROVIDED FOR  06300042
.*                                 THE LOG ITEMS MAY THEN BE USED IN    06360042
.*                                 THE CONVERSION MACRO INSTRUCTIONS.   06420042
         GBLA  &BITS(3000),&DB,&DT,&INITIAL                             06480042
         GBLA  &ITEMITR,&ITEMFST(20),&ITEMNBR,&ITEMMDX                  06540042
         GBLA  &ITEMNDX(3000),&ITEMXPT                                  06600042
         GBLA  &LABELNR,&LASTCC,&LB,&LBLCTR(100),&LPTR,&LT              06660042
         GBLA  &NRENTS,&SHIFT(3000)                                     06720042
         GBLB  &DIAGITF,&DIAGLIN,&DIAGSET,&DIAGTST,&FSW,&TEST           06780042
         GBLC  &CARRCON,&CSECT,&DSECT,&ITEM(3000)                       06840042
         GBLC  &LABELS(3000),&LBL(100),&NRENTSX                         06900042
         LCLB  &ONLY1,&CTIND                                            06960042
         LCLA  &START1,&START2,&END1,&END2                              07020042
         LCLC  &SYMBOL,&EQUSYM                                          07080042
         LCLA  &OP,&COUNT,&BYTE,&EQUCNT                                 07140042
         ACTR  100000                                                   07200042
         AIF   (&ITEMITR EQ 0).START                                    07260042
 MNOTE   20,'DSGEN MACRO OCCURRS AFTER ITEMSORT MACRO HAS BEEN ISSUED.' 07320042
         MEXIT                                                          07380042
.START   AIF   (N'&SYSLIST(&OP+1) LT 3).LOOP                            07440042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP+1,3)' EQ 'EQU').LOOP     TEST FOR EQU     07500042
  AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP+1,3)' EQ '' OR '&SYSLIST(&OP+1,4)' EQ '').ERR1   07560042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP+1,3)' GT '&SYSLIST(&OP+1,4)').ERR3        07620042
&START1  SETA  &SYSLIST(&OP+1,3)        GET START COUNT OF 1            07680042
&START2  SETA  &SYSLIST(&OP+1,4)        GET FIRST END COUNT             07740042
         AGO   .SET2A                   BRANCH AROUND                   07800042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP+1,5)' GT '&SYSLIST(&OP+1,6)').ERR3        07860042
.ERR1    MNOTE '**FIRST SYMBOL CONCATENATION INCOMPLETE**'              07920042
         MEXIT                                                          07980042
.SET2A   AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP+1,5)' EQ ''AND '&SYSLIST(&OP+1,6)' EQ '' X08040042
               ).SET2                   TEST FOR NO SECOND              08100042
  AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP+1,5)' EQ '' OR '&SYSLIST(&OP+1,6)' EQ '').ERR2   08160042
&END1    SETA  &SYSLIST(&OP+1,5)        GET START COUNT OF 2            08220042
&END2    SETA  &SYSLIST(&OP+1,6)        GET END COUNT OF 2              08280042
         AGO   .LOOP                                                    08340042
.SET2    ANOP                                                           08400042
&ONLY1   SETB  1                        INDICATE ONLY ONE CONCATENATION 08460042
         AGO   .LOOP                                                    08520042
.ERR2    MNOTE '**SECOND SYMBOL CONCATENATION INCOMPLETE**'             08580042
         MEXIT                                                          08640042
.ERR3    MNOTE '**START GREATER THAN END CONCATENATION**'               08700042
         MEXIT                                                          08760042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           08820042
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    08880042
         AIF   (&OP GT N'&SYSLIST).DONE      TEST IF ALL DONE           08940042
&ITEMNBR SETA  &ITEMNBR+1                                               09000042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,2)' NE '').OK1                            09060042
         MNOTE '**NULL BIT COUNT FIELD**'                               09120042
         MEXIT                                                          09180042
.OK1     ANOP                                                           09240042
&SYMBOL  SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP,1)'                                        09300042
         AIF   ('&SYMBOL' NE '').OK                                     09360042
*              *****     LOG ITEM SYMBOL NOT PROVIDED     *****         09420042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,3)' NE 'EQU').CNT                         09480042
         AGO   .START                   GET NEXT                        09540042
.OK      AIF   (N'&SYSLIST(&OP) LT 3).NO3    TEST FOR OLD FORMAT        09600042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,3)' EQ 'EQU').EQU   TEST FOR EQU          09660042
         AIF   (&ONLY1).OK2             TEST FOR ONLY ONE CONCAT        09720042
&SYMBOL  SETC  '&SYMBOL.&START1.&END1'       GET 1 AND 2 CONCAT         09780042
         AGO   .NO3                     BRANCH AROUND                   09840042
.OK2     ANOP                                                           09900042
&SYMBOL  SETC  '&SYMBOL.&START1'        GET 1 CONCATENATED              09960042
.NO3     ANOP                                                           10020042
&SYMBOL  EQU   *+&BYTE                                                  10080042
&ITEM(&ITEMNBR) SETC '&SYMBOL'          GET LABEL IN GLOBAL             10140042
&BITS(&ITEMNBR) SETA &SYSLIST(&OP,2)                                    10200042
&SHIFT(&ITEMNBR) SETA &COUNT-&BYTE*8                                    10260042
.CNT     ANOP                                                           10320042
&CTIND   SETB  1                        SET COUNT INDICATOR             10380042
&COUNT   SETA  &COUNT+&SYSLIST(&OP,2)                                   10440042
&BYTE    SETA  &COUNT/8                                                 10500042
         AIF   (N'&SYSLIST(&OP) LT 3).START  TEST FOR OLD FORMAT        10560042
         AIF   (&ONLY1).TSTST           TEST FOR ONLY ONE CONCAT        10620042
         AIF   (&END1 EQ &END2).TSTST   TEST FOR SECOND END             10680042
&END1    SETA  &END1+1                  INCREMENT COUNT                 10740042
&OP      SETA  &OP-1                    DECREMENT INCREMENT             10800042
         AGO   .LOOP                    GENERATE NEXT                   10860042
.TSTST   ANOP                                                           10920042
         AIF   (&START1 EQ &START2).LPDONE   TEST FOR END               10980042
         AIF   (&ONLY1).NSET1           TEST FOR ONLY ONE CONCAT        11040042
&END1    SETA  &SYSLIST(&OP,5)          RE-INIT SECOND START COUNT      11100042
.NSET1   ANOP                                                           11160042
&OP      SETA  &OP-1                    DECREMENT INDEX                 11220042
&START1  SETA  &START1+1                INCREMENT FIRST COUNT           11280042
         AGO   .LOOP                    GO DO NEXT                      11340042
.LPDONE  ANOP                                                           11400042
&ONLY1   SETB  0                        CLEAR INDICATOR                 11460042
         AGO   .START                   GO TEST FOR MORE SUB-LISTS      11520042
.DONE    AIF   (&COUNT-&COUNT/8*8 NE 0).ERR  TEST FOR MULTIPLE OF EIGHT 11580042
         AIF   (&CTIND EQ 0).END        NO DS IF NO COUNT               11640042
&COUNT   SETA  &COUNT/8                 GET NUMBER OF BYTES             11700042
&NAME    DS    &COUNT.C                                                 11760042
.END     MEXIT                                                          11820042
.ERR     MNOTE '**BIT COUNT FLDS DO NOT TOTAL MULTIPLE OF 8**'          11880042
         MEXIT                                                          11940042
.EQU     AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,4)' NE '').EQU1     TEST FOR NULL LABEL   12000042
.ERR4    MNOTE '**EQU OPERAND OMITTED OR NOT FOUND**'                   12060042
         MEXIT                                                          12120042
.EQU1    AIF   (&SYSLIST(&OP,2) LT 16).EQU2  COUNT OVER FIFTEEN         12180042
*****               THE FOLLOWING STATEMENT                *****        12240042
*****     NUMBER OF BITS EXCEED 15 - DO NOT USE AS BIN     *****        12300042
.EQU2    ANOP                                                           12360042
&EQUCNT  SETA  0                        CLEAR COUNTER                   12420042
&EQUSYM  SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP,4)'        GET EQU OPERAND                 12480042
.EQULOP  ANOP                                                           12540042
&EQUCNT  SETA  &EQUCNT+1                INCREMENT INDEX                 12600042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&EQUCNT)' EQ '&EQUSYM').EQUOUT  LABEL FOUND?     12660042
         AIF   (&EQUCNT EQ &ITEMNBR).ERR4    ALL TESTED?                12720042
         AGO   .EQULOP                  NO-GET NEXT                     12780042
.EQUOUT  ANOP                                                           12840042
&ITEM(&ITEMNBR) SETC '&SYMBOL'          GET LABEL NAME                  12900042
&BITS(&ITEMNBR) SETA &SYSLIST(&OP,2)    GET NUMBER OF BITS              12960042
&SHIFT(&ITEMNBR) SETA &SHIFT(&EQUCNT)   GET SHIFT COUNT                 13020042
&SYMBOL  EQU   &EQUSYM                  THIS SYMBOL EQUATED             13080042
         AGO   .START                   RETURN FOR NEXT                 13140042
         MEND                                                           13200042
         MACRO                                                          13260042
         CONVT ,                                                        13320042
         GBLA  &BITS(3000),&DB,&DT,&INITIAL                             13380042
         GBLA  &ITEMITR,&ITEMFST(20),&ITEMNBR,&ITEMMDX                  13440042
         GBLA  &ITEMNDX(3000),&ITEMXPT                                  13500042
         GBLA  &LABELNR,&LASTCC,&LB,&LBLCTR(100),&LPTR,&LT              13560042
         GBLA  &NRENTS,&SHIFT(3000)                                     13620042
         GBLB  &DIAGITF,&DIAGLIN,&DIAGSET,&DIAGTST,&FSW,&TEST           13680042
         GBLC  &CARRCON,&CSECT,&DSECT,&ITEM(3000)                       13740042
         GBLC  &LABELS(3000),&LBL(100),&NRENTSX                         13800042
         LCLB  &SUB                                                     13860042
         LCLA  &OP                                                      13920042
         LCLA  &OFFSET,&OUT,&IN,&IND,&IBITS,&ISHIFT                     13980042
.*                                                                      14040042
.*       CONVERT BINARY TO DECIMAL                                      14100042
.*             &NAME IS THE REFERENCE INTO THE DSECT RECORD             14160042
.*             &OUT    IS THE NUMBER OF CHARS TO BE PUT ONTO PRINT LINE 14220042
.*                                      DEFAULT IS FOUR MAXIMUM IS 8    14280042
.*             &IN       IS THE NUMBER OF BYTES AS INPUT                14340042
.*                                      ERROR DEFAULT IS 2 MAXIMUM IS 4 14400042
.*                                                                      14460042
         AIF   (&DIAGTST EQ 0).NOMSG                                    14520042
         AIF   (&INITIAL EQ 0).NOMSG                                    14580042
         AIF   (&DIAGLIN EQ 1).NOMSG                                    14640042
         MNOTE '**NO LINE ASSOCIATED WITH THIS DATA**'                  14700042
*****THE FOLLOWING GENERATED FOR TEST PURPOSES*****                     14760042
*        LINE                                                           14820042
         LINE                                                           14880042
.NOMSG   ANOP                                                           14940042
         AIF   (K'&SYSLIST(1) EQ K'&SYSLIST(1,1)).LLOP                  15000042
&SUB     SETB  1                                                        15060042
.LLOP    ANOP                                                           15120042
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    15180042
&OUT     SETA  4                        .BR NOT NULL ELSE SET TO 4      15240042
         AIF   (&SUB EQ 1).SUBA                                         15300042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(3)' EQ '').B  TEST FOR NULL INPUT             15360042
&OUT     SETA  &SYSLIST(3)             SET &OUT FROM INPUT              15420042
         AGO   .A                                                       15480042
.SUBA    AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,3)' EQ '').B                              15540042
&OUT     SETA  &SYSLIST(&OP,3)          SET &OUT FROM INPUT             15600042
.A       AIF   (&OUT GT 0 AND &OUT LT 9).B   TEST RANGE                 15660042
.AERR    MNOTE '*** BYTES OUT INCORRECTLY SPECIFIED DEFAULT USED ***'   15720042
&OUT     SETA  4                                                        15780042
.B       AIF   (&SUB EQ 1).SUBB                                         15840042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(2)' EQ '').LOOP    BRANCH IF NULL             15900042
&IN      SETA  &SYSLIST(2)              .SET &IN FROM INPUT             15960042
         AGO   .BB                                                      16020042
.SUBB    AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,2)' EQ '').LOOP                           16080042
&IN      SETA  &SYSLIST(&OP,2)          .SET &IN FROM INPUT             16140042
.BB      AIF   (&IN GT 0 AND &IN LT 5).D     TEST RANGE                 16200042
.BERR    MNOTE '*** BYTES IN INCORRECTLY SPECIFIED DEFAULT USED ***'    16260042
&IN      SETA  2                                                        16320042
         AGO   .D                                                       16380042
.LOOP    ANOP                           .LOOP TO FIND &NAME IN DSECT    16440042
&IND     SETA  &IND+1                   .SET UP LOOP COUNTER            16500042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&IND)' EQ '&SYSLIST(&OP,1)').FOUND               16560042
         AIF   (&IND LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP  .TEST FOR END OF DSECT          16620042
         MNOTE '*** LOG ITEM NOT DEFINED ***'                           16680042
         MEXIT                                                          16740042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           16800042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&IND)              .SET UP NUMBER OF BITS SPEC     16860042
         AIF   (&IBITS-((&IBITS/8)*8) EQ 0).C  .TEST FOR MULTIPLE OF 8  16920042
         MNOTE '*** DATA NOT DEFINED A MULTIPLE OF 8 BITS ***'          16980042
         MEXIT                                                          17040042
.C       ANOP                                                           17100042
&IN      SETA  &IBITS/8                 .COMPUTE NUMBER OF BYTES        17160042
         AIF   (&IN LT 1 OR &IN GT 4).BERR  .TEST RANGE B IF IN ERROR   17220042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&IND)             .SET UP FOR TEST OF BYTE BNDR   17280042
         AIF   (&ISHIFT EQ 0).D         .TEST FOR BYTE BNDRY            17340042
         MNOTE '*** DATA NOT ALIGNED ON A BYTE BOUNDARY ***'            17400042
         MEXIT                                                          17460042
.*                                                                      17520042
.D       ANOP                                                           17580042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                17640042
         DC    AL.12(&SYSLIST(&OP,1)-&DSECT),AL.4(9)                    17700042
         DC    X'&IN',X'&OUT'                                           17760042
&IND     SETA  0                                                        17820042
         AIF   (&SUB EQ 0).OUTA                                         17880042
         AIF   (&OP LT N'&SYSLIST).LLOP                                 17940042
.OUTA    ANOP                                                           18000042
         MEND                                                           18060042
         MACRO                                                          18120042
         ITEMFIND &ARG,&ITFDIAG=                                        18180042
         GBLA  &BITS(3000),&DB,&DT,&INITIAL                             18240042
         GBLA  &ITEMITR,&ITEMFST(20),&ITEMNBR,&ITEMMDX                  18300042
         GBLA  &ITEMNDX(3000),&ITEMXPT                                  18360042
         GBLA  &LABELNR,&LASTCC,&LB,&LBLCTR(100),&LPTR,&LT              18420042
         GBLA  &NRENTS,&SHIFT(3000)                                     18480042
         GBLB  &DIAGITF,&DIAGLIN,&DIAGSET,&DIAGTST,&FSW,&TEST           18540042
         GBLC  &CARRCON,&CSECT,&DSECT,&ITEM(3000)                       18600042
         GBLC  &LABELS(3000),&LBL(100),&NRENTSX                         18660042
         LCLA  &A,&B,&X,&I                                              18720042
         LCLC  &C1,&C2,&S                                               18780042
         ACTR  100000                                                   18840042
&ITEMXPT SETA  0                  INDICATE ITEM NOT FOUND.              18900042
         AIF   ('&ARG' NE '').NORM                                      18960042
         AIF   ('&ITFDIAG' EQ 'OFF'  OR  '&ITFDIAG' EQ 'ON').DIAGSET    19020042
  MNOTE 0,'ITEMFIND - OPERAND (&ITFDIAG) INVALID FOR ITFDIAG KEYWORD.'  19080042
         MEXIT                                                          19140042
.DIAGSET ANOP                                                           19200042
&DIAGITF SETB  ('&ITFDIAG' EQ 'ON')                                     19260042
         MEXIT                                                          19320042
.NORM    AIF   (&ITEMITR GT 0).SORTED                                   19380042
         ITEMSORT                                                       19440042
.SORTED  ANOP                                                           19500042
&I       SETA  &ITEMITR           COMPUTED ITTERATION COUNT.            19560042
&X       SETA  &ITEMMDX           COMPUTED MAXIMUM INDEX.               19620042
&C1      SETC  '&ARG'             ISOLATE SEARCH ARGUMENT.              19680042
&C1      SETC  '&C1'.'       '(1,8-K'&C1) PAD TO FULL 8 CHARACTERS.     19740042
.SRCHUP  ANOP                                                           19800042
&A       SETA  &A+&X              CURRENT TABLE SUBSCRIPT + INDEX.      19860042
&S       SETC  '+'                                                      19920042
         AIF   (&A  GT &ITEMNBR  AND  NOT &DIAGITF).SRCHDN1             19980042
         AIF   (&A  LE &ITEMNBR).SRCH00                                 20040042
&C2      SETC  '*-OVER-*'                                               20100042
&I       SETA  &I-1               DECREMENT ITTERATION COUNTER.         20160042
&X       SETA  &X/2               HALVE INDEX VALUE.                    20220042
 MNOTE *,'&ARG - &C2   ITRCTR = &I   PTR = &A&S &X'                     20280042
         AIF   (&I GE 0).SRCHDWN  IF ITTERATION COUNT NOT EXPIRED.      20340042
.NOFIND  MNOTE  20,' ITEMFIND FAILED FOR NAME  &C1  '                   20400042
         MEXIT                                                          20460042
.SRCH00  ANOP                                                           20520042
&I       SETA  &I-1               DECREMENT ITTERATION COUNTER.         20580042
         AIF   (&I LT 0).NOFIND   IF COUNT HAS GONE TO ZERO.            20640042
&X       SETA  &X/2               HALVE INDEX VALUE.                    20700042
&B       SETA  &ITEMNDX(&A)       GET SUBSCRIPT FROM INDEX TABLE.       20760042
&C2      SETC  '&ITEM(&B)'.'       '(1,8-K'&ITEM(&B))  PAD COMPARAND.   20820042
         AIF   (NOT &DIAGITF).COMPARE                                   20880042
 MNOTE *,'&ARG - &C2   ITRCTR = &I   PTR = &A&S &X   POS = &B'          20940042
.COMPARE AIF   ('&C1' LT '&C2').SRCHDWN   ARGUMENT LOWER, MOVE DOWN.    21000042
         AIF   ('&C1' GT '&C2').SRCHUP    ARGUMENT HIGHER, MOVE UP.     21060042
&ITEMXPT SETA  &B                 FOUND. SET INDEX POINTER FOR RETURN.  21120042
&ITEMFST(&I+1)  SETA  &ITEMFST(&I+1)+1                                  21180042
         MEXIT                                                          21240042
.SRCHDWN ANOP                                                           21300042
&A       SETA  &A-&X              CURRENT POINTER MINUS INDEX VALUE.    21360042
&S       SETC  '-'                                                      21420042
         AIF   (&A LE &ITEMNBR).SRCH00    IF WITHIN BOUNDS OF TABLE.    21480042
.SRCHDN1 ANOP                                                           21540042
&I       SETA  &I-1               DECREMENT ITTERATION COUNTER.         21600042
&X       SETA  &X/2               HALVE INDEX VALUE.                    21660042
         AIF   (&I GE 0).SRCHDWN  IF ITTERATION COUNT NOT EXPIRED.      21720042
         MNOTE  20,' ITEMFIND FAILED FOR NAME  &C1  '                   21780042
         MEND                                                           21840042
         MACRO                                                          21900042
         ITEMSORT  &DUMMY                                               21960042
         GBLA  &BITS(3000),&DB,&DT,&INITIAL                             22020042
         GBLA  &ITEMITR,&ITEMFST(20),&ITEMNBR,&ITEMMDX                  22080042
         GBLA  &ITEMNDX(3000),&ITEMXPT                                  22140042
         GBLA  &LABELNR,&LASTCC,&LB,&LBLCTR(100),&LPTR,&LT              22200042
         GBLA  &NRENTS,&SHIFT(3000)                                     22260042
         GBLB  &DIAGITF,&DIAGLIN,&DIAGSET,&DIAGTST,&FSW,&TEST           22320042
         GBLC  &CARRCON,&CSECT,&DSECT,&ITEM(3000)                       22380042
         GBLC  &LABELS(3000),&LBL(100),&NRENTSX                         22440042
         LCLA  &R,&ZI,&I,&A1,&A2,&TEMP                                  22500042
         LCLB  &SR,&GOTO,&TB                                            22560042
         LCLB   &SW(4000)                                               22620042
         LCLC  &C1,&C2                                                  22680042
         ACTR   200000                                                  22740042
&A1      SETA  0                                                        22800042
         AIF   (&ITEMITR EQ 0).LOOP0   TEST FOR RE-ENTRY.               22860042
 MNOTE   0,'ITEMSORT MACRO OCCURRS MORE THAN ONCE. TABLE NOT RESORTED.' 22920042
         MEXIT                                                          22980042
.LOOP0   ANOP                                                           23040042
&A1      SETA  &A1+1                                                    23100042
&ITEMNDX(&A1) SETA &A1                                                  23160042
         AIF   (&A1 LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP0                                  23220042
         AIF   (&ITEMNBR LT 2).MEXIT                                    23280042
&A1      SETA  &ITEMNBR/2         HALF OF TOTAL ENTRIES.                23340042
&A2      SETA  0                                                        23400042
.LOOP1   ANOP                                                           23460042
&A2      SETA  &A2+1                                                    23520042
&SW(&A2) SETB  1                  SET FIRST HALF OF SWITCHES TO 1.      23580042
         AIF   (&A2 LT &A1).LOOP1                                       23640042
.LOOP2   ANOP                                                           23700042
&A2      SETA  &A2+1                                                    23760042
&SW(&A2) SETB  0                  SET SECOND HALF TO ZERO.              23820042
         AIF   (&A2 LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP2                                  23880042
&R       SETA  0                  SET R TO FIRST TRIAL ITEM.            23940042
&ZI      SETA  &ITEMNBR-1         SET ZI TO LAST ITEM.                  24000042
&I       SETA  &ZI-1                                                    24060042
.T3      ANOP                                                           24120042
&SR      SETB  (&SW(&R+1))        GET FLAG, WHICH WAY TO GO?            24180042
&R       SETA  (&R*2)+1+&SR       R=2R+(1 OR 2)                         24240042
         AIF   (&R LE &I).T3                                            24300042
.T4      ANOP                                                           24360042
&R       SETA  (&R-1)/2           R=(R-1)/2                             24420042
&SR      SETB  (&SW(&R+1))        GET SUBTREE SELECT FLAG.              24480042
         AIF   (&SR EQ 0).T7                                            24540042
         AIF   (&GOTO EQ 0).T5                                          24600042
.T7      ANOP                                                           24660042
&A1      SETA  &ITEMNDX(&R+1)                                           24720042
&A2      SETA  &ITEMNDX(&ZI+1)                                          24780042
&C1      SETC  '&ITEM(&A1)'.'       '(1,8-K'&ITEM(&A1))                 24840042
&C2      SETC  '&ITEM(&A2)'.'       '(1,8-K'&ITEM(&A2))                 24900042
         AIF   ('&C1' LT '&C2').T8                                      24960042
.T9      ANOP                                                           25020042
&TEMP    SETA  &ITEMNDX(&R+1)     Z(R) TO TEMP.                         25080042
&TB      SETB  (&SW(&R+1))                                              25140042
&ITEMNDX(&R+1) SETA &ITEMNDX(&ZI+1)    Z(I) TO Z(R)                     25200042
&SW(&R+1) SETB (&SW(&ZI+1))                                             25260042
&ITEMNDX(&ZI+1) SETA &TEMP        TEMP TO Z(I)                          25320042
&SW(&ZI+1) SETB (&TB)                                                   25380042
&SR      SETB  (&SR EQ 0)                                               25440042
&SW(&R+1) SETB (&SR)                                                    25500042
.T8      AIF   (&R GT 0).T4                                             25560042
&GOTO    SETB  1                  SET 'GO TO' T7                        25620042
&ZI      SETA  &ZI-1                                                    25680042
&I       SETA  &I-1                                                     25740042
         AIF   (&I GE 0).T3                                             25800042
.MEXIT   ANOP                                                           25860042
&ITEMITR SETA 1                                                         25920042
&ITEMMDX SETA 1                                                         25980042
.ITRLOOP ANOP                                                           26040042
&ITEMITR SETA &ITEMITR+1                                                26100042
&ITEMMDX SETA &ITEMMDX+&ITEMMDX                                         26160042
         AIF  (&ITEMMDX LT &ITEMNBR).ITRLOOP                            26220042
&ITEMITR SETA &ITEMITR-1                                                26280042
&ITEMMDX SETA &ITEMMDX/2                                                26340042
&A1      SETA &ITEMNBR                                                  26400042
&A2      SETA &ITEMMDX                                                  26460042
&TEMP    SETA &ITEMITR                                                  26520042
 MNOTE *,' ITEMS = &A1, MAX INDEX = &A2, ITTERATION COUNT = &TEMP'      26580042
         MEXIT                                                          26640042
.T5      ANOP                                                           26700042
&TEMP    SETA  &ITEMNDX(&R+1)     Z(R) TO TEMP.                         26760042
&TB      SETB  (&SW(&R+1))                                              26820042
&ITEMNDX(&R+1) SETA &ITEMNDX(&ZI+1)    Z(I) TO Z(R)                     26880042
&SW(&R+1) SETB (&SW(&ZI+1))                                             26940042
&ITEMNDX(&ZI+1) SETA &TEMP        TEMP TO Z(I)                          27000042
&SW(&ZI+1) SETB (&TB)                                                   27060042
&SR      SETB  (&SR EQ 0)                                               27120042
&SW(&R+1) SETB (&SR)                                                    27180042
         AGO   .T3                                                      27240042
         MEND                                                           27300042
           MACRO                                                        27360042
&NAME    LABEL &LABEL1,&LABEL2,&LABEL3,&LABEL4,&LABEL5,&LABEL6,        C27420042
               &LABEL7,&LABEL8                                          27480042
.*                                 THIS MACRO ALLOWS LABELS TO          27540042
.*                                 BE SPECIFIED FOR A GIVEN LINE. THE   27600042
.*                                 LABELS SHOULD BE ENCLOSED IN QUOTA-  27660042
.*                                 TION MARKS. THE COLUMN AND LINE END  27720042
.*                                 CONTROLS WILL BE INSERTED BY THE     27780042
.*                                 MACRO. OMITTED OPERANDS MEAN NO      27840042
.*                                 LABEL REQUIRED FOR RESPECTIVE        27900042
.*                                 COLUMN.                              27960042
         GBLA  &BITS(3000),&DB,&DT,&INITIAL                             28020042
         GBLA  &ITEMITR,&ITEMFST(20),&ITEMNBR,&ITEMMDX                  28080042
         GBLA  &ITEMNDX(3000),&ITEMXPT                                  28140042
         GBLA  &LABELNR,&LASTCC,&LB,&LBLCTR(100),&LPTR,&LT              28200042
         GBLA  &NRENTS,&SHIFT(3000)                                     28260042
         GBLB  &DIAGITF,&DIAGLIN,&DIAGSET,&DIAGTST,&FSW,&TEST           28320042
         GBLC  &CARRCON,&CSECT,&DSECT,&ITEM(3000)                       28380042
         GBLC  &LABELS(3000),&LBL(100),&NRENTSX                         28440042
         LCLC  &MARGIN,&TACK                                            28500042
         LCLC  &TEXT                                                    28560042
         LCLA  &OP,&K,&START,&NRCHAR,&REMAIN                            28620042
         AIF   (&INITIAL EQ 0).DIAGCLR                                  28680042
         AIF   (&DIAGTST EQ 0).DIAGCLR                                  28740042
         AIF   (&DIAGLIN EQ 1).DIAGCLR                                  28800042
         MNOTE '**NO LINE ASSOCIATED WITH PREVIOUS LABEL**'             28860042
***** THE FOLLOWING GENERATED FOR TEST PURPOSES *****                   28920042
*        LINE                                                           28980042
         LINE                                                           29040042
.DIAGCLR ANOP                                                           29100042
&DIAGSET SETB  0                                                        29160042
&DIAGLIN SETB  0                                                        29220042
&MARGIN  SETC  '*'                                                      29280042
         AIF   ('&NAME' EQ '').LOOPOUT                                  29340042
&LPTR    SETA  &LPTR+1                                                  29400042
&LBL(&LPTR) SETC '&NAME'                                                29460042
&LBLCTR(&LPTR) SETA &LABELNR+1                                          29520042
.LOOPOUT ANOP                                                           29580042
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    29640042
&K       SETA  K'&SYSLIST(&OP)                                          29700042
         AIF (&K GE 2).NORM                                             29760042
&K       SETA  2                                                        29820042
.NORM    ANOP                                                           29880042
&START   SETA  2                                                        29940042
         AIF (&OP LT N'&SYSLIST).NOTLAST                                30000042
&MARGIN  SETC  '$'                                                      30060042
.NOTLAST ANOP                                                           30120042
&NRCHAR  SETA  8                                                        30180042
&TACK    SETC  ''                                                       30240042
.LOOPIN  ANOP                                                           30300042
&REMAIN  SETA  &K-&START                                                30360042
         AIF (&REMAIN GE 8).MORE                                        30420042
&TACK    SETC  '&MARGIN'                                                30480042
&NRCHAR  SETA  &REMAIN                                                  30540042
.MORE    ANOP                                                           30600042
&TEXT    SETC  ''                                                       30660042
         AIF (&REMAIN EQ 0).ENDTEXT                                     30720042
&TEXT    SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP)'(&START,&NRCHAR)                          30780042
.ENDTEXT ANOP                                                           30840042
&LABELNR SETA  &LABELNR+1                                               30900042
&LABELS(&LABELNR) SETC '&TEXT'.'&TACK'                                  30960042
&START   SETA  &START+8                                                 31020042
         AIF ('&TACK' EQ '').LOOPIN                                     31080042
         AIF ('&TACK' EQ '*').LOOPOUT                                   31140042
         MEND                                                           31200042
         MACRO                                                          31260042
&NAME    LINE  &DATA,&LABEL,&SKIP=                                      31320042
.*                            THIS MACRO ESTABLISHES THE MARGINS OR     31380042
.*                                 COLUMN SETTINGS FOR EACH LINE. IT    31440042
.*                                 GENERATES NECESSARY CARRIAGE CONTROL 31500042
.*                                 ENTRIES. LASTLY IT DETERMINES THE    31560042
.*                                 NUMBER OF ENTRIES ASSOCIATED WITH    31620042
.*                                 THE PREVIOUS LINE AND STORES THAT #  31680042
.*                                 INTO THE APPROPRIATE BYTE.           31740042
.*                            &DATA(1) - CHARACTER POSITION TO BEGIN    31800042
.*                                 DATA.                                31860042
.*                            &DATA(2) - # OF SPACES BETWEEN SUCCESSIVE 31920042
.*                                 DATA COLUMN STARTING CHARACTERS.     31980042
.*                            &LABEL(1) - CHAR. POS. TO BEGIN LABELS.   32040042
.*                            &LABEL(2) - # SPACES BETWEEN LINE'S LABEL 32100042
.*                                 STARTING CHARACTERS.                 32160042
.*                            &SKIP= - # OF LINES TO ADVANCE CARRIAGE   32220042
.*                                 TO BEGIN NEXT PRINTED LINE.          32280042
.*                            NEW ENTRIES ARE GENERATED ONLY WHEN       32340042
.*                                 NECESSARY. OMISSION OF ITEMS MEANS   32400042
.*                                 THEY HAVE NOT CHANGED SINCE PREVIOUS 32460042
.*                                 SETTINGS. A LINE MACRO IS REQUIRED   32520042
.*                                 FOR EACH PRINTED LINE. IF NO SETTING 32580042
.*                                 CHANGES ARE REQUIRED ALL OPERANDS    32640042
.*                                 ARE OMITTED IN WHICH CASE ONLY THE   32700042
.*                                 # OF ENTRIES FOR THE PREVIOUS LINE   32760042
.*                                 IS COMPUTED. THIS MACRO MUST BE THE  32820042
.*                                 FIRST MACRO INSTRUCTION ISSUED FOR   32880042
.*                                 THE SUBJECT LINE                     32940042
         GBLA  &BITS(3000),&DB,&DT,&INITIAL                             33000042
         GBLA  &ITEMITR,&ITEMFST(20),&ITEMNBR,&ITEMMDX                  33060042
         GBLA  &ITEMNDX(3000),&ITEMXPT                                  33120042
         GBLA  &LABELNR,&LASTCC,&LB,&LBLCTR(100),&LPTR,&LT              33180042
         GBLA  &NRENTS,&SHIFT(3000)                                     33240042
         GBLB  &DIAGITF,&DIAGLIN,&DIAGSET,&DIAGTST,&FSW,&TEST           33300042
         GBLC  &CARRCON,&CSECT,&DSECT,&ITEM(3000)                       33360042
         GBLC  &LABELS(3000),&LBL(100),&NRENTSX                         33420042
         LCLA  &S                                                       33480042
         AIF   (&INITIAL EQ 0 OR &DIAGTST EQ 0).DIAGSET                 33540042
         AIF   (&DIAGSET EQ 0).DIAGSET                                  33600042
         MNOTE '**NO LABEL ASSOCIATED WITH LAST SET**'                  33660042
***** THE FOLLOWING GENERATED FOR TEST PURPOSES *****                   33720042
*        LABEL '%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%'       33780042
               LABEL '%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%' 33840042
.DIAGSET ANOP                                                           33900042
&DIAGSET SETB  1                                                        33960042
&DIAGLIN SETB  1                                                        34020042
&NAME    DS    0C                                                       34080042
         AIF   (&INITIAL EQ 0).FIRSTLN                                  34140042
         LINEND                                                         34200042
         AGO   .NTFIRST                                                 34260042
.FIRSTLN ANOP                                                           34320042
&NRENTSX SETC  'N&SYSNDX'                                               34380042
&INITIAL SETA  1                                                        34440042
N&SYSNDX EQU   *                                                        34500042
.NTFIRST ANOP                                                           34560042
         DC    AL1(0)                                                   34620042
         AIF   ('&DATA(1)' EQ '').CKDTABS                               34680042
         AIF   (&DATA(1) EQ &DB).CKDTABS                                34740042
&DB      SETA  &DATA(1)                                                 34800042
         AGO   .AA                                                      34860042
.CKDTABS AIF   ('&DATA(2)' EQ '').NCDATA                                34920042
         AIF   (&DATA(2) EQ &DT).NCDATA                                 34980042
         AGO   .CC                                                      35040042
.AA      AIF   ('&DATA(2)' EQ '').BB                                    35100042
         AIF   (&DATA(2) EQ &DT).BB                                     35160042
.CC      ANOP                                                           35220042
&DT      SETA  &DATA(2)                                                 35280042
.BB      DC    XL2'FFFE'                                                35340042
         DC    FL1'&DB'                                                 35400042
         DC    FL1'&DT'                                                 35460042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                35520042
.NCDATA  ANOP                                                           35580042
         AIF   ('&LABEL(1)' EQ '').CKLTABS                              35640042
         AIF   (&LABEL(1) EQ &LB).CKLTABS                               35700042
&LB      SETA  &LABEL(1)                                                35760042
         AGO   .AAA                                                     35820042
.CKLTABS AIF   ('&LABEL(2)' EQ '').NCLABEL                              35880042
         AIF   (&LABEL(2) EQ &LT).NCLABEL                               35940042
         AGO   .CCC                                                     36000042
.AAA     AIF   ('&LABEL(2)' EQ '').BBB                                  36060042
         AIF   (&LABEL(2) EQ &LT).BBB                                   36120042
.CCC     ANOP                                                           36180042
&LT      SETA  &LABEL(2)                                                36240042
.BBB     DC    XL2'FFFF'                                                36300042
         DC    FL1'&LB'                                                 36360042
         DC    FL1'&LT'                                                 36420042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                36480042
.NCLABEL ANOP                                                           36540042
         AIF   ('&SKIP' NE '').CONT                                     36600042
         AIF   (&TEST EQ 0).NOCHANG                                     36660042
         AGO   .DEFALTA                                                 36720042
.CONT    ANOP                                                           36780042
         AIF   (&TEST EQ 0).AB                                          36840042
         AIF   ('&SKIP' EQ 'E').AB                                      36900042
&S       SETA  &SKIP                                                    36960042
.DEFAULT ANOP                                                           37020042
         AIF   (&SKIP EQ &LASTCC).DEFALTA                               37080042
         ORG   &CARRCON+3                                               37140042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&S),AL.3(1)                                 37200042
         ORG                                                            37260042
&LASTCC  SETA  &S                                                       37320042
.DEFALTA ANOP                                                           37380042
&TEST    SETB  0                                                        37440042
         AGO   .DD                                                      37500042
.AB      AIF   ('&SKIP' NE 'E').ABB                                     37560042
A&SYSNDX DC    X'FFFB8B00'              EJECT                           37620042
&LASTCC  SETA  184                                                      37680042
&TEST    SETB  1                                                        37740042
         AGO   .ABC                                                     37800042
.ABB     AIF   (&SKIP EQ &LASTCC).NOCHANG                               37860042
A&SYSNDX DC    XL2'FFFB'                                                37920042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&SKIP),AL.3(1)                              37980042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&SKIP),AL.3(1)                              38040042
&LASTCC  SETA  &SKIP                                                    38100042
&TEST    SETB  1                                                        38160042
.ABC     ANOP                                                           38220042
&CARRCON SETC  'A&SYSNDX'                                               38280042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                38340042
.DD      ANOP                                                           38400042
.NOCHANG ANOP                                                           38460042
         MEND                                                           38520042
         MACRO                                                          38580042
         LINEND ,                                                       38640042
.*                                 THIS MACRO IS USED ONLY BY THE LINE  38700042
.*                                 MACRO TO SET THE NUMBER OF ENTRIES   38760042
.*                                 ASSOCIATED WITH EACH LINE.           38820042
         GBLA  &BITS(3000),&DB,&DT,&INITIAL                             38880042
         GBLA  &ITEMITR,&ITEMFST(20),&ITEMNBR,&ITEMMDX                  38940042
         GBLA  &ITEMNDX(3000),&ITEMXPT                                  39000042
         GBLA  &LABELNR,&LASTCC,&LB,&LBLCTR(100),&LPTR,&LT              39060042
         GBLA  &NRENTS,&SHIFT(3000)                                     39120042
         GBLB  &DIAGITF,&DIAGLIN,&DIAGSET,&DIAGTST,&FSW,&TEST           39180042
         GBLC  &CARRCON,&CSECT,&DSECT,&ITEM(3000)                       39240042
         GBLC  &LABELS(3000),&LBL(100),&NRENTSX                         39300042
         ORG   &NRENTSX                                                 39360042
         DC    FL1'&NRENTS'                                             39420042
         ORG                                                            39480042
&NRENTS  SETA  0                                                        39540042
B&SYSNDX EQU   *                                                        39600042
&NRENTSX SETC  'B&SYSNDX'                                               39660042
         MEND                                                           39720042
         MACRO                                                          39780042
         LSTART ,                                                       39840042
.*                            THIS MACRO IS ISSUED WHEN THE LABEL AREA  39900042
.*                                 OF THE TABLE IS TO BEGIN.            39960042
         GBLA  &BITS(3000),&DB,&DT,&INITIAL                             40020042
         GBLA  &ITEMITR,&ITEMFST(20),&ITEMNBR,&ITEMMDX                  40080042
         GBLA  &ITEMNDX(3000),&ITEMXPT                                  40140042
         GBLA  &LABELNR,&LASTCC,&LB,&LBLCTR(100),&LPTR,&LT              40200042
         GBLA  &NRENTS,&SHIFT(3000)                                     40260042
         GBLB  &DIAGITF,&DIAGLIN,&DIAGSET,&DIAGTST,&FSW,&TEST           40320042
         GBLC  &CARRCON,&CSECT,&DSECT,&ITEM(3000)                       40380042
         GBLC  &LABELS(3000),&LBL(100),&NRENTSX                         40440042
         LCLA  &NDX,&CTR                                                40500042
         ACTR  500000                                                   40560042
         AIF   (&DIAGTST EQ 0).NODIAG                                   40620042
         AIF   (&DIAGSET EQ 0).NODIAG                                   40680042
         MNOTE '**NO LABEL ASSOCIATED WITH LAST SET**'                  40740042
***** THE FOLLOWING GENERATED FOR TEST PURPOSES *****                   40800042
*        LABEL '%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%'       40860042
               LABEL '%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%' 40920042
.NODIAG  ANOP                                                           40980042
         LINEND                                                         41040042
&CTR     SETA  1                                                        41100042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           41160042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   41220042
         AIF   (&LBLCTR(&CTR) NE &NDX).NOLBL                            41280042
&LBL(&CTR) DC  C'&LABELS(&NDX)'                                         41340042
&CTR     SETA  &CTR+1                                                   41400042
         AGO   .LOOPCTL                                                 41460042
.NOLBL   ANOP                                                           41520042
         DC    C'&LABELS(&NDX)'                                         41580042
.LOOPCTL AIF   (&NDX LT &LABELNR).LOOP                                  41640042
         MEND                                                           41700042
         MACRO                                                          41760042
&NAME    ROUTINE &LOGITEM,&RNAME                                        41820042
         GBLA  &BITS(3000),&DB,&DT,&INITIAL                             41880042
         GBLA  &ITEMITR,&ITEMFST(20),&ITEMNBR,&ITEMMDX                  41940042
         GBLA  &ITEMNDX(3000),&ITEMXPT                                  42000042
         GBLA  &LABELNR,&LASTCC,&LB,&LBLCTR(100),&LPTR,&LT              42060042
         GBLA  &NRENTS,&SHIFT(3000)                                     42120042
         GBLB  &DIAGITF,&DIAGLIN,&DIAGSET,&DIAGTST,&FSW,&TEST           42180042
         GBLC  &CARRCON,&CSECT,&DSECT,&ITEM(3000)                       42240042
         GBLC  &LABELS(3000),&LBL(100),&NRENTSX                         42300042
         AIF   (&DIAGTST EQ 0).NOMSG                                    42360042
         AIF   (&INITIAL EQ 0).NOMSG                                    42420042
         AIF   (&DIAGLIN EQ 1).NOMSG                                    42480042
         MNOTE '**NO LINE ASSOCIATED WITH THIS ROUTINE**'               42540042
*****THE FOLLOWING GENERATED FOR TEST PURPOSES*****                     42600042
*        LINE                                                           42660042
         LINE                                                           42720042
.NOMSG   ANOP                                                           42780042
&NAME    DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'D'                           42840042
         DC    AL2(&RNAME-&CSECT)                                       42900042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                42960042
         MEND                                                           43020042
         MACRO                                                          43080042
         SPECIAL &ROUTINE,&PARAM,&SPACE=                                43140042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES A SPECIAL ROUTINE    43200042
.*                                 ENTRY TO BE PROCESSED BY THE SUM. M. 43260042
.*                            &ROUTINE - SYMBOL ON SPECIAL ROUTINE EWT. 43320042
.*                            &PARAM - AN 8 BIT BINARY REPRESENTATION   43380042
.*                                 TO OCCUPY THE 'MASK' FIELD BUT TO BE 43440042
.*                                 INTERPRETED AS AN ARGUMENT OF THE    43500042
.*                                 SPECIAL ROUTINE.                     43560042
.*                            &SPACE - THE NUMBER OF 2BYTE COUNTERS TO  43620042
.*                                 ALLOCATE FOR REQUIRED PROCESSING.    43680042
         GBLC  &CSECT                                                   43740042
         GBLA  &COUNTR                                                  43800042
         LCLA  &ADD                                                     43860042
         DC    AL1(128)                                                 43920042
         DC    BL.8'&PARAM'                                             43980042
         DC    AL2(&ROUTINE-&CSECT)                                     44040042
         DC    AL2(&COUNTR)                                             44100042
&ADD     SETA  1                                                        44160042
         AIF   ('&SPACE' EQ '').NORM                                    44220042
&ADD     SETA  &SPACE                                                   44280042
.NORM    ANOP                                                           44340042
&COUNTR  SETA  &COUNTR+&ADD                                             44400042
         MEND                                                           44460042
         MACRO                                                          44520042
         HEX   ,                                                        44580042
.*                            THIS MACRO FACILITATES GENERATION OF THE  44640042
.*                                 TABLE ENTRIES SPECIFYING HEX TYPE    44700042
.*                                 CONVERSIONS.                         44760042
.*                            &SYSLIST(&OP,1) - NAME OF DATA ITEM TO BE 44820042
.*                                 CONVERTED                            44880042
.*                            &SYSLIST(&OP,2) - # OF SPACES TO SKIP ON  44940042
.*                                 MULTIPLE PRINT OR NBR OF SPACES TO   45000042
.*                                 BACK UP FROM COLUMN FOR START OF     45060042
.*                                 PRINTING. THE LETTER B PRECEEDS THE  45120042
.*                                 NUMBER (B8) IF THE LATTER OPTION IS  45180042
.*                                 DESIRED. OMISSION OF THIS OPERAND    45240042
.*                                 FORCES OPTION 2 WITH BACKUP SPACING  45300042
.*                                 EQUAL TO THE NUMBER OF BYTES SPECI-  45360042
.*                                 FIED BY THE NEXT OPERAND (TWICE THIS 45420042
.*                                 NUMBER IF SUFFIX IS EXPLICITLY OR    45480042
.*                                 IMPLICITLY B).                       45540042
.*                            &SYSLIST(&OP,3) - NUMBER OF BYTES TO      45600042
.*                                 PROCESS. THIS NUMBER IS SUFFIXED     45660042
.*                                 WITH AN L,R, OR B TO STIPULATE       45720042
.*                                 PRINTING OF THE LEFT HALF, RIGHT     45780042
.*                                 HALF, OR BOTH HALVES OF THE BYTE     45840042
.*                                 RESPECTIVELY. OMISSION OF THIS       45900042
.*                                 OPERAND DEFAULTS TO B WITH THE NUM-  45960042
.*                                 BER OF BYTES EQUAL TO THE ITEM LNGTH 46020042
.*                            A NEW ENTRY IS GENERATED ONLY WHEN NECES- 46080042
.*                                 SARY. THIS MACRO MUST BE THE FIRST   46140042
.*                                 MACRO INSTRUCTION ISSUED FOR THE     46200042
.*                                 SUBJECT LINE(S).                     46260042
         GBLA  &BITS(3000),&DB,&DT,&INITIAL                             46320042
         GBLA  &ITEMITR,&ITEMFST(20),&ITEMNBR,&ITEMMDX                  46380042
         GBLA  &ITEMNDX(3000),&ITEMXPT                                  46440042
         GBLA  &LABELNR,&LASTCC,&LB,&LBLCTR(100),&LPTR,&LT              46500042
         GBLA  &NRENTS,&SHIFT(3000)                                     46560042
         GBLB  &DIAGITF,&DIAGLIN,&DIAGSET,&DIAGTST,&FSW,&TEST           46620042
         GBLC  &CARRCON,&CSECT,&DSECT,&ITEM(3000)                       46680042
         GBLC  &LABELS(3000),&LBL(100),&NRENTSX                         46740042
         LCLB  &B,&SUB                                                  46800042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&ISHIFT,&K,&T,&CODE,&BYTESP,&OP                   46860042
         LCLC  &S,&LETTER,&ARG                                          46920042
       ACTR  500000                                                     46980042
         AIF   (&DIAGTST EQ 0).NOMSG                                    47040042
         AIF   (&INITIAL EQ 0).NOMSG                                    47100042
         AIF   (&DIAGLIN EQ 1).NOMSG                                    47160042
         MNOTE '**NO LINE ASSOCIATED WITH THIS DATA**'                  47220042
*****THE FOLLOWING GENERATED FOR TEST PURPOSES*****                     47280042
*        LINE                                                           47340042
         LINE                                                           47400042
.NOMSG   ANOP                                                           47460042
         AIF   (K'&SYSLIST(1) EQ K'&SYSLIST(1,1)).LOOP                  47520042
&SUB     SETB  1                                                        47580042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           47640042
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    47700042
&ARG     SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP,1)'                                        47760042
         ITEMFIND  &ARG                                                 47820042
         AIF   (&ITEMXPT EQ 0).MEXIT                                    47880042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           47940042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&ITEMXPT)                                         48000042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&ITEMXPT)                                          48060042
         AIF   (&ISHIFT EQ 0 OR &ISHIFT EQ 4).ALIGN                     48120042
.ERR     MNOTE '**DATA NOT ALLIGNED ON HEX OR BYTE BOUNDARY**'          48180042
.MEXIT   MEXIT                                                          48240042
.ALIGN   ANOP                                                           48300042
&CODE    SETA  1                                                        48360042
         AIF   (&SUB EQ 1).SUBA                                         48420042
&K       SETA  K'&SYSLIST(3)                                            48480042
         AGO   .SUBB                                                    48540042
.SUBA    ANOP                                                           48600042
&K       SETA  K'&SYSLIST(&OP,3)                                        48660042
.SUBB    ANOP                                                           48720042
         AIF   (&K EQ 1).ERR3                                           48780042
         AIF   (&IBITS-(&IBITS/4)*4 EQ 0).OK                            48840042
         MNOTE '**BIT LENGTH SPECIFICATION INCONSISTENT WITH CONTROL**' 48900042
         MEXIT                                                          48960042
.OK      AIF   (&SUB EQ 1).SUBC                                         49020042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(3)' EQ '').USEDEFN                            49080042
&LETTER  SETC  '&SYSLIST(3)'(&K,1)                                      49140042
&S       SETC  '&SYSLIST(3)'(1,&K-1)                                    49200042
         AGO   .SUBD                                                    49260042
.SUBC    ANOP                                                           49320042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,3)' EQ '').USEDEFN                        49380042
&LETTER  SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP,3)'(&K,1)                                  49440042
&S       SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP,3)'(1,&K-1)                                49500042
.SUBD    ANOP                                                           49560042
&BYTESP  SETA  &S                                                       49620042
         AIF   ('&LETTER' EQ 'B').BOTH                                  49680042
         AIF   ('&LETTER' EQ 'L').LEFT                                  49740042
         AIF   ('&LETTER' EQ 'R').RIGHT                                 49800042
.ERR3    MNOTE '**PARAMETER 3 INCOMPLETE-DSGEN DEFINITION USED**'       49860042
         AGO   .USEDEFN                                                 49920042
.RIGHT   ANOP                                                           49980042
&CODE    SETA  2                                                        50040042
         AGO   .L                                                       50100042
.LEFT    ANOP                                                           50160042
&CODE    SETA  1                                                        50220042
         AGO   .L                                                       50280042
.USEDEFN ANOP                                                           50340042
&BYTESP  SETA  &IBITS/8                                                 50400042
.BOTH    AIF   (&ISHIFT NE 0).ERR                                       50460042
&CODE    SETA  3                                                        50520042
&T       SETA  &BYTESP*2-1                                              50580042
&S       SETC  '&T'                                                     50640042
.OK2     AIF   (&ISHIFT EQ 0).L                                         50700042
&CODE    SETA  2                                                        50760042
.L       ANOP                                                           50820042
&B       SETB  1                                                        50880042
         AIF   (&SUB EQ 1).SUBE                                         50940042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(2)' EQ '').BACKUP                             51000042
&K       SETA  K'&SYSLIST(2)                                            51060042
&B       SETB  ('&SYSLIST(2)'(1,1) EQ 'B')                              51120042
&S       SETC  '&SYSLIST(2)'(&B+1,&K-&B)                                51180042
         AGO   .SUBF                                                    51240042
.SUBE    ANOP                                                           51300042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,2)' EQ '').BACKUP                         51360042
&K       SETA  K'&SYSLIST(&OP,2)                                        51420042
&B       SETB  ('&SYSLIST(&OP,2)'(1,1) EQ 'B')                          51480042
&S       SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP,2)'(&B+1,&K-&B)                            51540042
.SUBF    ANOP                                                           51600042
.BACKUP  ANOP                                                           51660042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                51720042
         AIF   (&BYTESP GT 0 AND &BYTESP LT 16).SUB0                    51780042
         MNOTE '**NO. OF BYTES OUTSIDE RANGE OF 1-15**'                 51840042
         MEXIT                                                          51900042
.SUB0    AIF   (&SUB EQ 1).SUBG                                         51960042
         DC    AL.12(&SYSLIST(1)-&DSECT),XL.4'A'                        52020042
         AGO   .SUBH                                                    52080042
.SUBG    ANOP                                                           52140042
         DC    AL.12(&SYSLIST(&OP,1)-&DSECT),XL.4'A'                    52200042
.SUBH    ANOP                                                           52260042
         DC    BL.1'&B',FL.7'&S',AL.4(&BYTESP),FL.4'&CODE'              52320042
.OUT     ANOP                                                           52380042
&ITEMXPT     SETA  0                                                    52440042
         AIF   (&SUB EQ 0).OUTA                                         52500042
         AIF   (&OP LT N'&SYSLIST).LOOP                                 52560042
.OUTA    ANOP                                                           52620042
         MEND                                                           52680042
         MACRO                                                          52740042
         SUM   &LOGITEM,&MASK                                           52800042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES A NORMAL EDIT ENTRY  52860042
.*                                 FOR PROCESSING BY THE SUMMARY MODULE 52920042
.*                            &LOGITEM - NAME OF DATA ITEM TO BE SUMMED 52980042
.*                            &MASK - BYTE MASK FOR BITS TO BE TESTED.  53040042
.*                                 THIS OPERAND SHOULD BE OMITTED FOR   53100042
.*                                 SINGLE BIT ITEMS IN WHICH CASE THE   53160042
.*                                 MASK WILL BE SET ACCORDING TO THE    53220042
.*                                 OFF BYTE BIT DISPLACEMENT OF THE     53280042
.*                                 ITEM AS DEFINED BY THE MACRO 'DSGEN' 53340042
         GBLA  &COUNTR,&ITEMNBR,&BITS(3000),&SHIFT(3000)                53400042
         GBLC  &ITEM(3000),&DSECT                                       53460042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&M,&BITNBR                           53520042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           53580042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   53640042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      53700042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  53760042
         MNOTE *,'LOGITEM NOT FOUND'                                    53820042
         MEXIT                                                          53880042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           53940042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             54000042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              54060042
         AIF   (&IBITS EQ 1).FORM1      TEST FOR OLD FORM               54120042
         AIF   ('&MASK' NE '').FORM1    TEST FOR MASK                   54180042
         AIF   (&IBITS+&ISHIFT GT 8).MSG     TEST FOR MORE THAN EIGHT   54240042
         DC    AL.1(0),AL.3(&ISHIFT),AL.4(&IBITS)                       54300042
         DC    AL1(0)                                                   54360042
         AGO   .ITEM                                                    54420042
.MSG     MNOTE '**BITS GREATER THAN 8**'                                54480042
         MEXIT                                                          54540042
.FORM1   ANOP                                                           54600042
         DC    AL1(0)                                                   54660042
         AIF   ('&MASK' EQ '').FORM                                     54720042
         DC    B'&MASK'                                                 54780042
         AGO   .ITEM                                                    54840042
.FORM    ANOP                                                           54900042
&BITNBR  SETA  &ISHIFT-7                                                54960042
&BITNBR  SETA  0-&BITNBR                                                55020042
&M       SETA  1                                                        55080042
.LOOP2   ANOP                                                           55140042
         AIF   (&BITNBR EQ 0).GOTIT                                     55200042
&M       SETA  &M*2                                                     55260042
&BITNBR  SETA  &BITNBR-1                                                55320042
         AGO   .LOOP2                                                   55380042
.GOTIT   ANOP                                                           55440042
         DC    AL1(&M)                                                  55500042
.ITEM    DC    AL2(&LOGITEM-&DSECT)                                     55560042
         DC    AL2(&COUNTR)                                             55620042
&COUNTR  SETA  &COUNTR+1                                                55680042
         MEND                                                           55740042
** THIS MODULE SUPPORTS ARGONAUT DEVICE ---                             55800042
         GBLC  &DSECT,&CSECT                                            55860042
&CSECT   SETC  'IFCSXXXF'          ALIAS IFCST00C                       55920042
&DSECT   SETC  'RECORD'                                                 55980042

               (SYSREL,8),              SYSTEM & RELEASE LEVEL         X56280042

         DSGEN (JOBID,64),              JOB NAME                       X57060042

         ORG   JOBID                                                    57840042
         DSGEN (DEVCUA,16),             DEV CHAN & UNIT ADDR           X57900042
               (SPARE,16),              SPACE (2 BYTES)                X57960042
               (SENSE01,64),            SENSE INFO  1                  X58020042
               (SENSE02,64),            SENSE INFO  2                  X58080042

               (PAPERPRS,16),           PAPER PROCESD                  X59100042
               (SERIALNO,16)            SERIAL NO.                      59160042
         TITLE 'IF C S X X X F    SUMMARY TABLE FOR      PRINTER'       59220042
         ORG   CSW+5                                                    59280042
         DSGEN (DUMMY,4),                                              X59340042
               (CDCK,1),                CHAN DATA CK                   X59400042

               (CHCK,1)                 CHAIN CK                        59580042
         DSGEN (SNS,8,EQU,SNS00)        EQUATE FOR PTR SET-UP           59640042
IFCSXXXF CSECT                                                          59700042
         USING RECORD,R2                                                59760042
         USING *,R9                                                     59820042
         DC    A(ENTRY)                 PTR TO SUM ENTRIES              59880042
         DC    A(PEDIT)                 PTR TO EDIT TABLE               59940042
REG8     DC    F'0'                     PTR TO ACTIVE ENTRY             60000042
SCSIZE   DC    AL2(JUB#)                # OF 2 BYTE COUNTERS   @Y17CSWT 60060042
R0       EQU   0                                                        60120042
R1       EQU   1                                                        60180042
R2       EQU   2                                                        60240042

R12      EQU   12                                                       60840042

R14      EQU   14                                                       60960042
