         MACRO                                                          70320002
         SUM   &LOGITEM,&MASK                                           70400002
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES A NORMAL EDIT ENTRY  70480002
.*                                 FOR PROCESSING BY THE SUMMARY MODULE 70560002
.*                            &LOGITEM - NAME OF DATA ITEM TO BE SUMMED 70640002
.*                            &MASK - BYTE MASK FOR BITS TO BE TESTED.  70720002
.*                                 THIS OPERAND SHOULD BE OMITTED FOR   70800002
.*                                 SINGLE BIT ITEMS IN WHICH CASE THE   70880002
.*                                 MASK WILL BE SET ACCORDING TO THE    70960002
.*                                 OFF BYTE BIT DISPLACEMENT OF THE     71040002
.*                                 ITEM AS DEFINED BY THE MACRO 'DSGEN' 71120002
         GBLA  &COUNTR,&ITEMNBR,&BITS(3000),&SHIFT(3000)                71200002
         GBLC  &ITEM(3000),&DSECT                                       71280002
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&M,&BITNBR                           71360002
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           71440002
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   71520002
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      71600002
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  71680002
         MNOTE *,'LOGITEM NOT FOUND'                                    71760002
         MEXIT                                                          71840002
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           71920002
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             72000002
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              72080002
         AIF   (&IBITS EQ 1).FORM1      TEST FOR OLD FORM               72160002
         AIF   ('&MASK' NE '').FORM1    TEST FOR MASK                   72240002
         AIF   (&IBITS+&ISHIFT GT 8).MSG     TEST FOR MORE THAN EIGHT   72320002
         DC    AL.1(0),AL.3(&ISHIFT),AL.4(&IBITS)                       72400002
         DC    AL1(0)                                                   72480002
         AGO   .ITEM                                                    72560002
.MSG     MNOTE '**BITS GREATER THAN 8**'                                72640002
         MEXIT                                                          72720002
.FORM1   ANOP                                                           72800002
         DC    AL1(0)                                                   72880002
         AIF   ('&MASK' EQ '').FORM                                     72960002
         DC    B'&MASK'                                                 73040002
         AGO   .ITEM                                                    73120002
.FORM    ANOP                                                           73200002
&BITNBR  SETA  &ISHIFT-7                                                73280002
&BITNBR  SETA  0-&BITNBR                                                73360002
&M       SETA  1                                                        73440002
.LOOP2   ANOP                                                           73520002
         AIF   (&BITNBR EQ 0).GOTIT                                     73600002
&M       SETA  &M*2                                                     73680002
&BITNBR  SETA  &BITNBR-1                                                73760002
         AGO   .LOOP2                                                   73840002
.GOTIT   ANOP                                                           73920002
         DC    AL1(&M)                                                  74000002
.ITEM    DC    AL2(&LOGITEM-&DSECT)                                     74080002
         DC    AL2(&COUNTR)                                             74160002
&COUNTR  SETA  &COUNTR+1                                                74240002
         MEND                                                           74320002
         GBLC  &DSECT,&CSECT                                            74400002

               (FORMFLSH,32)          FORMS FLASH COUNT                 78640002

               (CHCK,1)                 CHAIN CK                        79200002
         DSGEN (SNS,8,EQU,SNS00)        EQUATE FOR PTR SET-UP           79280002

         DS    0F                                                       84320002
RETURN   LM    R5,R8,REGSAVE            RESTORE REGS                    84400002
SKIP     BR    R14                      RETURN                          84480002
MDRCK    EQU   *                                                        84560002
         STM   R5,R8,REGSAVE            SAVE REGS                       84640002
         TM    CLASRC,X90               MDR RECORD ?                    84720002
         BNO   RETURN                   NO, BR TO RETURN                84800002
         XC    ENTRYNO(L2),ENTRYNO      ZERO ENTRY NO. FIELD            84880002
         LR    R5,R3                    GET CTR PTR                     84960002
         BAL   R8,ADDUP                 GO ADD TO MDR CTR               85040002
         B    RETURN                 RETURN                             85120002
ADDUP    EQU   *                                                        85200002
         LH    R6,L0(R5)                LOAD SUM CTR                    85280002
         LA    R6,L1(R6)                ADD ONE TO CTR                  85360002
         STH   R6,L0(R5)                SAVE CTR                        85440002
         LA    R5,L2(R5)                BUMP SUM CTR PTR                85520002
         BR    R8                       RETURN                          85600002
OBRCNT   DS    0H                                                       85680002
         STM   R5,R8,REGSAVE            SAVE REGS                       85760002
         TM    CLASRC,X90               MDR RECORD ?                    85840002
         BO    RETURN                   YES, RETURN                     85920002
         LR    R5,R3                    GET COUNTER PTR                 86000002
         TM    SWITCH1,X20              OBR SHORT RECORD ?              86080002
         BNO   OBRLNG                   NO,BRANCH TO LONG               86160002
         BAL   R8,ADDUP                 YES, BR TO BUMP CTR             86240002
         LA    R5,L2(R5)               BUMP POINTER                     86320002
*        LA    R8,SHORTOBR-L6          GET ADDR FOR SHORT CTR START     86400002
*        ST    R8,REG8                 PUT IT IN THE POINTER            86480002
*        MVC   DEVTYPE(L8),JOBID       GET DEV TYPE,SDR CTR,CUA         86560002
*        MVC   SDR00(L8),FAILCCW       GET SDR INFO                     86640002
*                                      MAKING SHORT RECORD LOOK LONG    86720002
         B     RETURN                   RETURN                          86800002
OBRLNG   DS    0H                                                       86880002
         LA    R5,L2(R5)                BUMP CTR PTR                    86960002
         BAL   R8,ADDUP                 GO ADD TO CTR                   87040002
         B     RETURN                   RETURN                          87120002
XDATE1   DS    0H                                                       87200002
         STM   R5,R8,REGSAVE            SAVE REGS                       87280002
         CLC   DATE(L4),X00             IS DATE 0 ?                     87360002
         BE    RETURN                   YES, BR                         87440002
         CLC   L0(L4,R3),X00            IS LO DATE / ?                  87520002
         BNE   XDATE2                   NO, BR                          87600002
         MVC   L0(L4,R3),DATE           MOVE DATE IN                    87680002
XDATE2   EQU   *                                                        87760002
         CLC   DATE(L4),L0(R3)          CHECK FOR LO DATE               87840002
         BL    SAVELOW                  IT IS LOWER, BRANCH             87920002
         CLC   DATE(L4),L4(R3)          CHECK FOR HI DATE               88000002
         BNH   RETURN                   IT IS IN BETWEEN, BR            88080002
         MVC   L4(L4,R3),DATE           IT IS HIGHER, SAVE IT           88160002
         B     RETURN                   RETURN                          88240002
SAVELOW  EQU   *                                                        88320002
         MVC   L0(L4,R3),DATE           IT IS LO, SAVE IT               88400002
         B     RETURN                   RETURN                          88480002
ENTRY    DS    0F                                                       88560002
         SPECIAL XDATE1,0,SPACE=4                                       88640002
         SPECIAL MDRCK,0,SPACE=2                                        88720002
         SPECIAL OBRCNT,0,SPACE=2                                       88800002
         DC    XL1'FF'                  END OF SUM SECTION              88880002
PEDIT    DS    0F                                                       88960002
&DSECT   SETC  'OAKCTR'                                                 89040002

RETURN1  LM    R5,R8,REGSAVE1           RESTORE REGS                    91760002

SETCPUNO EQU   *                                                        91920002
         STM   R5,R8,REGSAVE1           SAVE REGS                       92000002
         SR    R5,R5                    ZERO R5                         92080002
         IC    R5,L0(R4)                PICK UP CPU TYPE                92160002
         SLL   R5,L8                      V                             92240002
         IC    R5,L1(R4)                  V                             92320002
         LTR   R5,R5                    IS IT ZERO ?                    92400002
         BNZ   RETURN1                  NO, BRANCH                      92480002
         LA    R6,L46                   BACK UP POINTER 46 BYTES        92560002
         SR    R3,R6                     TO PUT IN NEW INFO             92640002
         MVC   L0(L6,R3),SHARED         SAY MODEL = SHARED     @Z427VLS 92720002
         B     RETURN1                  RETURN                          92880002
SETDATE  EQU   *                                                        92960002
         UNPK  WORK(L8),L0(L4,R4)       UNPACK A DATE                   93040002
         MVZ   WORK+L7(L1),WORK         MOVE IN ZONE BITS               93120002
         MVC   L0(L3,R3),WORK+L5        MOVE DAY TO PRINT BUFF          93200002
         MVC   L5(L2,R3),WORK+L3        MOVE YEAR TO RPINT BUFF         93280002
         BR    R14                      RETURN                          93360002
SPACE20  EQU   *                                                        93440002
         LA    R3,L19(R3)               BUMP POINTER TO BUFF            93520002
         BR    R14                      RETURN                          93600002
THEND    EQU   *                                                        93680002
         STM   R14,R12,L12(R13)         SAVE REGS                       93760002
         LR    R12,R13                  LOAD SAVE AREA ADDR             93840002
         LA    R13,FSAVE                LOAD MY SAVE AREA ADDR          93920002
         ST    R12,L4(R13)              SAVE CALLERS SAVE AREA ADDR     94000002
         ST    R13,L8(R12)              SAVE MY SAVE AREA ADDR @Y17BSPM 94080002
         L     R3,L4(R2)                LOAD ADDR OF NEXT CTR           94130002
         ST    R3,L28(R12)              SAVE POINTER           @Y17BSPM 94180002
         ST    R3,L28(R12)     SAVE ADDR OF NEXT COUNTER       @X060CHW 94200002
         LH    R0,SIZE                  LOAD SIZE OF CTRS               94240002
         LR    R1,R2                    LOAD ADDR OF CTRS               94320002
         FREEMAIN R,LV=(0),A=(1)        FREE CTR STORAGE                94400002
         LTR   R3,R3                    ARE THERE MORE CTRS ?           94480002
         BZ    RETURNF                  NO,RETURN                       94560002
         LR    R2,R3                    LOAD POINTER                    94640002
         LA    R5,PENTRY+L10            LOAD EDIT TBL ADDR              94720002
         ST    R5,YR9PTR                STORE IT FOR EREP CTL           94800002
         LA    R5,LABELS-L1             LOAD LABEL ADDR                 94880002
         ST    R5,YLABEL                STORE IT FOR EREP CTL           94960002
RETURNF  EQU   *                                                        95040002
         L     R13,L4(R13)              LOAD CALLERS SAVE AREA ADDR     95120002
         LM    R14,R12,L12(R13)         RESTORE REGS                    95200002
         BR    R14                      RETURN                          95280002
FSAVE    DC    18F'0'                                                   95360002
SIZE     DC    H'638'                   BYTES OF COUNTERS + 22          95440002

./  ADD  SSI=81350998,NAME=IFCSXXXH
*** THIS MODULE APPLICABLE FOR VS1 W/ SU01, MVS W/ SU27 AND AS SVS ICR  00050002
*** THIS MODULE SUPPORTS 3895 DEVICE --- SUPPORT CODE = G30HIMD         00100002
         MACRO                                                          00150002
         BIN   ,                                                        00200002
.*                                 &SYSLIST(&OP,1) - NAME OF LOG ITEM   00250002
.*                                      RECORD DSECT                    00300002
.*                                 $SYSLIST(&OP,2) - NBR OF SPACES      00350002
.*                                      TO SKIP ON MULTIPLE             00400002
.*                                      PRINT OR NBR OF SPACES          00450002
.*                                      TO BACK UP FROM COLUMN FOR      00500002
.*                                      START OF PRINTING. THE LETTER   00550002
.*                                      B PRECEEDS THE NUMBER (B5) IF   00600002
.*                                      THE LATTER IS DESIRED. OMISSION 00650002
.*                                      OF THIS OPERAND FORCES OPTION 2 00700002
.*                                      WITH BACKUP SPACING EQUAL TO    00750002
.*                                 THE NUMBER OF BITS IN THE ITEM       00800002
.*                                 DEFINITION (VIA MACRO 'DSGEN').      00850002
.*                            A LIMIT OF 15 BITS IS IMPOSED FOR THE     00900002
.*                                 TOTAL NUMBER OF BITS TO PRINT.       00950002
         GBLA  &BITS(3000),&DB,&DT,&INITIAL                             01000002
         GBLA  &ITEMITR,&ITEMFST(20),&ITEMNBR,&ITEMMDX                  01050002
         GBLA  &ITEMNDX(3000),&ITEMXPT                                  01100002
         GBLA  &LABELNR,&LASTCC,&LB,&LBLCTR(100),&LPTR,&LT              01150002
         GBLA  &NRENTS,&SHIFT(3000)                                     01200002
         GBLB  &DIAGITF,&DIAGLIN,&DIAGSET,&DIAGTST,&FSW,&TEST           01250002
         GBLC  &CARRCON,&CSECT,&DSECT,&ITEM(3000)                       01300002
         GBLC  &LABELS(3000),&LBL(100),&NRENTSX                         01350002
         LCLB  &B,&SUB                                                  01400002
         LCLA  &IBITS,&ISHIFT,&K                                        01450002
         LCLA  &TEMP,&T,&OP                                             01500002
         LCLC  &S,&ARG                                                  01550002
          ACTR  500000                                                  01600002
         AIF   (&DIAGTST EQ 0).NOMSG                                    01650002
         AIF   (&INITIAL EQ 0).NOMSG                                    01700002
         AIF   (&DIAGLIN EQ 1).NOMSG                                    01750002
         MNOTE '**NO LINE ASSOCIATED WITH THIS DATA**'                  01800002
*****THE FOLLOWING GENERATED FOR TEST PURPOSES*****                     01850002
*        LINE                                                           01900002
         LINE                                                           01950002
.NOMSG   ANOP                                                           02000002
         AIF   (K'&SYSLIST(1) EQ K'&SYSLIST(1,1)).LOOP                  02050002
&SUB     SETB  1                                                        02100002
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           02150002
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    02200002
&ARG     SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP,1)'                                        02250002
         ITEMFIND &ARG                                                  02300002
         AIF   (&ITEMXPT EQ 0).MEXIT                                    02350002
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&ITEMXPT)                                         02400002
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&ITEMXPT)                                          02450002
         AIF   (&SUB EQ 1).SUB00                                        02500002
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(3)' EQ '').SETT                               02550002
&IBITS   SETA  &SYSLIST(3)                                              02600002
         AGO   .SETT                                                    02650002
.SUB00   AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,3)' EQ '').SETT                           02700002
&IBITS   SETA  &SYSLIST(&OP,3)                                          02750002
.SETT    ANOP                                                           02800002
&T       SETA  &IBITS-1                                                 02850002
&B       SETB  0                                                        02900002
         AIF   (&IBITS GT 0 AND &IBITS LT 16).SUB0                      02950002
         MNOTE '**NO. OF BITS OUTSIDE RANGE OF 1-15**'                  03000002
.MEXIT   MEXIT                                                          03050002
.SUB0    AIF   (&SUB EQ 1).SUBA                                         03100002
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(2)' EQ '').BACKUP                             03150002
&K       SETA  K'&SYSLIST(2)                                            03200002
&B       SETB  ('&SYSLIST(2)'(1,1) EQ 'B')                              03250002
&S       SETC  '&SYSLIST(2)'(&B+1,&K-&B)                                03300002
         AGO   .SUBB                                                    03350002
.SUBA    ANOP                                                           03400002
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,2)' EQ '').BACKUP                         03450002
&K       SETA  K'&SYSLIST(&OP,2)                                        03500002
&B       SETB  ('&SYSLIST(&OP,2)'(1,1) EQ 'B')                          03550002
&S       SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP,2)'(&B+1,&K-&B)                            03600002
.SUBB    ANOP                                                           03650002
&T       SETA  &S                                                       03700002
.BACKUP  ANOP                                                           03750002
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                03800002
         AIF   (&IBITS NE 1 OR &B NE 0).BIN2                            03850002
&TEMP    SETA  &ISHIFT                                                  03900002
         DC    AL.12(&SYSLIST(&OP,1)-&DSECT),XL.4'&TEMP'                03950002
         AGO   .OUT                                                     04000002
         AIF   (&SUB EQ 1).BIN2                                         04050002
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(2)' NE '').BIN3                               04100002
         AGO   .BIN2A                                                   04150002
.BIN2    AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,2)' NE '').BIN3                           04200002
.BIN2A   ANOP                                                           04250002
&B       SETB  1                                                        04300002
.BIN3    ANOP                                                           04350002
         DC    AL.12(&SYSLIST(&OP,1)-&DSECT),XL.4'C'                    04400002
         DC    BL.1'&B',AL.7(&T),AL.4(&IBITS),FL.4'&ISHIFT'             04450002
.OUT     ANOP                                                           04500002
&ITEMXPT     SETA  0                                                    04550002
         AIF   (&SUB EQ 0).OUTA                                         04600002
         AIF   (&OP LT N'&SYSLIST).LOOP                                 04650002
.OUTA    ANOP                                                           04700002
         MEND                                                           04750002
         MACRO                                                          04800002
&NAME    DSGEN ,                                                        04850002
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES ONE DSECT WORD       04900002
.*                                 FORMATTED FOR THE SUBJECT LOG RECORD 04950002
.*                                 EACH OPERAND HAS TWO SUB LISTS. THE  05000002
.*                                 FIRST IS THE NAME OF THE LOG ITEM    05050002
.*                                 WHILE THE SECOND IS THE # OF BITS TO 05100002
.*                                 ALLOCATE FOR THIS ITEM. ITEMS MUST   05150002
.*                                 BE DEFINED CONTIGUOUSLY WITHOUT GAPS 05200002
.*                                 UNUSED BIT GROUPS MUST BE GIVEN      05250002
.*                                 DUMMY NAMES. THE NAMES PROVIDED FOR  05300002
.*                                 THE LOG ITEMS MAY THEN BE USED IN    05350002
.*                                 THE CONVERSION MACRO INSTRUCTIONS.   05400002
         GBLA  &BITS(3000),&DB,&DT,&INITIAL                             05450002
         GBLA  &ITEMITR,&ITEMFST(20),&ITEMNBR,&ITEMMDX                  05500002
         GBLA  &ITEMNDX(3000),&ITEMXPT                                  05550002
         GBLA  &LABELNR,&LASTCC,&LB,&LBLCTR(100),&LPTR,&LT              05600002
         GBLA  &NRENTS,&SHIFT(3000)                                     05650002
         GBLB  &DIAGITF,&DIAGLIN,&DIAGSET,&DIAGTST,&FSW,&TEST           05700002
         GBLC  &CARRCON,&CSECT,&DSECT,&ITEM(3000)                       05750002
         GBLC  &LABELS(3000),&LBL(100),&NRENTSX                         05800002
         LCLB  &ONLY1,&CTIND                                            05850002
         LCLA  &START1,&START2,&END1,&END2                              05900002
         LCLC  &SYMBOL,&EQUSYM                                          05950002
         LCLA  &OP,&COUNT,&BYTE,&EQUCNT                                 06000002
         ACTR  100000                                                   06050002
         AIF   (&ITEMITR EQ 0).START                                    06100002
 MNOTE   20,'DSGEN MACRO OCCURRS AFTER ITEMSORT MACRO HAS BEEN ISSUED.' 06150002
         MEXIT                                                          06200002
.START   AIF   (N'&SYSLIST(&OP+1) LT 3).LOOP                            06250002
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP+1,3)' EQ 'EQU').LOOP     TEST FOR EQU     06300002
  AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP+1,3)' EQ '' OR '&SYSLIST(&OP+1,4)' EQ '').ERR1   06350002
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP+1,3)' GT '&SYSLIST(&OP+1,4)').ERR3        06400002
&START1  SETA  &SYSLIST(&OP+1,3)        GET START COUNT OF 1            06450002
&START2  SETA  &SYSLIST(&OP+1,4)        GET FIRST END COUNT             06500002
         AGO   .SET2A                   BRANCH AROUND                   06550002
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP+1,5)' GT '&SYSLIST(&OP+1,6)').ERR3        06600002
.ERR1    MNOTE '**FIRST SYMBOL CONCATENATION INCOMPLETE**'              06650002
         MEXIT                                                          06700002
.SET2A   AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP+1,5)' EQ ''AND '&SYSLIST(&OP+1,6)' EQ '' X06750002
               ).SET2                   TEST FOR NO SECOND              06800002
  AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP+1,5)' EQ '' OR '&SYSLIST(&OP+1,6)' EQ '').ERR2   06850002
&END1    SETA  &SYSLIST(&OP+1,5)        GET START COUNT OF 2            06900002
&END2    SETA  &SYSLIST(&OP+1,6)        GET END COUNT OF 2              06950002
         AGO   .LOOP                                                    07000002
.SET2    ANOP                                                           07050002
&ONLY1   SETB  1                        INDICATE ONLY ONE CONCATENATION 07100002
         AGO   .LOOP                                                    07150002
.ERR2    MNOTE '**SECOND SYMBOL CONCATENATION INCOMPLETE**'             07200002
         MEXIT                                                          07250002
.ERR3    MNOTE '**START GREATER THAN END CONCATENATION**'               07300002
         MEXIT                                                          07350002
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           07400002
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    07450002
         AIF   (&OP GT N'&SYSLIST).DONE      TEST IF ALL DONE           07500002
&ITEMNBR SETA  &ITEMNBR+1                                               07550002
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,2)' NE '').OK1                            07600002
         MNOTE '**NULL BIT COUNT FIELD**'                               07650002
         MEXIT                                                          07700002
.OK1     ANOP                                                           07750002
&SYMBOL  SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP,1)'                                        07800002
         AIF   ('&SYMBOL' NE '').OK                                     07850002
*              *****     LOG ITEM SYMBOL NOT PROVIDED     *****         07900002
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,3)' NE 'EQU').CNT                         07950002
         AGO   .START                   GET NEXT                        08000002
.OK      AIF   (N'&SYSLIST(&OP) LT 3).NO3    TEST FOR OLD FORMAT        08050002
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,3)' EQ 'EQU').EQU   TEST FOR EQU          08100002
         AIF   (&ONLY1).OK2             TEST FOR ONLY ONE CONCAT        08150002
&SYMBOL  SETC  '&SYMBOL.&START1.&END1'       GET 1 AND 2 CONCAT         08200002
         AGO   .NO3                     BRANCH AROUND                   08250002
.OK2     ANOP                                                           08300002
&SYMBOL  SETC  '&SYMBOL.&START1'        GET 1 CONCATENATED              08350002
.NO3     ANOP                                                           08400002
&SYMBOL  EQU   *+&BYTE                                                  08450002
&ITEM(&ITEMNBR) SETC '&SYMBOL'          GET LABEL IN GLOBAL             08500002
&BITS(&ITEMNBR) SETA &SYSLIST(&OP,2)                                    08550002
&SHIFT(&ITEMNBR) SETA &COUNT-&BYTE*8                                    08600002
.CNT     ANOP                                                           08650002
&CTIND   SETB  1                        SET COUNT INDICATOR             08700002
&COUNT   SETA  &COUNT+&SYSLIST(&OP,2)                                   08750002
&BYTE    SETA  &COUNT/8                                                 08800002
         AIF   (N'&SYSLIST(&OP) LT 3).START  TEST FOR OLD FORMAT        08850002
         AIF   (&ONLY1).TSTST           TEST FOR ONLY ONE CONCAT        08900002
         AIF   (&END1 EQ &END2).TSTST   TEST FOR SECOND END             08950002
&END1    SETA  &END1+1                  INCREMENT COUNT                 09000002
&OP      SETA  &OP-1                    DECREMENT INCREMENT             09050002
         AGO   .LOOP                    GENERATE NEXT                   09100002
.TSTST   ANOP                                                           09150002
         AIF   (&START1 EQ &START2).LPDONE   TEST FOR END               09200002
         AIF   (&ONLY1).NSET1           TEST FOR ONLY ONE CONCAT        09250002
&END1    SETA  &SYSLIST(&OP,5)          RE-INIT SECOND START COUNT      09300002
.NSET1   ANOP                                                           09350002
&OP      SETA  &OP-1                    DECREMENT INDEX                 09400002
&START1  SETA  &START1+1                INCREMENT FIRST COUNT           09450002
         AGO   .LOOP                    GO DO NEXT                      09500002
.LPDONE  ANOP                                                           09550002
&ONLY1   SETB  0                        CLEAR INDICATOR                 09600002
         AGO   .START                   GO TEST FOR MORE SUB-LISTS      09650002
.DONE    AIF   (&COUNT-&COUNT/8*8 NE 0).ERR  TEST FOR MULTIPLE OF EIGHT 09700002
         AIF   (&CTIND EQ 0).END        NO DS IF NO COUNT               09750002
&COUNT   SETA  &COUNT/8                 GET NUMBER OF BYTES             09800002
&NAME    DS    &COUNT.C                                                 09850002
.END     MEXIT                                                          09900002
.ERR     MNOTE '**BIT COUNT FLDS DO NOT TOTAL MULTIPLE OF 8**'          09950002
         MEXIT                                                          10000002
.EQU     AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,4)' NE '').EQU1     TEST FOR NULL LABEL   10050002
.ERR4    MNOTE '**EQU OPERAND OMITTED OR NOT FOUND**'                   10100002
         MEXIT                                                          10150002
.EQU1    AIF   (&SYSLIST(&OP,2) LT 16).EQU2  COUNT OVER FIFTEEN         10200002
*****               THE FOLLOWING STATEMENT                *****        10250002
*****     NUMBER OF BITS EXCEED 15 - DO NOT USE AS BIN     *****        10300002
.EQU2    ANOP                                                           10350002
&EQUCNT  SETA  0                        CLEAR COUNTER                   10400002
&EQUSYM  SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP,4)'        GET EQU OPERAND                 10450002
.EQULOP  ANOP                                                           10500002
&EQUCNT  SETA  &EQUCNT+1                INCREMENT INDEX                 10550002
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&EQUCNT)' EQ '&EQUSYM').EQUOUT  LABEL FOUND?     10600002
         AIF   (&EQUCNT EQ &ITEMNBR).ERR4    ALL TESTED?                10650002
         AGO   .EQULOP                  NO-GET NEXT                     10700002
.EQUOUT  ANOP                                                           10750002
&ITEM(&ITEMNBR) SETC '&SYMBOL'          GET LABEL NAME                  10800002
&BITS(&ITEMNBR) SETA &SYSLIST(&OP,2)    GET NUMBER OF BITS              10850002
&SHIFT(&ITEMNBR) SETA &SHIFT(&EQUCNT)   GET SHIFT COUNT                 10900002
&SYMBOL  EQU   &EQUSYM                  THIS SYMBOL EQUATED             10950002
         AGO   .START                   RETURN FOR NEXT                 11000002
         MEND                                                           11050002
         MACRO                                                          11100002
         CONVT ,                                                        11150002
         GBLA  &BITS(3000),&DB,&DT,&INITIAL                             11200002
         GBLA  &ITEMITR,&ITEMFST(20),&ITEMNBR,&ITEMMDX                  11250002
         GBLA  &ITEMNDX(3000),&ITEMXPT                                  11300002
         GBLA  &LABELNR,&LASTCC,&LB,&LBLCTR(100),&LPTR,&LT              11350002
         GBLA  &NRENTS,&SHIFT(3000)                                     11400002
         GBLB  &DIAGITF,&DIAGLIN,&DIAGSET,&DIAGTST,&FSW,&TEST           11450002
         GBLC  &CARRCON,&CSECT,&DSECT,&ITEM(3000)                       11500002
         GBLC  &LABELS(3000),&LBL(100),&NRENTSX                         11550002
         LCLB  &SUB                                                     11600002
         LCLA  &OP                                                      11650002
         LCLA  &OFFSET,&OUT,&IN,&IND,&IBITS,&ISHIFT                     11700002
.*                                                                      11750002
.*       CONVERT BINARY TO DECIMAL                                      11800002
.*             &NAME IS THE REFERENCE INTO THE DSECT RECORD             11850002
.*             &OUT    IS THE NUMBER OF CHARS TO BE PUT ONTO PRINT LINE 11900002
.*                                      DEFAULT IS FOUR MAXIMUM IS 8    11950002
.*             &IN       IS THE NUMBER OF BYTES AS INPUT                12000002
.*                                      ERROR DEFAULT IS 2 MAXIMUM IS 4 12050002
.*                                                                      12100002
         AIF   (&DIAGTST EQ 0).NOMSG                                    12150002
         AIF   (&INITIAL EQ 0).NOMSG                                    12200002
         AIF   (&DIAGLIN EQ 1).NOMSG                                    12250002
         MNOTE '**NO LINE ASSOCIATED WITH THIS DATA**'                  12300002
*****THE FOLLOWING GENERATED FOR TEST PURPOSES*****                     12350002
*        LINE                                                           12400002
         LINE                                                           12450002
.NOMSG   ANOP                                                           12500002
         AIF   (K'&SYSLIST(1) EQ K'&SYSLIST(1,1)).LLOP                  12550002
&SUB     SETB  1                                                        12600002
.LLOP    ANOP                                                           12650002
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    12700002
&OUT     SETA  4                        .BR NOT NULL ELSE SET TO 4      12750002
         AIF   (&SUB EQ 1).SUBA                                         12800002
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(3)' EQ '').B  TEST FOR NULL INPUT             12850002
&OUT     SETA  &SYSLIST(3)             SET &OUT FROM INPUT              12900002
         AGO   .A                                                       12950002
.SUBA    AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,3)' EQ '').B                              13000002
&OUT     SETA  &SYSLIST(&OP,3)          SET &OUT FROM INPUT             13050002
.A       AIF   (&OUT GT 0 AND &OUT LT 9).B   TEST RANGE                 13100002
.AERR    MNOTE '*** BYTES OUT INCORRECTLY SPECIFIED DEFAULT USED ***'   13150002
&OUT     SETA  4                                                        13200002
.B       AIF   (&SUB EQ 1).SUBB                                         13250002
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(2)' EQ '').LOOP    BRANCH IF NULL             13300002
&IN      SETA  &SYSLIST(2)              .SET &IN FROM INPUT             13350002
         AGO   .BB                                                      13400002
.SUBB    AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,2)' EQ '').LOOP                           13450002
&IN      SETA  &SYSLIST(&OP,2)          .SET &IN FROM INPUT             13500002
.BB      AIF   (&IN GT 0 AND &IN LT 5).D     TEST RANGE                 13550002
.BERR    MNOTE '*** BYTES IN INCORRECTLY SPECIFIED DEFAULT USED ***'    13600002
&IN      SETA  2                                                        13650002
         AGO   .D                                                       13700002
.LOOP    ANOP                           .LOOP TO FIND &NAME IN DSECT    13750002
&IND     SETA  &IND+1                   .SET UP LOOP COUNTER            13800002
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&IND)' EQ '&SYSLIST(&OP,1)').FOUND               13850002
         AIF   (&IND LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP  .TEST FOR END OF DSECT          13900002
         MNOTE '*** LOG ITEM NOT DEFINED ***'                           13950002
         MEXIT                                                          14000002
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           14050002
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&IND)              .SET UP NUMBER OF BITS SPEC     14100002
         AIF   (&IBITS-((&IBITS/8)*8) EQ 0).C  .TEST FOR MULTIPLE OF 8  14150002
         MNOTE '*** DATA NOT DEFINED A MULTIPLE OF 8 BITS ***'          14200002
         MEXIT                                                          14250002
.C       ANOP                                                           14300002
&IN      SETA  &IBITS/8                 .COMPUTE NUMBER OF BYTES        14350002
         AIF   (&IN LT 1 OR &IN GT 4).BERR  .TEST RANGE B IF IN ERROR   14400002
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&IND)             .SET UP FOR TEST OF BYTE BNDR   14450002
         AIF   (&ISHIFT EQ 0).D         .TEST FOR BYTE BNDRY            14500002
         MNOTE '*** DATA NOT ALIGNED ON A BYTE BOUNDARY ***'            14550002
         MEXIT                                                          14600002
.*                                                                      14650002
.D       ANOP                                                           14700002
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                14750002
         DC    AL.12(&SYSLIST(&OP,1)-&DSECT),AL.4(9)                    14800002
         DC    X'&IN',X'&OUT'                                           14850002
&IND     SETA  0                                                        14900002
         AIF   (&SUB EQ 0).OUTA                                         14950002
         AIF   (&OP LT N'&SYSLIST).LLOP                                 15000002
.OUTA    ANOP                                                           15050002
         MEND                                                           15100002
         MACRO                                                          15150002
         ITEMFIND &ARG,&ITFDIAG=                                        15200002
         GBLA  &BITS(3000),&DB,&DT,&INITIAL                             15250002
         GBLA  &ITEMITR,&ITEMFST(20),&ITEMNBR,&ITEMMDX                  15300002
         GBLA  &ITEMNDX(3000),&ITEMXPT                                  15350002
         GBLA  &LABELNR,&LASTCC,&LB,&LBLCTR(100),&LPTR,&LT              15400002
         GBLA  &NRENTS,&SHIFT(3000)                                     15450002
         GBLB  &DIAGITF,&DIAGLIN,&DIAGSET,&DIAGTST,&FSW,&TEST           15500002
         GBLC  &CARRCON,&CSECT,&DSECT,&ITEM(3000)                       15550002
         GBLC  &LABELS(3000),&LBL(100),&NRENTSX                         15600002
         LCLA  &A,&B,&X,&I                                              15650002
         LCLC  &C1,&C2,&S                                               15700002
         ACTR  100000                                                   15750002
&ITEMXPT SETA  0                  INDICATE ITEM NOT FOUND.              15800002
         AIF   ('&ARG' NE '').NORM                                      15850002
         AIF   ('&ITFDIAG' EQ 'OFF'  OR  '&ITFDIAG' EQ 'ON').DIAGSET    15900002
  MNOTE 0,'ITEMFIND - OPERAND (&ITFDIAG) INVALID FOR ITFDIAG KEYWORD.'  15950002
         MEXIT                                                          16000002
.DIAGSET ANOP                                                           16050002
&DIAGITF SETB  ('&ITFDIAG' EQ 'ON')                                     16100002
         MEXIT                                                          16150002
.NORM    AIF   (&ITEMITR GT 0).SORTED                                   16200002
         ITEMSORT                                                       16250002
.SORTED  ANOP                                                           16300002
&I       SETA  &ITEMITR           COMPUTED ITTERATION COUNT.            16350002
&X       SETA  &ITEMMDX           COMPUTED MAXIMUM INDEX.               16400002
&C1      SETC  '&ARG'             ISOLATE SEARCH ARGUMENT.              16450002
&C1      SETC  '&C1'.'       '(1,8-K'&C1) PAD TO FULL 8 CHARACTERS.     16500002
.SRCHUP  ANOP                                                           16550002
&A       SETA  &A+&X              CURRENT TABLE SUBSCRIPT + INDEX.      16600002
&S       SETC  '+'                                                      16650002
         AIF   (&A  GT &ITEMNBR  AND  NOT &DIAGITF).SRCHDN1             16700002
         AIF   (&A  LE &ITEMNBR).SRCH00                                 16750002
&C2      SETC  '*-OVER-*'                                               16800002
&I       SETA  &I-1               DECREMENT ITTERATION COUNTER.         16850002
&X       SETA  &X/2               HALVE INDEX VALUE.                    16900002
 MNOTE *,'&ARG - &C2   ITRCTR = &I   PTR = &A&S &X'                     16950002
         AIF   (&I GE 0).SRCHDWN  IF ITTERATION COUNT NOT EXPIRED.      17000002
.NOFIND  MNOTE  20,' ITEMFIND FAILED FOR NAME  &C1  '                   17050002
         MEXIT                                                          17100002
.SRCH00  ANOP                                                           17150002
&I       SETA  &I-1               DECREMENT ITTERATION COUNTER.         17200002
         AIF   (&I LT 0).NOFIND   IF COUNT HAS GONE TO ZERO.            17250002
&X       SETA  &X/2               HALVE INDEX VALUE.                    17300002
&B       SETA  &ITEMNDX(&A)       GET SUBSCRIPT FROM INDEX TABLE.       17350002
&C2      SETC  '&ITEM(&B)'.'       '(1,8-K'&ITEM(&B))  PAD COMPARAND.   17400002
         AIF   (NOT &DIAGITF).COMPARE                                   17450002
 MNOTE *,'&ARG - &C2   ITRCTR = &I   PTR = &A&S &X   POS = &B'          17500002
.COMPARE AIF   ('&C1' LT '&C2').SRCHDWN   ARGUMENT LOWER, MOVE DOWN.    17550002
         AIF   ('&C1' GT '&C2').SRCHUP    ARGUMENT HIGHER, MOVE UP.     17600002
&ITEMXPT SETA  &B                 FOUND. SET INDEX POINTER FOR RETURN.  17650002
&ITEMFST(&I+1)  SETA  &ITEMFST(&I+1)+1                                  17700002
         MEXIT                                                          17750002
.SRCHDWN ANOP                                                           17800002
&A       SETA  &A-&X              CURRENT POINTER MINUS INDEX VALUE.    17850002
&S       SETC  '-'                                                      17900002
         AIF   (&A LE &ITEMNBR).SRCH00    IF WITHIN BOUNDS OF TABLE.    17950002
.SRCHDN1 ANOP                                                           18000002
&I       SETA  &I-1               DECREMENT ITTERATION COUNTER.         18050002
&X       SETA  &X/2               HALVE INDEX VALUE.                    18100002
         AIF   (&I GE 0).SRCHDWN  IF ITTERATION COUNT NOT EXPIRED.      18150002
         MNOTE  20,' ITEMFIND FAILED FOR NAME  &C1  '                   18200002
         MEND                                                           18250002
         MACRO                                                          18300002
         ITEMSORT  &DUMMY                                               18350002
         GBLA  &BITS(3000),&DB,&DT,&INITIAL                             18400002
         GBLA  &ITEMITR,&ITEMFST(20),&ITEMNBR,&ITEMMDX                  18450002
         GBLA  &ITEMNDX(3000),&ITEMXPT                                  18500002
         GBLA  &LABELNR,&LASTCC,&LB,&LBLCTR(100),&LPTR,&LT              18550002
         GBLA  &NRENTS,&SHIFT(3000)                                     18600002
         GBLB  &DIAGITF,&DIAGLIN,&DIAGSET,&DIAGTST,&FSW,&TEST           18650002
         GBLC  &CARRCON,&CSECT,&DSECT,&ITEM(3000)                       18700002
         GBLC  &LABELS(3000),&LBL(100),&NRENTSX                         18750002
         LCLA  &R,&ZI,&I,&A1,&A2,&TEMP                                  18800002
         LCLB  &SR,&GOTO,&TB                                            18850002
         LCLB   &SW(4000)                                               18900002
         LCLC  &C1,&C2                                                  18950002
         ACTR   200000                                                  19000002
&A1      SETA  0                                                        19050002
         AIF   (&ITEMITR EQ 0).LOOP0   TEST FOR RE-ENTRY.               19100002
 MNOTE   0,'ITEMSORT MACRO OCCURRS MORE THAN ONCE. TABLE NOT RESORTED.' 19150002
         MEXIT                                                          19200002
.LOOP0   ANOP                                                           19250002
&A1      SETA  &A1+1                                                    19300002
&ITEMNDX(&A1) SETA &A1                                                  19350002
         AIF   (&A1 LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP0                                  19400002
         AIF   (&ITEMNBR LT 2).MEXIT                                    19450002
&A1      SETA  &ITEMNBR/2         HALF OF TOTAL ENTRIES.                19500002
&A2      SETA  0                                                        19550002
.LOOP1   ANOP                                                           19600002
&A2      SETA  &A2+1                                                    19650002
&SW(&A2) SETB  1                  SET FIRST HALF OF SWITCHES TO 1.      19700002
         AIF   (&A2 LT &A1).LOOP1                                       19750002
.LOOP2   ANOP                                                           19800002
&A2      SETA  &A2+1                                                    19850002
&SW(&A2) SETB  0                  SET SECOND HALF TO ZERO.              19900002
         AIF   (&A2 LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP2                                  19950002
&R       SETA  0                  SET R TO FIRST TRIAL ITEM.            20000002
&ZI      SETA  &ITEMNBR-1         SET ZI TO LAST ITEM.                  20050002
&I       SETA  &ZI-1                                                    20100002
.T3      ANOP                                                           20150002
&SR      SETB  (&SW(&R+1))        GET FLAG, WHICH WAY TO GO?            20200002
&R       SETA  (&R*2)+1+&SR       R=2R+(1 OR 2)                         20250002
         AIF   (&R LE &I).T3                                            20300002
.T4      ANOP                                                           20350002
&R       SETA  (&R-1)/2           R=(R-1)/2                             20400002
&SR      SETB  (&SW(&R+1))        GET SUBTREE SELECT FLAG.              20450002
         AIF   (&SR EQ 0).T7                                            20500002
         AIF   (&GOTO EQ 0).T5                                          20550002
.T7      ANOP                                                           20600002
&A1      SETA  &ITEMNDX(&R+1)                                           20650002
&A2      SETA  &ITEMNDX(&ZI+1)                                          20700002
&C1      SETC  '&ITEM(&A1)'.'       '(1,8-K'&ITEM(&A1))                 20750002
&C2      SETC  '&ITEM(&A2)'.'       '(1,8-K'&ITEM(&A2))                 20800002
         AIF   ('&C1' LT '&C2').T8                                      20850002
.T9      ANOP                                                           20900002
&TEMP    SETA  &ITEMNDX(&R+1)     Z(R) TO TEMP.                         20950002
&TB      SETB  (&SW(&R+1))                                              21000002
&ITEMNDX(&R+1) SETA &ITEMNDX(&ZI+1)    Z(I) TO Z(R)                     21050002
&SW(&R+1) SETB (&SW(&ZI+1))                                             21100002
&ITEMNDX(&ZI+1) SETA &TEMP        TEMP TO Z(I)                          21150002
&SW(&ZI+1) SETB (&TB)                                                   21200002
&SR      SETB  (&SR EQ 0)                                               21250002
&SW(&R+1) SETB (&SR)                                                    21300002
.T8      AIF   (&R GT 0).T4                                             21350002
&GOTO    SETB  1                  SET 'GO TO' T7                        21400002
&ZI      SETA  &ZI-1                                                    21450002
&I       SETA  &I-1                                                     21500002
         AIF   (&I GE 0).T3                                             21550002
.MEXIT   ANOP                                                           21600002
&ITEMITR SETA 1                                                         21650002
&ITEMMDX SETA 1                                                         21700002
.ITRLOOP ANOP                                                           21750002
&ITEMITR SETA &ITEMITR+1                                                21800002
&ITEMMDX SETA &ITEMMDX+&ITEMMDX                                         21850002
         AIF  (&ITEMMDX LT &ITEMNBR).ITRLOOP                            21900002
&ITEMITR SETA &ITEMITR-1                                                21950002
&ITEMMDX SETA &ITEMMDX/2                                                22000002
&A1      SETA &ITEMNBR                                                  22050002
&A2      SETA &ITEMMDX                                                  22100002
&TEMP    SETA &ITEMITR                                                  22150002
 MNOTE *,' ITEMS = &A1, MAX INDEX = &A2, ITTERATION COUNT = &TEMP'      22200002
         MEXIT                                                          22250002
.T5      ANOP                                                           22300002
&TEMP    SETA  &ITEMNDX(&R+1)     Z(R) TO TEMP.                         22350002
&TB      SETB  (&SW(&R+1))                                              22400002
&ITEMNDX(&R+1) SETA &ITEMNDX(&ZI+1)    Z(I) TO Z(R)                     22450002
&SW(&R+1) SETB (&SW(&ZI+1))                                             22500002
&ITEMNDX(&ZI+1) SETA &TEMP        TEMP TO Z(I)                          22550002
&SW(&ZI+1) SETB (&TB)                                                   22600002
&SR      SETB  (&SR EQ 0)                                               22650002
&SW(&R+1) SETB (&SR)                                                    22700002
         AGO   .T3                                                      22750002
         MEND                                                           22800002
           MACRO                                                        22850002
&NAME    LABEL &LABEL1,&LABEL2,&LABEL3,&LABEL4,&LABEL5,&LABEL6,        C22900002
               &LABEL7,&LABEL8                                          22950002
.*                                 THIS MACRO ALLOWS LABELS TO          23000002
.*                                 BE SPECIFIED FOR A GIVEN LINE. THE   23050002
.*                                 LABELS SHOULD BE ENCLOSED IN QUOTA-  23100002
.*                                 TION MARKS. THE COLUMN AND LINE END  23150002
.*                                 CONTROLS WILL BE INSERTED BY THE     23200002
.*                                 MACRO. OMITTED OPERANDS MEAN NO      23250002
.*                                 LABEL REQUIRED FOR RESPECTIVE        23300002
.*                                 COLUMN.                              23350002
         GBLA  &BITS(3000),&DB,&DT,&INITIAL                             23400002
         GBLA  &ITEMITR,&ITEMFST(20),&ITEMNBR,&ITEMMDX                  23450002
         GBLA  &ITEMNDX(3000),&ITEMXPT                                  23500002
         GBLA  &LABELNR,&LASTCC,&LB,&LBLCTR(100),&LPTR,&LT              23550002
         GBLA  &NRENTS,&SHIFT(3000)                                     23600002
         GBLB  &DIAGITF,&DIAGLIN,&DIAGSET,&DIAGTST,&FSW,&TEST           23650002
         GBLC  &CARRCON,&CSECT,&DSECT,&ITEM(3000)                       23700002
         GBLC  &LABELS(3000),&LBL(100),&NRENTSX                         23750002
         LCLC  &MARGIN,&TACK                                            23800002
         LCLC  &TEXT                                                    23850002
         LCLA  &OP,&K,&START,&NRCHAR,&REMAIN                            23900002
         AIF   (&INITIAL EQ 0).DIAGCLR                                  23950002
         AIF   (&DIAGTST EQ 0).DIAGCLR                                  24000002
         AIF   (&DIAGLIN EQ 1).DIAGCLR                                  24050002
         MNOTE '**NO LINE ASSOCIATED WITH PREVIOUS LABEL**'             24100002
***** THE FOLLOWING GENERATED FOR TEST PURPOSES *****                   24150002
*        LINE                                                           24200002
         LINE                                                           24250002
.DIAGCLR ANOP                                                           24300002
&DIAGSET SETB  0                                                        24350002
&DIAGLIN SETB  0                                                        24400002
&MARGIN  SETC  '*'                                                      24450002
         AIF   ('&NAME' EQ '').LOOPOUT                                  24500002
&LPTR    SETA  &LPTR+1                                                  24550002
&LBL(&LPTR) SETC '&NAME'                                                24600002
&LBLCTR(&LPTR) SETA &LABELNR+1                                          24650002
.LOOPOUT ANOP                                                           24700002
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    24750002
&K       SETA  K'&SYSLIST(&OP)                                          24800002
         AIF (&K GE 2).NORM                                             24850002
&K       SETA  2                                                        24900002
.NORM    ANOP                                                           24950002
&START   SETA  2                                                        25000002
         AIF (&OP LT N'&SYSLIST).NOTLAST                                25050002
&MARGIN  SETC  '$'                                                      25100002
.NOTLAST ANOP                                                           25150002
&NRCHAR  SETA  8                                                        25200002
&TACK    SETC  ''                                                       25250002
.LOOPIN  ANOP                                                           25300002
&REMAIN  SETA  &K-&START                                                25350002
         AIF (&REMAIN GE 8).MORE                                        25400002
&TACK    SETC  '&MARGIN'                                                25450002
&NRCHAR  SETA  &REMAIN                                                  25500002
.MORE    ANOP                                                           25550002
&TEXT    SETC  ''                                                       25600002
         AIF (&REMAIN EQ 0).ENDTEXT                                     25650002
&TEXT    SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP)'(&START,&NRCHAR)                          25700002
.ENDTEXT ANOP                                                           25750002
&LABELNR SETA  &LABELNR+1                                               25800002
&LABELS(&LABELNR) SETC '&TEXT'.'&TACK'                                  25850002
&START   SETA  &START+8                                                 25900002
         AIF ('&TACK' EQ '').LOOPIN                                     25950002
         AIF ('&TACK' EQ '*').LOOPOUT                                   26000002
         MEND                                                           26050002
         MACRO                                                          26100002
&NAME    LINE  &DATA,&LABEL,&SKIP=                                      26150002
.*                            THIS MACRO ESTABLISHES THE MARGINS OR     26200002
.*                                 COLUMN SETTINGS FOR EACH LINE. IT    26250002
.*                                 GENERATES NECESSARY CARRIAGE CONTROL 26300002
.*                                 ENTRIES. LASTLY IT DETERMINES THE    26350002
.*                                 NUMBER OF ENTRIES ASSOCIATED WITH    26400002
.*                                 THE PREVIOUS LINE AND STORES THAT #  26450002
.*                                 INTO THE APPROPRIATE BYTE.           26500002
.*                            &DATA(1) - CHARACTER POSITION TO BEGIN    26550002
.*                                 DATA.                                26600002
.*                            &DATA(2) - # OF SPACES BETWEEN SUCCESSIVE 26650002
.*                                 DATA COLUMN STARTING CHARACTERS.     26700002
.*                            &LABEL(1) - CHAR. POS. TO BEGIN LABELS.   26750002
.*                            &LABEL(2) - # SPACES BETWEEN LINE'S LABEL 26800002
.*                                 STARTING CHARACTERS.                 26850002
.*                            &SKIP= - # OF LINES TO ADVANCE CARRIAGE   26900002
.*                                 TO BEGIN NEXT PRINTED LINE.          26950002
.*                            NEW ENTRIES ARE GENERATED ONLY WHEN       27000002
.*                                 NECESSARY. OMISSION OF ITEMS MEANS   27050002
.*                                 THEY HAVE NOT CHANGED SINCE PREVIOUS 27100002
.*                                 SETTINGS. A LINE MACRO IS REQUIRED   27150002
.*                                 FOR EACH PRINTED LINE. IF NO SETTING 27200002
.*                                 CHANGES ARE REQUIRED ALL OPERANDS    27250002
.*                                 ARE OMITTED IN WHICH CASE ONLY THE   27300002
.*                                 # OF ENTRIES FOR THE PREVIOUS LINE   27350002
.*                                 IS COMPUTED. THIS MACRO MUST BE THE  27400002
.*                                 FIRST MACRO INSTRUCTION ISSUED FOR   27450002
.*                                 THE SUBJECT LINE                     27500002
         GBLA  &BITS(3000),&DB,&DT,&INITIAL                             27550002
         GBLA  &ITEMITR,&ITEMFST(20),&ITEMNBR,&ITEMMDX                  27600002
         GBLA  &ITEMNDX(3000),&ITEMXPT                                  27650002
         GBLA  &LABELNR,&LASTCC,&LB,&LBLCTR(100),&LPTR,&LT              27700002
         GBLA  &NRENTS,&SHIFT(3000)                                     27750002
         GBLB  &DIAGITF,&DIAGLIN,&DIAGSET,&DIAGTST,&FSW,&TEST           27800002
         GBLC  &CARRCON,&CSECT,&DSECT,&ITEM(3000)                       27850002
         GBLC  &LABELS(3000),&LBL(100),&NRENTSX                         27900002
         LCLA  &S                                                       27950002
         AIF   (&INITIAL EQ 0 OR &DIAGTST EQ 0).DIAGSET                 28000002
         AIF   (&DIAGSET EQ 0).DIAGSET                                  28050002
         MNOTE '**NO LABEL ASSOCIATED WITH LAST SET**'                  28100002
***** THE FOLLOWING GENERATED FOR TEST PURPOSES *****                   28150002
*        LABEL '%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%'       28200002
               LABEL '%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%' 28250002
.DIAGSET ANOP                                                           28300002
&DIAGSET SETB  1                                                        28350002
&DIAGLIN SETB  1                                                        28400002
&NAME    DS    0C                                                       28450002
         AIF   (&INITIAL EQ 0).FIRSTLN                                  28500002
         LINEND                                                         28550002
         AGO   .NTFIRST                                                 28600002
.FIRSTLN ANOP                                                           28650002
&NRENTSX SETC  'N&SYSNDX'                                               28700002
&INITIAL SETA  1                                                        28750002
N&SYSNDX EQU   *                                                        28800002
.NTFIRST ANOP                                                           28850002
         DC    AL1(0)                                                   28900002
         AIF   ('&DATA(1)' EQ '').CKDTABS                               28950002
         AIF   (&DATA(1) EQ &DB).CKDTABS                                29000002
&DB      SETA  &DATA(1)                                                 29050002
         AGO   .AA                                                      29100002
.CKDTABS AIF   ('&DATA(2)' EQ '').NCDATA                                29150002
         AIF   (&DATA(2) EQ &DT).NCDATA                                 29200002
         AGO   .CC                                                      29250002
.AA      AIF   ('&DATA(2)' EQ '').BB                                    29300002
         AIF   (&DATA(2) EQ &DT).BB                                     29350002
.CC      ANOP                                                           29400002
&DT      SETA  &DATA(2)                                                 29450002
.BB      DC    XL2'FFFE'                                                29500002
         DC    FL1'&DB'                                                 29550002
         DC    FL1'&DT'                                                 29600002
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                29650002
.NCDATA  ANOP                                                           29700002
         AIF   ('&LABEL(1)' EQ '').CKLTABS                              29750002
         AIF   (&LABEL(1) EQ &LB).CKLTABS                               29800002
&LB      SETA  &LABEL(1)                                                29850002
         AGO   .AAA                                                     29900002
.CKLTABS AIF   ('&LABEL(2)' EQ '').NCLABEL                              29950002
         AIF   (&LABEL(2) EQ &LT).NCLABEL                               30000002
         AGO   .CCC                                                     30050002
.AAA     AIF   ('&LABEL(2)' EQ '').BBB                                  30100002
         AIF   (&LABEL(2) EQ &LT).BBB                                   30150002
.CCC     ANOP                                                           30200002
&LT      SETA  &LABEL(2)                                                30250002
.BBB     DC    XL2'FFFF'                                                30300002
         DC    FL1'&LB'                                                 30350002
         DC    FL1'&LT'                                                 30400002
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                30450002
.NCLABEL ANOP                                                           30500002
         AIF   ('&SKIP' NE '').CONT                                     30550002
         AIF   (&TEST EQ 0).NOCHANG                                     30600002
         AGO   .DEFALTA                                                 30650002
.CONT    ANOP                                                           30700002
         AIF   (&TEST EQ 0).AB                                          30750002
         AIF   ('&SKIP' EQ 'E').AB                                      30800002
&S       SETA  &SKIP                                                    30850002
.DEFAULT ANOP                                                           30900002
         AIF   (&SKIP EQ &LASTCC).DEFALTA                               30950002
         ORG   &CARRCON+3                                               31000002
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&S),AL.3(1)                                 31050002
         ORG                                                            31100002
&LASTCC  SETA  &S                                                       31150002
.DEFALTA ANOP                                                           31200002
&TEST    SETB  0                                                        31250002
         AGO   .DD                                                      31300002
.AB      AIF   ('&SKIP' NE 'E').ABB                                     31350002
A&SYSNDX DC    X'FFFB8B00'              EJECT                           31400002
&LASTCC  SETA  184                                                      31450002
&TEST    SETB  1                                                        31500002
         AGO   .ABC                                                     31550002
.ABB     AIF   (&SKIP EQ &LASTCC).NOCHANG                               31600002
A&SYSNDX DC    XL2'FFFB'                                                31650002
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&SKIP),AL.3(1)                              31700002
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&SKIP),AL.3(1)                              31750002
&LASTCC  SETA  &SKIP                                                    31800002
&TEST    SETB  1                                                        31850002
.ABC     ANOP                                                           31900002
&CARRCON SETC  'A&SYSNDX'                                               31950002
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                32000002
.DD      ANOP                                                           32050002
.NOCHANG ANOP                                                           32100002
         MEND                                                           32150002
         MACRO                                                          32200002
         LINEND ,                                                       32250002
.*                                 THIS MACRO IS USED ONLY BY THE LINE  32300002
.*                                 MACRO TO SET THE NUMBER OF ENTRIES   32350002
.*                                 ASSOCIATED WITH EACH LINE.           32400002
         GBLA  &BITS(3000),&DB,&DT,&INITIAL                             32450002
         GBLA  &ITEMITR,&ITEMFST(20),&ITEMNBR,&ITEMMDX                  32500002

         MACRO                                                          33200002
         LSTART ,                                                       33250002
.*                            THIS MACRO IS ISSUED WHEN THE LABEL AREA  33300002
.*                                 OF THE TABLE IS TO BEGIN.            33350002

         MACRO                                                          34850002
