         MACRO                                                          35950002
         SPECIAL &ROUTINE,&PARAM,&SPACE=                                36000002
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES A SPECIAL ROUTINE    36050002
.*                                 ENTRY TO BE PROCESSED BY THE SUM. M. 36100002
.*                            &ROUTINE - SYMBOL ON SPECIAL ROUTINE EWT. 36150002
.*                            &PARAM - AN 8 BIT BINARY REPRESENTATION   36200002
.*                                 TO OCCUPY THE 'MASK' FIELD BUT TO BE 36250002
.*                                 INTERPRETED AS AN ARGUMENT OF THE    36300002
.*                                 SPECIAL ROUTINE.                     36350002
.*                            &SPACE - THE NUMBER OF 2BYTE COUNTERS TO  36400002
.*                                 ALLOCATE FOR REQUIRED PROCESSING.    36450002
         GBLC  &CSECT                                                   36500002
         GBLA  &COUNTR                                                  36550002
         LCLA  &ADD                                                     36600002
         DC    AL1(128)                                                 36650002
         DC    BL.8'&PARAM'                                             36700002
         DC    AL2(&ROUTINE-&CSECT)                                     36750002
         DC    AL2(&COUNTR)                                             36800002
&ADD     SETA  1                                                        36850002
         AIF   ('&SPACE' EQ '').NORM                                    36900002
&ADD     SETA  &SPACE                                                   36950002
.NORM    ANOP                                                           37000002
&COUNTR  SETA  &COUNTR+&ADD                                             37050002
         MEND                                                           37100002
         MACRO                                                          37150002
         HEX   ,                                                        37200002
.*                            THIS MACRO FACILITATES GENERATION OF THE  37250002
.*                                 TABLE ENTRIES SPECIFYING HEX TYPE    37300002
.*                                 CONVERSIONS.                         37350002
.*                            &SYSLIST(&OP,1) - NAME OF DATA ITEM TO BE 37400002
.*                                 CONVERTED                            37450002
.*                            &SYSLIST(&OP,2) - # OF SPACES TO SKIP ON  37500002
.*                                 MULTIPLE PRINT OR NBR OF SPACES TO   37550002
.*                                 BACK UP FROM COLUMN FOR START OF     37600002
.*                                 PRINTING. THE LETTER B PRECEEDS THE  37650002
.*                                 NUMBER (B8) IF THE LATTER OPTION IS  37700002
.*                                 DESIRED. OMISSION OF THIS OPERAND    37750002
.*                                 FORCES OPTION 2 WITH BACKUP SPACING  37800002
.*                                 EQUAL TO THE NUMBER OF BYTES SPECI-  37850002
.*                                 FIED BY THE NEXT OPERAND (TWICE THIS 37900002
.*                                 NUMBER IF SUFFIX IS EXPLICITLY OR    37950002
.*                                 IMPLICITLY B).                       38000002
.*                            &SYSLIST(&OP,3) - NUMBER OF BYTES TO      38050002
.*                                 PROCESS. THIS NUMBER IS SUFFIXED     38100002
.*                                 WITH AN L,R, OR B TO STIPULATE       38150002
.*                                 PRINTING OF THE LEFT HALF, RIGHT     38200002
.*                                 HALF, OR BOTH HALVES OF THE BYTE     38250002
.*                                 RESPECTIVELY. OMISSION OF THIS       38300002
.*                                 OPERAND DEFAULTS TO B WITH THE NUM-  38350002
.*                                 BER OF BYTES EQUAL TO THE ITEM LNGTH 38400002
.*                            A NEW ENTRY IS GENERATED ONLY WHEN NECES- 38450002
.*                                 SARY. THIS MACRO MUST BE THE FIRST   38500002
.*                                 MACRO INSTRUCTION ISSUED FOR THE     38550002
.*                                 SUBJECT LINE(S).                     38600002
         GBLA  &BITS(3000),&DB,&DT,&INITIAL                             38650002
         GBLA  &ITEMITR,&ITEMFST(20),&ITEMNBR,&ITEMMDX                  38700002
         GBLA  &ITEMNDX(3000),&ITEMXPT                                  38750002
         GBLA  &LABELNR,&LASTCC,&LB,&LBLCTR(100),&LPTR,&LT              38800002
         GBLA  &NRENTS,&SHIFT(3000)                                     38850002
         GBLB  &DIAGITF,&DIAGLIN,&DIAGSET,&DIAGTST,&FSW,&TEST           38900002
         GBLC  &CARRCON,&CSECT,&DSECT,&ITEM(3000)                       38950002
         GBLC  &LABELS(3000),&LBL(100),&NRENTSX                         39000002
         LCLB  &B,&SUB                                                  39050002
         LCLA  &IBITS,&ISHIFT,&K,&T,&CODE,&BYTESP,&OP                   39100002
         LCLC  &S,&LETTER,&ARG                                          39150002
       ACTR  500000                                                     39200002
         AIF   (&DIAGTST EQ 0).NOMSG                                    39250002
         AIF   (&INITIAL EQ 0).NOMSG                                    39300002
         AIF   (&DIAGLIN EQ 1).NOMSG                                    39350002
         MNOTE '**NO LINE ASSOCIATED WITH THIS DATA**'                  39400002
*****THE FOLLOWING GENERATED FOR TEST PURPOSES*****                     39450002
*        LINE                                                           39500002
         LINE                                                           39550002
.NOMSG   ANOP                                                           39600002
         AIF   (K'&SYSLIST(1) EQ K'&SYSLIST(1,1)).LOOP                  39650002
&SUB     SETB  1                                                        39700002
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           39750002
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    39800002
&ARG     SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP,1)'                                        39850002
         ITEMFIND  &ARG                                                 39900002
         AIF   (&ITEMXPT EQ 0).MEXIT                                    39950002
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           40000002
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&ITEMXPT)                                         40050002
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&ITEMXPT)                                          40100002
         AIF   (&ISHIFT EQ 0 OR &ISHIFT EQ 4).ALIGN                     40150002
.ERR     MNOTE '**DATA NOT ALLIGNED ON HEX OR BYTE BOUNDARY**'          40200002
.MEXIT   MEXIT                                                          40250002
.ALIGN   ANOP                                                           40300002
&CODE    SETA  1                                                        40350002
         AIF   (&SUB EQ 1).SUBA                                         40400002
&K       SETA  K'&SYSLIST(3)                                            40450002
         AGO   .SUBB                                                    40500002
.SUBA    ANOP                                                           40550002
&K       SETA  K'&SYSLIST(&OP,3)                                        40600002
.SUBB    ANOP                                                           40650002
         AIF   (&K EQ 1).ERR3                                           40700002
         AIF   (&IBITS-(&IBITS/4)*4 EQ 0).OK                            40750002
         MNOTE '**BIT LENGTH SPECIFICATION INCONSISTENT WITH CONTROL**' 40800002
         MEXIT                                                          40850002
.OK      AIF   (&SUB EQ 1).SUBC                                         40900002
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(3)' EQ '').USEDEFN                            40950002
&LETTER  SETC  '&SYSLIST(3)'(&K,1)                                      41000002
&S       SETC  '&SYSLIST(3)'(1,&K-1)                                    41050002
         AGO   .SUBD                                                    41100002
.SUBC    ANOP                                                           41150002
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,3)' EQ '').USEDEFN                        41200002
&LETTER  SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP,3)'(&K,1)                                  41250002
&S       SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP,3)'(1,&K-1)                                41300002
.SUBD    ANOP                                                           41350002
&BYTESP  SETA  &S                                                       41400002
         AIF   ('&LETTER' EQ 'B').BOTH                                  41450002
         AIF   ('&LETTER' EQ 'L').LEFT                                  41500002
         AIF   ('&LETTER' EQ 'R').RIGHT                                 41550002
.ERR3    MNOTE '**PARAMETER 3 INCOMPLETE-DSGEN DEFINITION USED**'       41600002
         AGO   .USEDEFN                                                 41650002
.RIGHT   ANOP                                                           41700002
&CODE    SETA  2                                                        41750002
         AGO   .L                                                       41800002
.LEFT    ANOP                                                           41850002
&CODE    SETA  1                                                        41900002
         AGO   .L                                                       41950002
.USEDEFN ANOP                                                           42000002
&BYTESP  SETA  &IBITS/8                                                 42050002
.BOTH    AIF   (&ISHIFT NE 0).ERR                                       42100002
&CODE    SETA  3                                                        42150002
&T       SETA  &BYTESP*2-1                                              42200002
&S       SETC  '&T'                                                     42250002
.OK2     AIF   (&ISHIFT EQ 0).L                                         42300002
&CODE    SETA  2                                                        42350002
.L       ANOP                                                           42400002
&B       SETB  1                                                        42450002
         AIF   (&SUB EQ 1).SUBE                                         42500002
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(2)' EQ '').BACKUP                             42550002
&K       SETA  K'&SYSLIST(2)                                            42600002
&B       SETB  ('&SYSLIST(2)'(1,1) EQ 'B')                              42650002
&S       SETC  '&SYSLIST(2)'(&B+1,&K-&B)                                42700002
         AGO   .SUBF                                                    42750002
.SUBE    ANOP                                                           42800002
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,2)' EQ '').BACKUP                         42850002
&K       SETA  K'&SYSLIST(&OP,2)                                        42900002
&B       SETB  ('&SYSLIST(&OP,2)'(1,1) EQ 'B')                          42950002
&S       SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP,2)'(&B+1,&K-&B)                            43000002
.SUBF    ANOP                                                           43050002
.BACKUP  ANOP                                                           43100002
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                43150002
         AIF   (&BYTESP GT 0 AND &BYTESP LT 16).SUB0                    43200002
         MNOTE '**NO. OF BYTES OUTSIDE RANGE OF 1-15**'                 43250002
         MEXIT                                                          43300002
.SUB0    AIF   (&SUB EQ 1).SUBG                                         43350002
         DC    AL.12(&SYSLIST(1)-&DSECT),XL.4'A'                        43400002
         AGO   .SUBH                                                    43450002
.SUBG    ANOP                                                           43500002
         DC    AL.12(&SYSLIST(&OP,1)-&DSECT),XL.4'A'                    43550002
.SUBH    ANOP                                                           43600002
         DC    BL.1'&B',FL.7'&S',AL.4(&BYTESP),FL.4'&CODE'              43650002
.OUT     ANOP                                                           43700002
&ITEMXPT     SETA  0                                                    43750002
         AIF   (&SUB EQ 0).OUTA                                         43800002
         AIF   (&OP LT N'&SYSLIST).LOOP                                 43850002
.OUTA    ANOP                                                           43900002
         MEND                                                           43950002
         MACRO                                                          44000002
         SUM   &LOGITEM,&MASK                                           44050002
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES A NORMAL EDIT ENTRY  44100002
.*                                 FOR PROCESSING BY THE SUMMARY MODULE 44150002
.*                            &LOGITEM - NAME OF DATA ITEM TO BE SUMMED 44200002
.*                            &MASK - BYTE MASK FOR BITS TO BE TESTED.  44250002
.*                                 THIS OPERAND SHOULD BE OMITTED FOR   44300002
.*                                 SINGLE BIT ITEMS IN WHICH CASE THE   44350002
.*                                 MASK WILL BE SET ACCORDING TO THE    44400002
.*                                 OFF BYTE BIT DISPLACEMENT OF THE     44450002
.*                                 ITEM AS DEFINED BY THE MACRO 'DSGEN' 44500002
         GBLA  &COUNTR,&ITEMNBR,&BITS(3000),&SHIFT(3000)                44550002
         GBLC  &ITEM(3000),&DSECT                                       44600002
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&M,&BITNBR                           44650002
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           44700002
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   44750002
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      44800002
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  44850002
         MNOTE *,'LOGITEM NOT FOUND'                                    44900002
         MEXIT                                                          44950002
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           45000002
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             45050002
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              45100002
         AIF   (&IBITS EQ 1).FORM1      TEST FOR OLD FORM               45150002
         AIF   ('&MASK' NE '').FORM1    TEST FOR MASK                   45200002
         AIF   (&IBITS+&ISHIFT GT 8).MSG     TEST FOR MORE THAN EIGHT   45250002
         DC    AL.1(0),AL.3(&ISHIFT),AL.4(&IBITS)                       45300002
         DC    AL1(0)                                                   45350002
         AGO   .ITEM                                                    45400002
.MSG     MNOTE '**BITS GREATER THAN 8**'                                45450002
         MEXIT                                                          45500002
.FORM1   ANOP                                                           45550002
         DC    AL1(0)                                                   45600002
         AIF   ('&MASK' EQ '').FORM                                     45650002
         DC    B'&MASK'                                                 45700002
         AGO   .ITEM                                                    45750002
.FORM    ANOP                                                           45800002
&BITNBR  SETA  &ISHIFT-7                                                45850002
&BITNBR  SETA  0-&BITNBR                                                45900002
&M       SETA  1                                                        45950002
.LOOP2   ANOP                                                           46000002
         AIF   (&BITNBR EQ 0).GOTIT                                     46050002
&M       SETA  &M*2                                                     46100002
&BITNBR  SETA  &BITNBR-1                                                46150002
         AGO   .LOOP2                                                   46200002
.GOTIT   ANOP                                                           46250002
         DC    AL1(&M)                                                  46300002
.ITEM    DC    AL2(&LOGITEM-&DSECT)                                     46350002
         DC    AL2(&COUNTR)                                             46400002
&COUNTR  SETA  &COUNTR+1                                                46450002
         MEND                                                           46500002
         GBLC  &DSECT,&CSECT                                            46550002

         STM   R5,R8,REGSAVE            SAVE REGS                       53000002
         TM    CLASRC,X90               MDR RECORD ?                    53050002
         BNO   RETURN                   NO, BR TO RETURN                53100002
         LR    R5,R3                    GET CTR PTR                     53200002
         BAL   R8,ADDUP                 GO ADD TO MDR CTR               53250002

         LA    R8,63            LENGTH OF TWO BYTE COUNTERS    @XA20885 53500001

DOALL    SR    R5,R5               ZERO R5                              53650002
         CH    R5,L0(R6)           ANY DATA IN INPUT?                   53700002
         BE    NXTBYTE             BRANCH IF NO                         53750002
         LH    R5,L0(R6)           GET SUM COUNTER VALUE                53800002
         A     R5,L0(R7)           ADD NEW VALUE                        53850002
         ST    R5,L0(R7)           STORE NEW VALUE IN SUM AREA          53900002
NXTBYTE  LA    R7,L4(R7)           STEP SUM AREA COUNTER                53950002
         LA    R6,L2(R6)           STEP INPUT AREA COUNTER              54000002
         BCT   R8,DOALL            DO ALL SENSE BYTES                   54050002
         LA    R8,112           LENGTH OF ONE BYTE COUNTERS    @XA20885 54054001
         LA    R6,MDRC10        ADDR OF 1 BYTE COUNTERS        @XA20899 54058001
DOALL1   SR    R5,R5               ZERO R5                     @M04AE95 54062002
         ICM   R5,1,L0(R6)         GET VALUE OF COUNTER        @M04AE95 54066002
         LTR   R5,R5               ANY VALUE                   @M04AE95 54070002
         BZ    NXTBYTE1            NO,CHECK NEXT COUNTER       @M04AE95 54074002

         ST    R5,L0(R7)           STORE NEW VALUE IN SUM AREA @M04AE95 54082002

         LA    R6,L1(R6)           STEP INPUT AREA COUNTER     @M04AE95 54090002
         BCT   R8,DOALL1           DO ALL ONE BYTE COUNTERS    @M04AE95 54094002
         B     RETURN              RETURN WHEN FINISHED                 54100002

         BZ    NEXT                                                     55600002

         STH   R4,L0(R6)                                                55750002

XDATE1    DS    0H                                                      57350002
         STM   R5,R8,REGSAVE            SAVE REGS                       57400002
         CLC   DATE(L4),X00             IS DATE 0 ?                     57450002
         BE    RETURN                   YES, BR                         57500002
         CLC   L0(L4,R3),X00            IS LO DATE / ?                  57550002
         BNE   XDATE2                   NO, BR                          57600002
         MVC   L0(L4,R3),DATE           MOVE DATE IN                    57650002
XDATE2   EQU   *                                                        57700002
         CLC   DATE(L4),L0(R3)          CHECK FOR LO DATE               57750002
         BL    SAVELOW                  IT IS LOWER, BRANCH             57800002
         CLC   DATE(L4),L4(R3)          CHECK FOR HI DATE               57850002
         BNH   RETURN                   IT IS IN BETWEEN, BR            57900002
         MVC   L4(L4,R3),DATE           IT IS HIGHER, SAVE IT           57950002
         B     RETURN                   RETURN                          58000002

         BO    OVFLW               BRANCH IF YES                        58200002

         BAL   R8,ADDUP            ADD TO COUNTER              @XA19168 58260001
         B     MDRERR              GO CHECK FOR ERRORS         @XA19168 58270001

         SR    R5,R5                    ZERO R5                         62550002
         IC    R5,L0(R4)                PICK UP CPU TYPE                62600002
         SLL   R5,L8                      V                             62650002
         IC    R5,L1(R4)                  V                             62700002

         B     RETURN1                  RETURN                          63050002

         BO    NOFREEMN                 ALREADY FREED, BYPASS  @XA20701 63970001
         FREEMAIN R,LV=(0),A=(1)        FREE CTR STORAGE                64000002
         MVI   ONETIME,YES              SET ONETIME SWITCH     @XA20701 64010001
NOFREEMN EQU   *                        BYPASS OF FREEMAIN     @XA20701 64020001
         LTR   R3,R3                    ARE THERE MORE CTRS ?           64050002
         BZ    RETURNF                  NO,RETURN                       64100002
         LR    R2,R3                    LOAD POINTER                    64150002
         LA    R5,PENTRY+L10            LOAD EDIT TBL ADDR              64200002
         ST    R5,YR9PTR                STORE IT FOR EREP CTL           64250002
         LA    R5,LABELS-L1             LOAD LABEL ADDR                 64300002
         ST    R5,YLABEL                STORE IT FOR EREP CTL           64350002
RETURNF  EQU   *                                                        64400002
         L     R13,L4(R13)              LOAD CALLERS SAVE AREA ADDR     64450002
         LM    R14,R12,L12(R13)         RESTORE REGS                    64500002
         SR    R15,R15                  PREVENT PRINTING                64550001
         BR    R14                      RETURN                          64560001
FSAVE    DC    18F'0'                                                   64600002
SIZE     DC    H'986'           BYTES OF COUNTERS + 22         @XA20885 64650001
REGSAVE1 DC    4F'0'                    REG SAVE AREA                   64700002
UNIV     DC    C'UNIVERSAL'                                             64750002
NONE     DC    C'NONE  '                                                64800002
WORK     DC    D'0'                     WORK AREA                       64850002
HW0      DC    H'0'                     ZERO FOR CTR COMPARE            64900002
MDRLOC   DC    A(MDR-4)                                        @XA19531 64910001
MDRLAB   DC    A(MDR1-1)                                       @XA19531 64920001
FINISH   DC    A(FIN-4)                                        @XA19531 64930001
FINISH1  DC    A(FIN1-1)                                       @XA19531 64940001
ONETIME  DC    X'00'                    ONETIME(FREEMAIN) SWTCH@XA20701 64943001
YES      EQU   X'01'                    ALREADY FREEMAINED     @XA20701 64946001
PENTRY   DS    0F                                                       64950002
         DC   X'00000000'                                               65000002
         DC   X'00000000'                                               65050002
         DC    A(LABELS)                                                65100002
         DC    H'0'                                                     65150002

FIN1     LABEL ''                                                       84494101
         DC    X'FF'                                                    84495002
         DC    X'0000'                                                  84500002
         DC    X'0000'                                                  84550002
         DC    X'0000'                                                  84600002
         DC    C'$'                                                     84650002

         END                                                            84800002
./  ADD  SSI=73500040,NAME=IFCSXXXX
         SPACE 2                                                        00090042
*  LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO            * 00180042
         MACRO                                                          00270042
&NAME    LINE  &DATA,&LABEL,&SKIP=                                      00360042
.*                            THIS MACRO ESTABLISHES THE MARGINS OR     00450042
.*                                 COLUMN SETTINGS FOR EACH LINE. IT    00540042
.*                                 GENERATES NECESSARY CARRIAGE CONTROL 00630042
.*                                 ENTRIES. LASTLY IT DETERMINES THE    00720042
.*                                 NUMBER OF ENTRIES ASSOCIATED WITH    00810042
.*                                 THE PREVIOUS LINE AND STORES THAT #  00900042
.*                                 INTO THE APPROPRIATE BYTE.           00990042
.*                            &DATA(1) - CHARACTER POSITION TO BEGIN    01080042
.*                                 DATA.                                01170042
.*                            &DATA(2) - # OF SPACES BETWEEN SUCCESSIVE 01260042
.*                                 DATA COLUMN STARTING CHARACTERS.     01350042
.*                            &LABEL(1) - CHAR. POS. TO BEGIN LABELS.   01440042
.*                            &LABEL(2) - # SPACES BETWEEN LINE'S LABEL 01530042
.*                                 STARTING CHARACTERS.                 01620042
.*                            &SKIP= - # OF LINES TO ADVANCE CARRIAGE   01710042
.*                                 TO BEGIN NEXT PRINTED LINE.          01800042
.*                            NEW ENTRIES ARE GENERATED ONLY WHEN       01890042
.*                                 NECESSARY. OMISSION OF ITEMS MEANS   01980042
.*                                 THEY HAVE NOT CHANGED SINCE PREVIOUS 02070042
.*                                 SETTINGS. A LINE MACRO IS REQUIRED   02160042
.*                                 FOR EACH PRINTED LINE. IF NO SETTING 02250042
.*                                 CHANGES ARE REQUIRED ALL OPERANDS    02340042
.*                                 ARE OMITTED IN WHICH CASE ONLY THE   02430042
.*                                 # OF ENTRIES FOR THE PREVIOUS LINE   02520042
.*                                 IS COMPUTED. THIS MACRO MUST BE THE  02610042
.*                                 FIRST MACRO INSTRUCTION ISSUED FOR   02700042
.*                                 THE SUBJECT LINE                     02790042
         GBLA  &DB,&DT,&LB,&LT,&NRENTS                                  02880042
         GBLA  &LASTCC,&INITIAL                                         02970042
         GBLC  &NRENTSX                                                 03060042
         GBLC  &CARRCON                                                 03150042
         GBLB  &TEST                                                    03240042
         LCLA  &S                                                       03330042
&NAME    DS    0C                                                       03420042
         AIF   (&INITIAL EQ 0).FIRSTLN                                  03510042
         LINEND                                                         03600042
         AGO   .NTFIRST                                                 03690042
.FIRSTLN ANOP                                                           03780042
&NRENTSX SETC  'N&SYSNDX'                                               03870042
&INITIAL SETA  1                                                        03960042
N&SYSNDX EQU   *                                                        04050042
.NTFIRST ANOP                                                           04140042
         DC    AL1(0)                                                   04230042
         AIF   ('&DATA(1)' EQ '').CKDTABS                               04320042
         AIF   (&DATA(1) EQ &DB).CKDTABS                                04410042
&DB      SETA  &DATA(1)                                                 04500042
         AGO   .AA                                                      04590042
.CKDTABS AIF   ('&DATA(2)' EQ '').NCDATA                                04680042
         AIF   (&DATA(2) EQ &DT).NCDATA                                 04770042
         AGO   .CC                                                      04860042
.AA      AIF   ('&DATA(2)' EQ '').BB                                    04950042
         AIF   (&DATA(2) EQ &DT).BB                                     05040042
.CC      ANOP                                                           05130042
&DT      SETA  &DATA(2)                                                 05220042
.BB      DC    XL2'FFFE'                                                05310042
         DC    FL1'&DB'                                                 05400042
         DC    FL1'&DT'                                                 05490042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                05580042
.NCDATA  ANOP                                                           05670042
         AIF   ('&LABEL(1)' EQ '').CKLTABS                              05760042
         AIF   (&LABEL(1) EQ &LB).CKLTABS                               05850042
&LB      SETA  &LABEL(1)                                                05940042
         AGO   .AAA                                                     06030042
.CKLTABS AIF   ('&LABEL(2)' EQ '').NCLABEL                              06120042
         AIF   (&LABEL(2) EQ &LT).NCLABEL                               06210042
         AGO   .CCC                                                     06300042
.AAA     AIF   ('&LABEL(2)' EQ '').BBB                                  06390042
         AIF   (&LABEL(2) EQ &LT).BBB                                   06480042
.CCC     ANOP                                                           06570042
&LT      SETA  &LABEL(2)                                                06660042
.BBB     DC    XL2'FFFF'                                                06750042
         DC    FL1'&LB'                                                 06840042
         DC    FL1'&LT'                                                 06930042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                07020042
.NCLABEL ANOP                                                           07110042
         AIF   ('&SKIP' NE '').CONT                                     07200042
         AIF   (&TEST EQ 0).NOCHANG                                     07290042
&S       SETA  &LASTCC                                                  07380042
         AGO   .DEFAULT                                                 07470042
.CONT    ANOP                                                           07560042
         AIF   (&TEST EQ 0).AB                                          07650042
&S       SETA  &SKIP                                                    07740042
.DEFAULT ANOP                                                           07830042
         ORG   &CARRCON+3                                               07920042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&S),AL.3(1)                                 08010042
         ORG                                                            08100042
&LASTCC  SETA  &S                                                       08190042
&TEST    SETB  0                                                        08280042
         AGO   .DD                                                      08370042
.AB      AIF   (&SKIP EQ &LASTCC).NOCHANG                               08460042
A&SYSNDX DC    XL2'FFFB'                                                08550042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&SKIP),AL.3(1)                              08640042
         DC    FL1'9'                                                   08730042
&LASTCC  SETA  &SKIP                                                    08820042
&TEST    SETB  1                                                        08910042
&CARRCON SETC  'A&SYSNDX'                                               09000042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                09090042
.DD      ANOP                                                           09180042
.NOCHANG ANOP                                                           09270042
         MEND                                                           09360042
         EJECT                                                          09450042
         SPACE 2                                                        09540042
*  ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO* 09630042
         MACRO                                                          09720042
&NAME    ROUTINE &LOGITEM,&RNAME                                        09810042
         GBLC  &DSECT,&CSECT                                            09900042
         GBLC  &ITEM(1000)                                              09990042
         GBLA  &SHIFT(1000),&ITEMNBR                                    10080042
         GBLA  &NRENTS                                                  10170042
         LCLA  &ISHIFT,&NDX                                             10260042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           10350042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   10440042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      10530042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  10620042
         MNOTE *,'LOG ITEM NOT DEFINED'                                 10710042
         MEXIT                                                          10800042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           10890042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             10980042
&NAME    DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'D'                           11070042
         DC    AL.4(&ISHIFT),AL.12(&RNAME-&CSECT)                       11160042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                11250042
         MEND                                                           11340042
*  DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO        * 11430042
         SPACE 2                                                        11520042
         MACRO                                                          11610042
&NAME    DSGEN &X1,&X2,&X3,&X4,&X5,&X6,&X7,&X8,&X9,&X10,&X11,&X12,&X13,X11700042
               &X14,&X15,&X16,&X17,&X18,&X19,&X20,&X21,&X22,&X23,&X24, X11790042
               &X25,&X26,&X27,&X28,&X29,&X30,&X31,&X32                  11880042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES ONE DSECT WORD       11970042
.*                                 FORMATTED FOR THE SUBJECT LOG RECORD 12060042
.*                                 EACH OPERAND HAS TWO SUB LISTS. THE  12150042
.*                                 FIRST IS THE NAME OF THE LOG ITEM    12240042
.*                                 WHILE THE SECOND IS THE # OF BITS TO 12330042
.*                                 ALLOCATE FOR THIS ITEM. ITEMS MUST   12420042
.*                                 BE DEFINED CONTIGUOUSLY WITHOUT GAPS 12510042
.*                                 UNUSED BIT GROUPS MUST BE GIVEN      12600042
.*                                 DUMMY NAMES. THE NAMES PROVIDED FOR  12690042
.*                                 THE LOG ITEMS MAY THEN BE USED IN    12780042
.*                                 THE CONVERSION MACRO INSTRUCTIONS.   12870042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000)                                               12960042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000)                         13050042
         LCLC  &SYMBOL                                                  13140042
         LCLA  &OP,&COUNT,&BYTE                                         13230042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           13320042
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    13410042
&ITEMNBR SETA  &ITEMNBR+1                                               13500042
&SYMBOL  SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP,1)'                                        13590042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,2)' NE '').OK1                            13680042
         MNOTE *,'NULL BIT COUNT FIELD'                                 13770042
         MEXIT                                                          13860042
.OK1     ANOP                                                           13950042
         AIF   ('&SYMBOL' NE '').OK                                     14040042
         MNOTE 'LOG ITEM SYMBOL NOT PROVIDED'                           14130042
         AGO   .CNT                                                     14220042
.OK      ANOP                                                           14310042
         AIF   ('&SYMBOL'(1,1) EQ '''').CNT                *TEMP*       14400042
&SYMBOL  EQU   *+&BYTE                                                  14490042
&ITEM(&ITEMNBR)  SETC '&SYSLIST(&OP,1)'                                 14580042
&BITS(&ITEMNBR) SETA &SYSLIST(&OP,2)                                    14670042
&SHIFT(&ITEMNBR) SETA &COUNT-&BYTE*8                                    14760042
.CNT     ANOP                                                           14850042
&COUNT   SETA  &COUNT+&SYSLIST(&OP,2)                                   14940042
&BYTE    SETA  &COUNT/8                                                 15030042
         AIF (&OP LT N'&SYSLIST).LOOP                                   15120042
         AIF   (&COUNT NE 32).NOT32                                     15210042
&NAME    DS    4C                                                       15300042
         MEXIT                                                          15390042
.NOT32   AIF   (&COUNT NE 64).ERR                                       15480042
&NAME    DS    8C                                                       15570042
         MEXIT                                                          15660042
.ERR     MNOTE '**BIT COUNT FIELDS DO NOT TOTAL 32 OR 64**'             15750042
         MEND                                                           15840042
         MACRO                                                          15930042
         LINEND                                                         16020042
.*                            THIS MACRO IS USED ONLY BY THE LINE       16110042
.*                                 MACRO TO SET THE NUMBER OF ENTRIES   16200042
.*                                 ASSOCIATED WITH EACH LINE.           16290042
         GBLA  &NRENTS                                                  16380042
         GBLC &NRENTSX                                                  16470042
         ORG   &NRENTSX                                                 16560042
         DC    FL1'&NRENTS'                                             16650042
         ORG                                                            16740042
&NRENTS  SETA  0                                                        16830042
B&SYSNDX EQU   *                                                        16920042
&NRENTSX SETC  'B&SYSNDX'                                               17010042
         MEND                                                           17100042
         SPACE 2                                                        17190042
         EJECT                                                          17280042
*  LABEL MACRO     LABEL MACRO     LABEL MACRO     LABEL MACRO        * 17370042
         SPACE 2                                                        17460042
         MACRO                                                          17550042
&NAME    LABEL &LABEL1,&LABEL2,&LABEL3,&LABEL4,&LABEL5,&LABEL6,        C17640042
               &LABEL7,&LABEL8                                          17730042
.*                            THIS MACRO ALLOWS UP TO ACHT LABELS TO    17820042
.*                                 BE SPECIFIED FOR A GIVEN LINE. THE   17910042
.*                                 LABELS SHOULD BE ENCLOSED IN QUOTA-  18000042
.*                                 TION MARKS. THE COLUMN AND LINE END  18090042
.*                                 CONTROLS WILL BE INSERTED BY THE     18180042
.*                                 MACRO. OMITTED OPERANDS MEAN NO      18270042
.*                                 LABEL REQUIRED FOR RESPECTIVE        18360042
.*                                 COLUMN. THIS MACRO WILL ALSO ALERT   18450042
.*                                 THE PROGRAMMER TO EXACTLY WHERE THE  18540042
.*                                 TABLE MUST BE BROKEN IF NECESSARY    18630042
.*                                 TO AVOID EXCEEDING THE MAXIMUM LIMIT 18720042
         GBLC &LABELS(2000)                                             18810042
         GBLC  &LBL(100)                                                18900042
         GBLA  &LBLCTR(100)                                             18990042
         GBLA  &LABELNR                                                 19080042
         GBLA  &NRENTS,&LPTR                                            19170042
         LCLC  &MARGIN,&TACK                                            19260042
         LCLC  &TEXT                                                    19350042
         LCLA  &OP,&K,&START,&NRCHAR,&REMAIN                            19440042
&MARGIN  SETC  '*'                                                      19530042
         AIF   ('&NAME' EQ '').LOOPOUT                                  19620042
&LPTR    SETA  &LPTR+1                                                  19710042
&LBL(&LPTR) SETC '&NAME'                                                19800042
&LBLCTR(&LPTR) SETA &LABELNR+1                                          19890042
.LOOPOUT ANOP                                                           19980042
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    20070042
&K       SETA  K'&SYSLIST(&OP)                                          20160042
         AIF (&K GE 2).NORM                                             20250042
&K       SETA  2                                                        20340042
.NORM    ANOP                                                           20430042
&START   SETA  2                                                        20520042
         AIF (&OP LT N'&SYSLIST).NOTLAST                                20610042
&MARGIN  SETC  '$'                                                      20700042
.NOTLAST ANOP                                                           20790042
&NRCHAR  SETA  8                                                        20880042
&TACK    SETC  ''                                                       20970042
.LOOPIN  ANOP                                                           21060042
&REMAIN  SETA  &K-&START                                                21150042
         AIF (&REMAIN GE 8).MORE                                        21240042
&TACK    SETC  '&MARGIN'                                                21330042
&NRCHAR  SETA  &REMAIN                                                  21420042
.MORE    ANOP                                                           21510042
&TEXT    SETC  ''                                                       21600042
         AIF (&REMAIN EQ 0).ENDTEXT                                     21690042
&TEXT    SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP)'(&START,&NRCHAR)                          21780042
.ENDTEXT ANOP                                                           21870042
&LABELNR SETA  &LABELNR+1                                               21960042
&LABELS(&LABELNR) SETC '&TEXT'.'&TACK'                                  22050042
&START   SETA  &START+8                                                 22140042
         AIF ('&TACK' EQ '').LOOPIN                                     22230042
         AIF ('&TACK' EQ '*').LOOPOUT                                   22320042
         MEND                                                           22410042
         SPACE 2                                                        22500042
         MACRO                                                          22590042
         LSTART                                                         22680042
.*                            THIS MACRO IS ISSUED WHEN THE LABEL AREA  22770042
.*                                 OF THE TABLE IS TO BEGIN.            22860042
         GBLC &LABELS(2000)                                             22950042
         GBLA  &LABELNR                                                 23040042
         GBLC  &LBL(100)                                                23130042
         GBLA  &LBLCTR(100)                                             23220042
         LCLA  &NDX,&CTR                                                23310042
         LINEND                                                         23400042
&CTR     SETA  1                                                        23490042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           23580042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   23670042
         AIF   (&LBLCTR(&CTR) NE &NDX).NOLBL                            23760042
&LBL(&CTR) DC  C'&LABELS(&NDX)'                                         23850042
&CTR     SETA  &CTR+1                                                   23940042
         AGO   .LOOPCTL                                                 24030042
.NOLBL   ANOP                                                           24120042
         DC    C'&LABELS(&NDX)'                                         24210042
.LOOPCTL AIF   (&NDX LT &LABELNR).LOOP                                  24300042
         MEND                                                           24390042
         SPACE 2                                                        24480042
*  BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO  * 24570042
         SPACE 2                                                        24660042
         MACRO                                                          24750042
         BIN   &LOGITEM,&SKIP$OR                                        24840042
.*                                 &LOGITEM - NAME OF ITEM IN LOG       24930042
.*                                      RECORD DSECT                    25020042
.*                                 &SKIP$OR - NBR OF SPACES TO SKIP ON  25110042
.*                                 MULTIPLE PRINT OR NBR OF SPACES      25200042
.*                                      TO BACK UP FROM COLUMN FOR      25290042
.*                                      START OF PRINTING. THE LETTER   25380042
.*                                      B PRECEEDS THE NUMBER (B5) IF   25470042
.*                                      THE LATTER IS DESIRED. OMISSION 25560042
.*                                      OF THIS OPERAND FORCES OPTION 2 25650042
.*                                      WITH BACKUP SPACING EQUAL TO    25740042
.*                                 THE NUMBER OF BITS IN THE ITEM       25830042
.*                                 DEFINITION (VIA MACRO 'DSGEN').      25920042
.*                            A LIMIT OF 15 BITS IS IMPOSED FOR THE     26010042
.*                                 TOTAL NUMBER OF BITS TO PRINT.       26100042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000)                                               26190042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000),&NRENTS                 26280042
         GBLC  &DSECT                                                   26370042
         LCLB  &B                                                       26460042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&K                                   26550042
         LCLA  &TEMP,&T                                                 26640042
         LCLC  &S                                                       26730042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           26820042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   26910042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      27000042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  27090042
         MNOTE *,'YOU BLEW IT'                                          27180042
         ROUTINE DUM,SKIPPER                                            27270042
         MEXIT                                                          27360042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           27450042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             27540042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              27630042
&T       SETA  &IBITS-1                                                 27720042
&B       SETB  0                                                        27810042
         AIF   ('&SKIP$OR' EQ '').BACKUP                                27900042
&K       SETA  K'&SKIP$OR                                               27990042
&B       SETB  ('&SKIP$OR'(1,1) EQ 'B')                                 28080042
&S       SETC  '&SKIP$OR'(&B+1,&K-&B)                                   28170042
&T       SETA  &S                                                       28260042
.BACKUP  ANOP                                                           28350042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                28440042
&TEMP    SETA  &ISHIFT                                                  28530042
A&SYSNDX DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'&TEMP'                       28620042
         AIF (&IBITS EQ 1 AND &B EQ 0).OUT                              28710042
         ORG   A&SYSNDX                                                 28800042
&B       SETB  1                                                        28890042
         DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'C'                           28980042
         DC    BL.1'&B',AL.7(&T),AL.4(&IBITS),FL.4'&ISHIFT'             29070042
.OUT     ANOP                                                           29160042
         MEND                                                           29250042
         EJECT                                                          29340042
*  HEX MACRO     HEX MACRO     HEX MACRO    HEXN MACRO     HEX MACRO  * 29430042
         SPACE 2                                                        29520042
         MACRO                                                          29610042
         HEX   &LOGITEM,&SKIP$OR,&BYTES                                 29700042
.*                            THIS MACRO FACILITATES GENERATION OF THE  29790042
.*                                 TABLE ENTRIES SPECIFYING HEX TYPE    29880042
.*                                 CONVERSIONS.                         29970042
.*                            &LOGITEM - NAME OF DATA ITEM TO BE        30060042
.*                                 CONVERTED                            30150042
.*                            &SKIP$OR - NUMBER OF SPACES TO SKIP ON    30240042
.*                                 MULTIPLE PRINT OR NBR OF SPACES TO   30330042
.*                                 BACK UP FROM COLUMN FOR START OF     30420042
.*                                 PRINTING. THE LETTER B PRECEEDS THE  30510042
.*                                 NUMBER (B8) IF THE LATTER OPTION IS  30600042
.*                                 DESIRED. OMISSION OF THIS OPERAND    30690042
.*                                 FORCES OPTION 2 WITH BACKUP SPACING  30780042
.*                                 EQUAL TO THE NUMBER OF BYTES SPECI-  30870042
.*                                 FIED BY THE NEXT OPERAND (TWICE THIS 30960042
.*                                 NUMBER IF SUFFIX IS EXPLICITLY OR    31050042
.*                                 IMPLICITLY B).                       31140042
.*                            &BYTES - NUMBER OF TOTAL INPUT BYTES TO   31230042
.*                                 PROCESS. THIS NUMBER IS SUFFIXED     31320042
.*                                 WITH AN L,R, OR B TO STIPULATE       31410042
.*                                 PRINTING OF THE LEFT HALF, RIGHT     31500042
.*                                 HALF, OR BOTH HALVES OF THE BYTE     31590042
.*                                 RESPECTIVELY. OMISSION OF THIS       31680042
.*                                 OPERAND DEFAULTS TO B WITH THE NUM-  31770042
.*                                 BER OF BYTES EQUAL TO THE ITEM LNGTH 31860042
.*                            A NEW ENTRY IS GENERATED ONLY WHEN NECES- 31950042
.*                                 SARY. THIS MACRO MUST BE THE FIRST   32040042
.*                                 MACRO INSTRUCTION ISSUED FOR THE     32130042
.*                                 SUBJECT LINE(S).                     32220042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000),&DSECT                                        32310042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000),&NRENTS                 32400042
         LCLB  &B                                                       32490042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&K,&T,&CODE,&BYTESP                  32580042
         LCLC  &S,&LETTER                                               32670042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           32760042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   32850042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      32940042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  33030042
         MNOTE *,'LOG ITEM NOT DEFINED'                                 33120042
         MEXIT                                                          33210042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           33300042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             33390042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              33480042
&CODE    SETA  1                                                        33570042
&K       SETA  K'&BYTES                                                 33660042
         AIF   (&IBITS-(&IBITS/4)*4 EQ 0).OK                            33750042
         MNOTE *,'BIT LENGTH SPECIFICATION INCONSISTENT WITH CONTROL'   33840042
         MEXIT                                                          33930042
.OK      AIF   ('&BYTES' EQ '').USEDEFN                                 34020042
&LETTER  SETC  '&BYTES'(&K,1)                                           34110042
&S       SETC  '&BYTES'(1,&K-1)                                         34200042
&BYTESP  SETA  &S                                                       34290042
         AIF   ('&LETTER' EQ 'B').BOTH                                  34380042
         AIF   (&ISHIFT EQ 0 OR &ISHIFT EQ 4).OK2                       34470042
.ERR     MNOTE *,'DATA NOT ALLIGNED ON HEX OR BYTE BOUNDARY'            34560042
         MEXIT                                                          34650042
.USEDEFN ANOP                                                           34740042
&BYTESP  SETA  &IBITS/8                                                 34830042
.BOTH    AIF   (&ISHIFT NE 0).ERR                                       34920042
&CODE    SETA  3                                                        35010042
&T       SETA  &BYTESP*2-1                                              35100042
&S       SETC  '&T'                                                     35190042
.OK2     AIF   (&ISHIFT EQ 0).L                                         35280042
&CODE    SETA  2                                                        35370042
.L       ANOP                                                           35460042
&B       SETB  1                                                        35550042
         AIF   ('&SKIP$OR' EQ '').BACKUP                                35640042
&K       SETA  K'&SKIP$OR                                               35730042
&B       SETB  ('&SKIP$OR'(1,1) EQ 'B')                                 35820042
&S       SETC  '&SKIP$OR'(&B+1,&K-&B)                                   35910042
.BACKUP  ANOP                                                           36000042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                36090042
         DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'A'                           36180042
         DC    BL.1'&B',FL.7'&S',FL.4'&BYTESP',FL.4'&CODE'              36270042
.OUT     ANOP                                                           36360042
         MEND                                                           36450042
         MACRO                                                          36540042
         SPECIAL  &ROUTINE,&PARAM,&SPACE=                               36630042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES A SPECIAL ROUTINE    36720042
.*                                 ENTRY TO BE PROCESSED BY THE SUM. M. 36810042
.*                            &ROUTINE - SYMBOL ON SPECIAL ROUTINE EWT. 36900042
.*                            &PARAM - AN 8 BIT BINARY REPRESENTATION   36990042
.*                                 TO OCCUPY THE 'MASK' FIELD BUT TO BE 37080042
.*                                 INTERPRETED AS AN ARGUMENT OF THE    37170042
.*                                 SPECIAL ROUTINE.                     37260042
.*                            &SPACE - THE NUMBER OF 2BYTE COUNTERS TO  37350042
.*                                 ALLOCATE FOR REQUIRED PROCESSING.    37440042
         GBLC  &CSECT                                                   37530042
         GBLA  &COUNTR                                                  37620042
         LCLA  &ADD                                                     37710042
         DC    AL1(128)                                                 37800042
         DC    BL.8'&PARAM'                                             37890042
         DC    AL2(&ROUTINE-&CSECT)                                     37980042
         DC    AL2(&COUNTR)                                             38070042
&ADD     SETA  1                                                        38160042
         AIF   ('&SPACE' EQ '').NORM                                    38250042
&ADD     SETA  &SPACE                                                   38340042
.NORM    ANOP                                                           38430042
&COUNTR  SETA  &COUNTR+&ADD                                             38520042
         MEND                                                           38610042
         MACRO                                                          38700042
         SUM   &LOGITEM,&MASK                                           38790042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES A NORMAL EDIT ENTRY  38880042
.*                                 FOR PROCESSING BY THE SUMMARY MODULE 38970042
.*                            &LOGITEM - NAME OF DATA ITEM TO BE SUMMED 39060042
.*                            &MASK - BYTE MASK FOR BITS TO BE TESTED.  39150042
.*                                 THIS OPERAND SHOULD BE OMITTED FOR   39240042
.*                                 SINGLE BIT ITEMS IN WHICH CASE THE   39330042
.*                                 MASK WILL BE SET ACCORDING TO THE    39420042
.*                                 OFF BYTE BIT DISPLACEMENT OF THE     39510042
.*                                ITEM AS DEFINED BY THE MACRO 'DSGEN'  39600042
         GBLA  &COUNTR,&ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000)                39690042
         GBLC  &ITEM(1000),&DSECT                                       39780042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&M,&BITNBR                           39870042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           39960042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   40050042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      40140042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  40230042
         MNOTE *,'LOGITEM NOT FOUND'                                    40320042
         MEXIT                                                          40410042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           40500042
         DC    AL1(0)                                                   40590042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             40680042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              40770042
         AIF   ('&MASK' EQ '').FORM                                     40860042
         DC    B'&MASK'                                                 40950042
         AGO   .ITEM                                                    41040042
.FORM    ANOP                                                           41130042
&BITNBR  SETA  &ISHIFT-7                                                41220042
&BITNBR  SETA  0-&BITNBR                                                41310042
&M       SETA  1                                                        41400042
.LOOP2   ANOP                                                           41490042
         AIF   (&BITNBR EQ 0).GOTIT                                     41580042
&M       SETA  &M*2                                                     41670042
&BITNBR  SETA  &BITNBR-1                                                41760042
         AGO   .LOOP2                                                   41850042
.GOTIT   ANOP                                                           41940042
         DC    AL1(&M)                                                  42030042
.ITEM    DC    AL2(&LOGITEM-&DSECT)                                     42120042
         DC    AL2(&COUNTR)                                             42210042
&COUNTR  SETA  &COUNTR+1                                                42300042
         MEND                                                           42390042
         GBLC  &DSECT,&CSECT                                            42480042
&CSECT   SETC  'IFCSXXXX'                                               42570042
&DSECT   SETC  'XTCAM'                                                  42660042
          TITLE 'IFCSXXXX- LINKNAME - IFCSXXXX'                         42750042
IFCSXXXX CSECT                                                          42840042
         USING *,R9                                                     42930042
*                                                                       43020042
*              TCAM  SUMMARY MODULE                                     43110042
*                                                                       43200042
*                                                                       43290042

SETDATE  CLC   DAY(L4),HEX00            IS DATE ZERO                    52830042
         BE    NODATE                   BR-YES                          52920042
         CLC   L0(L4,R3),HEX00          IS THIS FIRST TIME              53010042
         BNE   TESTDTE                  BR-NO                           53100042
         MVC   L0(L4,R3),DAY            MOVE IN DAY                     53190042
SAVEHI   MVC   L4(L4,R3),DAY            TO BOTH HI & LOW CNTRS          53280042
         BE    NODATE                   EXIT                            53370042
TESTDTE  CLC   L0(L4,R3),DAY            TEST FOR LOW                    53460042
         BNH   TESTHI                   BR-SAVED DATE LOW               53550042
         MVC   L0(L4,R3),DAY            NEW DATE LOW                    53640042
TESTHI   CLC   L4(L4,R3),DAY            TEST FOR HI                     53730042
         BL    SAVEHI              BR-SAVED DATE LOW                    53820042
NODATE   BR    R14                      RETURN                          53910042
*                                                                       54000042
*                                                                       54090042
*                                                                       54180042
SETDEV   MVC   L0(L2,R3),DEVTYP2        SAVE DEVTYPE                    54270042
         BR    R14                      RETURN                          54360042
*                                                                       54450042
*                                                                       54540042
TESTMODE STM   R5,R8,SAVEREG            SAVE REGS                       54630042
         TM    CLASRC,HEX32            IS THIS A CONVERTED RECORDS21926 54720042
         BO    TESTCONV                YES                       S21926 54810042
         B     NEWREC                  NO                        S21926 54900042
TESTCONV TM    SBCNT,HEX02             HAS THIS RECORD BEEN CONDENSED   54990042
         BO    NEWREC                  YES                       S21926 55080042
         MVC   SNB11(L2),SNB11+L17      MOVE SENSE OVER SDR      P4954  55170042
NEWREC   TM    TCAMFL,HEX80            TEST FOR INTENSIFIED      S21926 55260042
         BZ    RETURN                   BR-NO                           55350042
         LA    R5,INTVMODE-L6           YES SET PTR TO                  55440042
         ST    R5,R8PTR                 INTENSIFIED SECTION             55530042
RETURN   LM    R5,R8,SAVEREG        RESTORE REGS                        55620042
         BR    R14                                                      55710042

         MVC   TEMPWORK+L2(L2),SIOCNT   GET SIO COUNT          @YA02789 56070042
         L     R5,TEMPWORK                                     @YA02789 56100042
         MVC   TEMPWORK(L4),L0(R3)      GET VALUE TO BEADDED   @YA02789 56130042

         ST    R5,TEMPWORK              SAVE IT                @YA02789 56190042
         MVC   L0(L4,R3),TEMPWORK       SAVE IT                @YA02789 56220042

         AH    R5,L0(R3)                ADD SUM TO IT                   56790042
         STH   R5,L0(R3)                SAVE IT                         56880042
         TM    TCAMFL,HEX60             TEST FOR EOD & OVERFLOW         56970042
         BM    RECDONE                  BR YES                          57060042
         LH    R5,L2(R3)                YES ADD 1 TO PER                57150042

         STH   R5,L2(R3)                SAVE IT                         57330042
         CLI   LDGRAPH,L0          IS IT A LEADING GRAPHIC ERR          57420042

STOREPTR ST    R5,R8PTR            SAVE PTR FOR SUM MODULE              57870042
         B     RETURN                                                   57960042
RECDONE  LA    R5,UNRECEND-L6      SET PTR TO X'FF' TO SIGNAL END       58050042
         B     STOREPTR                                                 58140042
*                                                                       58230042
ADDCR    STM   R5,R8,SAVEREG                                            58320042
         TM    TCAMFL,HEX10        TEST FOR INTIAL SELECT               58410042

         SPECIAL   ADDSIO,0,SPACE=3                            @YA02789 64710042
         SPECIAL    ADDTE,0,SPACE=2               ADD TEMP/PERM ERRORS  64800042
         SUM        SNB17                         ADD LOST DATA BOTH    64890042
         SPECIAL    ADDCR,0,SPACE=2               ADD CMND REJ SEL 0/1  64980042
         SUM        CSWUS8                                              65070042
         SPECIAL    ADDTO,0,SPACE=4               ADD TIME OUT 4 CNTRS  65160042

         SUM        SNB16                         ADD TO OVERUN BOTH    65340042

         SPECIAL    ADDOC,0,SPACE=3               ADD TO DATA CHK BOTH  65520042

*                                                                       65880042

         CLC   LODATE(L4),L30(R8)       CHECK DATE RANGE                73350042
         BNL   FNDTOTSB                 BNOT LOW                        73440042
         MVC   L30(L4,R8),LODATE        MOVE IN LOW DATE                73530042
FNDTOTSB CLC   HIDATE(L4),L34(R8)       TEST HI                         73620042
         BNH   FNDTOTSC                 BR-NOT HI                       73710042
         MVC   L34(L4,R8),HIDATE        MOVE IN HI DATE                 73800042
FNDTOTSC L     R2,FWDPTR                PICK UP CHAIN                   73890042
         LTR   R2,R2                    IS IT ZERO                      73980042
         BNZ   FNDTOTSA                 BR-NO MORE AREAS                74070042
         STH   R3,TOTREC                                                74160042
         ST    R4,TOTSIO                                       @YA02789 74250042
         STH   R5,TOTTE                 HALF WDS IN CORE                74340042
         STH   R6,TOTUNR                                                74430042
         STH   R7,TOTIM                                                 74520042
         LM    R2,R8,SAVEREG                                            74610042
         BR    R14                                                      74700042
*                                                                       74790042
SETCPUNO STM   R5,R8,SAVEREG            SAVE REGS                       74880042
         SR    R5,R5                    CLEAR R5                        74970042
         IC    R5,0(R4)                 PICK UP CPU TYPE                75060042
         SLL   R5,R8                                                    75150042
         IC    R5,L1(R4)                                                75240042
         LTR   R5,R5                    IS IT ZERO                      75330042
         BNZ   RETURNA                  NO                              75420042
         LA    R6,L64                   CORREST DATA POINTER            75510042
         SR    R3,R6                                                    75600042
         MVC   L0(L6,R3),SHARED         MOVE IN SHARED         @Z427VLS 75690042
         B     RETURNA                                                  75870042
*                                                                       75960042
SHARED   DC    C'SHARED'                                       @Z427VLS 76140042
*                                                                       76230042
SETDATE2 UNPK  WORK(L8),L0(L4,R4)                                       76320042
         MVZ   WORK+L7(L1),WORK                                         76410042

         BR    R14                                                      76680042

         BNE   NEXTCHK                                         @XA20610 76860001

         LA    R5,ADDTERM-L4       SET UP TO                            78840042
         LA    R6,ADDLABEL         LOOP THROUGH TBL AGAIN               78930042
CHKMORE  L     R2,FWDPTR           IF ANY CNTRS FOR ANOTHER TERMINAL    79020042
         LTR   R2,R2               EXISTS                               79110042
         BZ    NOMORE              IF NOT END PGM                       79200042
         STM   R5,R6,R9PTR                                              79290042

CHKMORE2 STM   R5,R8,SAVEREG       SAME AS CHKMORE1                     79470042
         LA    R5,ADDGRAP-L4       BUT DOING GRAPHIC SECTION            79560042
         LA    R6,ADDGRPHL                                              79650042

NOMORE   L     R2,SAVE8                                                 79830042
         B     RETURNA                                                  79920042

         LR    R12,R13                                                  80370042
