./  ADD  SSI=63160139,NAME=IFCSXXX1
         TITLE 'IFCSXXX1 - SUM TABLE - LINKNAME=IFCS2540, ALIASES=IFCS1C00080042
               442,IFCS2501,IFCS2520,IFCS2495'                          00160042
         SPACE 2                                                        00240042
*  LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO            * 00320042
         MACRO                                                          00400042
&NAME    LINE  &DATA,&LABEL,&SKIP=                                      00480042
.*                            THIS MACRO ESTABLISHES THE MARGINS OR     00560042
.*                                 COLUMN SETTINGS FOR EACH LINE. IT    00640042
.*                                 GENERATES NECESSARY CARRIAGE CONTROL 00720042
.*                                 ENTRIES. LASTLY IT DETERMINES THE    00800042
.*                                 NUMBER OF ENTRIES ASSOCIATED WITH    00880042
.*                                 THE PREVIOUS LINE AND STORES THAT #  00960042
.*                                 INTO THE APPROPRIATE BYTE.           01040042
.*                                 &DATA(1) - CHARACTER POSITION TO     01120042
.*                                 BEGIN DATA.                          01200042
.*                                                                      01280042
.*                                 &DATA(2) - # OF SPACES BETWEEN       01360042
.*                                 SUCCESSIVE DATA COLUMN STARTING      01440042
.*                                 CHARACTERS.                          01520042
.*                                                                      01600042
.*                                 &LABEL(1) - CHARACTER POSITION       01680042
.*                                 TO BEGIN LABELS.                     01760042
.*                                                                      01840042
.*                                 &LABEL(2) - # OF SPACES BETWEEN      01920042
.*                                 LINE'S LABEL STARTING CHARACTERS.    02000042
.*                                                                      02080042
.*                                 &SKIP= - # OF LINES TO ADVANCE       02160042
.*                                 CARRIAGE TO BEGIN NEXT PRINTED LINE. 02240042
.*                                                                      02320042
.*                                 NEW ENTRIES ARE GENERATED ONLY WHEN  02400042
.*                                 NECESSARY. OMISSION OF ITEMS MEANS   02480042
.*                                 THEY HAVE NOT CHANGED SINCE PREVIOUS 02560042
.*                                 SETTINGS. A LINE MACRO IS REQUIRED   02640042
.*                                 FOR EACH PRINTED LINE. IF NO SETTING 02720042
.*                                 CHANGES ARE REQUIRED ALL OPERANDS    02800042
.*                                 ARE OMITTED IN WHICH CASE ONLY THE   02880042
.*                                 # OF ENTRIES FOR THE PREVIOUS LINE   02960042
.*                                 FIRST MACRO INSTRUCTION ISSUED FOR   03040042
.*                                 THE SUBJECT LINE.                    03120042
         GBLA  &DB,&DT,&LB,&LT,&NRENTS                                  03200042
         GBLA  &LASTCC,&INITIAL                                         03280042
         GBLC  &NRENTSX                                                 03360042
         GBLC  &CARRCON                                                 03440042
         GBLB  &TEST                                                    03520042
         LCLA  &S                                                       03600042
&NAME    DS    0C                                                       03680042
         AIF   (&INITIAL EQ 0).FIRSTLN                                  03760042
         LINEND                                                         03840042
         AGO   .NTFIRST                                                 03920042
.FIRSTLN ANOP                                                           04000042
&NRENTSX SETC  'N&SYSNDX'                                               04080042
&INITIAL SETA  1                                                        04160042
&LASTCC  SETA  1                                                        04240042
N&SYSNDX EQU   *                                                        04320042
.NTFIRST ANOP                                                           04400042
         DC    AL1(0)                                                   04480042
         AIF   ('&DATA(1)' EQ '').CKDTABS                               04560042
         AIF   ('&DATA'(1,1) NE '(').SLABEL                             04640042
         AIF   (&DATA(1) EQ &DB).CKDTABS                                04720042
&DB      SETA  &DATA(1)                                                 04800042
         AGO   .AA                                                      04880042
.CKDTABS AIF   ('&DATA(2)' EQ '').NCDATA                                04960042
         AIF   (&DATA(2) EQ &DT).NCDATA                                 05040042
         AGO   .CC                                                      05120042
.AA      AIF   ('&DATA(2)' EQ '').BB                                    05200042
         AIF   (&DATA(2) EQ &DT).BB                                     05280042
.CC      ANOP                                                           05360042
&DT      SETA  &DATA(2)                                                 05440042
.BB      DC    XL2'FFFE'                                                05520042
         DC    FL1'&DB'                                                 05600042
         DC    FL1'&DT'                                                 05680042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                05760042
.NCDATA  ANOP                                                           05840042
         AIF   ('&LABEL(1)' EQ '').CKLTABS                              05920042
         AIF   ('&LABEL'(1,1) NE '(').SLABEL                            06000042
         AIF   (&LABEL(1) EQ &LB).CKLTABS                               06080042
&LB      SETA  &LABEL(1)                                                06160042
         AGO   .AAA                                                     06240042
.CKLTABS AIF   ('&LABEL(2)' EQ '').NCLABEL                              06320042
         AIF   (&LABEL(2) EQ &LT).NCLABEL                               06400042
         AGO   .CCC                                                     06480042
.AAA     AIF   ('&LABEL(2)' EQ '').BBB                                  06560042
         AIF   (&LABEL(2) EQ &LT).BBB                                   06640042
.CCC     ANOP                                                           06720042
&LT      SETA  &LABEL(2)                                                06800042
.BBB     DC    XL2'FFFF'                                                06880042
         DC    FL1'&LB'                                                 06960042
         DC    FL1'&LT'                                                 07040042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                07120042
.NCLABEL ANOP                                                           07200042
         AIF   ('&SKIP' EQ 'E').EJECT                                   07280042
         AIF   ('&SKIP' EQ '').TESTOFF                                  07360042
.CONT    ANOP                                                           07440042
         AIF   (&TEST EQ 0).AB                                          07520042
         AIF   (&SKIP EQ &LASTCC).TESTOFF                               07600042
&S       SETA  &SKIP                                                    07680042
         ORG   &CARRCON+3                                               07760042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&S),AL.3(1)                                 07840042
         ORG                                                            07920042
&LASTCC  SETA  &S                                                       08000042
.SLABEL  ANOP                                                           08080042
.TESTOFF ANOP                                                           08160042
&TEST    SETB  0                                                        08240042
         AGO   .DD                                                      08320042
.EJECT   DC    XL2'FFFB'                                                08400042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                08480042
         DC    X'8B'              SKIP TO CHANNEL 1                     08560042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&LASTCC),AL.3(1)                            08640042
&TEST    SETB  1                                                        08720042
         AGO   .DD                                                      08800042
.AB      AIF   (&SKIP EQ &LASTCC).NOCHANG                               08880042
A&SYSNDX DC    XL2'FFFB'                                                08960042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&SKIP),AL.3(1)                              09040042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&SKIP),AL.3(1)                              09120042
&LASTCC  SETA  &SKIP                                                    09200042
&TEST    SETB  1                                                        09280042
&CARRCON SETC  'A&SYSNDX'                                               09360042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                09440042
.DD      ANOP                                                           09520042
.NOCHANG ANOP                                                           09600042
         MEND                                                           09680042
         EJECT                                                          09760042
         SPACE 2                                                        09840042
*  ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO* 09920042
         MACRO                                                          10000042
&NAME    ROUTINE &LOGITEM,&RNAME                                        10080042
         GBLC  &DSECT,&CSECT                                            10160042
         GBLC  &ITEM(1000)                                              10240042
         GBLA  &SHIFT(1000),&ITEMNBR                                    10320042
         GBLA  &NRENTS                                                  10400042
         LCLA  &ISHIFT,&NDX                                             10480042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           10560042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   10640042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      10720042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  10800042
         MNOTE *,'LOG ITEM NOT DEFINED'                                 10880042
         MEXIT                                                          10960042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           11040042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             11120042
&NAME    DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'D'                           11200042
         DC    AL.4(&ISHIFT),AL.12(&RNAME-&CSECT)                       11280042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                11360042
         MEND                                                           11440042
*  DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO        * 11520042
         SPACE 2                                                        11600042
         MACRO                                                          11680042
&NAME    DSGEN &X1,&X2,&X3,&X4,&X5,&X6,&X7,&X8,&X9,&X10,&X11,&X12,&X13,X11760042
               &X14,&X15,&X16,&X17,&X18,&X19,&X20,&X21,&X22,&X23,&X24, X11840042
               &X25,&X26,&X27,&X28,&X29,&X30,&X31,&X32                  11920042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES ONE DSECT WORD       12000042
.*                                 FORMATTED FOR THE SUBJECT LOG RECORD 12080042
.*                                 EACH OPERAND HAS TWO SUB LISTS. THE  12160042
.*                                 FIRST IS THE NAME OF THE LOG ITEM    12240042
.*                                 WHILE THE SECOND IS THE # OF BITS TO 12320042
.*                                 ALLOCATE FOR THIS ITEM. ITEMS MUST   12400042
.*                                 BE DEFINED CONTIGUOUSLY WITHOUT GAPS 12480042
.*                                 UNUSED BIT GROUPS MUST BE GIVEN      12560042
.*                                 DUMMY NAMES. THE NAMES PROVIDED FOR  12640042
.*                                 THE LOG ITEMS MAY THEN BE USED IN    12720042
.*                                 THE CONVERSION MACRO INSTRUCTIONS.   12800042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000)                                               12880042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000)                         12960042
         LCLC  &SYMBOL                                                  13040042
         LCLA  &OP,&COUNT,&BYTE                                         13120042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           13200042
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    13280042
&ITEMNBR SETA  &ITEMNBR+1                                               13360042
&SYMBOL  SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP,1)'                                        13440042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,2)' NE '').OK1                            13520042
         MNOTE *,'NULL BIT COUNT FIELD'                                 13600042
         MEXIT                                                          13680042
.OK1     ANOP                                                           13760042
         AIF   ('&SYMBOL' NE '').OK                                     13840042
         MNOTE 'LOG ITEM SYMBOL NOT PROVIDED'                           13920042
         AGO   .CNT                                                     14000042
.OK      ANOP                                                           14080042
         AIF   ('&SYMBOL'(1,1) EQ '''').CNT                *TEMP*       14160042
&SYMBOL  EQU   *+&BYTE                                                  14240042
&ITEM(&ITEMNBR)  SETC '&SYSLIST(&OP,1)'                                 14320042
&BITS(&ITEMNBR) SETA &SYSLIST(&OP,2)                                    14400042
&SHIFT(&ITEMNBR) SETA &COUNT-&BYTE*8                                    14480042
.CNT     ANOP                                                           14560042
&COUNT   SETA  &COUNT+&SYSLIST(&OP,2)                                   14640042
&BYTE    SETA  &COUNT/8                                                 14720042
         AIF (&OP LT N'&SYSLIST).LOOP                                   14800042
         AIF   (&COUNT NE 32).NOT32                                     14880042
&NAME    DS    4C                                                       14960042
         MEXIT                                                          15040042
.NOT32   AIF   (&COUNT NE 64).ERR                                       15120042
&NAME    DS    8C                                                       15200042
         MEXIT                                                          15280042
.ERR     MNOTE '**BIT COUNT FIELDS DO NOT TOTAL 32 OR 64**'             15360042
         MEND                                                           15440042
         MACRO                                                          15520042
         LINEND                                                         15600042
.*                            THIS MACRO IS USED ONLY BY THE LINE       15680042
.*                                 MACRO TO SET THE NUMBER OF ENTRIES   15760042
.*                                 ASSOCIATED WITH EACH LINE.           15840042
         GBLA  &NRENTS                                                  15920042
         GBLC &NRENTSX                                                  16000042
         ORG   &NRENTSX                                                 16080042
         DC    FL1'&NRENTS'                                             16160042
         ORG                                                            16240042
&NRENTS  SETA  0                                                        16320042
B&SYSNDX EQU   *                                                        16400042
&NRENTSX SETC  'B&SYSNDX'                                               16480042
         MEND                                                           16560042
         SPACE 2                                                        16640042
         EJECT                                                          16720042
*  LABEL MACRO     LABEL MACRO     LABEL MACRO     LABEL MACRO        * 16800042
         SPACE 2                                                        16880042
         MACRO                                                          16960042
&NAME    LABEL &LABEL1,&LABEL2,&LABEL3,&LABEL4,&LABEL5,&LABEL6,        C17040042
               &LABEL7,&LABEL8                                          17120042
.*                            THIS MACRO ALLOWS UP TO ACHT LABELS TO    17200042
.*                                 BE SPECIFIED FOR A GIVEN LINE. THE   17280042
.*                                 LABELS SHOULD BE ENCLOSED IN QUOTA-  17360042
.*                                 TION MARKS. THE COLUMN AND LINE END  17440042
.*                                 CONTROLS WILL BE INSERTED BY THE     17520042
.*                                 MACRO. OMITTED OPERANDS MEAN NO      17600042
.*                                 LABEL REQUIRED FOR RESPECTIVE        17680042
.*                                 COLUMN. THIS MACRO WILL ALSO ALERT   17760042
.*                                 THE PROGRAMMER TO EXACTLY WHERE THE  17840042
.*                                 TABLE MUST BE BROKEN IF NECESSARY    17920042
.*                                 TO AVOID EXCEEDING THE MAXIMUM LIMIT 18000042
         GBLC &LABELS(2000)                                             18080042
         GBLC  &LBL(100)                                                18160042
         GBLA  &LBLCTR(100)                                             18240042
         GBLA  &LABELNR                                                 18320042
         GBLA  &NRENTS,&LPTR                                            18400042
         LCLC  &MARGIN,&TACK                                            18480042
         LCLC  &TEXT                                                    18560042
         LCLA  &OP,&K,&START,&NRCHAR,&REMAIN                            18640042
&MARGIN  SETC  '*'                                                      18720042
         AIF   ('&NAME' EQ '').LOOPOUT                                  18800042
&LPTR    SETA  &LPTR+1                                                  18880042
&LBL(&LPTR) SETC '&NAME'                                                18960042
&LBLCTR(&LPTR) SETA &LABELNR+1                                          19040042
.LOOPOUT ANOP                                                           19120042
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    19200042
&K       SETA  K'&SYSLIST(&OP)                                          19280042
         AIF (&K GE 2).NORM                                             19360042
&K       SETA  2                                                        19440042
.NORM    ANOP                                                           19520042
&START   SETA  2                                                        19600042
         AIF (&OP LT N'&SYSLIST).NOTLAST                                19680042
&MARGIN  SETC  '$'                                                      19760042
.NOTLAST ANOP                                                           19840042
&NRCHAR  SETA  8                                                        19920042
&TACK    SETC  ''                                                       20000042
.LOOPIN  ANOP                                                           20080042
&REMAIN  SETA  &K-&START                                                20160042
         AIF (&REMAIN GE 8).MORE                                        20240042
&TACK    SETC  '&MARGIN'                                                20320042
&NRCHAR  SETA  &REMAIN                                                  20400042
.MORE    ANOP                                                           20480042
&TEXT    SETC  ''                                                       20560042
         AIF (&REMAIN EQ 0).ENDTEXT                                     20640042
&TEXT    SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP)'(&START,&NRCHAR)                          20720042
.ENDTEXT ANOP                                                           20800042
&LABELNR SETA  &LABELNR+1                                               20880042
&LABELS(&LABELNR) SETC '&TEXT'.'&TACK'                                  20960042
&START   SETA  &START+8                                                 21040042
         AIF ('&TACK' EQ '').LOOPIN                                     21120042
         AIF ('&TACK' EQ '*').LOOPOUT                                   21200042
         MEND                                                           21280042
         SPACE 2                                                        21360042
         MACRO                                                          21440042
         LSTART                                                         21520042
.*                            THIS MACRO IS ISSUED WHEN THE LABEL AREA  21600042
.*                                 OF THE TABLE IS TO BEGIN.            21680042
         GBLC &LABELS(2000)                                             21760042
         GBLA  &LABELNR                                                 21840042
         GBLC  &LBL(100)                                                21920042
         GBLA  &LBLCTR(100)                                             22000042
         LCLA  &NDX,&CTR                                                22080042
         LINEND                                                         22160042
&CTR     SETA  1                                                        22240042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           22320042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   22400042
         AIF   (&LBLCTR(&CTR) NE &NDX).NOLBL                            22480042
&LBL(&CTR) DC  C'&LABELS(&NDX)'                                         22560042
&CTR     SETA  &CTR+1                                                   22640042
         AGO   .LOOPCTL                                                 22720042
.NOLBL   ANOP                                                           22800042
         DC    C'&LABELS(&NDX)'                                         22880042
.LOOPCTL AIF   (&NDX LT &LABELNR).LOOP                                  22960042
         MEND                                                           23040042
         SPACE 2                                                        23120042
*  BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO  * 23200042
         SPACE 2                                                        23280042
         MACRO                                                          23360042
         BIN   &LOGITEM,&SKIP$OR                                        23440042
.*                                 &LOGITEM - NAME OF ITEM IN LOG       23520042
.*                                      RECORD DSECT                    23600042
.*                                 &SKIP$OR - NBR OF SPACES TO SKIP ON  23680042
.*                                 MULTIPLE PRINT OR NBR OF SPACES      23760042
.*                                      TO BACK UP FROM COLUMN FOR      23840042
.*                                      START OF PRINTING. THE LETTER   23920042
.*                                      B PRECEEDS THE NUMBER (B5) IF   24000042
.*                                      THE LATTER IS DESIRED. OMISSION 24080042
.*                                      OF THIS OPERAND FORCES OPTION 2 24160042
.*                                      WITH BACKUP SPACING EQUAL TO    24240042
.*                                 THE NUMBER OF BITS IN THE ITEM       24320042
.*                                 DEFINITION (VIA MACRO 'DSGEN').      24400042
.*                            A LIMIT OF 15 BITS IS IMPOSED FOR THE     24480042
.*                                 TOTAL NUMBER OF BITS TO PRINT.       24560042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000)                                               24640042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000),&NRENTS                 24720042
         GBLC  &DSECT                                                   24800042
         LCLB  &B                                                       24880042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&K                                   24960042
         LCLA  &TEMP,&T                                                 25040042
         LCLC  &S                                                       25120042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           25200042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   25280042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      25360042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  25440042
         MNOTE *,'YOU BLEW IT'                                          25520042
         ROUTINE DUM,SKIPPER                                            25600042
         MEXIT                                                          25680042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           25760042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             25840042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              25920042
&T       SETA  &IBITS-1                                                 26000042
&B       SETB  0                                                        26080042
         AIF   ('&SKIP$OR' EQ '').BACKUP                                26160042
&K       SETA  K'&SKIP$OR                                               26240042
&B       SETB  ('&SKIP$OR'(1,1) EQ 'B')                                 26320042
&S       SETC  '&SKIP$OR'(&B+1,&K-&B)                                   26400042
&T       SETA  &S                                                       26480042
.BACKUP  ANOP                                                           26560042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                26640042
&TEMP    SETA  &ISHIFT                                                  26720042
A&SYSNDX DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'&TEMP'                       26800042
         AIF (&IBITS EQ 1 AND &B EQ 0).OUT                              26880042
         ORG   A&SYSNDX                                                 26960042
&B       SETB  1                                                        27040042
         DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'C'                           27120042
         DC    BL.1'&B',AL.7(&T),AL.4(&IBITS),FL.4'&ISHIFT'             27200042
.OUT     ANOP                                                           27280042
         MEND                                                           27360042
         EJECT                                                          27440042
*  HEX MACRO     HEX MACRO     HEX MACRO    HEXN MACRO     HEX MACRO  * 27520042
         SPACE 2                                                        27600042
         MACRO                                                          27680042
         HEX   &LOGITEM,&SKIP$OR,&BYTES                                 27760042
.*                            THIS MACRO FACILITATES GENERATION OF THE  27840042
.*                                 TABLE ENTRIES SPECIFYING HEX TYPE    27920042
.*                                 CONVERSIONS.                         28000042
.*                            &LOGITEM - NAME OF DATA ITEM TO BE        28080042
.*                                 CONVERTED                            28160042
.*                            &SKIP$OR - NUMBER OF SPACES TO SKIP ON    28240042
.*                                 MULTIPLE PRINT OR NBR OF SPACES TO   28320042
.*                                 BACK UP FROM COLUMN FOR START OF     28400042
.*                                 PRINTING. THE LETTER B PRECEEDS THE  28480042
.*                                 NUMBER (B8) IF THE LATTER OPTION IS  28560042
.*                                 DESIRED. OMISSION OF THIS OPERAND    28640042
.*                                 FORCES OPTION 2 WITH BACKUP SPACING  28720042
.*                                 EQUAL TO THE NUMBER OF BYTES SPECI-  28800042
.*                                 FIED BY THE NEXT OPERAND (TWICE THIS 28880042
.*                                 NUMBER IF SUFFIX IS EXPLICITLY OR    28960042
.*                                 IMPLICITLY B).                       29040042
.*                            &BYTES - NUMBER OF TOTAL INPUT BYTES TO   29120042
.*                                 PROCESS. THIS NUMBER IS SUFFIXED     29200042
.*                                 WITH AN L,R, OR B TO STIPULATE       29280042
.*                                 PRINTING OF THE LEFT HALF, RIGHT     29360042
.*                                 HALF, OR BOTH HALVES OF THE BYTE     29440042
.*                                 RESPECTIVELY. OMISSION OF THIS       29520042
.*                                 OPERAND DEFAULTS TO B WITH THE NUM-  29600042
.*                                 BER OF BYTES EQUAL TO THE ITEM LNGTH 29680042
.*                            A NEW ENTRY IS GENERATED ONLY WHEN NECES- 29760042
.*                                 SARY. THIS MACRO MUST BE THE FIRST   29840042
.*                                 MACRO INSTRUCTION ISSUED FOR THE     29920042
.*                                 SUBJECT LINE(S).                     30000042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000),&DSECT                                        30080042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000),&NRENTS                 30160042
         LCLB  &B                                                       30240042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&K,&T,&CODE,&BYTESP                  30320042
         LCLC  &S,&LETTER                                               30400042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           30480042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   30560042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      30640042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  30720042
         MNOTE *,'LOG ITEM NOT DEFINED'                                 30800042
         MEXIT                                                          30880042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           30960042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             31040042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              31120042
&CODE    SETA  1                                                        31200042
&K       SETA  K'&BYTES                                                 31280042
         AIF   (&IBITS-(&IBITS/4)*4 EQ 0).OK                            31360042
         MNOTE *,'BIT LENGTH SPECIFICATION INCONSISTENT WITH CONTROL'   31440042
         MEXIT                                                          31520042
.OK      AIF   ('&BYTES' EQ '').USEDEFN                                 31600042
&LETTER  SETC  '&BYTES'(&K,1)                                           31680042
&S       SETC  '&BYTES'(1,&K-1)                                         31760042
&BYTESP  SETA  &S                                                       31840042
         AIF   ('&LETTER' EQ 'B').BOTH                                  31920042
         AIF   (&ISHIFT EQ 0 OR &ISHIFT EQ 4).OK2                       32000042
.ERR     MNOTE *,'DATA NOT ALLIGNED ON HEX OR BYTE BOUNDARY'            32080042
         MEXIT                                                          32160042
.USEDEFN ANOP                                                           32240042
&BYTESP  SETA  &IBITS/8                                                 32320042
.BOTH    AIF   (&ISHIFT NE 0).ERR                                       32400042
&CODE    SETA  3                                                        32480042
&T       SETA  &BYTESP*2-1                                              32560042
&S       SETC  '&T'                                                     32640042
.OK2     AIF   (&ISHIFT EQ 0).L                                         32720042
&CODE    SETA  2                                                        32800042
.L       ANOP                                                           32880042
&B       SETB  1                                                        32960042
         AIF   ('&SKIP$OR' EQ '').BACKUP                                33040042
&K       SETA  K'&SKIP$OR                                               33120042
&B       SETB  ('&SKIP$OR'(1,1) EQ 'B')                                 33200042
&S       SETC  '&SKIP$OR'(&B+1,&K-&B)                                   33280042
.BACKUP  ANOP                                                           33360042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                33440042
         DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'A'                           33520042
         DC    BL.1'&B',FL.7'&S',FL.4'&BYTESP',FL.4'&CODE'              33600042
.OUT     ANOP                                                           33680042
         MEND                                                           33760042
         MACRO                                                          33840042
         SPECIAL  &ROUTINE,&PARAM,&SPACE=                               33920042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES A SPECIAL ROUTINE    34000042
.*                                 ENTRY TO BE PROCESSED BY THE SUM. M. 34080042
.*                            &ROUTINE - SYMBOL ON SPECIAL ROUTINE EWT. 34160042
.*                            &PARAM - AN 8 BIT BINARY REPRESENTATION   34240042
.*                                 TO OCCUPY THE 'MASK' FIELD BUT TO BE 34320042
.*                                 INTERPRETED AS AN ARGUMENT OF THE    34400042
.*                                 SPECIAL ROUTINE.                     34480042
.*                            &SPACE - THE NUMBER OF 2BYTE COUNTERS TO  34560042
.*                                 ALLOCATE FOR REQUIRED PROCESSING.    34640042
         GBLC  &CSECT                                                   34720042
         GBLA  &COUNTR                                                  34800042
         LCLA  &ADD                                                     34880042
         DC    AL1(128)                                                 34960042
         DC    BL.8'&PARAM'                                             35040042
         DC    AL2(&ROUTINE-&CSECT)                                     35120042
         DC    AL2(&COUNTR)                                             35200042
&ADD     SETA  1                                                        35280042
         AIF   ('&SPACE' EQ '').NORM                                    35360042
&ADD     SETA  &SPACE                                                   35440042
.NORM    ANOP                                                           35520042
&COUNTR  SETA  &COUNTR+&ADD                                             35600042
         MEND                                                           35680042
         MACRO                                                          35760042
         SUM   &LOGITEM,&MASK                                           35840042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES A NORMAL EDIT ENTRY  35920042
.*                                 FOR PROCESSING BY THE SUMMARY MODULE 36000042
.*                            &LOGITEM - NAME OF DATA ITEM TO BE SUMMED 36080042
.*                            &MASK - BYTE MASK FOR BITS TO BE TESTED.  36160042
.*                                 THIS OPERAND SHOULD BE OMITTED FOR   36240042
.*                                 SINGLE BIT ITEMS IN WHICH CASE THE   36320042
.*                                 MASK WILL BE SET ACCORDING TO THE    36400042
.*                                 OFF BYTE BIT DISPLACEMENT OF THE     36480042
.*                                ITEM AS DEFINED BY THE MACRO 'DSGEN'  36560042
         GBLA  &COUNTR,&ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000)                36640042
         GBLC  &ITEM(1000),&DSECT                                       36720042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&M,&BITNBR                           36800042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           36880042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   36960042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      37040042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  37120042
         MNOTE *,'LOGITEM NOT FOUND'                                    37200042
         MEXIT                                                          37280042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           37360042
         DC    AL1(0)                                                   37440042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             37520042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              37600042
         AIF   ('&MASK' EQ '').FORM                                     37680042
         DC    B'&MASK'                                                 37760042
         AGO   .ITEM                                                    37840042
.FORM    ANOP                                                           37920042
&BITNBR  SETA  &ISHIFT-7                                                38000042
&BITNBR  SETA  0-&BITNBR                                                38080042
&M       SETA  1                                                        38160042
.LOOP2   ANOP                                                           38240042
         AIF   (&BITNBR EQ 0).GOTIT                                     38320042
&M       SETA  &M*2                                                     38400042
&BITNBR  SETA  &BITNBR-1                                                38480042
         AGO   .LOOP2                                                   38560042
.GOTIT   ANOP                                                           38640042
         DC    AL1(&M)                                                  38720042
.ITEM    DC    AL2(&LOGITEM-&DSECT)                                     38800042
         DC    AL2(&COUNTR)                                             38880042
&COUNTR  SETA  &COUNTR+1                                                38960042
         MEND                                                           39040042
         GBLC  &DSECT,&CSECT                                            39120042
&CSECT   SETC  'IFCSXXX1'                                               39200042
&DSECT   SETC  'XXX1'                                                   39280042
IFCSXXX1 CSECT                                                          39360042

         DSGEN (XDUM2,32)                    SPARES                     40560042

         DSGEN (XFCCWFL,8),(XZERO,8),(XFCCWCT,16)   FAILING CCW         41200042

IFCSXXX1 CSECT                                                          44480042
         USING XXX1,R2                                                  44560042
         USING *,R9                                                     44640042
         DC    A(ENTRIES)               PTR TO ENTRIES                  44720042
         DC    A(PEDIT)                 PTR TO EDIT SECTION OF SUM TBL  44800042
REG8     DC    F'0'                     R8 SAVE AREA CURRENT ENTRY      44880042
SCSIZE   DC    H'110'                   NO OF 2 BYTE CNTRS FOR SUS21021 44960042
R0       EQU   0                                                        45040042
R1       EQU   1                                                        45120042
R2       EQU   2                                                        45200042
R3       EQU   3                                                        45280042
R4       EQU   4                                                        45360042

R14      EQU   14                                                       46160042

*                                                                       46320042
*        SPECIAL ROUTINE SECTION   R2=PTR TO LOGREC R9=BASE ADDR        46400042
*                                  R3=PTR TO BUM COUNTER                46480042
XFAILCCW EQU   *                                                        46560042
         TM    XSW,HEX20                IS THIS A SHORT RECORD?  S21021 46640042
         BCR   1,R14                    YES, NO CCW, RETURN      S21021 46720042
*                                                                       46800042
         STM   R14,R12,L12(R13)         SAVE REGS                       46880042
         SR    R7,R7                                                    46960042
         IC    R7,XFCCWCC               PICK UP FAILING CCW CODE        47040042
         B     COMMON                                                   47120042
*                                                                       47200042
*                                                                       47280042
XDATE1   STM   R14,R15,L12(R13)         SAVE R14 & R 15          S21021 47360042
         BAL   R14,EXPANDER             BAL TO EXPAND REC        S21021 47440042
         STM   R0,R12,L20(R13)          SAVE REMAINDER OF REGS   S21021 47520042
         CLC   XDATE(L4),HEX00         IS DATE ZERO                     47600042
         BE    RETURN                   BR-ZERO                         47680042
         CLC   L0(L4,R3),HEX00          IS LOW DATE ZERO                47760042
         BNE   XDATE2                   BR-NO                           47840042
         MVC   L0(L4,R3),XDATE          MOVE IN DATE                    47920042
XDATE2   EQU   *                                                        48000042
         CLC   XDATE(L4),L0(R3)         CHECK FOR LOW DATE              48080042
         BL    SAVELOW                  LOWER SAVE IT                   48160042
         CLC   XDATE(L4),L4(R3)         CHECK FOR HI                    48240042
         BNH   RETURN                   BR-NOT HI                       48320042
SAVEHI   MVC   L4(L4,R3),XDATE          MOVE HI DATE                    48400042
         B     RETURN                                                   48480042
SAVELOW  MVC   L0(L4,R3),XDATE          MOVE LOW DATE                   48560042
         B     RETURN                                                   48640042
*                                                                       48720042
*                                                                S21021 48800042
*                                       ROUTINE TO SUM SDR CNTRS S21021 48880042

         SR    R5,R5                    CLEAAR R5                S21021 67600042
         IC    R5,0(R4)                 PICK UP                  S21021 67680042
         SLL   R5,R8                      CPU TYPE               S21021 67760042
         IC    R5,L1(R4)                    FIELD                S21021 67840042
         LTR   R5,R5                    IS TI ZERO?              S21021 67920042

         MVC   0(L6,R3),SHARED          SAY MODEL SHARED       @Z427VLS 68240042
