./  ADD  SSI=63160142,NAME=IFCSXXX3
         TITLE 'IFCSXXX3 - SUM TABLE - LINKNAME=IFCS1443, ALIASES=IFCS1C00074042
               419,IFCS1275,IFCS1285,IFCS2671'                          00148042
         SPACE 2                                                        00222042
*  LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO            * 00296042
         MACRO                                                          00370042
&NAME    LINE  &DATA,&LABEL,&SKIP=                                      00444042
.*                            THIS MACRO ESTABLISHES THE MARGINS OR     00518042
.*                                 COLUMN SETTINGS FOR EACH LINE. IT    00592042
.*                                 GENERATES NECESSARY CARRIAGE CONTROL 00666042
.*                                 ENTRIES. LASTLY IT DETERMINES THE    00740042
.*                                 NUMBER OF ENTRIES ASSOCIATED WITH    00814042
.*                                 THE PREVIOUS LINE AND STORES THAT #  00888042
.*                                 INTO THE APPROPRIATE BYTE.           00962042
.*                                 &DATA(1) - CHARACTER POSITION TO     01036042
.*                                 BEGIN DATA.                          01110042
.*                                                                      01184042
.*                                 &DATA(2) - # OF SPACES BETWEEN       01258042
.*                                 SUCCESSIVE DATA COLUMN STARTING      01332042
.*                                 CHARACTERS.                          01406042
.*                                                                      01480042
.*                                 &LABEL(1) - CHARACTER POSITION       01554042
.*                                 TO BEGIN LABELS.                     01628042
.*                                                                      01702042
.*                                 &LABEL(2) - # OF SPACES BETWEEN      01776042
.*                                 LINE'S LABEL STARTING CHARACTERS.    01850042
.*                                                                      01924042
.*                                 &SKIP= - # OF LINES TO ADVANCE       01998042
.*                                 CARRIAGE TO BEGIN NEXT PRINTED LINE. 02072042
.*                                                                      02146042
.*                                 NEW ENTRIES ARE GENERATED ONLY WHEN  02220042
.*                                 NECESSARY. OMISSION OF ITEMS MEANS   02294042
.*                                 THEY HAVE NOT CHANGED SINCE PREVIOUS 02368042
.*                                 SETTINGS. A LINE MACRO IS REQUIRED   02442042
.*                                 FOR EACH PRINTED LINE. IF NO SETTING 02516042
.*                                 CHANGES ARE REQUIRED ALL OPERANDS    02590042
.*                                 ARE OMITTED IN WHICH CASE ONLY THE   02664042
.*                                 # OF ENTRIES FOR THE PREVIOUS LINE   02738042
.*                                 FIRST MACRO INSTRUCTION ISSUED FOR   02812042
.*                                 THE SUBJECT LINE.                    02886042
         GBLA  &DB,&DT,&LB,&LT,&NRENTS                                  02960042
         GBLA  &LASTCC,&INITIAL                                         03034042
         GBLC  &NRENTSX                                                 03108042
         GBLC  &CARRCON                                                 03182042
         GBLB  &TEST                                                    03256042
         LCLA  &S                                                       03330042
&NAME    DS    0C                                                       03404042
         AIF   (&INITIAL EQ 0).FIRSTLN                                  03478042
         LINEND                                                         03552042
         AGO   .NTFIRST                                                 03626042
.FIRSTLN ANOP                                                           03700042
&NRENTSX SETC  'N&SYSNDX'                                               03774042
&INITIAL SETA  1                                                        03848042
&LASTCC  SETA  1                                                        03922042
N&SYSNDX EQU   *                                                        03996042
.NTFIRST ANOP                                                           04070042
         DC    AL1(0)                                                   04144042
         AIF   ('&DATA(1)' EQ '').CKDTABS                               04218042
         AIF   ('&DATA'(1,1) NE '(').SLABEL                             04292042
         AIF   (&DATA(1) EQ &DB).CKDTABS                                04366042
&DB      SETA  &DATA(1)                                                 04440042
         AGO   .AA                                                      04514042
.CKDTABS AIF   ('&DATA(2)' EQ '').NCDATA                                04588042
         AIF   (&DATA(2) EQ &DT).NCDATA                                 04662042
         AGO   .CC                                                      04736042
.AA      AIF   ('&DATA(2)' EQ '').BB                                    04810042
         AIF   (&DATA(2) EQ &DT).BB                                     04884042
.CC      ANOP                                                           04958042
&DT      SETA  &DATA(2)                                                 05032042
.BB      DC    XL2'FFFE'                                                05106042
         DC    FL1'&DB'                                                 05180042
         DC    FL1'&DT'                                                 05254042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                05328042
.NCDATA  ANOP                                                           05402042
         AIF   ('&LABEL(1)' EQ '').CKLTABS                              05476042
         AIF   ('&LABEL'(1,1) NE '(').SLABEL                            05550042
         AIF   (&LABEL(1) EQ &LB).CKLTABS                               05624042
&LB      SETA  &LABEL(1)                                                05698042
         AGO   .AAA                                                     05772042
.CKLTABS AIF   ('&LABEL(2)' EQ '').NCLABEL                              05846042
         AIF   (&LABEL(2) EQ &LT).NCLABEL                               05920042
         AGO   .CCC                                                     05994042
.AAA     AIF   ('&LABEL(2)' EQ '').BBB                                  06068042
         AIF   (&LABEL(2) EQ &LT).BBB                                   06142042
.CCC     ANOP                                                           06216042
&LT      SETA  &LABEL(2)                                                06290042
.BBB     DC    XL2'FFFF'                                                06364042
         DC    FL1'&LB'                                                 06438042
         DC    FL1'&LT'                                                 06512042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                06586042
.NCLABEL ANOP                                                           06660042
         AIF   ('&SKIP' EQ 'E').EJECT                                   06734042
         AIF   ('&SKIP' EQ '').TESTOFF                                  06808042
.CONT    ANOP                                                           06882042
         AIF   (&TEST EQ 0).AB                                          06956042
         AIF   (&SKIP EQ &LASTCC).TESTOFF                               07030042
&S       SETA  &SKIP                                                    07104042
         ORG   &CARRCON+3                                               07178042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&S),AL.3(1)                                 07252042
         ORG                                                            07326042
&LASTCC  SETA  &S                                                       07400042
.SLABEL  ANOP                                                           07474042
.TESTOFF ANOP                                                           07548042
&TEST    SETB  0                                                        07622042
         AGO   .DD                                                      07696042
.EJECT   DC    XL2'FFFB'                                                07770042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                07844042
         DC    X'8B'              SKIP TO CHANNEL 1                     07918042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&LASTCC),AL.3(1)                            07992042
&TEST    SETB  1                                                        08066042
         AGO   .DD                                                      08140042
.AB      AIF   (&SKIP EQ &LASTCC).NOCHANG                               08214042
A&SYSNDX DC    XL2'FFFB'                                                08288042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&SKIP),AL.3(1)                              08362042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&SKIP),AL.3(1)                              08436042
&LASTCC  SETA  &SKIP                                                    08510042
&TEST    SETB  1                                                        08584042
&CARRCON SETC  'A&SYSNDX'                                               08658042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                08732042
.DD      ANOP                                                           08806042
.NOCHANG ANOP                                                           08880042
         MEND                                                           08954042
         SPACE 2                                                        09028042
*  ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO* 09102042
         MACRO                                                          09176042
&NAME    ROUTINE &LOGITEM,&RNAME                                        09250042
         GBLC  &DSECT,&CSECT                                            09324042
         GBLC  &ITEM(1000)                                              09398042
         GBLA  &SHIFT(1000),&ITEMNBR                                    09472042
         GBLA  &NRENTS                                                  09546042
         LCLA  &ISHIFT,&NDX                                             09620042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           09694042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   09768042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      09842042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  09916042
         MNOTE *,'LOG ITEM NOT DEFINED'                                 09990042
         MEXIT                                                          10064042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           10138042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             10212042
&NAME    DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'D'                           10286042
         DC    AL.4(&ISHIFT),AL.12(&RNAME-&CSECT)                       10360042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                10434042
         MEND                                                           10508042
*  DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO        * 10582042
         SPACE 2                                                        10656042
         MACRO                                                          10730042
&NAME    DSGEN &X1,&X2,&X3,&X4,&X5,&X6,&X7,&X8,&X9,&X10,&X11,&X12,&X13,X10804042
               &X14,&X15,&X16,&X17,&X18,&X19,&X20,&X21,&X22,&X23,&X24, X10878042
               &X25,&X26,&X27,&X28,&X29,&X30,&X31,&X32                  10952042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES ONE DSECT WORD       11026042
.*                                 FORMATTED FOR THE SUBJECT LOG RECORD 11100042
.*                                 EACH OPERAND HAS TWO SUB LISTS. THE  11174042
.*                                 FIRST IS THE NAME OF THE LOG ITEM    11248042
.*                                 WHILE THE SECOND IS THE # OF BITS TO 11322042
.*                                 ALLOCATE FOR THIS ITEM. ITEMS MUST   11396042
.*                                 BE DEFINED CONTIGUOUSLY WITHOUT GAPS 11470042
.*                                 UNUSED BIT GROUPS MUST BE GIVEN      11544042
.*                                 DUMMY NAMES. THE NAMES PROVIDED FOR  11618042
.*                                 THE LOG ITEMS MAY THEN BE USED IN    11692042
.*                                 THE CONVERSION MACRO INSTRUCTIONS.   11766042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000)                                               11840042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000)                         11914042
         LCLC  &SYMBOL                                                  11988042
         LCLA  &OP,&COUNT,&BYTE                                         12062042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           12136042
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    12210042
&ITEMNBR SETA  &ITEMNBR+1                                               12284042
&SYMBOL  SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP,1)'                                        12358042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,2)' NE '').OK1                            12432042
         MNOTE *,'NULL BIT COUNT FIELD'                                 12506042
         MEXIT                                                          12580042
.OK1     ANOP                                                           12654042
         AIF   ('&SYMBOL' NE '').OK                                     12728042
         MNOTE 'LOG ITEM SYMBOL NOT PROVIDED'                           12802042
         AGO   .CNT                                                     12876042
.OK      ANOP                                                           12950042
         AIF   ('&SYMBOL'(1,1) EQ '''').CNT                *TEMP*       13024042
&SYMBOL  EQU   *+&BYTE                                                  13098042
&ITEM(&ITEMNBR)  SETC '&SYSLIST(&OP,1)'                                 13172042
&BITS(&ITEMNBR) SETA &SYSLIST(&OP,2)                                    13246042
&SHIFT(&ITEMNBR) SETA &COUNT-&BYTE*8                                    13320042
.CNT     ANOP                                                           13394042
&COUNT   SETA  &COUNT+&SYSLIST(&OP,2)                                   13468042
&BYTE    SETA  &COUNT/8                                                 13542042
         AIF (&OP LT N'&SYSLIST).LOOP                                   13616042
         AIF   (&COUNT NE 32).NOT32                                     13690042
&NAME    DS    4C                                                       13764042
         MEXIT                                                          13838042
.NOT32   AIF   (&COUNT NE 64).ERR                                       13912042
&NAME    DS    8C                                                       13986042
         MEXIT                                                          14060042
.ERR     MNOTE '**BIT COUNT FIELDS DO NOT TOTAL 32 OR 64**'             14134042
         MEND                                                           14208042
         MACRO                                                          14282042
         LINEND                                                         14356042
.*                            THIS MACRO IS USED ONLY BY THE LINE       14430042
.*                                 MACRO TO SET THE NUMBER OF ENTRIES   14504042
.*                                 ASSOCIATED WITH EACH LINE.           14578042
         GBLA  &NRENTS                                                  14652042
         GBLC &NRENTSX                                                  14726042
         ORG   &NRENTSX                                                 14800042
         DC    FL1'&NRENTS'                                             14874042
         ORG                                                            14948042
&NRENTS  SETA  0                                                        15022042
B&SYSNDX EQU   *                                                        15096042
&NRENTSX SETC  'B&SYSNDX'                                               15170042
         MEND                                                           15244042
         SPACE 2                                                        15318042
         EJECT                                                          15392042
*  LABEL MACRO     LABEL MACRO     LABEL MACRO     LABEL MACRO        * 15466042
         SPACE 2                                                        15540042
         MACRO                                                          15614042
&NAME    LABEL &LABEL1,&LABEL2,&LABEL3,&LABEL4,&LABEL5,&LABEL6,        C15688042
               &LABEL7,&LABEL8                                          15762042
.*                            THIS MACRO ALLOWS UP TO ACHT LABELS TO    15836042
.*                                 BE SPECIFIED FOR A GIVEN LINE. THE   15910042
.*                                 LABELS SHOULD BE ENCLOSED IN QUOTA-  15984042
.*                                 TION MARKS. THE COLUMN AND LINE END  16058042
.*                                 CONTROLS WILL BE INSERTED BY THE     16132042
.*                                 MACRO. OMITTED OPERANDS MEAN NO      16206042
.*                                 LABEL REQUIRED FOR RESPECTIVE        16280042
.*                                 COLUMN. THIS MACRO WILL ALSO ALERT   16354042
.*                                 THE PROGRAMMER TO EXACTLY WHERE THE  16428042
.*                                 TABLE MUST BE BROKEN IF NECESSARY    16502042
.*                                 TO AVOID EXCEEDING THE MAXIMUM LIMIT 16576042
         GBLC &LABELS(2000)                                             16650042
         GBLC  &LBL(100)                                                16724042
         GBLA  &LBLCTR(100)                                             16798042
         GBLA  &LABELNR                                                 16872042
         GBLA  &NRENTS,&LPTR                                            16946042
         LCLC  &MARGIN,&TACK                                            17020042
         LCLC  &TEXT                                                    17094042
         LCLA  &OP,&K,&START,&NRCHAR,&REMAIN                            17168042
&MARGIN  SETC  '*'                                                      17242042
         AIF   ('&NAME' EQ '').LOOPOUT                                  17316042
&LPTR    SETA  &LPTR+1                                                  17390042
&LBL(&LPTR) SETC '&NAME'                                                17464042
&LBLCTR(&LPTR) SETA &LABELNR+1                                          17538042
.LOOPOUT ANOP                                                           17612042
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    17686042
&K       SETA  K'&SYSLIST(&OP)                                          17760042
         AIF (&K GE 2).NORM                                             17834042
&K       SETA  2                                                        17908042
.NORM    ANOP                                                           17982042
&START   SETA  2                                                        18056042
         AIF (&OP LT N'&SYSLIST).NOTLAST                                18130042
&MARGIN  SETC  '$'                                                      18204042
.NOTLAST ANOP                                                           18278042
&NRCHAR  SETA  8                                                        18352042
&TACK    SETC  ''                                                       18426042
.LOOPIN  ANOP                                                           18500042
&REMAIN  SETA  &K-&START                                                18574042
         AIF (&REMAIN GE 8).MORE                                        18648042
&TACK    SETC  '&MARGIN'                                                18722042
&NRCHAR  SETA  &REMAIN                                                  18796042
.MORE    ANOP                                                           18870042
&TEXT    SETC  ''                                                       18944042
         AIF (&REMAIN EQ 0).ENDTEXT                                     19018042
&TEXT    SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP)'(&START,&NRCHAR)                          19092042
.ENDTEXT ANOP                                                           19166042
&LABELNR SETA  &LABELNR+1                                               19240042
&LABELS(&LABELNR) SETC '&TEXT'.'&TACK'                                  19314042
&START   SETA  &START+8                                                 19388042
         AIF ('&TACK' EQ '').LOOPIN                                     19462042
         AIF ('&TACK' EQ '*').LOOPOUT                                   19536042
         MEND                                                           19610042
         SPACE 2                                                        19684042
         MACRO                                                          19758042
         LSTART                                                         19832042
.*                            THIS MACRO IS ISSUED WHEN THE LABEL AREA  19906042
.*                                 OF THE TABLE IS TO BEGIN.            19980042
         GBLC &LABELS(2000)                                             20054042
         GBLA  &LABELNR                                                 20128042
         GBLC  &LBL(100)                                                20202042
         GBLA  &LBLCTR(100)                                             20276042
         LCLA  &NDX,&CTR                                                20350042
         LINEND                                                         20424042
&CTR     SETA  1                                                        20498042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           20572042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   20646042
         AIF   (&LBLCTR(&CTR) NE &NDX).NOLBL                            20720042
&LBL(&CTR) DC  C'&LABELS(&NDX)'                                         20794042
&CTR     SETA  &CTR+1                                                   20868042
         AGO   .LOOPCTL                                                 20942042
.NOLBL   ANOP                                                           21016042
         DC    C'&LABELS(&NDX)'                                         21090042
.LOOPCTL AIF   (&NDX LT &LABELNR).LOOP                                  21164042
         MEND                                                           21238042
         SPACE 2                                                        21312042
*  BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO  * 21386042
         SPACE 2                                                        21460042
         MACRO                                                          21534042
         BIN   &LOGITEM,&SKIP$OR                                        21608042
.*                                 &LOGITEM - NAME OF ITEM IN LOG       21682042
.*                                      RECORD DSECT                    21756042
.*                                 &SKIP$OR - NBR OF SPACES TO SKIP ON  21830042
.*                                 MULTIPLE PRINT OR NBR OF SPACES      21904042
.*                                      TO BACK UP FROM COLUMN FOR      21978042
.*                                      START OF PRINTING. THE LETTER   22052042
.*                                      B PRECEEDS THE NUMBER (B5) IF   22126042
.*                                      THE LATTER IS DESIRED. OMISSION 22200042
.*                                      OF THIS OPERAND FORCES OPTION 2 22274042
.*                                      WITH BACKUP SPACING EQUAL TO    22348042
.*                                 THE NUMBER OF BITS IN THE ITEM       22422042
.*                                 DEFINITION (VIA MACRO 'DSGEN').      22496042
.*                            A LIMIT OF 15 BITS IS IMPOSED FOR THE     22570042
.*                                 TOTAL NUMBER OF BITS TO PRINT.       22644042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000)                                               22718042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000),&NRENTS                 22792042
         GBLC  &DSECT                                                   22866042
         LCLB  &B                                                       22940042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&K                                   23014042
         LCLA  &TEMP,&T                                                 23088042
         LCLC  &S                                                       23162042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           23236042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   23310042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      23384042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  23458042
         MNOTE *,'YOU BLEW IT'                                          23532042
         ROUTINE DUM,SKIPPER                                            23606042
         MEXIT                                                          23680042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           23754042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             23828042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              23902042
&T       SETA  &IBITS-1                                                 23976042
&B       SETB  0                                                        24050042
         AIF   ('&SKIP$OR' EQ '').BACKUP                                24124042
&K       SETA  K'&SKIP$OR                                               24198042
&B       SETB  ('&SKIP$OR'(1,1) EQ 'B')                                 24272042
&S       SETC  '&SKIP$OR'(&B+1,&K-&B)                                   24346042
&T       SETA  &S                                                       24420042
.BACKUP  ANOP                                                           24494042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                24568042
&TEMP    SETA  &ISHIFT                                                  24642042
A&SYSNDX DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'&TEMP'                       24716042
         AIF (&IBITS EQ 1 AND &B EQ 0).OUT                              24790042
         ORG   A&SYSNDX                                                 24864042
&B       SETB  1                                                        24938042
         DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'C'                           25012042
         DC    BL.1'&B',AL.7(&T),AL.4(&IBITS),FL.4'&ISHIFT'             25086042
.OUT     ANOP                                                           25160042
         MEND                                                           25234042
         EJECT                                                          25308042
*  HEX MACRO     HEX MACRO     HEX MACRO    HEXN MACRO     HEX MACRO  * 25382042
         SPACE 2                                                        25456042
         MACRO                                                          25530042
         HEX   &LOGITEM,&SKIP$OR,&BYTES                                 25604042
.*                            THIS MACRO FACILITATES GENERATION OF THE  25678042
.*                                 TABLE ENTRIES SPECIFYING HEX TYPE    25752042
.*                                 CONVERSIONS.                         25826042
.*                            &LOGITEM - NAME OF DATA ITEM TO BE        25900042
.*                                 CONVERTED                            25974042
.*                            &SKIP$OR - NUMBER OF SPACES TO SKIP ON    26048042
.*                                 MULTIPLE PRINT OR NBR OF SPACES TO   26122042
.*                                 BACK UP FROM COLUMN FOR START OF     26196042
.*                                 PRINTING. THE LETTER B PRECEEDS THE  26270042
.*                                 NUMBER (B8) IF THE LATTER OPTION IS  26344042
.*                                 DESIRED. OMISSION OF THIS OPERAND    26418042
.*                                 FORCES OPTION 2 WITH BACKUP SPACING  26492042
.*                                 EQUAL TO THE NUMBER OF BYTES SPECI-  26566042
.*                                 FIED BY THE NEXT OPERAND (TWICE THIS 26640042
.*                                 NUMBER IF SUFFIX IS EXPLICITLY OR    26714042
.*                                 IMPLICITLY B).                       26788042
.*                            &BYTES - NUMBER OF TOTAL INPUT BYTES TO   26862042
.*                                 PROCESS. THIS NUMBER IS SUFFIXED     26936042
.*                                 WITH AN L,R, OR B TO STIPULATE       27010042
.*                                 PRINTING OF THE LEFT HALF, RIGHT     27084042
.*                                 HALF, OR BOTH HALVES OF THE BYTE     27158042
.*                                 RESPECTIVELY. OMISSION OF THIS       27232042
.*                                 OPERAND DEFAULTS TO B WITH THE NUM-  27306042
.*                                 BER OF BYTES EQUAL TO THE ITEM LNGTH 27380042
.*                            A NEW ENTRY IS GENERATED ONLY WHEN NECES- 27454042
.*                                 SARY. THIS MACRO MUST BE THE FIRST   27528042
.*                                 MACRO INSTRUCTION ISSUED FOR THE     27602042
.*                                 SUBJECT LINE(S).                     27676042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000),&DSECT                                        27750042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000),&NRENTS                 27824042
         LCLB  &B                                                       27898042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&K,&T,&CODE,&BYTESP                  27972042
         LCLC  &S,&LETTER                                               28046042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           28120042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   28194042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      28268042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  28342042
         MNOTE *,'LOG ITEM NOT DEFINED'                                 28416042
         MEXIT                                                          28490042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           28564042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             28638042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              28712042
&CODE    SETA  1                                                        28786042
&K       SETA  K'&BYTES                                                 28860042
         AIF   (&IBITS-(&IBITS/4)*4 EQ 0).OK                            28934042
         MNOTE *,'BIT LENGTH SPECIFICATION INCONSISTENT WITH CONTROL'   29008042
         MEXIT                                                          29082042
.OK      AIF   ('&BYTES' EQ '').USEDEFN                                 29156042
&LETTER  SETC  '&BYTES'(&K,1)                                           29230042
&S       SETC  '&BYTES'(1,&K-1)                                         29304042
&BYTESP  SETA  &S                                                       29378042
         AIF   ('&LETTER' EQ 'B').BOTH                                  29452042
         AIF   (&ISHIFT EQ 0 OR &ISHIFT EQ 4).OK2                       29526042
.ERR     MNOTE *,'DATA NOT ALLIGNED ON HEX OR BYTE BOUNDARY'            29600042
         MEXIT                                                          29674042
.USEDEFN ANOP                                                           29748042
&BYTESP  SETA  &IBITS/8                                                 29822042
.BOTH    AIF   (&ISHIFT NE 0).ERR                                       29896042
&CODE    SETA  3                                                        29970042
&T       SETA  &BYTESP*2-1                                              30044042
&S       SETC  '&T'                                                     30118042
.OK2     AIF   (&ISHIFT EQ 0).L                                         30192042
&CODE    SETA  2                                                        30266042
.L       ANOP                                                           30340042
&B       SETB  1                                                        30414042
         AIF   ('&SKIP$OR' EQ '').BACKUP                                30488042
&K       SETA  K'&SKIP$OR                                               30562042
&B       SETB  ('&SKIP$OR'(1,1) EQ 'B')                                 30636042
&S       SETC  '&SKIP$OR'(&B+1,&K-&B)                                   30710042
.BACKUP  ANOP                                                           30784042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                30858042
         DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'A'                           30932042
         DC    BL.1'&B',FL.7'&S',FL.4'&BYTESP',FL.4'&CODE'              31006042
.OUT     ANOP                                                           31080042
         MEND                                                           31154042
         MACRO                                                          31228042
         SPECIAL  &ROUTINE,&PARAM,&SPACE=                               31302042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES A SPECIAL ROUTINE    31376042
.*                                 ENTRY TO BE PROCESSED BY THE SUM. M. 31450042
.*                            &ROUTINE - SYMBOL ON SPECIAL ROUTINE EWT. 31524042
.*                            &PARAM - AN 8 BIT BINARY REPRESENTATION   31598042
.*                                 TO OCCUPY THE 'MASK' FIELD BUT TO BE 31672042
.*                                 INTERPRETED AS AN ARGUMENT OF THE    31746042
.*                                 SPECIAL ROUTINE.                     31820042
.*                            &SPACE - THE NUMBER OF 2BYTE COUNTERS TO  31894042
.*                                 ALLOCATE FOR REQUIRED PROCESSING.    31968042
         GBLC  &CSECT                                                   32042042
         GBLA  &COUNTR                                                  32116042
         LCLA  &ADD                                                     32190042
         DC    AL1(128)                                                 32264042
         DC    BL.8'&PARAM'                                             32338042
         DC    AL2(&ROUTINE-&CSECT)                                     32412042
         DC    AL2(&COUNTR)                                             32486042
&ADD     SETA  1                                                        32560042
         AIF   ('&SPACE' EQ '').NORM                                    32634042
&ADD     SETA  &SPACE                                                   32708042
.NORM    ANOP                                                           32782042
&COUNTR  SETA  &COUNTR+&ADD                                             32856042
         MEND                                                           32930042
         MACRO                                                          33004042
         SUM   &LOGITEM,&MASK                                           33078042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES A NORMAL EDIT ENTRY  33152042
.*                                 FOR PROCESSING BY THE SUMMARY MODULE 33226042
.*                            &LOGITEM - NAME OF DATA ITEM TO BE SUMMED 33300042
.*                            &MASK - BYTE MASK FOR BITS TO BE TESTED.  33374042
.*                                 THIS OPERAND SHOULD BE OMITTED FOR   33448042
.*                                 SINGLE BIT ITEMS IN WHICH CASE THE   33522042
.*                                 MASK WILL BE SET ACCORDING TO THE    33596042
.*                                 OFF BYTE BIT DISPLACEMENT OF THE     33670042
.*                                ITEM AS DEFINED BY THE MACRO 'DSGEN'  33744042
         GBLA  &COUNTR,&ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000)                33818042
         GBLC  &ITEM(1000),&DSECT                                       33892042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&M,&BITNBR                           33966042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           34040042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   34114042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      34188042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  34262042
         MNOTE *,'LOGITEM NOT FOUND'                                    34336042
         MEXIT                                                          34410042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           34484042
         DC    AL1(0)                                                   34558042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             34632042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              34706042
         AIF   ('&MASK' EQ '').FORM                                     34780042
         DC    B'&MASK'                                                 34854042
         AGO   .ITEM                                                    34928042
.FORM    ANOP                                                           35002042
&BITNBR  SETA  &ISHIFT-7                                                35076042
&BITNBR  SETA  0-&BITNBR                                                35150042
&M       SETA  1                                                        35224042
.LOOP2   ANOP                                                           35298042
         AIF   (&BITNBR EQ 0).GOTIT                                     35372042
&M       SETA  &M*2                                                     35446042
&BITNBR  SETA  &BITNBR-1                                                35520042
         AGO   .LOOP2                                                   35594042
.GOTIT   ANOP                                                           35668042
         DC    AL1(&M)                                                  35742042
.ITEM    DC    AL2(&LOGITEM-&DSECT)                                     35816042
         DC    AL2(&COUNTR)                                             35890042
&COUNTR  SETA  &COUNTR+1                                                35964042
         MEND                                                           36038042
         GBLC  &DSECT,&CSECT                                            36112042
&DSECT   SETC  'XXX3'                                                   36186042
&CSECT   SETC  'IFCSXXX3'                                               36260042
IFCSXXX3 CSECT                                                          36334042

         DSGEN (XKEY1,16),(XDUM1,8),(XSW,1),(SW2B1,1),           S21021X37074042

         DSGEN (XDUM2,32)                    SPARES                     37296042

         DSGEN (XCSWATTN,1),(XCSWSM,1),(XCSWUA,1),(XCSWBSY,1),         C38036042

*                                                                S21021 40922042
IFCSXXX3 CSECT                                                          40996042
         USING XXX3,R2                                                  41070042
         USING *,R9                                                     41144042
         DC    A(ENTRIES)               PTR TO ENTRIES                  41218042
         DC    A(PEDIT)                 PTR TO EDIT SECTION OF SUM TBL  41292042
REG8     DC    F'0'                     R8 SAVE AREA CURRENT ENTRY      41366042
SCSIZE   DC    H'118'                                            S21021 41440042

R1       EQU   1                                                        41588042
R2       EQU   2                                                        41662042

*                                                                       42698042
*        SPECIAL ROUTINE SECTION   R2=PTR TO LOGREC R9=BASE ADDR        42772042
*                                  R3=PTR TO BUM COUNTER                42846042
XFAILCCW EQU   *                                                        42920042
         TM    XSW,HEX20                IS THIS A SHORT RECORD?  S21021 42994042
         BCR   1,R14                    YES, NO CCW, RETURN      S21021 43068042
*                                                                       43142042
         STM   R14,R12,L12(R13)         SAVE REGS                       43216042
         SR    R7,R7                                                    43290042
         IC    R7,XFCCWCC               PICK UP FAILING CCW CODE        43364042
         B     COMMON                                                   43438042
*                                                                       43512042
*                                                                       43586042
XDATE1   STM   R14,R15,L12(R13)         SAVE R14 & R 15          S21021 43660042
         BAL   R14,EXPANDER             BAL TO EXPAND REC        S21021 43734042
         STM   R0,R12,L20(R13)          SAVE REMAINDER OF REGS   S21021 43808042
         CLC   XDATE(L4),HEX00         IS DATE ZERO                     43882042
         BE    RETURN                   BR-ZERO                         43956042
         CLC   L0(L4,R3),HEX00          IS LOW DATE ZERO                44030042
         BNE   XDATE2                   BR-NO                           44104042
         MVC   L0(L4,R3),XDATE          MOVE IN DATE                    44178042
XDATE2   EQU   *                                                        44252042
         CLC   XDATE(L4),L0(R3)         CHECK FOR LOW DATE              44326042
         BL    SAVELOW                  LOWER SAVE IT                   44400042
         CLC   XDATE(L4),L4(R3)         CHECK FOR HI                    44474042
         BNH   RETURN                   BR-NOT HI                       44548042
SAVEHI   MVC   L4(L4,R3),XDATE          MOVE HI DATE                    44622042
         B     RETURN                                                   44696042
SAVELOW  MVC   L0(L4,R3),XDATE          MOVE LOW DATE                   44770042
         B     RETURN                                                   44844042
*                                                                       44918042
*                                                                S21021 44992042
*                                       ROUTINE TO SUM SDR CNTRS S21021 45066042
*                                                                S21021 45140042
SDR1L    IC    R15,SDR1                                          S21021 45214042
SDRLEFT  SLL   R15,L24                  SHIFT OFF UNUSED BITS    S21021 45288042
SDRADD   SRL   R15,L28                  MOVE IT BACK FOR ADD     S21021 45362042
         AH    R15,L0(R3)               ADD IN COUNTER           S21021 45436042
         STH   R15,L0(R3)               SAVE RESULT              S21021 45510042
         BR    R14  RETURN                                       S21021 45584042
SDR1R    IC    R15,SDR1                 PICK UP COUNTER          S21021 45658042

         A     R7,STLBTBAD              SET TO LABEL             S21021 72964042
         MVC   L0(L13,R5),L0(R7)        MOVE IN LABEL            S21021 73038042
         B     STLBL001                                          S21021 73112042
STLBLNUS DS    0H                                                S21021 73186042
         MVC   L0(L13,R5),STLBNTUS      'NOT USED' LABEL         S21021 73260042
STLBL001 DS    0H                                                S21021 73334042
         LA    R5,L14(R5)               BUMP R5                  S21021 73408042
         LA    R7,STLBTABL              GET PROPER LABEL         S21021 73482042
         LA    R8,L1(R8)                POINT TO NEXT INDEX      S21021 73556042
         C     R8,STLBLEND              AT END OF LIST?          S21021 73630042
         BNE   STLABLP                  NO, CONTINUE             S21021 73704042
         B     RETURNA                                           S21021 73778042
*                                                                S21021 73852042
STLBNTUS DC    C'NOT USED     '                                  S21021 73926042
STLBLIST DS    0C                                                S21021 74000042
         DC    X'080A'                                           S21021 74074042
         DC    X'000102030406FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF07' 1443 STAT LABES21021 74148042
         DC    X'0810'                                           S21021 74222042
         DC    X'0001020304FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF07' 2671 STAT LABES21021 74296042

         DC    X'00010203040508FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF07'     1419 2 BYTE      74592042

         DC    X'081F'                                                  74834042
         DC    X'00010203040508FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF07'     1275 2 BYTE      74854042
