./  ADD  SSI=63160145,NAME=IFCSXXX5
         TITLE 'IFCSXXX5 - SUM TABLE - LINKNAME=IFCS2301'               00075042
         SPACE 2                                                        00150042
*  LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO            * 00225042
         MACRO                                                          00300042
&NAME    LINE  &DATA,&LABEL,&SKIP=                                      00375042
.*                            THIS MACRO ESTABLISHES THE MARGINS OR     00450042
.*                                 COLUMN SETTINGS FOR EACH LINE. IT    00525042
.*                                 GENERATES NECESSARY CARRIAGE CONTROL 00600042
.*                                 ENTRIES. LASTLY IT DETERMINES THE    00675042
.*                                 NUMBER OF ENTRIES ASSOCIATED WITH    00750042
.*                                 THE PREVIOUS LINE AND STORES THAT #  00825042
.*                                 INTO THE APPROPRIATE BYTE.           00900042
.*                                 &DATA(1) - CHARACTER POSITION TO     00975042
.*                                 BEGIN DATA.                          01050042
.*                                                                      01125042
.*                                 &DATA(2) - # OF SPACES BETWEEN       01200042
.*                                 SUCCESSIVE DATA COLUMN STARTING      01275042
.*                                 CHARACTERS.                          01350042
.*                                                                      01425042
.*                                 &LABEL(1) - CHARACTER POSITION       01500042
.*                                 TO BEGIN LABELS.                     01575042
.*                                                                      01650042
.*                                 &LABEL(2) - # OF SPACES BETWEEN      01725042
.*                                 LINE'S LABEL STARTING CHARACTERS.    01800042
.*                                                                      01875042
.*                                 &SKIP= - # OF LINES TO ADVANCE       01950042
.*                                 CARRIAGE TO BEGIN NEXT PRINTED LINE. 02025042
.*                                                                      02100042
.*                                 NEW ENTRIES ARE GENERATED ONLY WHEN  02175042
.*                                 NECESSARY. OMISSION OF ITEMS MEANS   02250042
.*                                 THEY HAVE NOT CHANGED SINCE PREVIOUS 02325042
.*                                 SETTINGS. A LINE MACRO IS REQUIRED   02400042
.*                                 FOR EACH PRINTED LINE. IF NO SETTING 02475042
.*                                 CHANGES ARE REQUIRED ALL OPERANDS    02550042
.*                                 ARE OMITTED IN WHICH CASE ONLY THE   02625042
.*                                 # OF ENTRIES FOR THE PREVIOUS LINE   02700042
.*                                 FIRST MACRO INSTRUCTION ISSUED FOR   02775042
.*                                 THE SUBJECT LINE.                    02850042
         GBLA  &DB,&DT,&LB,&LT,&NRENTS                                  02925042
         GBLA  &LASTCC,&INITIAL                                         03000042
         GBLC  &NRENTSX                                                 03075042
         GBLC  &CARRCON                                                 03150042
         GBLB  &TEST                                                    03225042
         LCLA  &S                                                       03300042
&NAME    DS    0C                                                       03375042
         AIF   (&INITIAL EQ 0).FIRSTLN                                  03450042
         LINEND                                                         03525042
         AGO   .NTFIRST                                                 03600042
.FIRSTLN ANOP                                                           03675042
&NRENTSX SETC  'N&SYSNDX'                                               03750042
&INITIAL SETA  1                                                        03825042
&LASTCC  SETA  1                                                        03900042
N&SYSNDX EQU   *                                                        03975042
.NTFIRST ANOP                                                           04050042
         DC    AL1(0)                                                   04125042
         AIF   ('&DATA(1)' EQ '').CKDTABS                               04200042
         AIF   ('&DATA'(1,1) NE '(').SLABEL                             04275042
         AIF   (&DATA(1) EQ &DB).CKDTABS                                04350042
&DB      SETA  &DATA(1)                                                 04425042
         AGO   .AA                                                      04500042
.CKDTABS AIF   ('&DATA(2)' EQ '').NCDATA                                04575042
         AIF   (&DATA(2) EQ &DT).NCDATA                                 04650042
         AGO   .CC                                                      04725042
.AA      AIF   ('&DATA(2)' EQ '').BB                                    04800042
         AIF   (&DATA(2) EQ &DT).BB                                     04875042
.CC      ANOP                                                           04950042
&DT      SETA  &DATA(2)                                                 05025042
.BB      DC    XL2'FFFE'                                                05100042
         DC    FL1'&DB'                                                 05175042
         DC    FL1'&DT'                                                 05250042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                05325042
.NCDATA  ANOP                                                           05400042
         AIF   ('&LABEL(1)' EQ '').CKLTABS                              05475042
         AIF   ('&LABEL'(1,1) NE '(').SLABEL                            05550042
         AIF   (&LABEL(1) EQ &LB).CKLTABS                               05625042
&LB      SETA  &LABEL(1)                                                05700042
         AGO   .AAA                                                     05775042
.CKLTABS AIF   ('&LABEL(2)' EQ '').NCLABEL                              05850042
         AIF   (&LABEL(2) EQ &LT).NCLABEL                               05925042
         AGO   .CCC                                                     06000042
.AAA     AIF   ('&LABEL(2)' EQ '').BBB                                  06075042
         AIF   (&LABEL(2) EQ &LT).BBB                                   06150042
.CCC     ANOP                                                           06225042
&LT      SETA  &LABEL(2)                                                06300042
.BBB     DC    XL2'FFFF'                                                06375042
         DC    FL1'&LB'                                                 06450042
         DC    FL1'&LT'                                                 06525042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                06600042
.NCLABEL ANOP                                                           06675042
         AIF   ('&SKIP' EQ 'E').EJECT                                   06750042
         AIF   ('&SKIP' EQ '').TESTOFF                                  06825042
.CONT    ANOP                                                           06900042
         AIF   (&TEST EQ 0).AB                                          06975042
         AIF   (&SKIP EQ &LASTCC).TESTOFF                               07050042
&S       SETA  &SKIP                                                    07125042
         ORG   &CARRCON+3                                               07200042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&S),AL.3(1)                                 07275042
         ORG                                                            07350042
&LASTCC  SETA  &S                                                       07425042
.SLABEL  ANOP                                                           07500042
.TESTOFF ANOP                                                           07575042
&TEST    SETB  0                                                        07650042
         AGO   .DD                                                      07725042
.EJECT   DC    XL2'FFFB'                                                07800042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                07875042
         DC    X'8B'              SKIP TO CHANNEL 1                     07950042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&LASTCC),AL.3(1)                            08025042
&TEST    SETB  1                                                        08100042
         AGO   .DD                                                      08175042
.AB      AIF   (&SKIP EQ &LASTCC).NOCHANG                               08250042
A&SYSNDX DC    XL2'FFFB'                                                08325042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&SKIP),AL.3(1)                              08400042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&SKIP),AL.3(1)                              08475042
&LASTCC  SETA  &SKIP                                                    08550042
&TEST    SETB  1                                                        08625042
&CARRCON SETC  'A&SYSNDX'                                               08700042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                08775042
.DD      ANOP                                                           08850042
.NOCHANG ANOP                                                           08925042
         MEND                                                           09000042
         EJECT                                                          09075042
         SPACE 2                                                        09150042
*  ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO* 09225042
         MACRO                                                          09300042
&NAME    ROUTINE &LOGITEM,&RNAME                                        09375042
         GBLC  &DSECT,&CSECT                                            09450042
         GBLC  &ITEM(1000)                                              09525042
         GBLA  &SHIFT(1000),&ITEMNBR                                    09600042
         GBLA  &NRENTS                                                  09675042
         LCLA  &ISHIFT,&NDX                                             09750042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           09825042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   09900042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      09975042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  10050042
         MNOTE *,'LOG ITEM NOT DEFINED'                                 10125042
         MEXIT                                                          10200042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           10275042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             10350042
&NAME    DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'D'                           10425042
         DC    AL.4(&ISHIFT),AL.12(&RNAME-&CSECT)                       10500042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                10575042
         MEND                                                           10650042
*  DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO        * 10725042
         SPACE 2                                                        10800042
         MACRO                                                          10875042
&NAME    DSGEN &X1,&X2,&X3,&X4,&X5,&X6,&X7,&X8,&X9,&X10,&X11,&X12,&X13,X10950042
               &X14,&X15,&X16,&X17,&X18,&X19,&X20,&X21,&X22,&X23,&X24, X11025042
               &X25,&X26,&X27,&X28,&X29,&X30,&X31,&X32                  11100042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES ONE DSECT WORD       11175042
.*                                 FORMATTED FOR THE SUBJECT LOG RECORD 11250042
.*                                 EACH OPERAND HAS TWO SUB LISTS. THE  11325042
.*                                 FIRST IS THE NAME OF THE LOG ITEM    11400042
.*                                 WHILE THE SECOND IS THE # OF BITS TO 11475042
.*                                 ALLOCATE FOR THIS ITEM. ITEMS MUST   11550042
.*                                 BE DEFINED CONTIGUOUSLY WITHOUT GAPS 11625042
.*                                 UNUSED BIT GROUPS MUST BE GIVEN      11700042
.*                                 DUMMY NAMES. THE NAMES PROVIDED FOR  11775042
.*                                 THE LOG ITEMS MAY THEN BE USED IN    11850042
.*                                 THE CONVERSION MACRO INSTRUCTIONS.   11925042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000)                                               12000042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000)                         12075042
         LCLC  &SYMBOL                                                  12150042
         LCLA  &OP,&COUNT,&BYTE                                         12225042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           12300042
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    12375042
&ITEMNBR SETA  &ITEMNBR+1                                               12450042
&SYMBOL  SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP,1)'                                        12525042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,2)' NE '').OK1                            12600042
         MNOTE *,'NULL BIT COUNT FIELD'                                 12675042
         MEXIT                                                          12750042
.OK1     ANOP                                                           12825042
         AIF   ('&SYMBOL' NE '').OK                                     12900042
         MNOTE 'LOG ITEM SYMBOL NOT PROVIDED'                           12975042
         AGO   .CNT                                                     13050042
.OK      ANOP                                                           13125042
         AIF   ('&SYMBOL'(1,1) EQ '''').CNT                *TEMP*       13200042
&SYMBOL  EQU   *+&BYTE                                                  13275042
&ITEM(&ITEMNBR)  SETC '&SYSLIST(&OP,1)'                                 13350042
&BITS(&ITEMNBR) SETA &SYSLIST(&OP,2)                                    13425042
&SHIFT(&ITEMNBR) SETA &COUNT-&BYTE*8                                    13500042
.CNT     ANOP                                                           13575042
&COUNT   SETA  &COUNT+&SYSLIST(&OP,2)                                   13650042
&BYTE    SETA  &COUNT/8                                                 13725042
         AIF (&OP LT N'&SYSLIST).LOOP                                   13800042
         AIF   (&COUNT NE 32).NOT32                                     13875042
&NAME    DS    4C                                                       13950042
         MEXIT                                                          14025042
.NOT32   AIF   (&COUNT NE 64).ERR                                       14100042
&NAME    DS    8C                                                       14175042
         MEXIT                                                          14250042
.ERR     MNOTE '**BIT COUNT FIELDS DO NOT TOTAL 32 OR 64**'             14325042
         MEND                                                           14400042
         MACRO                                                          14475042
         LINEND                                                         14550042
.*                            THIS MACRO IS USED ONLY BY THE LINE       14625042
.*                                 MACRO TO SET THE NUMBER OF ENTRIES   14700042
.*                                 ASSOCIATED WITH EACH LINE.           14775042
         GBLA  &NRENTS                                                  14850042
         GBLC &NRENTSX                                                  14925042
         ORG   &NRENTSX                                                 15000042
         DC    FL1'&NRENTS'                                             15075042
         ORG                                                            15150042
&NRENTS  SETA  0                                                        15225042
B&SYSNDX EQU   *                                                        15300042
&NRENTSX SETC  'B&SYSNDX'                                               15375042
         MEND                                                           15450042
         SPACE 2                                                        15525042
         EJECT                                                          15600042
*  LABEL MACRO     LABEL MACRO     LABEL MACRO     LABEL MACRO        * 15675042
         SPACE 2                                                        15750042
         MACRO                                                          15825042
&NAME    LABEL &LABEL1,&LABEL2,&LABEL3,&LABEL4,&LABEL5,&LABEL6,        C15900042
               &LABEL7,&LABEL8                                          15975042
.*                            THIS MACRO ALLOWS UP TO ACHT LABELS TO    16050042
.*                                 BE SPECIFIED FOR A GIVEN LINE. THE   16125042
.*                                 LABELS SHOULD BE ENCLOSED IN QUOTA-  16200042
.*                                 TION MARKS. THE COLUMN AND LINE END  16275042
.*                                 CONTROLS WILL BE INSERTED BY THE     16350042
.*                                 MACRO. OMITTED OPERANDS MEAN NO      16425042
.*                                 LABEL REQUIRED FOR RESPECTIVE        16500042
.*                                 COLUMN. THIS MACRO WILL ALSO ALERT   16575042
.*                                 THE PROGRAMMER TO EXACTLY WHERE THE  16650042
.*                                 TABLE MUST BE BROKEN IF NECESSARY    16725042
.*                                 TO AVOID EXCEEDING THE MAXIMUM LIMIT 16800042
         GBLC &LABELS(2000)                                             16875042
         GBLC  &LBL(100)                                                16950042
         GBLA  &LBLCTR(100)                                             17025042
         GBLA  &LABELNR                                                 17100042
         GBLA  &NRENTS,&LPTR                                            17175042
         LCLC  &MARGIN,&TACK                                            17250042
         LCLC  &TEXT                                                    17325042
         LCLA  &OP,&K,&START,&NRCHAR,&REMAIN                            17400042
&MARGIN  SETC  '*'                                                      17475042
         AIF   ('&NAME' EQ '').LOOPOUT                                  17550042
&LPTR    SETA  &LPTR+1                                                  17625042
&LBL(&LPTR) SETC '&NAME'                                                17700042
&LBLCTR(&LPTR) SETA &LABELNR+1                                          17775042
.LOOPOUT ANOP                                                           17850042
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    17925042
&K       SETA  K'&SYSLIST(&OP)                                          18000042
         AIF (&K GE 2).NORM                                             18075042
&K       SETA  2                                                        18150042
.NORM    ANOP                                                           18225042
&START   SETA  2                                                        18300042
         AIF (&OP LT N'&SYSLIST).NOTLAST                                18375042
&MARGIN  SETC  '$'                                                      18450042
.NOTLAST ANOP                                                           18525042
&NRCHAR  SETA  8                                                        18600042
&TACK    SETC  ''                                                       18675042
.LOOPIN  ANOP                                                           18750042
&REMAIN  SETA  &K-&START                                                18825042
         AIF (&REMAIN GE 8).MORE                                        18900042
&TACK    SETC  '&MARGIN'                                                18975042
&NRCHAR  SETA  &REMAIN                                                  19050042
.MORE    ANOP                                                           19125042
&TEXT    SETC  ''                                                       19200042
         AIF (&REMAIN EQ 0).ENDTEXT                                     19275042
&TEXT    SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP)'(&START,&NRCHAR)                          19350042
.ENDTEXT ANOP                                                           19425042
&LABELNR SETA  &LABELNR+1                                               19500042
&LABELS(&LABELNR) SETC '&TEXT'.'&TACK'                                  19575042
&START   SETA  &START+8                                                 19650042
         AIF ('&TACK' EQ '').LOOPIN                                     19725042
         AIF ('&TACK' EQ '*').LOOPOUT                                   19800042
         MEND                                                           19875042
         SPACE 2                                                        19950042
         MACRO                                                          20025042
         LSTART                                                         20100042
.*                            THIS MACRO IS ISSUED WHEN THE LABEL AREA  20175042
.*                                 OF THE TABLE IS TO BEGIN.            20250042
         GBLC &LABELS(2000)                                             20325042
         GBLA  &LABELNR                                                 20400042
         GBLC  &LBL(100)                                                20475042
         GBLA  &LBLCTR(100)                                             20550042
         LCLA  &NDX,&CTR                                                20625042
         LINEND                                                         20700042
&CTR     SETA  1                                                        20775042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           20850042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   20925042
         AIF   (&LBLCTR(&CTR) NE &NDX).NOLBL                            21000042
&LBL(&CTR) DC  C'&LABELS(&NDX)'                                         21075042
&CTR     SETA  &CTR+1                                                   21150042
         AGO   .LOOPCTL                                                 21225042
.NOLBL   ANOP                                                           21300042
         DC    C'&LABELS(&NDX)'                                         21375042
.LOOPCTL AIF   (&NDX LT &LABELNR).LOOP                                  21450042
         MEND                                                           21525042
         SPACE 2                                                        21600042
*  BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO  * 21675042
         SPACE 2                                                        21750042
         MACRO                                                          21825042
         BIN   &LOGITEM,&SKIP$OR                                        21900042
.*                                 &LOGITEM - NAME OF ITEM IN LOG       21975042
.*                                      RECORD DSECT                    22050042
.*                                 &SKIP$OR - NBR OF SPACES TO SKIP ON  22125042
.*                                 MULTIPLE PRINT OR NBR OF SPACES      22200042
.*                                      TO BACK UP FROM COLUMN FOR      22275042
.*                                      START OF PRINTING. THE LETTER   22350042
.*                                      B PRECEEDS THE NUMBER (B5) IF   22425042
.*                                      THE LATTER IS DESIRED. OMISSION 22500042
.*                                      OF THIS OPERAND FORCES OPTION 2 22575042
.*                                      WITH BACKUP SPACING EQUAL TO    22650042
.*                                 THE NUMBER OF BITS IN THE ITEM       22725042
.*                                 DEFINITION (VIA MACRO 'DSGEN').      22800042
.*                            A LIMIT OF 15 BITS IS IMPOSED FOR THE     22875042
.*                                 TOTAL NUMBER OF BITS TO PRINT.       22950042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000)                                               23025042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000),&NRENTS                 23100042
         GBLC  &DSECT                                                   23175042
         LCLB  &B                                                       23250042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&K                                   23325042
         LCLA  &TEMP,&T                                                 23400042
         LCLC  &S                                                       23475042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           23550042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   23625042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      23700042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  23775042
         MNOTE *,'YOU BLEW IT'                                          23850042
         ROUTINE DUM,SKIPPER                                            23925042
         MEXIT                                                          24000042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           24075042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             24150042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              24225042
&T       SETA  &IBITS-1                                                 24300042
&B       SETB  0                                                        24375042
         AIF   ('&SKIP$OR' EQ '').BACKUP                                24450042
&K       SETA  K'&SKIP$OR                                               24525042
&B       SETB  ('&SKIP$OR'(1,1) EQ 'B')                                 24600042
&S       SETC  '&SKIP$OR'(&B+1,&K-&B)                                   24675042
&T       SETA  &S                                                       24750042
.BACKUP  ANOP                                                           24825042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                24900042
&TEMP    SETA  &ISHIFT                                                  24975042
A&SYSNDX DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'&TEMP'                       25050042
         AIF (&IBITS EQ 1 AND &B EQ 0).OUT                              25125042
         ORG   A&SYSNDX                                                 25200042
&B       SETB  1                                                        25275042
         DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'C'                           25350042
         DC    BL.1'&B',AL.7(&T),AL.4(&IBITS),FL.4'&ISHIFT'             25425042
.OUT     ANOP                                                           25500042
         MEND                                                           25575042
         EJECT                                                          25650042
*  HEX MACRO     HEX MACRO     HEX MACRO    HEXN MACRO     HEX MACRO  * 25725042
         SPACE 2                                                        25800042
         MACRO                                                          25875042
         HEX   &LOGITEM,&SKIP$OR,&BYTES                                 25950042
.*                            THIS MACRO FACILITATES GENERATION OF THE  26025042
.*                                 TABLE ENTRIES SPECIFYING HEX TYPE    26100042
.*                                 CONVERSIONS.                         26175042
.*                            &LOGITEM - NAME OF DATA ITEM TO BE        26250042
.*                                 CONVERTED                            26325042
.*                            &SKIP$OR - NUMBER OF SPACES TO SKIP ON    26400042
.*                                 MULTIPLE PRINT OR NBR OF SPACES TO   26475042
.*                                 BACK UP FROM COLUMN FOR START OF     26550042
.*                                 PRINTING. THE LETTER B PRECEEDS THE  26625042
.*                                 NUMBER (B8) IF THE LATTER OPTION IS  26700042
.*                                 DESIRED. OMISSION OF THIS OPERAND    26775042
.*                                 FORCES OPTION 2 WITH BACKUP SPACING  26850042
.*                                 EQUAL TO THE NUMBER OF BYTES SPECI-  26925042
.*                                 FIED BY THE NEXT OPERAND (TWICE THIS 27000042
.*                                 NUMBER IF SUFFIX IS EXPLICITLY OR    27075042
.*                                 IMPLICITLY B).                       27150042
.*                            &BYTES - NUMBER OF TOTAL INPUT BYTES TO   27225042
.*                                 PROCESS. THIS NUMBER IS SUFFIXED     27300042
.*                                 WITH AN L,R, OR B TO STIPULATE       27375042
.*                                 PRINTING OF THE LEFT HALF, RIGHT     27450042
.*                                 HALF, OR BOTH HALVES OF THE BYTE     27525042
.*                                 RESPECTIVELY. OMISSION OF THIS       27600042
.*                                 OPERAND DEFAULTS TO B WITH THE NUM-  27675042
.*                                 BER OF BYTES EQUAL TO THE ITEM LNGTH 27750042
.*                            A NEW ENTRY IS GENERATED ONLY WHEN NECES- 27825042
.*                                 SARY. THIS MACRO MUST BE THE FIRST   27900042
.*                                 MACRO INSTRUCTION ISSUED FOR THE     27975042
.*                                 SUBJECT LINE(S).                     28050042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000),&DSECT                                        28125042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000),&NRENTS                 28200042
         LCLB  &B                                                       28275042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&K,&T,&CODE,&BYTESP                  28350042
         LCLC  &S,&LETTER                                               28425042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           28500042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   28575042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      28650042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  28725042
         MNOTE *,'LOG ITEM NOT DEFINED'                                 28800042
         MEXIT                                                          28875042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           28950042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             29025042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              29100042
&CODE    SETA  1                                                        29175042
&K       SETA  K'&BYTES                                                 29250042
         AIF   (&IBITS-(&IBITS/4)*4 EQ 0).OK                            29325042
         MNOTE *,'BIT LENGTH SPECIFICATION INCONSISTENT WITH CONTROL'   29400042
         MEXIT                                                          29475042
.OK      AIF   ('&BYTES' EQ '').USEDEFN                                 29550042
&LETTER  SETC  '&BYTES'(&K,1)                                           29625042
&S       SETC  '&BYTES'(1,&K-1)                                         29700042
&BYTESP  SETA  &S                                                       29775042
         AIF   ('&LETTER' EQ 'B').BOTH                                  29850042
         AIF   (&ISHIFT EQ 0 OR &ISHIFT EQ 4).OK2                       29925042
.ERR     MNOTE *,'DATA NOT ALLIGNED ON HEX OR BYTE BOUNDARY'            30000042
         MEXIT                                                          30075042
.USEDEFN ANOP                                                           30150042
&BYTESP  SETA  &IBITS/8                                                 30225042
.BOTH    AIF   (&ISHIFT NE 0).ERR                                       30300042
&CODE    SETA  3                                                        30375042
&T       SETA  &BYTESP*2-1                                              30450042
&S       SETC  '&T'                                                     30525042
.OK2     AIF   (&ISHIFT EQ 0).L                                         30600042
&CODE    SETA  2                                                        30675042
.L       ANOP                                                           30750042
&B       SETB  1                                                        30825042
         AIF   ('&SKIP$OR' EQ '').BACKUP                                30900042
&K       SETA  K'&SKIP$OR                                               30975042
&B       SETB  ('&SKIP$OR'(1,1) EQ 'B')                                 31050042
&S       SETC  '&SKIP$OR'(&B+1,&K-&B)                                   31125042
.BACKUP  ANOP                                                           31200042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                31275042
         DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'A'                           31350042
         DC    BL.1'&B',FL.7'&S',FL.4'&BYTESP',FL.4'&CODE'              31425042
.OUT     ANOP                                                           31500042
         MEND                                                           31575042
         MACRO                                                          31650042
         SPECIAL  &ROUTINE,&PARAM,&SPACE=                               31725042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES A SPECIAL ROUTINE    31800042
.*                                 ENTRY TO BE PROCESSED BY THE SUM. M. 31875042
.*                            &ROUTINE - SYMBOL ON SPECIAL ROUTINE EWT. 31950042
.*                            &PARAM - AN 8 BIT BINARY REPRESENTATION   32025042
.*                                 TO OCCUPY THE 'MASK' FIELD BUT TO BE 32100042
.*                                 INTERPRETED AS AN ARGUMENT OF THE    32175042
.*                                 SPECIAL ROUTINE.                     32250042
.*                            &SPACE - THE NUMBER OF 2BYTE COUNTERS TO  32325042
.*                                 ALLOCATE FOR REQUIRED PROCESSING.    32400042
         GBLC  &CSECT                                                   32475042
         GBLA  &COUNTR                                                  32550042
         LCLA  &ADD                                                     32625042
         DC    AL1(128)                                                 32700042
         DC    BL.8'&PARAM'                                             32775042
         DC    AL2(&ROUTINE-&CSECT)                                     32850042
         DC    AL2(&COUNTR)                                             32925042
&ADD     SETA  1                                                        33000042
         AIF   ('&SPACE' EQ '').NORM                                    33075042
&ADD     SETA  &SPACE                                                   33150042
.NORM    ANOP                                                           33225042
&COUNTR  SETA  &COUNTR+&ADD                                             33300042
         MEND                                                           33375042
         MACRO                                                          33450042
         SUM   &LOGITEM,&MASK                                           33525042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES A NORMAL EDIT ENTRY  33600042
.*                                 FOR PROCESSING BY THE SUMMARY MODULE 33675042
.*                            &LOGITEM - NAME OF DATA ITEM TO BE SUMMED 33750042
.*                            &MASK - BYTE MASK FOR BITS TO BE TESTED.  33825042
.*                                 THIS OPERAND SHOULD BE OMITTED FOR   33900042
.*                                 SINGLE BIT ITEMS IN WHICH CASE THE   33975042
.*                                 MASK WILL BE SET ACCORDING TO THE    34050042
.*                                 OFF BYTE BIT DISPLACEMENT OF THE     34125042
.*                                ITEM AS DEFINED BY THE MACRO 'DSGEN'  34200042
         GBLA  &COUNTR,&ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000)                34275042
         GBLC  &ITEM(1000),&DSECT                                       34350042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&M,&BITNBR                           34425042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           34500042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   34575042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      34650042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  34725042
         MNOTE *,'LOGITEM NOT FOUND'                                    34800042
         MEXIT                                                          34875042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           34950042
         DC    AL1(0)                                                   35025042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             35100042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              35175042
         AIF   ('&MASK' EQ '').FORM                                     35250042
         DC    B'&MASK'                                                 35325042
         AGO   .ITEM                                                    35400042
.FORM    ANOP                                                           35475042
&BITNBR  SETA  &ISHIFT-7                                                35550042
&BITNBR  SETA  0-&BITNBR                                                35625042
&M       SETA  1                                                        35700042
.LOOP2   ANOP                                                           35775042
         AIF   (&BITNBR EQ 0).GOTIT                                     35850042
&M       SETA  &M*2                                                     35925042
&BITNBR  SETA  &BITNBR-1                                                36000042
         AGO   .LOOP2                                                   36075042
.GOTIT   ANOP                                                           36150042
         DC    AL1(&M)                                                  36225042
.ITEM    DC    AL2(&LOGITEM-&DSECT)                                     36300042
         DC    AL2(&COUNTR)                                             36375042
&COUNTR  SETA  &COUNTR+1                                                36450042
         MEND                                                           36525042
         GBLC  &DSECT,&CSECT                                            36600042
&CSECT   SETC  'IFCSXXX5'                                               36675042
&DSECT   SETC  'XXX5'                                                   36750042

XFAILCCW EQU   *                                                        43950042

*                                                                       44175042

         SR    R7,R7                                                    44325042
         IC    R7,XFCCWCC               PICK UP FAILING CCW CODE        44400042

*                                                                       44625042
XDATE1   STM   R14,R15,L12(R13)         SAVE R14 & R 15          S21021 44700042
         BAL   R14,EXPANDER             BAL TO EXPAND REC        S21021 44775042
         STM   R0,R12,L20(R13)          SAVE REMAINDER OF REGS   S21021 44850042
         CLC   XDATE(L4),HEX00         IS DATE ZERO                     44925042
         BE    RETURN                   BR-ZERO                         45000042
         CLC   L0(L4,R3),HEX00          IS LOW DATE ZERO                45075042
         BNE   XDATE2                   BR-NO                           45150042
         MVC   L0(L4,R3),XDATE          MOVE IN DATE                    45225042
XDATE2   EQU   *                                                        45300042
         CLC   XDATE(L4),L0(R3)         CHECK FOR LOW DATE              45375042
         BL    SAVELOW                  LOWER SAVE IT                   45450042

SETVOLS  TM    XSW,HEX20                IS THIS A SHORT RECORD?  S21021 46050042
         BCR   1,R14                    YES, NO VOLSER, RETURN   S21021 46125042
         STM   R5,R8,XSAVE              SAVE REGS                S21021 46200042
         LA    R5,L10              SET COUNTER POINTER &                46275042
         LR    R6,R3               LOOP COUNTER                         46350042

         BE    SETVOL2             BR-YES                               46500042

SETCPUNO STM   R5,R8,XSAVE              SAVE REGS                S21021 69150042
         SR    R5,R5                    CLEAAR R5                S21021 69225042
         IC    R5,0(R4)                 PICK UP                  S21021 69300042
         SLL   R5,R8                      CPU TYPE               S21021 69375042
         IC    R5,L1(R4)                    FIELD                S21021 69450042
         LTR   R5,R5                    IS TI ZERO?              S21021 69525042
         BNZ   RETURNA                  NO, LINE IS GOOD, RETURN S21021 69600042
         LA    R6,L64                   ELSE, BACK UP DATA PTR   S21021 69675042
         SR    R3,R6                    TO PUT IN NEW INFO       S21021 69750042
         MVC   0(L6,R3),SHARED          SAY MODEL SHARED       @Z427VLS 69825042
         B     RETURNA                  RETURN                   S21021 69975042
*                                                                S21021 70050042
CONVERT  STM   R5,R8,XSAVE              SAVE REGS                       70125042
         LH    R5,L0(R4)                PICK UP COUNT                   70200042
CONV1    CVD   R5,WORK                  CONVERT IT TO DEVIMALP          70275042
         UNPK  L0(L3,R3),WORK+L5(L3)    UNPACK IT TO PRINT BUFF         70350042
         MVZ   L2(L1,R3),L0(R3)         PUT ON PRINTABLE ZONE           70425042
RETURNA  LM    R5,R8,XSAVE              RESTORE REGS                    70500042
         BR    R14                                                      70575042
*                                                                       70650042
SKIPPER  BR    R14                      RETURN                          70725042
*                                                                       70800042
SETDATE  UNPK  WORK(L8),L0(L4,R4)       PACK DATE                       70875042
         MVZ   WORK+L7(L1),WORK         MOVE ON ZONE                    70950042
         MVC   L0(L3,R3),WORK+L5        MOVE DATE TO PRINT LINE         71025042
         MVC   L5(L2,R3),WORK+L3        MOVE YEAR TO PRINT LINE         71100042
         BR    R14                                                      71175042
*                                                                       71250042

         BCR   L8,R14                   NO TI IS FULL                   71400042
         SR    R15,R15                  STOP LINE PRINTING              71475042
         BR    R14                      RETURN                          71550042
*              SET LABELS                                               71625042
*                                                                       71700042
*                                                                       71775042
*                                                                       71850042
*        FREEE COUNTERS AREA LAST THING DONE                            71925042
*                                                                       72000042
FREECTR  STM   R14,R12,L12(R13)         SAVE ALL REGS                   72075042
         LR    R12,R13                  SAVE SAVE AREA ADDR             72150042
         LA    R13,FSAVE                POINT TO MY SAVE                72225042
         ST    R12,L4(R13)              SET CHAINING POINTERS           72300042
         ST    R13,L8(R12)                                              72375042
         L     R3,L4(R2)                PICK UP POINTER TO NEXT COUNTER 72450042
         ST    R3,L28(R12)              SAVE POINTER IN REG SAVE        72525042
         LH    R0,SIZE                  PICK UP SIZE OF AREA            72600042
         LR    R1,R2                    SET ADDRESS                     72675042
         FREEMAIN R,LV=(0),A=(1)                                        72750042
         LTR   R3,R3                    ANY MORE COUNTERS               72825042
         BZ    RETURN0                  NO  RETURN                      72900042
         LA    R5,PENTRY+L10            POINT TO TOP ENTRY - 4          72975042
         ST    R5,YR9PTR                                                73050042
