./  ADD  SSI=63160147,NAME=IFCSXXX6
         TITLE 'IFCSXXX6 - SUM TABLE - LINKNAME=IFCS2314'               00075042
         SPACE 2                                                        00150042
*  LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO            * 00225042
         MACRO                                                          00300042
&NAME    LINE  &DATA,&LABEL,&SKIP=                                      00375042
.*                            THIS MACRO ESTABLISHES THE MARGINS OR     00450042
.*                                 COLUMN SETTINGS FOR EACH LINE. IT    00525042
.*                                 GENERATES NECESSARY CARRIAGE CONTROL 00600042
.*                                 ENTRIES. LASTLY IT DETERMINES THE    00675042
.*                                 NUMBER OF ENTRIES ASSOCIATED WITH    00750042
.*                                 THE PREVIOUS LINE AND STORES THAT #  00825042
.*                                 INTO THE APPROPRIATE BYTE.           00900042
.*                                 &DATA(1) - CHARACTER POSITION TO     00975042
.*                                 BEGIN DATA.                          01050042
.*                                                                      01125042
.*                                 &DATA(2) - # OF SPACES BETWEEN       01200042
.*                                 SUCCESSIVE DATA COLUMN STARTING      01275042
.*                                 CHARACTERS.                          01350042
.*                                                                      01425042
.*                                 &LABEL(1) - CHARACTER POSITION       01500042
.*                                 TO BEGIN LABELS.                     01575042
.*                                                                      01650042
.*                                 &LABEL(2) - # OF SPACES BETWEEN      01725042
.*                                 LINE'S LABEL STARTING CHARACTERS.    01800042
.*                                                                      01875042
.*                                 &SKIP= - # OF LINES TO ADVANCE       01950042
.*                                 CARRIAGE TO BEGIN NEXT PRINTED LINE. 02025042
.*                                                                      02100042
.*                                 NEW ENTRIES ARE GENERATED ONLY WHEN  02175042
.*                                 NECESSARY. OMISSION OF ITEMS MEANS   02250042
.*                                 THEY HAVE NOT CHANGED SINCE PREVIOUS 02325042
.*                                 SETTINGS. A LINE MACRO IS REQUIRED   02400042
.*                                 FOR EACH PRINTED LINE. IF NO SETTING 02475042
.*                                 CHANGES ARE REQUIRED ALL OPERANDS    02550042
.*                                 ARE OMITTED IN WHICH CASE ONLY THE   02625042
.*                                 # OF ENTRIES FOR THE PREVIOUS LINE   02700042
.*                                 FIRST MACRO INSTRUCTION ISSUED FOR   02775042
.*                                 THE SUBJECT LINE.                    02850042
         GBLA  &DB,&DT,&LB,&LT,&NRENTS                                  02925042
         GBLA  &LASTCC,&INITIAL                                         03000042
         GBLC  &NRENTSX                                                 03075042
         GBLC  &CARRCON                                                 03150042
         GBLB  &TEST                                                    03225042
         LCLA  &S                                                       03300042
&NAME    DS    0C                                                       03375042
         AIF   (&INITIAL EQ 0).FIRSTLN                                  03450042
         LINEND                                                         03525042
         AGO   .NTFIRST                                                 03600042
.FIRSTLN ANOP                                                           03675042
&NRENTSX SETC  'N&SYSNDX'                                               03750042
&INITIAL SETA  1                                                        03825042
&LASTCC  SETA  1                                                        03900042
N&SYSNDX EQU   *                                                        03975042
.NTFIRST ANOP                                                           04050042
         DC    AL1(0)                                                   04125042
         AIF   ('&DATA(1)' EQ '').CKDTABS                               04200042
         AIF   ('&DATA'(1,1) NE '(').SLABEL                             04275042
         AIF   (&DATA(1) EQ &DB).CKDTABS                                04350042
&DB      SETA  &DATA(1)                                                 04425042
         AGO   .AA                                                      04500042
.CKDTABS AIF   ('&DATA(2)' EQ '').NCDATA                                04575042
         AIF   (&DATA(2) EQ &DT).NCDATA                                 04650042
         AGO   .CC                                                      04725042
.AA      AIF   ('&DATA(2)' EQ '').BB                                    04800042
         AIF   (&DATA(2) EQ &DT).BB                                     04875042
.CC      ANOP                                                           04950042
&DT      SETA  &DATA(2)                                                 05025042
.BB      DC    XL2'FFFE'                                                05100042
         DC    FL1'&DB'                                                 05175042
         DC    FL1'&DT'                                                 05250042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                05325042
.NCDATA  ANOP                                                           05400042
         AIF   ('&LABEL(1)' EQ '').CKLTABS                              05475042
         AIF   ('&LABEL'(1,1) NE '(').SLABEL                            05550042
         AIF   (&LABEL(1) EQ &LB).CKLTABS                               05625042
&LB      SETA  &LABEL(1)                                                05700042
         AGO   .AAA                                                     05775042
.CKLTABS AIF   ('&LABEL(2)' EQ '').NCLABEL                              05850042
         AIF   (&LABEL(2) EQ &LT).NCLABEL                               05925042
         AGO   .CCC                                                     06000042
.AAA     AIF   ('&LABEL(2)' EQ '').BBB                                  06075042
         AIF   (&LABEL(2) EQ &LT).BBB                                   06150042
.CCC     ANOP                                                           06225042
&LT      SETA  &LABEL(2)                                                06300042
.BBB     DC    XL2'FFFF'                                                06375042
         DC    FL1'&LB'                                                 06450042
         DC    FL1'&LT'                                                 06525042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                06600042
.NCLABEL ANOP                                                           06675042
         AIF   ('&SKIP' EQ 'E').EJECT                                   06750042
         AIF   ('&SKIP' EQ '').TESTOFF                                  06825042
.CONT    ANOP                                                           06900042
         AIF   (&TEST EQ 0).AB                                          06975042
         AIF   (&SKIP EQ &LASTCC).TESTOFF                               07050042
&S       SETA  &SKIP                                                    07125042
         ORG   &CARRCON+3                                               07200042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&S),AL.3(1)                                 07275042
         ORG                                                            07350042
&LASTCC  SETA  &S                                                       07425042
.SLABEL  ANOP                                                           07500042
.TESTOFF ANOP                                                           07575042
&TEST    SETB  0                                                        07650042
         AGO   .DD                                                      07725042
.EJECT   DC    XL2'FFFB'                                                07800042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                07875042
         DC    X'8B'              SKIP TO CHANNEL 1                     07950042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&LASTCC),AL.3(1)                            08025042
&TEST    SETB  1                                                        08100042
         AGO   .DD                                                      08175042
.AB      AIF   (&SKIP EQ &LASTCC).NOCHANG                               08250042
A&SYSNDX DC    XL2'FFFB'                                                08325042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&SKIP),AL.3(1)                              08400042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&SKIP),AL.3(1)                              08475042
&LASTCC  SETA  &SKIP                                                    08550042
&TEST    SETB  1                                                        08625042
&CARRCON SETC  'A&SYSNDX'                                               08700042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                08775042
.DD      ANOP                                                           08850042
.NOCHANG ANOP                                                           08925042
         MEND                                                           09000042
         EJECT                                                          09075042
         SPACE 2                                                        09150042
*  ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO* 09225042
         MACRO                                                          09300042
&NAME    ROUTINE &LOGITEM,&RNAME                                        09375042
         GBLC  &DSECT,&CSECT                                            09450042
         GBLC  &ITEM(1000)                                              09525042
         GBLA  &SHIFT(1000),&ITEMNBR                                    09600042
         GBLA  &NRENTS                                                  09675042
         LCLA  &ISHIFT,&NDX                                             09750042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           09825042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   09900042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      09975042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  10050042
         MNOTE *,'LOG ITEM NOT DEFINED'                                 10125042
         MEXIT                                                          10200042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           10275042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             10350042
&NAME    DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'D'                           10425042
         DC    AL.4(&ISHIFT),AL.12(&RNAME-&CSECT)                       10500042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                10575042
         MEND                                                           10650042
*  DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO        * 10725042
         SPACE 2                                                        10800042
         MACRO                                                          10875042
&NAME    DSGEN &X1,&X2,&X3,&X4,&X5,&X6,&X7,&X8,&X9,&X10,&X11,&X12,&X13,X10950042
               &X14,&X15,&X16,&X17,&X18,&X19,&X20,&X21,&X22,&X23,&X24, X11025042
               &X25,&X26,&X27,&X28,&X29,&X30,&X31,&X32                  11100042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES ONE DSECT WORD       11175042
.*                                 FORMATTED FOR THE SUBJECT LOG RECORD 11250042
.*                                 EACH OPERAND HAS TWO SUB LISTS. THE  11325042
.*                                 FIRST IS THE NAME OF THE LOG ITEM    11400042
.*                                 WHILE THE SECOND IS THE # OF BITS TO 11475042
.*                                 ALLOCATE FOR THIS ITEM. ITEMS MUST   11550042
.*                                 BE DEFINED CONTIGUOUSLY WITHOUT GAPS 11625042
.*                                 UNUSED BIT GROUPS MUST BE GIVEN      11700042
.*                                 DUMMY NAMES. THE NAMES PROVIDED FOR  11775042
.*                                 THE LOG ITEMS MAY THEN BE USED IN    11850042
.*                                 THE CONVERSION MACRO INSTRUCTIONS.   11925042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000)                                               12000042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000)                         12075042
         LCLC  &SYMBOL                                                  12150042
         LCLA  &OP,&COUNT,&BYTE                                         12225042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           12300042
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    12375042
&ITEMNBR SETA  &ITEMNBR+1                                               12450042
&SYMBOL  SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP,1)'                                        12525042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,2)' NE '').OK1                            12600042
         MNOTE *,'NULL BIT COUNT FIELD'                                 12675042
         MEXIT                                                          12750042
.OK1     ANOP                                                           12825042
         AIF   ('&SYMBOL' NE '').OK                                     12900042
         MNOTE 'LOG ITEM SYMBOL NOT PROVIDED'                           12975042
         AGO   .CNT                                                     13050042
.OK      ANOP                                                           13125042
         AIF   ('&SYMBOL'(1,1) EQ '''').CNT                *TEMP*       13200042
&SYMBOL  EQU   *+&BYTE                                                  13275042
&ITEM(&ITEMNBR)  SETC '&SYSLIST(&OP,1)'                                 13350042
&BITS(&ITEMNBR) SETA &SYSLIST(&OP,2)                                    13425042
&SHIFT(&ITEMNBR) SETA &COUNT-&BYTE*8                                    13500042
.CNT     ANOP                                                           13575042
&COUNT   SETA  &COUNT+&SYSLIST(&OP,2)                                   13650042
&BYTE    SETA  &COUNT/8                                                 13725042
         AIF (&OP LT N'&SYSLIST).LOOP                                   13800042
         AIF   (&COUNT NE 32).NOT32                                     13875042
&NAME    DS    4C                                                       13950042
         MEXIT                                                          14025042
.NOT32   AIF   (&COUNT NE 64).ERR                                       14100042
&NAME    DS    8C                                                       14175042
         MEXIT                                                          14250042
.ERR     MNOTE '**BIT COUNT FIELDS DO NOT TOTAL 32 OR 64**'             14325042
         MEND                                                           14400042
         MACRO                                                          14475042
         LINEND                                                         14550042
.*                            THIS MACRO IS USED ONLY BY THE LINE       14625042
.*                                 MACRO TO SET THE NUMBER OF ENTRIES   14700042
.*                                 ASSOCIATED WITH EACH LINE.           14775042
         GBLA  &NRENTS                                                  14850042
         GBLC &NRENTSX                                                  14925042
         ORG   &NRENTSX                                                 15000042
         DC    FL1'&NRENTS'                                             15075042
         ORG                                                            15150042
&NRENTS  SETA  0                                                        15225042
B&SYSNDX EQU   *                                                        15300042
&NRENTSX SETC  'B&SYSNDX'                                               15375042
         MEND                                                           15450042
         SPACE 2                                                        15525042
         EJECT                                                          15600042
*  LABEL MACRO     LABEL MACRO     LABEL MACRO     LABEL MACRO        * 15675042
         SPACE 2                                                        15750042
         MACRO                                                          15825042
&NAME    LABEL &LABEL1,&LABEL2,&LABEL3,&LABEL4,&LABEL5,&LABEL6,        C15900042
               &LABEL7,&LABEL8                                          15975042
.*                            THIS MACRO ALLOWS UP TO ACHT LABELS TO    16050042
.*                                 BE SPECIFIED FOR A GIVEN LINE. THE   16125042
.*                                 LABELS SHOULD BE ENCLOSED IN QUOTA-  16200042
.*                                 TION MARKS. THE COLUMN AND LINE END  16275042
.*                                 CONTROLS WILL BE INSERTED BY THE     16350042
.*                                 MACRO. OMITTED OPERANDS MEAN NO      16425042
.*                                 LABEL REQUIRED FOR RESPECTIVE        16500042
.*                                 COLUMN. THIS MACRO WILL ALSO ALERT   16575042
.*                                 THE PROGRAMMER TO EXACTLY WHERE THE  16650042
.*                                 TABLE MUST BE BROKEN IF NECESSARY    16725042
.*                                 TO AVOID EXCEEDING THE MAXIMUM LIMIT 16800042
         GBLC &LABELS(2000)                                             16875042
         GBLC  &LBL(100)                                                16950042
         GBLA  &LBLCTR(100)                                             17025042
         GBLA  &LABELNR                                                 17100042
         GBLA  &NRENTS,&LPTR                                            17175042
         LCLC  &MARGIN,&TACK                                            17250042
         LCLC  &TEXT                                                    17325042
         LCLA  &OP,&K,&START,&NRCHAR,&REMAIN                            17400042
&MARGIN  SETC  '*'                                                      17475042
         AIF   ('&NAME' EQ '').LOOPOUT                                  17550042
&LPTR    SETA  &LPTR+1                                                  17625042
&LBL(&LPTR) SETC '&NAME'                                                17700042
&LBLCTR(&LPTR) SETA &LABELNR+1                                          17775042
.LOOPOUT ANOP                                                           17850042
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    17925042
&K       SETA  K'&SYSLIST(&OP)                                          18000042
         AIF (&K GE 2).NORM                                             18075042
&K       SETA  2                                                        18150042
.NORM    ANOP                                                           18225042
&START   SETA  2                                                        18300042
         AIF (&OP LT N'&SYSLIST).NOTLAST                                18375042
&MARGIN  SETC  '$'                                                      18450042
.NOTLAST ANOP                                                           18525042
&NRCHAR  SETA  8                                                        18600042
&TACK    SETC  ''                                                       18675042
.LOOPIN  ANOP                                                           18750042
&REMAIN  SETA  &K-&START                                                18825042
         AIF (&REMAIN GE 8).MORE                                        18900042
&TACK    SETC  '&MARGIN'                                                18975042
&NRCHAR  SETA  &REMAIN                                                  19050042
.MORE    ANOP                                                           19125042
&TEXT    SETC  ''                                                       19200042
         AIF (&REMAIN EQ 0).ENDTEXT                                     19275042
&TEXT    SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP)'(&START,&NRCHAR)                          19350042
.ENDTEXT ANOP                                                           19425042
&LABELNR SETA  &LABELNR+1                                               19500042
&LABELS(&LABELNR) SETC '&TEXT'.'&TACK'                                  19575042
&START   SETA  &START+8                                                 19650042
         AIF ('&TACK' EQ '').LOOPIN                                     19725042
         AIF ('&TACK' EQ '*').LOOPOUT                                   19800042
         MEND                                                           19875042
         SPACE 2                                                        19950042
         MACRO                                                          20025042
         LSTART                                                         20100042
.*                            THIS MACRO IS ISSUED WHEN THE LABEL AREA  20175042
.*                                 OF THE TABLE IS TO BEGIN.            20250042
         GBLC &LABELS(2000)                                             20325042
         GBLA  &LABELNR                                                 20400042
         GBLC  &LBL(100)                                                20475042
         GBLA  &LBLCTR(100)                                             20550042
         LCLA  &NDX,&CTR                                                20625042
         LINEND                                                         20700042
&CTR     SETA  1                                                        20775042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           20850042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   20925042
         AIF   (&LBLCTR(&CTR) NE &NDX).NOLBL                            21000042
&LBL(&CTR) DC  C'&LABELS(&NDX)'                                         21075042
&CTR     SETA  &CTR+1                                                   21150042
         AGO   .LOOPCTL                                                 21225042
.NOLBL   ANOP                                                           21300042
         DC    C'&LABELS(&NDX)'                                         21375042
.LOOPCTL AIF   (&NDX LT &LABELNR).LOOP                                  21450042
         MEND                                                           21525042
         SPACE 2                                                        21600042
*  BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO  * 21675042
         SPACE 2                                                        21750042
         MACRO                                                          21825042
         BIN   &LOGITEM,&SKIP$OR                                        21900042
.*                                 &LOGITEM - NAME OF ITEM IN LOG       21975042
.*                                      RECORD DSECT                    22050042
.*                                 &SKIP$OR - NBR OF SPACES TO SKIP ON  22125042
.*                                 MULTIPLE PRINT OR NBR OF SPACES      22200042
.*                                      TO BACK UP FROM COLUMN FOR      22275042
.*                                      START OF PRINTING. THE LETTER   22350042
.*                                      B PRECEEDS THE NUMBER (B5) IF   22425042
.*                                      THE LATTER IS DESIRED. OMISSION 22500042
.*                                      OF THIS OPERAND FORCES OPTION 2 22575042
.*                                      WITH BACKUP SPACING EQUAL TO    22650042
.*                                 THE NUMBER OF BITS IN THE ITEM       22725042
.*                                 DEFINITION (VIA MACRO 'DSGEN').      22800042
.*                            A LIMIT OF 15 BITS IS IMPOSED FOR THE     22875042
.*                                 TOTAL NUMBER OF BITS TO PRINT.       22950042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000)                                               23025042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000),&NRENTS                 23100042
         GBLC  &DSECT                                                   23175042
         LCLB  &B                                                       23250042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&K                                   23325042
         LCLA  &TEMP,&T                                                 23400042
         LCLC  &S                                                       23475042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           23550042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   23625042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      23700042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  23775042
         MNOTE *,'YOU BLEW IT'                                          23850042
         ROUTINE DUM,SKIPPER                                            23925042
         MEXIT                                                          24000042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           24075042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             24150042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              24225042
&T       SETA  &IBITS-1                                                 24300042
&B       SETB  0                                                        24375042
         AIF   ('&SKIP$OR' EQ '').BACKUP                                24450042
&K       SETA  K'&SKIP$OR                                               24525042
&B       SETB  ('&SKIP$OR'(1,1) EQ 'B')                                 24600042
&S       SETC  '&SKIP$OR'(&B+1,&K-&B)                                   24675042
&T       SETA  &S                                                       24750042
.BACKUP  ANOP                                                           24825042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                24900042
&TEMP    SETA  &ISHIFT                                                  24975042
A&SYSNDX DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'&TEMP'                       25050042
         AIF (&IBITS EQ 1 AND &B EQ 0).OUT                              25125042
         ORG   A&SYSNDX                                                 25200042
&B       SETB  1                                                        25275042
         DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'C'                           25350042
         DC    BL.1'&B',AL.7(&T),AL.4(&IBITS),FL.4'&ISHIFT'             25425042
.OUT     ANOP                                                           25500042
         MEND                                                           25575042
         EJECT                                                          25650042
*  HEX MACRO     HEX MACRO     HEX MACRO    HEXN MACRO     HEX MACRO  * 25725042
         SPACE 2                                                        25800042
         MACRO                                                          25875042
         HEX   &LOGITEM,&SKIP$OR,&BYTES                                 25950042
.*                                 CONVERSIONS.                         26025042
.*                            &LOGITEM - NAME OF DATA ITEM TO BE        26100042
.*                                 CONVERTED                            26175042
.*                            &SKIP$OR - NUMBER OF SPACES TO SKIP ON    26250042
.*                                 MULTIPLE PRINT OR NBR OF SPACES TO   26325042
.*                                 BACK UP FROM COLUMN FOR START OF     26400042
.*                                 PRINTING. THE LETTER B PRECEEDS THE  26475042
.*                                 NUMBER (B8) IF THE LATTER OPTION IS  26550042
.*                                 DESIRED. OMISSION OF THIS OPERAND    26625042
.*                                 FORCES OPTION 2 WITH BACKUP SPACING  26700042
.*                                 EQUAL TO THE NUMBER OF BYTES SPECI-  26775042
.*                                 FIED BY THE NEXT OPERAND (TWICE THIS 26850042
.*                                 NUMBER IF SUFFIX IS EXPLICITLY OR    26925042
.*                                 IMPLICITLY B).                       27000042
.*                            &BYTES - NUMBER OF TOTAL INPUT BYTES TO   27075042
.*                                 PROCESS. THIS NUMBER IS SUFFIXED     27150042
.*                                 WITH AN L,R, OR B TO STIPULATE       27225042
.*                                 PRINTING OF THE LEFT HALF, RIGHT     27300042
.*                                 HALF, OR BOTH HALVES OF THE BYTE     27375042
.*                                 RESPECTIVELY. OMISSION OF THIS       27450042
.*                                 OPERAND DEFAULTS TO B WITH THE NUM-  27525042
.*                                 BER OF BYTES EQUAL TO THE ITEM LNGTH 27600042
.*                            A NEW ENTRY IS GENERATED ONLY WHEN NECES- 27675042
.*                                 SARY. THIS MACRO MUST BE THE FIRST   27750042
.*                                 MACRO INSTRUCTION ISSUED FOR THE     27825042
.*                                 SUBJECT LINE(S).                     27900042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000),&DSECT                                        27975042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000),&NRENTS                 28050042
         LCLB  &B                                                       28125042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&K,&T,&CODE,&BYTESP                  28200042
         LCLC  &S,&LETTER                                               28275042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           28350042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   28425042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      28500042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  28575042
         MNOTE *,'LOG ITEM NOT DEFINED'                                 28650042
         MEXIT                                                          28725042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           28800042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             28875042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              28950042
&CODE    SETA  1                                                        29025042
&K       SETA  K'&BYTES                                                 29100042
         AIF   (&IBITS-(&IBITS/4)*4 EQ 0).OK                            29175042
         MNOTE *,'BIT LENGTH SPECIFICATION INCONSISTENT WITH CONTROL'   29250042
         MEXIT                                                          29325042
.OK      AIF   ('&BYTES' EQ '').USEDEFN                                 29400042
&LETTER  SETC  '&BYTES'(&K,1)                                           29475042
&S       SETC  '&BYTES'(1,&K-1)                                         29550042
&BYTESP  SETA  &S                                                       29625042
         AIF   ('&LETTER' EQ 'B').BOTH                                  29700042
         AIF   (&ISHIFT EQ 0 OR &ISHIFT EQ 4).OK2                       29775042
.ERR     MNOTE *,'DATA NOT ALLIGNED ON HEX OR BYTE BOUNDARY'            29850042
         MEXIT                                                          29925042
.USEDEFN ANOP                                                           30000042
&BYTESP  SETA  &IBITS/8                                                 30075042
.BOTH    AIF   (&ISHIFT NE 0).ERR                                       30150042
&CODE    SETA  3                                                        30225042
&T       SETA  &BYTESP*2-1                                              30300042
&S       SETC  '&T'                                                     30375042
.OK2     AIF   (&ISHIFT EQ 0).L                                         30450042
&CODE    SETA  2                                                        30525042
.L       ANOP                                                           30600042
&B       SETB  1                                                        30675042
         AIF   ('&SKIP$OR' EQ '').BACKUP                                30750042
&K       SETA  K'&SKIP$OR                                               30825042
&B       SETB  ('&SKIP$OR'(1,1) EQ 'B')                                 30900042
&S       SETC  '&SKIP$OR'(&B+1,&K-&B)                                   30975042
.BACKUP  ANOP                                                           31050042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                31125042
         DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'A'                           31200042
         DC    BL.1'&B',FL.7'&S',FL.4'&BYTESP',FL.4'&CODE'              31275042
.OUT     ANOP                                                           31350042
         MEND                                                           31425042
         MACRO                                                          31500042
         SPECIAL  &ROUTINE,&PARAM,&SPACE=                               31575042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES A SPECIAL ROUTINE    31650042
.*                                 ENTRY TO BE PROCESSED BY THE SUM. M. 31725042
.*                            &ROUTINE - SYMBOL ON SPECIAL ROUTINE EWT. 31800042
.*                            &PARAM - AN 8 BIT BINARY REPRESENTATION   31875042
.*                                 TO OCCUPY THE 'MASK' FIELD BUT TO BE 31950042
.*                                 INTERPRETED AS AN ARGUMENT OF THE    32025042
.*                                 SPECIAL ROUTINE.                     32100042
.*                            &SPACE - THE NUMBER OF 2BYTE COUNTERS TO  32175042
.*                                 ALLOCATE FOR REQUIRED PROCESSING.    32250042
         GBLC  &CSECT                                                   32325042
         GBLA  &COUNTR                                                  32400042
         LCLA  &ADD                                                     32475042
         DC    AL1(128)                                                 32550042
         DC    BL.8'&PARAM'                                             32625042
         DC    AL2(&ROUTINE-&CSECT)                                     32700042
         DC    AL2(&COUNTR)                                             32775042
&ADD     SETA  1                                                        32850042
         AIF   ('&SPACE' EQ '').NORM                                    32925042
&ADD     SETA  &SPACE                                                   33000042
.NORM    ANOP                                                           33075042
&COUNTR  SETA  &COUNTR+&ADD                                             33150042
         MEND                                                           33225042
         MACRO                                                          33300042
         SUM   &LOGITEM,&MASK                                           33375042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES A NORMAL EDIT ENTRY  33450042
.*                                 FOR PROCESSING BY THE SUMMARY MODULE 33525042
.*                            &LOGITEM - NAME OF DATA ITEM TO BE SUMMED 33600042
.*                            &MASK - BYTE MASK FOR BITS TO BE TESTED.  33675042
.*                                 THIS OPERAND SHOULD BE OMITTED FOR   33750042
.*                                 SINGLE BIT ITEMS IN WHICH CASE THE   33825042
.*                                 MASK WILL BE SET ACCORDING TO THE    33900042
.*                                 OFF BYTE BIT DISPLACEMENT OF THE     33975042
.*                                ITEM AS DEFINED BY THE MACRO 'DSGEN'  34050042
         GBLA  &COUNTR,&ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000)                34125042
         GBLC  &ITEM(1000),&DSECT                                       34200042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&M,&BITNBR                           34275042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           34350042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   34425042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      34500042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  34575042
         MNOTE *,'LOGITEM NOT FOUND'                                    34650042
         MEXIT                                                          34725042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           34800042
         DC    AL1(0)                                                   34875042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             34950042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              35025042
         AIF   ('&MASK' EQ '').FORM                                     35100042
         DC    B'&MASK'                                                 35175042
         AGO   .ITEM                                                    35250042
.FORM    ANOP                                                           35325042
&BITNBR  SETA  &ISHIFT-7                                                35400042
&BITNBR  SETA  0-&BITNBR                                                35475042
&M       SETA  1                                                        35550042
.LOOP2   ANOP                                                           35625042
         AIF   (&BITNBR EQ 0).GOTIT                                     35700042
&M       SETA  &M*2                                                     35775042
&BITNBR  SETA  &BITNBR-1                                                35850042
         AGO   .LOOP2                                                   35925042
.GOTIT   ANOP                                                           36000042
         DC    AL1(&M)                                                  36075042
.ITEM    DC    AL2(&LOGITEM-&DSECT)                                     36150042
         DC    AL2(&COUNTR)                                             36225042
&COUNTR  SETA  &COUNTR+1                                                36300042
         MEND                                                           36375042
         GBLC  &DSECT,&CSECT                                            36450042
&CSECT   SETC  'IFCSXXX6'                                               36525042
&DSECT   SETC  'XXX6'                                                   36600042
IFCSXXX6 CSECT                                                          36675042

XXX6     DSECT                                                          37050042

*                                                                S21021 41700042
IFCSXXX6 CSECT                                                          41775042
         USING XXX6,R2                                                  41850042
         USING *,R9                                                     41925042
         DC    A(ENTRIES)               PTR TO ENTRIES                  42000042
         DC    A(PEDIT)                 PTR TO EDIT SECTION OF SUM TBL  42075042
REG8     DC    F'0'                     R8 SAVE AREA CURRENT ENTRY      42150042
SCSIZE   DC    H'220'                   NUMBER OF 2-BYTES IN SUM S21021 42225042
R0       EQU   0                                                        42300042
R1       EQU   1                                                        42375042
R2       EQU   2                                                        42450042
R3       EQU   3                                                        42525042
R4       EQU   4                                                        42600042
R5       EQU   5                                                        42675042
R6       EQU   6                                                        42750042
R7       EQU   7                                                        42825042
R8       EQU   8                                                        42900042
R9       EQU   9                                                        42975042
R10      EQU   10                                                       43050042
R11      EQU   11                                                       43125042
R12      EQU   12                                                       43200042
R13      EQU   13                                                       43275042
R14      EQU   14                                                       43350042
R15      EQU   15                                                       43425042
*                                                                       43500042
*        SPECIAL ROUTINE SECTION   R2=PTR TO LOGREC R9=BASE ADDR        43575042
*                                  R3=PTR TO BUM COUNTER                43650042
XFAILCCW EQU   *                                                        43725042
         TM    XSW,HEX20                IS THIS A SHORT RECORD?  S21021 43800042
         BCR   1,R14                    YES, NO CCW, RETURN      S21021 43875042
*                                                                       43950042
         STM   R14,R12,L12(R13)         SAVE REGS                       44025042
         SR    R7,R7                                                    44100042
         IC    R7,XFCCWCC               PICK UP FAILING CCW CODE        44175042
         B     COMMON                                                   44250042
*                                                                       44325042
*                                                                       44400042
XDATE1   STM   R14,R15,L12(R13)         SAVE R14 & R 15          S21021 44475042
         BAL   R14,EXPANDER             BAL TO EXPAND REC        S21021 44550042
         STM   R0,R12,L20(R13)          SAVE REMAINDER OF REGS   S21021 44625042
         CLC   XDATE(L4),HEX00         IS DATE ZERO                     44700042
         BE    RETURN                   BR-ZERO                         44775042
         CLC   L0(L4,R3),HEX00          IS LOW DATE ZERO                44850042
         BNE   XDATE2                   BR-NO                           44925042
         MVC   L0(L4,R3),XDATE          MOVE IN DATE                    45000042
XDATE2   EQU   *                                                        45075042
         CLC   XDATE(L4),L0(R3)         CHECK FOR LOW DATE              45150042
         BL    SAVELOW                  LOWER SAVE IT                   45225042
         CLC   XDATE(L4),L4(R3)         CHECK FOR HI                    45300042

         B     RETURN                                                   45525042

         B     RETURN                                                   45675042
*                                                                       45750042

         BCR   1,R14                    YES, NO CCW, RETURN      S21021 45900042
         STM   R5,R8,XSAVE              SAVE REGS                S21021 45975042

         BE    SETVOL2             BR-YES                               46275042
         CLC   L0(L6,R6),XVOL1     ARE SERS EQUAL                       46350042

SETCPUNO STM   R5,R8,XSAVE              SAVE REGS                S21021 68925042
         SR    R5,R5                    CLEAAR R5                S21021 69000042
         IC    R5,0(R4)                 PICK UP                  S21021 69075042
         SLL   R5,R8                      CPU TYPE               S21021 69150042
         IC    R5,L1(R4)                    FIELD                S21021 69225042
         LTR   R5,R5                    IS TI ZERO?              S21021 69300042
         BNZ   RETURNA                  NO, LINE IS GOOD, RETURN S21021 69375042
         LA    R6,L64                   ELSE, BACK UP DATA PTR   S21021 69450042
         SR    R3,R6                    TO PUT IN NEW INFO       S21021 69525042
         MVC   0(L6,R3),SHARED          SAY MODEL SHARED       @Z427VLS 69600042
         B     RETURNA                  RETURN                   S21021 69750042

CONVERT  STM   R5,R8,XSAVE              SAVE REGS                       69900042
         LH    R5,L0(R4)                PICK UP COUNT                   69975042

         UNPK  L0(L3,R3),WORK+L5(L3)    UNPACK IT TO PRINT BUFF         70125042
         MVZ   L2(L1,R3),L0(R3)         PUT ON PRINTABLE ZONE           70200042

         BR    R14                                                      70350042
*                                                                       70425042

*                                                                       70575042
SETDATE  UNPK  WORK(L8),L0(L4,R4)       PACK DATE                       70650042
         MVZ   WORK+L7(L1),WORK         MOVE ON ZONE                    70725042
         MVC   L0(L3,R3),WORK+L5        MOVE DATE TO PRINT LINE         70800042
         MVC   L5(L2,R3),WORK+L3        MOVE YEAR TO PRINT LINE         70875042
         BR    R14                                                      70950042
*                                                                       71025042

         BCR   L8,R14                   NO TI IS FULL                   71175042
         SR    R15,R15                  STOP LINE PRINTING              71250042
         BR    R14                      RETURN                          71325042
*              SET LABELS                                               71400042

*                                                                       71625042
*        FREEE COUNTERS AREA LAST THING DONE                            71700042
*                                                                       71775042
FREECTR  STM   R14,R12,L12(R13)         SAVE ALL REGS                   71850042
         LR    R12,R13                  SAVE SAVE AREA ADDR             71925042
         LA    R13,FSAVE                POINT TO MY SAVE                72000042
         ST    R12,L4(R13)              SET CHAINING POINTERS           72075042
         ST    R13,L8(R12)                                              72150042
         L     R3,L4(R2)                PICK UP POINTER TO NEXT COUNTER 72225042
         ST    R3,L28(R12)              SAVE POINTER IN REG SAVE        72300042
         LH    R0,SIZE                  PICK UP SIZE OF AREA            72375042
         LR    R1,R2                    SET ADDRESS                     72450042
         FREEMAIN R,LV=(0),A=(1)                                        72525042
         LTR   R3,R3                    ANY MORE COUNTERS               72600042
         BZ    RETURN0                  NO  RETURN                      72675042
         LA    R5,PENTRY+L10            POINT TO TOP ENTRY - 4          72750042
         ST    R5,YR9PTR                                                72825042
         LA    R5,LABELS-L1               POINT TO FIRST LABEL - 1      72900042
         ST    R5,YLABELP               STORE IT IN TABLE               72975042

XSAVE    DS    4F                                                       73575042
FSAVE    DS    18F                                                      73650042
SHARED   DC    C'SHARED'                                       @Z427VLS 73800042
SIZE     DC    H'462'                   NUMBER OF BYTES TO FREE  S21021 73875042
HEXFFFF  DC    X'FFFF'                                                  73950042
*                                                                       74025042
SETVOL   MVC   L0(L6,R3),L0(R4)         MOVE LABEL TO LINE              74100042
         BR    R14                      RETURN                          74175042
CHKVOL   CLC   L0(L6,R4),YZEROS         IS COUNTER IN USE               74250042
         BCR   L7,R14                   BR YES                          74325042
         SR    R15,R15                  NO STOP PRINT                   74400042
         BR    R14                                                      74475042
YZEROS   DC    XL6'00'                                                  74550042
*                                                                       74625042

         DC    X'00010001'                                              74775042
         DC    X'00010001'                                              74850042
