./  ADD  SSI=73140257,NAME=IFCSXXX7
         TITLE 'IFCSXXX7 - SUM TABLE - LINKNAME=IFCS1015,ALIASES=IFCS32X00070042
               77,IFCS3284,IFCS3286,IFCS2245'                           00140042
         SPACE 2                                                        00210042
*  LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO            * 00280042
         MACRO                                                          00350042
&NAME    LINE  &DATA,&LABEL,&SKIP=                                      00420042
.*                            THIS MACRO ESTABLISHES THE MARGINS OR     00490042
.*                                 COLUMN SETTINGS FOR EACH LINE. IT    00560042
.*                                 GENERATES NECESSARY CARRIAGE CONTROL 00630042
.*                                 ENTRIES. LASTLY IT DETERMINES THE    00700042
.*                                 NUMBER OF ENTRIES ASSOCIATED WITH    00770042
.*                                 THE PREVIOUS LINE AND STORES THAT #  00840042
.*                                 INTO THE APPROPRIATE BYTE.           00910042
.*                                 &DATA(1) - CHARACTER POSITION TO     00980042
.*                                 BEGIN DATA.                          01050042
.*                                                                      01120042
.*                                 &DATA(2) - # OF SPACES BETWEEN       01190042
.*                                 SUCCESSIVE DATA COLUMN STARTING      01260042
.*                                 CHARACTERS.                          01330042
.*                                                                      01400042
.*                                 &LABEL(1) - CHARACTER POSITION       01470042
.*                                 TO BEGIN LABELS.                     01540042
.*                                                                      01610042
.*                                 &LABEL(2) - # OF SPACES BETWEEN      01680042
.*                                 LINE'S LABEL STARTING CHARACTERS.    01750042
.*                                                                      01820042
.*                                 &SKIP= - # OF LINES TO ADVANCE       01890042
.*                                 CARRIAGE TO BEGIN NEXT PRINTED LINE. 01960042
.*                                                                      02030042
.*                                 NEW ENTRIES ARE GENERATED ONLY WHEN  02100042
.*                                 NECESSARY. OMISSION OF ITEMS MEANS   02170042
.*                                 THEY HAVE NOT CHANGED SINCE PREVIOUS 02240042
.*                                 SETTINGS. A LINE MACRO IS REQUIRED   02310042
.*                                 FOR EACH PRINTED LINE. IF NO SETTING 02380042
.*                                 CHANGES ARE REQUIRED ALL OPERANDS    02450042
.*                                 ARE OMITTED IN WHICH CASE ONLY THE   02520042
.*                                 # OF ENTRIES FOR THE PREVIOUS LINE   02590042
.*                                 FIRST MACRO INSTRUCTION ISSUED FOR   02660042
.*                                 THE SUBJECT LINE.                    02730042
         GBLA  &DB,&DT,&LB,&LT,&NRENTS                                  02800042
         GBLA  &LASTCC,&INITIAL                                         02870042
         GBLC  &NRENTSX                                                 02940042
         GBLC  &CARRCON                                                 03010042
         GBLB  &TEST                                                    03080042
         LCLA  &S                                                       03150042
&NAME    DS    0C                                                       03220042
         AIF   (&INITIAL EQ 0).FIRSTLN                                  03290042
         LINEND                                                         03360042
         AGO   .NTFIRST                                                 03430042
.FIRSTLN ANOP                                                           03500042
&NRENTSX SETC  'N&SYSNDX'                                               03570042
&INITIAL SETA  1                                                        03640042
&LASTCC  SETA  1                                                        03710042
N&SYSNDX EQU   *                                                        03780042
.NTFIRST ANOP                                                           03850042
         DC    AL1(0)                                                   03920042
         AIF   ('&DATA(1)' EQ '').CKDTABS                               03990042
         AIF   ('&DATA'(1,1) NE '(').SLABEL                             04060042
         AIF   (&DATA(1) EQ &DB).CKDTABS                                04130042
&DB      SETA  &DATA(1)                                                 04200042
         AGO   .AA                                                      04270042
.CKDTABS AIF   ('&DATA(2)' EQ '').NCDATA                                04340042
         AIF   (&DATA(2) EQ &DT).NCDATA                                 04410042
         AGO   .CC                                                      04480042
.AA      AIF   ('&DATA(2)' EQ '').BB                                    04550042
         AIF   (&DATA(2) EQ &DT).BB                                     04620042
.CC      ANOP                                                           04690042
&DT      SETA  &DATA(2)                                                 04760042
.BB      DC    XL2'FFFE'                                                04830042
         DC    FL1'&DB'                                                 04900042
         DC    FL1'&DT'                                                 04970042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                05040042
.NCDATA  ANOP                                                           05110042
         AIF   ('&LABEL(1)' EQ '').CKLTABS                              05180042
         AIF   ('&LABEL'(1,1) NE '(').SLABEL                            05250042
         AIF   (&LABEL(1) EQ &LB).CKLTABS                               05320042
&LB      SETA  &LABEL(1)                                                05390042
         AGO   .AAA                                                     05460042
.CKLTABS AIF   ('&LABEL(2)' EQ '').NCLABEL                              05530042
         AIF   (&LABEL(2) EQ &LT).NCLABEL                               05600042
         AGO   .CCC                                                     05670042
.AAA     AIF   ('&LABEL(2)' EQ '').BBB                                  05740042
         AIF   (&LABEL(2) EQ &LT).BBB                                   05810042
.CCC     ANOP                                                           05880042
&LT      SETA  &LABEL(2)                                                05950042
.BBB     DC    XL2'FFFF'                                                06020042
         DC    FL1'&LB'                                                 06090042
         DC    FL1'&LT'                                                 06160042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                06230042
.NCLABEL ANOP                                                           06300042
         AIF   ('&SKIP' EQ 'E').EJECT                                   06370042
         AIF   ('&SKIP' EQ '').TESTOFF                                  06440042
.CONT    ANOP                                                           06510042
         AIF   (&TEST EQ 0).AB                                          06580042
         AIF   (&SKIP EQ &LASTCC).TESTOFF                               06650042
&S       SETA  &SKIP                                                    06720042
         ORG   &CARRCON+3                                               06790042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&S),AL.3(1)                                 06860042
         ORG                                                            06930042
&LASTCC  SETA  &S                                                       07000042
.SLABEL  ANOP                                                           07070042
.TESTOFF ANOP                                                           07140042
&TEST    SETB  0                                                        07210042
         AGO   .DD                                                      07280042
.EJECT   DC    XL2'FFFB'                                                07350042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                07420042
         DC    X'8B'              SKIP TO CHANNEL 1                     07490042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&LASTCC),AL.3(1)                            07560042
&TEST    SETB  1                                                        07630042
         AGO   .DD                                                      07700042
.AB      AIF   (&SKIP EQ &LASTCC).NOCHANG                               07770042
A&SYSNDX DC    XL2'FFFB'                                                07840042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&SKIP),AL.3(1)                              07910042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&SKIP),AL.3(1)                              07980042
&LASTCC  SETA  &SKIP                                                    08050042
&TEST    SETB  1                                                        08120042
&CARRCON SETC  'A&SYSNDX'                                               08190042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                08260042
.DD      ANOP                                                           08330042
.NOCHANG ANOP                                                           08400042
         MEND                                                           08470042
         EJECT                                                          08540042
         SPACE 2                                                        08610042
*  ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO* 08680042
         MACRO                                                          08750042
&NAME    ROUTINE &LOGITEM,&RNAME                                        08820042
         GBLC  &DSECT,&CSECT                                            08890042
         GBLC  &ITEM(1000)                                              08960042
         GBLA  &SHIFT(1000),&ITEMNBR                                    09030042
         GBLA  &NRENTS                                                  09100042
         LCLA  &ISHIFT,&NDX                                             09170042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           09240042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   09310042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      09380042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  09450042
         MNOTE *,'LOG ITEM NOT DEFINED'                                 09520042
         MEXIT                                                          09590042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           09660042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             09730042
&NAME    DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'D'                           09800042
         DC    AL.4(&ISHIFT),AL.12(&RNAME-&CSECT)                       09870042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                09940042
         MEND                                                           10010042
*  DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO        * 10080042
         SPACE 2                                                        10150042
         MACRO                                                          10220042
&NAME    DSGEN &X1,&X2,&X3,&X4,&X5,&X6,&X7,&X8,&X9,&X10,&X11,&X12,&X13,X10290042
               &X14,&X15,&X16,&X17,&X18,&X19,&X20,&X21,&X22,&X23,&X24, X10360042
               &X25,&X26,&X27,&X28,&X29,&X30,&X31,&X32                  10430042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES ONE DSECT WORD       10500042
.*                                 FORMATTED FOR THE SUBJECT LOG RECORD 10570042
.*                                 EACH OPERAND HAS TWO SUB LISTS. THE  10640042
.*                                 FIRST IS THE NAME OF THE LOG ITEM    10710042
.*                                 WHILE THE SECOND IS THE # OF BITS TO 10780042
.*                                 ALLOCATE FOR THIS ITEM. ITEMS MUST   10850042
.*                                 BE DEFINED CONTIGUOUSLY WITHOUT GAPS 10920042
.*                                 UNUSED BIT GROUPS MUST BE GIVEN      10990042
.*                                 DUMMY NAMES. THE NAMES PROVIDED FOR  11060042
.*                                 THE LOG ITEMS MAY THEN BE USED IN    11130042
.*                                 THE CONVERSION MACRO INSTRUCTIONS.   11200042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000)                                               11270042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000)                         11340042
         LCLC  &SYMBOL                                                  11410042
         LCLA  &OP,&COUNT,&BYTE                                         11480042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           11550042
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    11620042
&ITEMNBR SETA  &ITEMNBR+1                                               11690042
&SYMBOL  SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP,1)'                                        11760042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,2)' NE '').OK1                            11830042
         MNOTE *,'NULL BIT COUNT FIELD'                                 11900042
         MEXIT                                                          11970042
.OK1     ANOP                                                           12040042
         AIF   ('&SYMBOL' NE '').OK                                     12110042
         MNOTE 'LOG ITEM SYMBOL NOT PROVIDED'                           12180042
         AGO   .CNT                                                     12250042
.OK      ANOP                                                           12320042
         AIF   ('&SYMBOL'(1,1) EQ '''').CNT                *TEMP*       12390042
&SYMBOL  EQU   *+&BYTE                                                  12460042
&ITEM(&ITEMNBR)  SETC '&SYSLIST(&OP,1)'                                 12530042
&BITS(&ITEMNBR) SETA &SYSLIST(&OP,2)                                    12600042
&SHIFT(&ITEMNBR) SETA &COUNT-&BYTE*8                                    12670042
.CNT     ANOP                                                           12740042
&COUNT   SETA  &COUNT+&SYSLIST(&OP,2)                                   12810042
&BYTE    SETA  &COUNT/8                                                 12880042
         AIF (&OP LT N'&SYSLIST).LOOP                                   12950042
         AIF   (&COUNT NE 32).NOT32                                     13020042
&NAME    DS    4C                                                       13090042
         MEXIT                                                          13160042
.NOT32   AIF   (&COUNT NE 64).ERR                                       13230042
&NAME    DS    8C                                                       13300042
         MEXIT                                                          13370042
.ERR     MNOTE '**BIT COUNT FIELDS DO NOT TOTAL 32 OR 64**'             13440042
         MEND                                                           13510042
         MACRO                                                          13580042
         LINEND                                                         13650042
.*                            THIS MACRO IS USED ONLY BY THE LINE       13720042
.*                                 MACRO TO SET THE NUMBER OF ENTRIES   13790042
.*                                 ASSOCIATED WITH EACH LINE.           13860042
         GBLA  &NRENTS                                                  13930042
         GBLC &NRENTSX                                                  14000042
         ORG   &NRENTSX                                                 14070042
         DC    FL1'&NRENTS'                                             14140042
         ORG                                                            14210042
&NRENTS  SETA  0                                                        14280042
B&SYSNDX EQU   *                                                        14350042
&NRENTSX SETC  'B&SYSNDX'                                               14420042
         MEND                                                           14490042
         SPACE 2                                                        14560042
         EJECT                                                          14630042
*  LABEL MACRO     LABEL MACRO     LABEL MACRO     LABEL MACRO        * 14700042
         SPACE 2                                                        14770042
         MACRO                                                          14840042
&NAME    LABEL &LABEL1,&LABEL2,&LABEL3,&LABEL4,&LABEL5,&LABEL6,        C14910042
               &LABEL7,&LABEL8                                          14980042
.*                            THIS MACRO ALLOWS UP TO ACHT LABELS TO    15050042
.*                                 BE SPECIFIED FOR A GIVEN LINE. THE   15120042
.*                                 LABELS SHOULD BE ENCLOSED IN QUOTA-  15190042
.*                                 TION MARKS. THE COLUMN AND LINE END  15260042
.*                                 CONTROLS WILL BE INSERTED BY THE     15330042
.*                                 MACRO. OMITTED OPERANDS MEAN NO      15400042
.*                                 LABEL REQUIRED FOR RESPECTIVE        15470042
.*                                 COLUMN. THIS MACRO WILL ALSO ALERT   15540042
.*                                 THE PROGRAMMER TO EXACTLY WHERE THE  15610042
.*                                 TABLE MUST BE BROKEN IF NECESSARY    15680042
.*                                 TO AVOID EXCEEDING THE MAXIMUM LIMIT 15750042
         GBLC &LABELS(2000)                                             15820042
         GBLC  &LBL(100)                                                15890042
         GBLA  &LBLCTR(100)                                             15960042
         GBLA  &LABELNR                                                 16030042
         GBLA  &NRENTS,&LPTR                                            16100042
         LCLC  &MARGIN,&TACK                                            16170042
         LCLC  &TEXT                                                    16240042
         LCLA  &OP,&K,&START,&NRCHAR,&REMAIN                            16310042
&MARGIN  SETC  '*'                                                      16380042
         AIF   ('&NAME' EQ '').LOOPOUT                                  16450042
&LPTR    SETA  &LPTR+1                                                  16520042
&LBL(&LPTR) SETC '&NAME'                                                16590042
&LBLCTR(&LPTR) SETA &LABELNR+1                                          16660042
.LOOPOUT ANOP                                                           16730042
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    16800042
&K       SETA  K'&SYSLIST(&OP)                                          16870042
         AIF (&K GE 2).NORM                                             16940042
&K       SETA  2                                                        17010042
.NORM    ANOP                                                           17080042
&START   SETA  2                                                        17150042
         AIF (&OP LT N'&SYSLIST).NOTLAST                                17220042
&MARGIN  SETC  '$'                                                      17290042
.NOTLAST ANOP                                                           17360042
&NRCHAR  SETA  8                                                        17430042
&TACK    SETC  ''                                                       17500042
.LOOPIN  ANOP                                                           17570042
&REMAIN  SETA  &K-&START                                                17640042
         AIF (&REMAIN GE 8).MORE                                        17710042
&TACK    SETC  '&MARGIN'                                                17780042
&NRCHAR  SETA  &REMAIN                                                  17850042
.MORE    ANOP                                                           17920042
&TEXT    SETC  ''                                                       17990042
         AIF (&REMAIN EQ 0).ENDTEXT                                     18060042
&TEXT    SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP)'(&START,&NRCHAR)                          18130042
.ENDTEXT ANOP                                                           18200042
&LABELNR SETA  &LABELNR+1                                               18270042
&LABELS(&LABELNR) SETC '&TEXT'.'&TACK'                                  18340042
&START   SETA  &START+8                                                 18410042
         AIF ('&TACK' EQ '').LOOPIN                                     18480042
         AIF ('&TACK' EQ '*').LOOPOUT                                   18550042
         MEND                                                           18620042
         SPACE 2                                                        18690042
         MACRO                                                          18760042
         LSTART                                                         18830042
.*                            THIS MACRO IS ISSUED WHEN THE LABEL AREA  18900042
.*                                 OF THE TABLE IS TO BEGIN.            18970042
         GBLC &LABELS(2000)                                             19040042
         GBLA  &LABELNR                                                 19110042
         GBLC  &LBL(100)                                                19180042
         GBLA  &LBLCTR(100)                                             19250042
         LCLA  &NDX,&CTR                                                19320042
         LINEND                                                         19390042
&CTR     SETA  1                                                        19460042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           19530042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   19600042
         AIF   (&LBLCTR(&CTR) NE &NDX).NOLBL                            19670042
&LBL(&CTR) DC  C'&LABELS(&NDX)'                                         19740042
&CTR     SETA  &CTR+1                                                   19810042
         AGO   .LOOPCTL                                                 19880042
.NOLBL   ANOP                                                           19950042
         DC    C'&LABELS(&NDX)'                                         20020042
.LOOPCTL AIF   (&NDX LT &LABELNR).LOOP                                  20090042
         MEND                                                           20160042
         SPACE 2                                                        20230042
*  BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO  * 20300042
         SPACE 2                                                        20370042
         MACRO                                                          20440042
         BIN   &LOGITEM,&SKIP$OR                                        20510042
.*                                 &LOGITEM - NAME OF ITEM IN LOG       20580042
.*                                      RECORD DSECT                    20650042
.*                                 &SKIP$OR - NBR OF SPACES TO SKIP ON  20720042
.*                                 MULTIPLE PRINT OR NBR OF SPACES      20790042
.*                                      TO BACK UP FROM COLUMN FOR      20860042
.*                                      START OF PRINTING. THE LETTER   20930042
.*                                      B PRECEEDS THE NUMBER (B5) IF   21000042
.*                                      THE LATTER IS DESIRED. OMISSION 21070042
.*                                      OF THIS OPERAND FORCES OPTION 2 21140042
.*                                      WITH BACKUP SPACING EQUAL TO    21210042
.*                                 THE NUMBER OF BITS IN THE ITEM       21280042
.*                                 DEFINITION (VIA MACRO 'DSGEN').      21350042
.*                            A LIMIT OF 15 BITS IS IMPOSED FOR THE     21420042
.*                                 TOTAL NUMBER OF BITS TO PRINT.       21490042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000)                                               21560042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000),&NRENTS                 21630042
         GBLC  &DSECT                                                   21700042
         LCLB  &B                                                       21770042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&K                                   21840042
         LCLA  &TEMP,&T                                                 21910042
         LCLC  &S                                                       21980042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           22050042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   22120042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      22190042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  22260042
         MNOTE *,'YOU BLEW IT'                                          22330042
         ROUTINE DUM,SKIPPER                                            22400042
         MEXIT                                                          22470042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           22540042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             22610042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              22680042
&T       SETA  &IBITS-1                                                 22750042
&B       SETB  0                                                        22820042
         AIF   ('&SKIP$OR' EQ '').BACKUP                                22890042
&K       SETA  K'&SKIP$OR                                               22960042
&B       SETB  ('&SKIP$OR'(1,1) EQ 'B')                                 23030042
&S       SETC  '&SKIP$OR'(&B+1,&K-&B)                                   23100042
&T       SETA  &S                                                       23170042
.BACKUP  ANOP                                                           23240042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                23310042
&TEMP    SETA  &ISHIFT                                                  23380042
A&SYSNDX DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'&TEMP'                       23450042
         AIF (&IBITS EQ 1 AND &B EQ 0).OUT                              23520042
         ORG   A&SYSNDX                                                 23590042
&B       SETB  1                                                        23660042
         DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'C'                           23730042
         DC    BL.1'&B',AL.7(&T),AL.4(&IBITS),FL.4'&ISHIFT'             23800042
.OUT     ANOP                                                           23870042
         MEND                                                           23940042
         EJECT                                                          24010042
*  HEX MACRO     HEX MACRO     HEX MACRO    HEXN MACRO     HEX MACRO  * 24080042
         SPACE 2                                                        24150042
         MACRO                                                          24220042
         HEX   &LOGITEM,&SKIP$OR,&BYTES                                 24290042
.*                            THIS MACRO FACILITATES GENERATION OF THE  24360042
.*                                 TABLE ENTRIES SPECIFYING HEX TYPE    24430042
.*                                 CONVERSIONS.                         24500042
.*                            &LOGITEM - NAME OF DATA ITEM TO BE        24570042
.*                                 CONVERTED                            24640042
.*                            &SKIP$OR - NUMBER OF SPACES TO SKIP ON    24710042
.*                                 MULTIPLE PRINT OR NBR OF SPACES TO   24780042
.*                                 BACK UP FROM COLUMN FOR START OF     24850042
.*                                 PRINTING. THE LETTER B PRECEEDS THE  24920042
.*                                 NUMBER (B8) IF THE LATTER OPTION IS  24990042
.*                                 DESIRED. OMISSION OF THIS OPERAND    25060042
.*                                 FORCES OPTION 2 WITH BACKUP SPACING  25130042
.*                                 EQUAL TO THE NUMBER OF BYTES SPECI-  25200042
.*                                 FIED BY THE NEXT OPERAND (TWICE THIS 25270042
.*                                 NUMBER IF SUFFIX IS EXPLICITLY OR    25340042
.*                                 IMPLICITLY B).                       25410042
.*                            &BYTES - NUMBER OF TOTAL INPUT BYTES TO   25480042
.*                                 PROCESS. THIS NUMBER IS SUFFIXED     25550042
.*                                 WITH AN L,R, OR B TO STIPULATE       25620042
.*                                 PRINTING OF THE LEFT HALF, RIGHT     25690042
.*                                 HALF, OR BOTH HALVES OF THE BYTE     25760042
.*                                 RESPECTIVELY. OMISSION OF THIS       25830042
.*                                 OPERAND DEFAULTS TO B WITH THE NUM-  25900042
.*                                 BER OF BYTES EQUAL TO THE ITEM LNGTH 25970042
.*                            A NEW ENTRY IS GENERATED ONLY WHEN NECES- 26040042
.*                                 SARY. THIS MACRO MUST BE THE FIRST   26110042
.*                                 MACRO INSTRUCTION ISSUED FOR THE     26180042
.*                                 SUBJECT LINE(S).                     26250042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000),&DSECT                                        26320042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000),&NRENTS                 26390042
         LCLB  &B                                                       26460042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&K,&T,&CODE,&BYTESP                  26530042
         LCLC  &S,&LETTER                                               26600042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           26670042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   26740042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      26810042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  26880042
         MNOTE *,'LOG ITEM NOT DEFINED'                                 26950042
         MEXIT                                                          27020042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           27090042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             27160042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              27230042
&CODE    SETA  1                                                        27300042
&K       SETA  K'&BYTES                                                 27370042
         AIF   (&IBITS-(&IBITS/4)*4 EQ 0).OK                            27440042
         MNOTE *,'BIT LENGTH SPECIFICATION INCONSISTENT WITH CONTROL'   27510042
         MEXIT                                                          27580042
.OK      AIF   ('&BYTES' EQ '').USEDEFN                                 27650042
&LETTER  SETC  '&BYTES'(&K,1)                                           27720042
&S       SETC  '&BYTES'(1,&K-1)                                         27790042
&BYTESP  SETA  &S                                                       27860042
         AIF   ('&LETTER' EQ 'B').BOTH                                  27930042
         AIF   (&ISHIFT EQ 0 OR &ISHIFT EQ 4).OK2                       28000042
.ERR     MNOTE *,'DATA NOT ALLIGNED ON HEX OR BYTE BOUNDARY'            28070042
         MEXIT                                                          28140042
.USEDEFN ANOP                                                           28210042
&BYTESP  SETA  &IBITS/8                                                 28280042
.BOTH    AIF   (&ISHIFT NE 0).ERR                                       28350042
&CODE    SETA  3                                                        28420042
&T       SETA  &BYTESP*2-1                                              28490042
&S       SETC  '&T'                                                     28560042
.OK2     AIF   (&ISHIFT EQ 0).L                                         28630042
&CODE    SETA  2                                                        28700042
.L       ANOP                                                           28770042
&B       SETB  1                                                        28840042
         AIF   ('&SKIP$OR' EQ '').BACKUP                                28910042
&K       SETA  K'&SKIP$OR                                               28980042
&B       SETB  ('&SKIP$OR'(1,1) EQ 'B')                                 29050042
&S       SETC  '&SKIP$OR'(&B+1,&K-&B)                                   29120042
.BACKUP  ANOP                                                           29190042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                29260042
         DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'A'                           29330042
         DC    BL.1'&B',FL.7'&S',FL.4'&BYTESP',FL.4'&CODE'              29400042
.OUT     ANOP                                                           29470042
         MEND                                                           29540042
         MACRO                                                          29610042
         SPECIAL  &ROUTINE,&PARAM,&SPACE=                               29680042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES A SPECIAL ROUTINE    29750042
.*                                 ENTRY TO BE PROCESSED BY THE SUM. M. 29820042
.*                            &ROUTINE - SYMBOL ON SPECIAL ROUTINE EWT. 29890042
.*                            &PARAM - AN 8 BIT BINARY REPRESENTATION   29960042
.*                                 TO OCCUPY THE 'MASK' FIELD BUT TO BE 30030042
.*                                 INTERPRETED AS AN ARGUMENT OF THE    30100042
.*                                 SPECIAL ROUTINE.                     30170042
.*                            &SPACE - THE NUMBER OF 2BYTE COUNTERS TO  30240042
.*                                 ALLOCATE FOR REQUIRED PROCESSING.    30310042
         GBLC  &CSECT                                                   30380042
         GBLA  &COUNTR                                                  30450042
         LCLA  &ADD                                                     30520042
         DC    AL1(128)                                                 30590042
         DC    BL.8'&PARAM'                                             30660042
         DC    AL2(&ROUTINE-&CSECT)                                     30730042
         DC    AL2(&COUNTR)                                             30800042
&ADD     SETA  1                                                        30870042
         AIF   ('&SPACE' EQ '').NORM                                    30940042
&ADD     SETA  &SPACE                                                   31010042
.NORM    ANOP                                                           31080042
&COUNTR  SETA  &COUNTR+&ADD                                             31150042
         MEND                                                           31220042
         MACRO                                                          31290042
         SUM   &LOGITEM,&MASK                                           31360042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES A NORMAL EDIT ENTRY  31430042
.*                                 FOR PROCESSING BY THE SUMMARY MODULE 31500042
.*                            &LOGITEM - NAME OF DATA ITEM TO BE SUMMED 31570042
.*                            &MASK - BYTE MASK FOR BITS TO BE TESTED.  31640042
.*                                 THIS OPERAND SHOULD BE OMITTED FOR   31710042
.*                                 SINGLE BIT ITEMS IN WHICH CASE THE   31780042
.*                                 MASK WILL BE SET ACCORDING TO THE    31850042
.*                                 OFF BYTE BIT DISPLACEMENT OF THE     31920042
.*                                ITEM AS DEFINED BY THE MACRO 'DSGEN'  31990042
         GBLA  &COUNTR,&ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000)                32060042
         GBLC  &ITEM(1000),&DSECT                                       32130042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&M,&BITNBR                           32200042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           32270042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   32340042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      32410042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  32480042
         MNOTE *,'LOGITEM NOT FOUND'                                    32550042
         MEXIT                                                          32620042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           32690042
         DC    AL1(0)                                                   32760042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             32830042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              32900042
         AIF   ('&MASK' EQ '').FORM                                     32970042
         DC    B'&MASK'                                                 33040042
         AGO   .ITEM                                                    33110042
.FORM    ANOP                                                           33180042
&BITNBR  SETA  &ISHIFT-7                                                33250042
&BITNBR  SETA  0-&BITNBR                                                33320042
&M       SETA  1                                                        33390042
.LOOP2   ANOP                                                           33460042
         AIF   (&BITNBR EQ 0).GOTIT                                     33530042
&M       SETA  &M*2                                                     33600042
&BITNBR  SETA  &BITNBR-1                                                33670042
         AGO   .LOOP2                                                   33740042
.GOTIT   ANOP                                                           33810042
         DC    AL1(&M)                                                  33880042
.ITEM    DC    AL2(&LOGITEM-&DSECT)                                     33950042
         DC    AL2(&COUNTR)                                             34020042
&COUNTR  SETA  &COUNTR+1                                                34090042
         MEND                                                           34160042
         GBLC  &DSECT,&CSECT                                            34230042
&DSECT   SETC  'XXX7'                                                   34300042
&CSECT   SETC  'IFCSXXX7'                                               34370042
IFCSXXX7 CSECT                                                          34440042
*                   GBR SUM TABLE                                       34510042
*                                                                       34580042
*                   DEVICE CODE=1001 DEVICE TYPE=1015  ALIAS=IFCS1015   34650042
*                                                                       34720042
XXX7     DSECT                                                          34790042
         DSGEN (XKEY1,16),(XDUM1,8),(XSW,1),(SW2B1,1),           S21021X34860042
               (SHRTSW,1),(SW2B3,1),(SW2B4,1),(SW2B5,1),         S21021X34930042
               (SW2B6,1),(SW2B7,1)                               S21021 35000042
         DSGEN (XDUM2,32)                    SPARES                     35070042
         DSGEN (XDATE,32)                    DATE                       35140042
         DSGEN (XTIME,32)                    TIME                       35210042
         DSGEN (XDUM3,8),(XSER,24)           SERIAL NO                  35280042
         DSGEN (XMODEL,16),(XDUM8,16)        MODEL NUMBER               35350042
         DSGEN (XPGN1,32)                    JOB                        35420042
         DSGEN (XPGN2,32)                       NAME                    35490042
         DSGEN (XFCCWCC,8),(XFCCWDA,24)      FAILING                    35560042
         DSGEN (XFCCWFL,8),(XZERO,8),(XFCCWCT,16)   FAILING CCW         35630042
         DSGEN (XCSWK,8),(XCSWCA,24)                CSW                 35700042
         DSGEN (XCSWATTN,1),(XCSWSM,1),(XCSWUA,1),(XCSWBSY,1),         C35770042
               (XCSWCE,1),(XCSWDE,1),(XCSWUC,1),(XCSWUE,1),            C35840042
               (XCSWPCI,1),(XCSWSILI,1),(XCSWPC,1),(XCSWPCHK,1),       C35910042
               (XCSWCDC,1),(XCSWCCC,1),(XCSWICC,1),(XCSWCH,1),         C35980042
               (XCSWCT,16)                                              36050042
         DSGEN (XECSW,32)                              ECSW             36120042

XDATE1   STM   R14,R15,L12(R13)         SAVE R14 & R 15          S21021 41020042
         BAL   R14,EXPANDER             BAL TO EXPAND REC        S21021 41090042
         STM   R0,R12,L20(R13)          SAVE REMAINDER OF REGS   S21021 41160042
         CLC   XDATE(L4),HEX00         IS DATE ZERO                     41230042
         BE    RETURN                   BR-ZERO                         41300042
         CLC   L0(L4,R3),HEX00          IS LOW DATE ZERO                41370042
         BNE   XDATE2                   BR-NO                           41440042
         MVC   L0(L4,R3),XDATE          MOVE IN DATE                    41510042
XDATE2   EQU   *                                                        41580042
         CLC   XDATE(L4),L0(R3)         CHECK FOR LOW DATE              41650042
         BL    SAVELOW                  LOWER SAVE IT                   41720042
         CLC   XDATE(L4),L4(R3)         CHECK FOR HI                    41790042
         BNH   RETURN                   BR-NOT HI                       41860042
SAVEHI   MVC   L4(L4,R3),XDATE          MOVE HI DATE                    41930042
         B     RETURN                                                   42000042
SAVELOW  MVC   L0(L4,R3),XDATE          MOVE LOW DATE                   42070042
         B     RETURN                                                   42140042

CONVERT  STM   R5,R8,XSAVE              SAVE REGS                       58660042
         LH    R5,L0(R4)                PICK UP COUNT                   58730042
CONV1    CVD   R5,WORK                  CONVERT IT TO DEVIMALP          58800042
         UNPK  L0(L3,R3),WORK+L5(L3)    UNPACK IT TO PRINT BUFF         58870042
         MVZ   L2(L1,R3),L0(R3)         PUT ON PRINTABLE ZONE           58940042
RETURNA  LM    R5,R8,XSAVE              RESTORE REGS                    59010042
         BR    R14                                                      59080042
*                                                                       59150042
SKIPPER  BR    R14                      RETURN                          59220042
*                                                                       59290042
SETDATE  UNPK  WORK(L8),L0(L4,R4)       PACK DATE                       59360042
         MVZ   WORK+L7(L1),WORK         MOVE ON ZONE                    59430042
         MVC   L0(L3,R3),WORK+L5        MOVE DATE TO PRINT LINE         59500042
         MVC   L5(L2,R3),WORK+L3        MOVE YEAR TO PRINT LINE         59570042
         BR    R14                                                      59640042
*                                                                       59710042
CONVCC1  CLC   L0(L2,R4),HEXFFFF        IS THIS COUNTER EMPYT           59780042
         BCR   L8,R14                   NO TI IS FULL                   59850042
         SR    R15,R15                  STOP LINE PRINTING              59920042
         BR    R14                      RETURN                          59990042
*                                                                       60060042
*        FREEE COUNTERS AREA LAST THING DONE                            60130042
*                                                                       60200042

         LR    R12,R13                  SAVE SAVE AREA ADDR             60340042
         LA    R13,FSAVE                POINT TO MY SAVE                60410042
         ST    R12,L4(R13)              SET CHAINING POINTERS           60480042
         ST    R13,L8(R12)                                              60550042
         L     R3,L4(R2)                PICK UP POINTER TO NEXT COUNTER 60620042
         ST    R3,L28(R12)              SAVE POINTER IN REG SAVE        60690042
         LH    R0,SIZE                  PICK UP SIZE OF AREA            60760042
         LR    R1,R2                    SET ADDRESS                     60830042
         FREEMAIN R,LV=(0),A=(1)                                        60900042
         LTR   R3,R3                    ANY MORE COUNTERS               60970042
         BZ    RETURN0                  NO  RETURN                      61040042
         LA    R5,PENTRY+L10            POINT TO TOP ENTRY - 4          61110042
         ST    R5,YR9PTR                                                61180042

         ST    R5,YLABELP               STORE IT IN TABLE               61320042

         BR    R14                                                      61530042

SETCPUNO STM   R5,R8,XSAVE              SAVE REGS                S21021 61880042
         SR    R5,R5                    CLEAAR R5                S21021 61950042
         IC    R5,0(R4)                 PICK UP                  S21021 62020042
         SLL   R5,R8                      CPU TYPE               S21021 62090042
         IC    R5,L1(R4)                    FIELD                S21021 62160042
         LTR   R5,R5                    IS TI ZERO?              S21021 62230042
         BNZ   RETURNA                  NO, LINE IS GOOD, RETURN S21021 62300042
         LA    R6,L64                   ELSE, BACK UP DATA PTR   S21021 62370042
         SR    R3,R6                    TO PUT IN NEW INFO       S21021 62440042
         MVC   0(L6,R3),SHARED          SAY MODEL SHARED       @Z427VLS 62510042
         B     RETURNA                  RETURN                   S21021 62650042

SETSENSE CLC   0(L2,R4),TYPE1015        IS THIS 1015             S21003 62790042
         BCR   EQ,R14                   YES, SENSE LABELS GOOD   S21003 62860042
         ST    R5,XSAVE                 ELSE, SAVE REG           S21003 62930042
         CLC   0(L2,R4),TYPE2245        IS THIS 2245?            S21092 63000042
         BE    SET2245                                           S21092 63070042
         LA    R5,SENS3270              POINT TO 3270 SENSE LBLS S21003 63140042
RETSENS  DS    0H                                                S21003 63210042
         ST    R5,YLABELP               SET FOR EREP             S21003 63280042
         L     R5,XSAVE                 RESTORE REG              S21003 63350042
         BR    R14                      RETURN                   S21003 63420042
SET2245  LA    R5,C2245LAB              GET 2245 LABELS          S21092 63490042
                B     RETSENS                                           63560042
SETDEV   STM   R5,R8,XSAVE                                       S21003 63630042
         LA    R5,L9               NUMBER OF DEVICES                    63700062
         LA    R7,DEVTLIST              LIST OF TYPES            S21003 63770042
DEVTLOOP CLC   0(L2,R4),0(R7)           IS THIS TYPE             S21003 63840042
         BE    DEVTFND                  YES, GO SET TYPE FIELD   S21003 63910042
         LA    R7,L6(R7)                ELSE, BUMP               S21003 63980042
         BCT   R5,DEVTLOOP              TRY NEXT TILL COUNT      S21003 64050042
         B     RETURNA                                           S21003 64190042
DEVTFND  MVC   0(L4,R3),L2(R7)          TELL DEVICE TYPE         S21003 64260042
         B     RETURNA                                           S21003 64330042
WORK     DS    D                                                        64400042
XSAVE    DS    4F                                                       64470042
SETSTAT  DS    0H                                                S21003 64540042
         STM   R5,R8,XSAVE              SAVE REGS                S21003 64610042
         LA    R5,STATSECT-4            PNT TO EDITS FOR STATS   S21003 64680042
         ST    R5,YR9PTR                LET EREP KNOW            S21003 64750042
         LA    R5,STATLABS+1            PNTR FOR STAT LABELS     S21003 64820042
         ST    R5,YLABELP               SET FOR EREP             S21003 64890042
         LA    R5,L17(R5)               BUMP PAST FIRST LABEL    S21003 64960042
         LA    R6,L5                    NUMBER OF ENTRIES        S21003 65030042
         LA    R8,STLBLIST              POINT TO FIRST LABEL ENTRS21003 65100042
STLBCOMP CLC   0(L2,R4),0(R8)           IS THIS THE DEVICE TYPE  S21003 65170042
         BE    STLBLTFD                 YES, GO MOVE LABELS      S21003 65240042
         LA    R8,L18(R8)               NO, BUMP TO NEXT         S21003 65310042
         BCT   R6,STLBCOMP              NOT DONE, GO BACK        S21003 65380042
         LA    R8,STLBDFLT              DONE, USE DEFAULT        S21003 65450042
STLBLTFD DS    0H                  LABELS FOUND                  S21003 65520042
         LA    R8,L2(R8)                USE LABELS               S21003 65590042
         LA    R7,L16(R8)               DETERMINE END POINT      S21003 65660042
         ST    R7,STLBLEND              SAVE FOR COMPARE         S21003 65730042
STLABLP  DS    0H                                                S21003 65800042
         CLI   0(R8),XFF                IS THIS 'NOT USED'       S21003 65870042
         BE    STLBLNUS                 YES, LABEL = 'NOT USED'  S21003 65940042
         SR    R7,R7                    CLEAR R7                 S21003 66010042
         IC    R7,0(R8)                 GET INDEX TO LABEL       S21003 66080042
         MH    R7,HW13                  MULTIPLY TO GET LABEL    S21003 66150042
         A     R7,STLBTBAD              SET TO LABEL             S21003 66220042
         MVC   L0(L13,R5),L0(R7)        MOVE IN LABEL            S21003 66290042
         B     STLBL001                                          S21003 66360042
STLBLNUS DS    0H                                                S21003 66430042
         MVC   L0(L13,R5),STLBNTUS      'NOT USED' LABEL         S21003 66500042
STLBL001 DS    0H                                                S21003 66570042
         LA    R5,L14(R5)               BUMP R5                  S21003 66640042
         LA    R7,STLBTABL              GET PROPER LABEL         S21003 66710042
         LA    R8,L1(R8)                POINT TO NEXT INDEX      S21003 66780042
         C     R8,STLBLEND              AT END OF LIST?          S21003 66850042
         BNE   STLABLP                  NO, CONTINUE             S21003 66920042
         B     RETURNA                                           S21003 66990042
