./  ADD  SSI=63160149,NAME=IFCSXXX8
         TITLE 'IFCSXXX8 - SUM TABLE - LINKNAME=IFCS1287, ALIASES=IFCS1C00075042
               1288, IFCS3066, IFCS5450'                                00150042
         SPACE 2                                                        00225042
*  LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO            * 00300042
         MACRO                                                          00375042
&NAME    LINE  &DATA,&LABEL,&SKIP=                                      00450042
.*                            THIS MACRO ESTABLISHES THE MARGINS OR     00525042
.*                                 COLUMN SETTINGS FOR EACH LINE. IT    00600042
.*                                 GENERATES NECESSARY CARRIAGE CONTROL 00675042
.*                                 ENTRIES. LASTLY IT DETERMINES THE    00750042
.*                                 NUMBER OF ENTRIES ASSOCIATED WITH    00825042
.*                                 THE PREVIOUS LINE AND STORES THAT #  00900042
.*                                 INTO THE APPROPRIATE BYTE.           00975042
.*                                 &DATA(1) - CHARACTER POSITION TO     01050042
.*                                 BEGIN DATA.                          01125042
.*                                                                      01200042
.*                                 &DATA(2) - # OF SPACES BETWEEN       01275042
.*                                 SUCCESSIVE DATA COLUMN STARTING      01350042
.*                                 CHARACTERS.                          01425042
.*                                                                      01500042
.*                                 &LABEL(1) - CHARACTER POSITION       01575042
.*                                 TO BEGIN LABELS.                     01650042
.*                                                                      01725042
.*                                 &LABEL(2) - # OF SPACES BETWEEN      01800042
.*                                 LINE'S LABEL STARTING CHARACTERS.    01875042
.*                                                                      01950042
.*                                 &SKIP= - # OF LINES TO ADVANCE       02025042
.*                                 CARRIAGE TO BEGIN NEXT PRINTED LINE. 02100042
.*                                                                      02175042
.*                                 NEW ENTRIES ARE GENERATED ONLY WHEN  02250042
.*                                 NECESSARY. OMISSION OF ITEMS MEANS   02325042
.*                                 THEY HAVE NOT CHANGED SINCE PREVIOUS 02400042
.*                                 SETTINGS. A LINE MACRO IS REQUIRED   02475042
.*                                 FOR EACH PRINTED LINE. IF NO SETTING 02550042
.*                                 CHANGES ARE REQUIRED ALL OPERANDS    02625042
.*                                 ARE OMITTED IN WHICH CASE ONLY THE   02700042
.*                                 # OF ENTRIES FOR THE PREVIOUS LINE   02775042
.*                                 FIRST MACRO INSTRUCTION ISSUED FOR   02850042
.*                                 THE SUBJECT LINE.                    02925042
         GBLA  &DB,&DT,&LB,&LT,&NRENTS                                  03000042
         GBLA  &LASTCC,&INITIAL                                         03075042
         GBLC  &NRENTSX                                                 03150042
         GBLC  &CARRCON                                                 03225042
         GBLB  &TEST                                                    03300042
         LCLA  &S                                                       03375042
&NAME    DS    0C                                                       03450042
         AIF   (&INITIAL EQ 0).FIRSTLN                                  03525042
         LINEND                                                         03600042
         AGO   .NTFIRST                                                 03675042
.FIRSTLN ANOP                                                           03750042
&NRENTSX SETC  'N&SYSNDX'                                               03825042
&INITIAL SETA  1                                                        03900042
&LASTCC  SETA  1                                                        03975042
N&SYSNDX EQU   *                                                        04050042
.NTFIRST ANOP                                                           04125042
         DC    AL1(0)                                                   04200042
         AIF   ('&DATA(1)' EQ '').CKDTABS                               04275042
         AIF   ('&DATA'(1,1) NE '(').SLABEL                             04350042
         AIF   (&DATA(1) EQ &DB).CKDTABS                                04425042
&DB      SETA  &DATA(1)                                                 04500042
         AGO   .AA                                                      04575042
.CKDTABS AIF   ('&DATA(2)' EQ '').NCDATA                                04650042
         AIF   (&DATA(2) EQ &DT).NCDATA                                 04725042
         AGO   .CC                                                      04800042
.AA      AIF   ('&DATA(2)' EQ '').BB                                    04875042
         AIF   (&DATA(2) EQ &DT).BB                                     04950042
.CC      ANOP                                                           05025042
&DT      SETA  &DATA(2)                                                 05100042
.BB      DC    XL2'FFFE'                                                05175042
         DC    FL1'&DB'                                                 05250042
         DC    FL1'&DT'                                                 05325042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                05400042
.NCDATA  ANOP                                                           05475042
         AIF   ('&LABEL(1)' EQ '').CKLTABS                              05550042
         AIF   ('&LABEL'(1,1) NE '(').SLABEL                            05625042
         AIF   (&LABEL(1) EQ &LB).CKLTABS                               05700042
&LB      SETA  &LABEL(1)                                                05775042
         AGO   .AAA                                                     05850042
.CKLTABS AIF   ('&LABEL(2)' EQ '').NCLABEL                              05925042
         AIF   (&LABEL(2) EQ &LT).NCLABEL                               06000042
         AGO   .CCC                                                     06075042
.AAA     AIF   ('&LABEL(2)' EQ '').BBB                                  06150042
         AIF   (&LABEL(2) EQ &LT).BBB                                   06225042
.CCC     ANOP                                                           06300042
&LT      SETA  &LABEL(2)                                                06375042
.BBB     DC    XL2'FFFF'                                                06450042
         DC    FL1'&LB'                                                 06525042
         DC    FL1'&LT'                                                 06600042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                06675042
.NCLABEL ANOP                                                           06750042
         AIF   ('&SKIP' EQ 'E').EJECT                                   06825042
         AIF   ('&SKIP' EQ '').TESTOFF                                  06900042
.CONT    ANOP                                                           06975042
         AIF   (&TEST EQ 0).AB                                          07050042
         AIF   (&SKIP EQ &LASTCC).TESTOFF                               07125042
&S       SETA  &SKIP                                                    07200042
         ORG   &CARRCON+3                                               07275042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&S),AL.3(1)                                 07350042
         ORG                                                            07425042
&LASTCC  SETA  &S                                                       07500042
.SLABEL  ANOP                                                           07575042
.TESTOFF ANOP                                                           07650042
&TEST    SETB  0                                                        07725042
         AGO   .DD                                                      07800042
.EJECT   DC    XL2'FFFB'                                                07875042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                07950042
         DC    X'8B'              SKIP TO CHANNEL 1                     08025042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&LASTCC),AL.3(1)                            08100042
&TEST    SETB  1                                                        08175042
         AGO   .DD                                                      08250042
.AB      AIF   (&SKIP EQ &LASTCC).NOCHANG                               08325042
A&SYSNDX DC    XL2'FFFB'                                                08400042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&SKIP),AL.3(1)                              08475042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&SKIP),AL.3(1)                              08550042
&LASTCC  SETA  &SKIP                                                    08625042
&TEST    SETB  1                                                        08700042
&CARRCON SETC  'A&SYSNDX'                                               08775042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                08850042
.DD      ANOP                                                           08925042
.NOCHANG ANOP                                                           09000042
         MEND                                                           09075042
         EJECT                                                          09150042
         SPACE 2                                                        09225042
*  ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO* 09300042
         MACRO                                                          09375042
&NAME    ROUTINE &LOGITEM,&RNAME                                        09450042
         GBLC  &DSECT,&CSECT                                            09525042
         GBLC  &ITEM(1000)                                              09600042
         GBLA  &SHIFT(1000),&ITEMNBR                                    09675042
         GBLA  &NRENTS                                                  09750042
         LCLA  &ISHIFT,&NDX                                             09825042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           09900042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   09975042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      10050042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  10125042
         MNOTE *,'LOG ITEM NOT DEFINED'                                 10200042
         MEXIT                                                          10275042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           10350042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             10425042
&NAME    DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'D'                           10500042
         DC    AL.4(&ISHIFT),AL.12(&RNAME-&CSECT)                       10575042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                10650042
         MEND                                                           10725042
*  DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO        * 10800042
         SPACE 2                                                        10875042
         MACRO                                                          10950042
&NAME    DSGEN &X1,&X2,&X3,&X4,&X5,&X6,&X7,&X8,&X9,&X10,&X11,&X12,&X13,X11025042
               &X14,&X15,&X16,&X17,&X18,&X19,&X20,&X21,&X22,&X23,&X24, X11100042
               &X25,&X26,&X27,&X28,&X29,&X30,&X31,&X32                  11175042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES ONE DSECT WORD       11250042
.*                                 FORMATTED FOR THE SUBJECT LOG RECORD 11325042
.*                                 EACH OPERAND HAS TWO SUB LISTS. THE  11400042
.*                                 FIRST IS THE NAME OF THE LOG ITEM    11475042
.*                                 WHILE THE SECOND IS THE # OF BITS TO 11550042
.*                                 ALLOCATE FOR THIS ITEM. ITEMS MUST   11625042
.*                                 BE DEFINED CONTIGUOUSLY WITHOUT GAPS 11700042
.*                                 UNUSED BIT GROUPS MUST BE GIVEN      11775042
.*                                 DUMMY NAMES. THE NAMES PROVIDED FOR  11850042
.*                                 THE LOG ITEMS MAY THEN BE USED IN    11925042
.*                                 THE CONVERSION MACRO INSTRUCTIONS.   12000042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000)                                               12075042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000)                         12150042
         LCLC  &SYMBOL                                                  12225042
         LCLA  &OP,&COUNT,&BYTE                                         12300042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           12375042
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    12450042
&ITEMNBR SETA  &ITEMNBR+1                                               12525042
&SYMBOL  SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP,1)'                                        12600042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,2)' NE '').OK1                            12675042
         MNOTE *,'NULL BIT COUNT FIELD'                                 12750042
         MEXIT                                                          12825042
.OK1     ANOP                                                           12900042
         AIF   ('&SYMBOL' NE '').OK                                     12975042
         MNOTE 'LOG ITEM SYMBOL NOT PROVIDED'                           13050042
         AGO   .CNT                                                     13125042
.OK      ANOP                                                           13200042
         AIF   ('&SYMBOL'(1,1) EQ '''').CNT                *TEMP*       13275042
&SYMBOL  EQU   *+&BYTE                                                  13350042
&ITEM(&ITEMNBR)  SETC '&SYSLIST(&OP,1)'                                 13425042
&BITS(&ITEMNBR) SETA &SYSLIST(&OP,2)                                    13500042
&SHIFT(&ITEMNBR) SETA &COUNT-&BYTE*8                                    13575042
.CNT     ANOP                                                           13650042
&COUNT   SETA  &COUNT+&SYSLIST(&OP,2)                                   13725042
&BYTE    SETA  &COUNT/8                                                 13800042
         AIF (&OP LT N'&SYSLIST).LOOP                                   13875042
         AIF   (&COUNT NE 32).NOT32                                     13950042
&NAME    DS    4C                                                       14025042
         MEXIT                                                          14100042
.NOT32   AIF   (&COUNT NE 64).ERR                                       14175042
&NAME    DS    8C                                                       14250042
         MEXIT                                                          14325042
.ERR     MNOTE '**BIT COUNT FIELDS DO NOT TOTAL 32 OR 64**'             14400042
         MEND                                                           14475042
         MACRO                                                          14550042
         LINEND                                                         14625042
.*                            THIS MACRO IS USED ONLY BY THE LINE       14700042
.*                                 MACRO TO SET THE NUMBER OF ENTRIES   14775042
.*                                 ASSOCIATED WITH EACH LINE.           14850042
         GBLA  &NRENTS                                                  14925042
         GBLC &NRENTSX                                                  15000042
         ORG   &NRENTSX                                                 15075042
         DC    FL1'&NRENTS'                                             15150042
         ORG                                                            15225042
&NRENTS  SETA  0                                                        15300042
B&SYSNDX EQU   *                                                        15375042
&NRENTSX SETC  'B&SYSNDX'                                               15450042
         MEND                                                           15525042
         SPACE 2                                                        15600042
         EJECT                                                          15675042
*  LABEL MACRO     LABEL MACRO     LABEL MACRO     LABEL MACRO        * 15750042
         SPACE 2                                                        15825042
         MACRO                                                          15900042
&NAME    LABEL &LABEL1,&LABEL2,&LABEL3,&LABEL4,&LABEL5,&LABEL6,        C15975042
               &LABEL7,&LABEL8                                          16050042
.*                            THIS MACRO ALLOWS UP TO ACHT LABELS TO    16125042
.*                                 BE SPECIFIED FOR A GIVEN LINE. THE   16200042
.*                                 LABELS SHOULD BE ENCLOSED IN QUOTA-  16275042
.*                                 TION MARKS. THE COLUMN AND LINE END  16350042
.*                                 CONTROLS WILL BE INSERTED BY THE     16425042
.*                                 MACRO. OMITTED OPERANDS MEAN NO      16500042
.*                                 LABEL REQUIRED FOR RESPECTIVE        16575042
.*                                 COLUMN. THIS MACRO WILL ALSO ALERT   16650042
.*                                 THE PROGRAMMER TO EXACTLY WHERE THE  16725042
.*                                 TABLE MUST BE BROKEN IF NECESSARY    16800042
.*                                 TO AVOID EXCEEDING THE MAXIMUM LIMIT 16875042
         GBLC &LABELS(2000)                                             16950042
         GBLC  &LBL(100)                                                17025042
         GBLA  &LBLCTR(100)                                             17100042
         GBLA  &LABELNR                                                 17175042
         GBLA  &NRENTS,&LPTR                                            17250042
         LCLC  &MARGIN,&TACK                                            17325042
         LCLC  &TEXT                                                    17400042
         LCLA  &OP,&K,&START,&NRCHAR,&REMAIN                            17475042
&MARGIN  SETC  '*'                                                      17550042
         AIF   ('&NAME' EQ '').LOOPOUT                                  17625042
&LPTR    SETA  &LPTR+1                                                  17700042
&LBL(&LPTR) SETC '&NAME'                                                17775042
&LBLCTR(&LPTR) SETA &LABELNR+1                                          17850042
.LOOPOUT ANOP                                                           17925042
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    18000042
&K       SETA  K'&SYSLIST(&OP)                                          18075042
         AIF (&K GE 2).NORM                                             18150042
&K       SETA  2                                                        18225042
.NORM    ANOP                                                           18300042
&START   SETA  2                                                        18375042
         AIF (&OP LT N'&SYSLIST).NOTLAST                                18450042
&MARGIN  SETC  '$'                                                      18525042
.NOTLAST ANOP                                                           18600042
&NRCHAR  SETA  8                                                        18675042
&TACK    SETC  ''                                                       18750042
.LOOPIN  ANOP                                                           18825042
&REMAIN  SETA  &K-&START                                                18900042
         AIF (&REMAIN GE 8).MORE                                        18975042
&TACK    SETC  '&MARGIN'                                                19050042
&NRCHAR  SETA  &REMAIN                                                  19125042
.MORE    ANOP                                                           19200042
&TEXT    SETC  ''                                                       19275042
         AIF (&REMAIN EQ 0).ENDTEXT                                     19350042
&TEXT    SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP)'(&START,&NRCHAR)                          19425042
.ENDTEXT ANOP                                                           19500042
&LABELNR SETA  &LABELNR+1                                               19575042
&LABELS(&LABELNR) SETC '&TEXT'.'&TACK'                                  19650042
&START   SETA  &START+8                                                 19725042
         AIF ('&TACK' EQ '').LOOPIN                                     19800042
         AIF ('&TACK' EQ '*').LOOPOUT                                   19875042
         MEND                                                           19950042
         SPACE 2                                                        20025042
         MACRO                                                          20100042
         LSTART                                                         20175042
.*                            THIS MACRO IS ISSUED WHEN THE LABEL AREA  20250042
.*                                 OF THE TABLE IS TO BEGIN.            20325042
         GBLC &LABELS(2000)                                             20400042
         GBLA  &LABELNR                                                 20475042
         GBLC  &LBL(100)                                                20550042
         GBLA  &LBLCTR(100)                                             20625042
         LCLA  &NDX,&CTR                                                20700042
         LINEND                                                         20775042
&CTR     SETA  1                                                        20850042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           20925042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   21000042
         AIF   (&LBLCTR(&CTR) NE &NDX).NOLBL                            21075042
&LBL(&CTR) DC  C'&LABELS(&NDX)'                                         21150042
&CTR     SETA  &CTR+1                                                   21225042
         AGO   .LOOPCTL                                                 21300042
.NOLBL   ANOP                                                           21375042
         DC    C'&LABELS(&NDX)'                                         21450042
.LOOPCTL AIF   (&NDX LT &LABELNR).LOOP                                  21525042
         MEND                                                           21600042
         SPACE 2                                                        21675042
*  BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO  * 21750042
         SPACE 2                                                        21825042
         MACRO                                                          21900042
         BIN   &LOGITEM,&SKIP$OR                                        21975042
.*                                 &LOGITEM - NAME OF ITEM IN LOG       22050042
.*                                      RECORD DSECT                    22125042
.*                                 &SKIP$OR - NBR OF SPACES TO SKIP ON  22200042
.*                                 MULTIPLE PRINT OR NBR OF SPACES      22275042
.*                                      TO BACK UP FROM COLUMN FOR      22350042
.*                                      START OF PRINTING. THE LETTER   22425042
.*                                      B PRECEEDS THE NUMBER (B5) IF   22500042
.*                                      THE LATTER IS DESIRED. OMISSION 22575042
.*                                      OF THIS OPERAND FORCES OPTION 2 22650042
.*                                      WITH BACKUP SPACING EQUAL TO    22725042
.*                                 THE NUMBER OF BITS IN THE ITEM       22800042
.*                                 DEFINITION (VIA MACRO 'DSGEN').      22875042
.*                            A LIMIT OF 15 BITS IS IMPOSED FOR THE     22950042
.*                                 TOTAL NUMBER OF BITS TO PRINT.       23025042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000)                                               23100042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000),&NRENTS                 23175042
         GBLC  &DSECT                                                   23250042
         LCLB  &B                                                       23325042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&K                                   23400042
         LCLA  &TEMP,&T                                                 23475042
         LCLC  &S                                                       23550042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           23625042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   23700042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      23775042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  23850042
         MNOTE *,'YOU BLEW IT'                                          23925042
         ROUTINE DUM,SKIPPER                                            24000042
         MEXIT                                                          24075042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           24150042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             24225042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              24300042
&T       SETA  &IBITS-1                                                 24375042
&B       SETB  0                                                        24450042
         AIF   ('&SKIP$OR' EQ '').BACKUP                                24525042
&K       SETA  K'&SKIP$OR                                               24600042
&B       SETB  ('&SKIP$OR'(1,1) EQ 'B')                                 24675042
&S       SETC  '&SKIP$OR'(&B+1,&K-&B)                                   24750042
&T       SETA  &S                                                       24825042
.BACKUP  ANOP                                                           24900042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                24975042
&TEMP    SETA  &ISHIFT                                                  25050042
A&SYSNDX DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'&TEMP'                       25125042
         AIF (&IBITS EQ 1 AND &B EQ 0).OUT                              25200042
         ORG   A&SYSNDX                                                 25275042
&B       SETB  1                                                        25350042
         DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'C'                           25425042
         DC    BL.1'&B',AL.7(&T),AL.4(&IBITS),FL.4'&ISHIFT'             25500042
.OUT     ANOP                                                           25575042
         MEND                                                           25650042
         EJECT                                                          25725042
*  HEX MACRO     HEX MACRO     HEX MACRO    HEXN MACRO     HEX MACRO  * 25800042
         SPACE 2                                                        25875042
         MACRO                                                          25950042
         HEX   &LOGITEM,&SKIP$OR,&BYTES                                 26025042
.*                            THIS MACRO FACILITATES GENERATION OF THE  26100042
.*                                 TABLE ENTRIES SPECIFYING HEX TYPE    26175042
.*                                 CONVERSIONS.                         26250042
.*                            &LOGITEM - NAME OF DATA ITEM TO BE        26325042
.*                                 CONVERTED                            26400042
.*                            &SKIP$OR - NUMBER OF SPACES TO SKIP ON    26475042
.*                                 MULTIPLE PRINT OR NBR OF SPACES TO   26550042
.*                                 BACK UP FROM COLUMN FOR START OF     26625042
.*                                 PRINTING. THE LETTER B PRECEEDS THE  26700042
.*                                 NUMBER (B8) IF THE LATTER OPTION IS  26775042
.*                                 DESIRED. OMISSION OF THIS OPERAND    26850042
.*                                 FORCES OPTION 2 WITH BACKUP SPACING  26925042
.*                                 EQUAL TO THE NUMBER OF BYTES SPECI-  27000042
.*                                 FIED BY THE NEXT OPERAND (TWICE THIS 27075042
.*                                 NUMBER IF SUFFIX IS EXPLICITLY OR    27150042
.*                                 IMPLICITLY B).                       27225042
.*                            &BYTES - NUMBER OF TOTAL INPUT BYTES TO   27300042
.*                                 PROCESS. THIS NUMBER IS SUFFIXED     27375042
.*                                 WITH AN L,R, OR B TO STIPULATE       27450042
.*                                 PRINTING OF THE LEFT HALF, RIGHT     27525042
.*                                 HALF, OR BOTH HALVES OF THE BYTE     27600042
.*                                 RESPECTIVELY. OMISSION OF THIS       27675042
.*                                 OPERAND DEFAULTS TO B WITH THE NUM-  27750042
.*                                 BER OF BYTES EQUAL TO THE ITEM LNGTH 27825042
.*                            A NEW ENTRY IS GENERATED ONLY WHEN NECES- 27900042
.*                                 SARY. THIS MACRO MUST BE THE FIRST   27975042
.*                                 MACRO INSTRUCTION ISSUED FOR THE     28050042
.*                                 SUBJECT LINE(S).                     28125042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000),&DSECT                                        28200042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000),&NRENTS                 28275042
         LCLB  &B                                                       28350042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&K,&T,&CODE,&BYTESP                  28425042
         LCLC  &S,&LETTER                                               28500042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           28575042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   28650042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      28725042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  28800042
         MNOTE *,'LOG ITEM NOT DEFINED'                                 28875042
         MEXIT                                                          28950042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           29025042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             29100042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              29175042
&CODE    SETA  1                                                        29250042
&K       SETA  K'&BYTES                                                 29325042
         AIF   (&IBITS-(&IBITS/4)*4 EQ 0).OK                            29400042
         MNOTE *,'BIT LENGTH SPECIFICATION INCONSISTENT WITH CONTROL'   29475042
         MEXIT                                                          29550042
.OK      AIF   ('&BYTES' EQ '').USEDEFN                                 29625042
&LETTER  SETC  '&BYTES'(&K,1)                                           29700042
&S       SETC  '&BYTES'(1,&K-1)                                         29775042
&BYTESP  SETA  &S                                                       29850042
         AIF   ('&LETTER' EQ 'B').BOTH                                  29925042
         AIF   (&ISHIFT EQ 0 OR &ISHIFT EQ 4).OK2                       30000042
.ERR     MNOTE *,'DATA NOT ALLIGNED ON HEX OR BYTE BOUNDARY'            30075042
         MEXIT                                                          30150042
.USEDEFN ANOP                                                           30225042
&BYTESP  SETA  &IBITS/8                                                 30300042
.BOTH    AIF   (&ISHIFT NE 0).ERR                                       30375042
&CODE    SETA  3                                                        30450042
&T       SETA  &BYTESP*2-1                                              30525042
&S       SETC  '&T'                                                     30600042
.OK2     AIF   (&ISHIFT EQ 0).L                                         30675042
&CODE    SETA  2                                                        30750042
.L       ANOP                                                           30825042
&B       SETB  1                                                        30900042
         AIF   ('&SKIP$OR' EQ '').BACKUP                                30975042
&K       SETA  K'&SKIP$OR                                               31050042
&B       SETB  ('&SKIP$OR'(1,1) EQ 'B')                                 31125042
&S       SETC  '&SKIP$OR'(&B+1,&K-&B)                                   31200042
.BACKUP  ANOP                                                           31275042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                31350042
         DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'A'                           31425042
         DC    BL.1'&B',FL.7'&S',FL.4'&BYTESP',FL.4'&CODE'              31500042
.OUT     ANOP                                                           31575042
         MEND                                                           31650042
         MACRO                                                          31725042
         SPECIAL  &ROUTINE,&PARAM,&SPACE=                               31800042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES A SPECIAL ROUTINE    31875042
.*                                 ENTRY TO BE PROCESSED BY THE SUM. M. 31950042
.*                            &ROUTINE - SYMBOL ON SPECIAL ROUTINE EWT. 32025042
.*                            &PARAM - AN 8 BIT BINARY REPRESENTATION   32100042
.*                                 TO OCCUPY THE 'MASK' FIELD BUT TO BE 32175042
.*                                 INTERPRETED AS AN ARGUMENT OF THE    32250042
.*                                 SPECIAL ROUTINE.                     32325042
.*                            &SPACE - THE NUMBER OF 2BYTE COUNTERS TO  32400042
.*                                 ALLOCATE FOR REQUIRED PROCESSING.    32475042
         GBLC  &CSECT                                                   32550042
         GBLA  &COUNTR                                                  32625042
         LCLA  &ADD                                                     32700042
         DC    AL1(128)                                                 32775042
         DC    BL.8'&PARAM'                                             32850042
         DC    AL2(&ROUTINE-&CSECT)                                     32925042
         DC    AL2(&COUNTR)                                             33000042
&ADD     SETA  1                                                        33075042
         AIF   ('&SPACE' EQ '').NORM                                    33150042
&ADD     SETA  &SPACE                                                   33225042
.NORM    ANOP                                                           33300042
&COUNTR  SETA  &COUNTR+&ADD                                             33375042
         MEND                                                           33450042
         MACRO                                                          33525042
         SUM   &LOGITEM,&MASK                                           33600042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES A NORMAL EDIT ENTRY  33675042
.*                                 FOR PROCESSING BY THE SUMMARY MODULE 33750042
.*                            &LOGITEM - NAME OF DATA ITEM TO BE SUMMED 33825042
.*                            &MASK - BYTE MASK FOR BITS TO BE TESTED.  33900042
.*                                 THIS OPERAND SHOULD BE OMITTED FOR   33975042
.*                                 SINGLE BIT ITEMS IN WHICH CASE THE   34050042
.*                                 MASK WILL BE SET ACCORDING TO THE    34125042
.*                                 OFF BYTE BIT DISPLACEMENT OF THE     34200042
.*                                ITEM AS DEFINED BY THE MACRO 'DSGEN'  34275042
         GBLA  &COUNTR,&ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000)                34350042
         GBLC  &ITEM(1000),&DSECT                                       34425042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&M,&BITNBR                           34500042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           34575042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   34650042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      34725042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  34800042
         MNOTE *,'LOGITEM NOT FOUND'                                    34875042
         MEXIT                                                          34950042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           35025042
         DC    AL1(0)                                                   35100042

         L     R8,REG8             GET CURRENT PTR                      53100042

*                                  DATA - SUM COUNTER                   53475042

         CH    R7,L2(R3)           IS DATE EQUAL TO STORED              53775042

         B     RETURN              FULL RETURN                          54150042

SETCPUNO STM   R5,R8,XSAVE              SAVE REGS                S21021 63750042
         SR    R5,R5                    CLEAAR R5                S21021 63825042
         IC    R5,0(R4)                 PICK UP                  S21021 63900042
         SLL   R5,R8                      CPU TYPE               S21021 63975042
         IC    R5,L1(R4)                    FIELD                S21021 64050042
         LTR   R5,R5                    IS TI ZERO?              S21021 64125042
         BNZ   RETURNA                  NO, LINE IS GOOD, RETURN S21021 64200042
         LA    R6,L64                   ELSE, BACK UP DATA PTR   S21021 64275042
         SR    R3,R6                    TO PUT IN NEW INFO       S21021 64350042
         MVC   0(L6,R3),SHARED          SAY MODEL SHARED       @Z427VLS 64425042
         B     RETURNA                  RETURN                   S21021 64575042
*                                                                S21021 64650042
SETSTAT  DS    0H                                                S21021 64725042
         STM   R5,R8,XSAVE              SAVE REGS                S21021 64800042
         LA    R5,STATLABS              PNTR FOR STAT LABELS     S21021 64875042
         ST    R5,YLABELP               SET FOR EREP             S21021 64950042
         LA    R5,L17(R5)               BUMP PAST FIRST LABEL    S21021 65025042
         LA    R6,L4                    NUMBER OF LISTS                 65100042
         LA    R8,STLBLIST              POINT TO FIRST LABEL ENTRS21021 65175042
STLBCOMP CLC   0(L2,R4),0(R8)           IS THIS THE DEVICE TYPE  S21021 65250042
         BE    STLBLTFD                 YES, GO MOVE LABELS      S21021 65325042
         LA    R8,L18(R8)               NO, BUMP TO NEXT         S21021 65400042
         BCT   R6,STLBCOMP              NOT DONE, GO BACK        S21021 65475042
         LA    R8,STLBDFLT              DONE, USE DEFAULT        S21021 65550042
STLBLTFD DS    0H                  LABELS FOUND                  S21021 65625042
         LA    R8,L2(R8)                USE LABELS               S21021 65700042
         LA    R7,L16(R8)               DETERMINE END POINT      S21021 65775042
         ST    R7,STLBLEND              SAVE FOR COMPARE         S21021 65850042
STLABLP  DS    0H                                                S21021 65925042
         CLI   0(R8),XFF                IS THIS 'NOT USED'       S21021 66000042
         BE    STLBLNUS                 YES, LABEL = 'NOT USED'  S21021 66075042
         SR    R7,R7                    CLEAR R7                 S21021 66150042
         IC    R7,0(R8)                 GET INDEX TO LABEL       S21021 66225042
         MH    R7,HW13                  MULTIPLY TO GET LABEL    S21021 66300042
         A     R7,STLBTBAD              SET TO LABEL             S21021 66375042
         MVC   L0(L13,R5),L0(R7)        MOVE IN LABEL            S21021 66450042
         B     STLBL001                                          S21021 66525042
STLBLNUS DS    0H                                                S21021 66600042
         MVC   L0(L13,R5),STLBNTUS      'NOT USED' LABEL         S21021 66675042
STLBL001 DS    0H                                                S21021 66750042
         LA    R5,L14(R5)               BUMP R5                  S21021 66825042
         LA    R7,STLBTABL              GET PROPER LABEL         S21021 66900042
         LA    R8,L1(R8)                POINT TO NEXT INDEX      S21021 66975042
         C     R8,STLBLEND              AT END OF LIST?          S21021 67050042
         BNE   STLABLP                  NO, CONTINUE             S21021 67125042
         B     RETURNA                                           S21021 67200042
CONVERT  STM   R5,R8,XSAVE              SAVE REGS                       67275042
         LH    R5,L0(R4)                PICK UP COUNT                   67350042
CONV1    CVD   R5,WORK                  CONVERT IT TO DEVIMALP          67425042
         UNPK  L0(L3,R3),WORK+L5(L3)    UNPACK IT TO PRINT BUFF         67500042
         MVZ   L2(L1,R3),L0(R3)         PUT ON PRINTABLE ZONE           67575042
RETURNA  LM    R5,R8,XSAVE              RESTORE REGS                    67650042
         BR    R14                                                      67725042
*                                                                       67800042
SKIPPER  BR    R14                      RETURN                          67875042
*                                                                       67950042
SETDATE  UNPK  WORK(L8),L0(L4,R4)       PACK DATE                       68025042
         MVZ   WORK+L7(L1),WORK         MOVE ON ZONE                    68100042
         MVC   L0(L3,R3),WORK+L5        MOVE DATE TO PRINT LINE         68175042
         MVC   L5(L2,R3),WORK+L3        MOVE YEAR TO PRINT LINE         68250042
         BR    R14                                                      68325042
*                                                                       68400042
CONVCC1  CLC   L0(L2,R4),HEXFFFF        IS THIS COUNTER EMPYT           68475042
         BCR   L8,R14                   NO TI IS FULL                   68550042
         SR    R15,R15                  STOP LINE PRINTING              68625042
         BR    R14                      RETURN                          68700042
*              SET LABELS                                               68775042
*                                                                       68850042
SETLABEL STM   R5,R8,XSAVE              SAVE REGS                       68925042
         CLI   L1(R4),HEX1C                                             69000042
         BNE   SETLB2                   NO, SEE IF 1007,8               69075042
SET1288  LA    R5,CLABEL1                                               69150042
         ST    R5,YLABELP                                               69225042
         B     RETURNA                                                  69300042
SETLB2   DS    0H                                                       69375042
         CLC   0(L2,R4),T3066           IS THIS 3066 RECORD             69450042
         BE    CLAB2DO                  YES, SET LABELS                 69525042
         CLC   0(L2,R4),T5450           IS THIS 5450 RECORD             69600042
         BNE   RETURNA                 RETURN                           69675042
CLAB2DO  LA    R5,CLABEL2               LABELS FOR 1007,1008            69750042
         ST    R5,YLABELP               LET EREP KNOW                   69825042
         B     RETURNA                  RETURN                          69900042
HEX1C    EQU   X'1C'                                                    69975042
*                                                                       70050042
*        FREEE COUNTERS AREA LAST THING DONE                            70125042
*                                                                       70200042
FREECTR  STM   R14,R12,L12(R13)         SAVE ALL REGS                   70275042
         LR    R12,R13                  SAVE SAVE AREA ADDR             70350042
         LA    R13,FSAVE                POINT TO MY SAVE                70425042
         ST    R12,L4(R13)              SET CHAINING POINTERS           70500042
         ST    R13,L8(R12)                                              70575042
         L     R3,L4(R2)                PICK UP POINTER TO NEXT COUNTER 70650042
         ST    R3,L28(R12)              SAVE POINTER IN REG SAVE        70725042
         LH    R0,SIZE                  PICK UP SIZE OF AREA            70800042
         LR    R1,R2                    SET ADDRESS                     70875042
         FREEMAIN R,LV=(0),A=(1)                                        70950042
         LTR   R3,R3                    ANY MORE COUNTERS               71025042
         BZ    RETURN0                  NO  RETURN                      71100042
         LA    R5,PENTRY+L10            POINT TO TOP ENTRY - 4          71175042
         ST    R5,YR9PTR                                                71250042
         LA    R5,LABELS-L1               POINT TO FIRST LABEL - 1      71325042
         ST    R5,YLABELP               STORE IT IN TABLE               71400042
RETURN0  L    R13,L4(R13)               PICK UP &                       71475042
         LM    R14,R12,L12(R13)         RESTOR E REGS                   71550042
         BR    R14                                                      71625042
*                                                                       71700042
HEX02    EQU   X'02'                                                    71775042

WORK     DS    D                                                        71925042
XSAVE    DS    4F                                                       72000042
FSAVE    DS    18F                                                      72075042

SETDEV   STM   R5,R8,XSAVE              SAVE REGS                       75900042
         LH    R5,L0(R4)                PICK UP DEVICE TYPE             75975042
         LA    R6,L4                    NO OF DEVICES                   76050042
         LA    R7,DEVTBLE                                               76125042
LOOP     CH    R5,L0(R7)                IS IT THIS DEVICE               76200042
         BE    FOUND                    YES                             76275042
         LA    R7,L6(R7)                BUMP UP TO NEXT DEV             76350042
         BCT   R6,LOOP                  LOOP TILL DONE                  76425042
         B    RETURNA                                                   76575042
FOUND    MVC   L0(L4,R3),L2(R7)         MOVE IN DEVICE TYPE             76650042
         B    RETURNA                                                   76725042
