         DC    C'$'                                                     95625042
LABELS   EQU   *                                                        95700042
         LSTART                                                         95775042
         END                                                            95850042
./  ADD  SSI=63160150,NAME=IFCSXXX9
         TITLE 'IFCSXXX9 - SUM TABLE - LINKNAME=IFCS2250, ALIASES=IFCS2C00065042
               260,IFCS2280,IFCS2282,IFCS3505,IFCS3525'                 00130042
         SPACE 2                                                        00195042
*  LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO     LINE MACRO            * 00260042
         MACRO                                                          00325042
&NAME    LINE  &DATA,&LABEL,&SKIP=                                      00390042
.*                            THIS MACRO ESTABLISHES THE MARGINS OR     00455042
.*                                 COLUMN SETTINGS FOR EACH LINE. IT    00520042
.*                                 GENERATES NECESSARY CARRIAGE CONTROL 00585042
.*                                 ENTRIES. LASTLY IT DETERMINES THE    00650042
.*                                 NUMBER OF ENTRIES ASSOCIATED WITH    00715042
.*                                 THE PREVIOUS LINE AND STORES THAT #  00780042
.*                                 INTO THE APPROPRIATE BYTE.           00845042
.*                                 &DATA(1) - CHARACTER POSITION TO     00910042
.*                                 BEGIN DATA.                          00975042
.*                                                                      01040042
.*                                 &DATA(2) - # OF SPACES BETWEEN       01105042
.*                                 SUCCESSIVE DATA COLUMN STARTING      01170042
.*                                 CHARACTERS.                          01235042
.*                                                                      01300042
.*                                 &LABEL(1) - CHARACTER POSITION       01365042
.*                                 TO BEGIN LABELS.                     01430042
.*                                                                      01495042
.*                                 &LABEL(2) - # OF SPACES BETWEEN      01560042
.*                                 LINE'S LABEL STARTING CHARACTERS.    01625042
.*                                                                      01690042
.*                                 &SKIP= - # OF LINES TO ADVANCE       01755042
.*                                 CARRIAGE TO BEGIN NEXT PRINTED LINE. 01820042
.*                                                                      01885042
.*                                 NEW ENTRIES ARE GENERATED ONLY WHEN  01950042
.*                                 NECESSARY. OMISSION OF ITEMS MEANS   02015042
.*                                 THEY HAVE NOT CHANGED SINCE PREVIOUS 02080042
.*                                 SETTINGS. A LINE MACRO IS REQUIRED   02145042
.*                                 FOR EACH PRINTED LINE. IF NO SETTING 02210042
.*                                 CHANGES ARE REQUIRED ALL OPERANDS    02275042
.*                                 ARE OMITTED IN WHICH CASE ONLY THE   02340042
.*                                 # OF ENTRIES FOR THE PREVIOUS LINE   02405042
.*                                 FIRST MACRO INSTRUCTION ISSUED FOR   02470042
.*                                 THE SUBJECT LINE.                    02535042
         GBLA  &DB,&DT,&LB,&LT,&NRENTS                                  02600042
         GBLA  &LASTCC,&INITIAL                                         02665042
         GBLC  &NRENTSX                                                 02730042
         GBLC  &CARRCON                                                 02795042
         GBLB  &TEST                                                    02860042
         LCLA  &S                                                       02925042
&NAME    DS    0C                                                       02990042
         AIF   (&INITIAL EQ 0).FIRSTLN                                  03055042
         LINEND                                                         03120042
         AGO   .NTFIRST                                                 03185042
.FIRSTLN ANOP                                                           03250042
&NRENTSX SETC  'N&SYSNDX'                                               03315042
&INITIAL SETA  1                                                        03380042
&LASTCC  SETA  1                                                        03445042
N&SYSNDX EQU   *                                                        03510042
.NTFIRST ANOP                                                           03575042
         DC    AL1(0)                                                   03640042
         AIF   ('&DATA(1)' EQ '').CKDTABS                               03705042
         AIF   ('&DATA'(1,1) NE '(').SLABEL                             03770042
         AIF   (&DATA(1) EQ &DB).CKDTABS                                03835042
&DB      SETA  &DATA(1)                                                 03900042
         AGO   .AA                                                      03965042
.CKDTABS AIF   ('&DATA(2)' EQ '').NCDATA                                04030042
         AIF   (&DATA(2) EQ &DT).NCDATA                                 04095042
         AGO   .CC                                                      04160042
.AA      AIF   ('&DATA(2)' EQ '').BB                                    04225042
         AIF   (&DATA(2) EQ &DT).BB                                     04290042
.CC      ANOP                                                           04355042
&DT      SETA  &DATA(2)                                                 04420042
.BB      DC    XL2'FFFE'                                                04485042
         DC    FL1'&DB'                                                 04550042
         DC    FL1'&DT'                                                 04615042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                04680042
.NCDATA  ANOP                                                           04745042
         AIF   ('&LABEL(1)' EQ '').CKLTABS                              04810042
         AIF   ('&LABEL'(1,1) NE '(').SLABEL                            04875042
         AIF   (&LABEL(1) EQ &LB).CKLTABS                               04940042
&LB      SETA  &LABEL(1)                                                05005042
         AGO   .AAA                                                     05070042
.CKLTABS AIF   ('&LABEL(2)' EQ '').NCLABEL                              05135042
         AIF   (&LABEL(2) EQ &LT).NCLABEL                               05200042
         AGO   .CCC                                                     05265042
.AAA     AIF   ('&LABEL(2)' EQ '').BBB                                  05330042
         AIF   (&LABEL(2) EQ &LT).BBB                                   05395042
.CCC     ANOP                                                           05460042
&LT      SETA  &LABEL(2)                                                05525042
.BBB     DC    XL2'FFFF'                                                05590042
         DC    FL1'&LB'                                                 05655042
         DC    FL1'&LT'                                                 05720042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                05785042
.NCLABEL ANOP                                                           05850042
         AIF   ('&SKIP' EQ 'E').EJECT                                   05915042
         AIF   ('&SKIP' EQ '').TESTOFF                                  05980042
.CONT    ANOP                                                           06045042
         AIF   (&TEST EQ 0).AB                                          06110042
         AIF   (&SKIP EQ &LASTCC).TESTOFF                               06175042
&S       SETA  &SKIP                                                    06240042
         ORG   &CARRCON+3                                               06305042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&S),AL.3(1)                                 06370042
         ORG                                                            06435042
&LASTCC  SETA  &S                                                       06500042
.SLABEL  ANOP                                                           06565042
.TESTOFF ANOP                                                           06630042
&TEST    SETB  0                                                        06695042
         AGO   .DD                                                      06760042
.EJECT   DC    XL2'FFFB'                                                06825042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                06890042
         DC    X'8B'              SKIP TO CHANNEL 1                     06955042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&LASTCC),AL.3(1)                            07020042
&TEST    SETB  1                                                        07085042
         AGO   .DD                                                      07150042
.AB      AIF   (&SKIP EQ &LASTCC).NOCHANG                               07215042
A&SYSNDX DC    XL2'FFFB'                                                07280042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&SKIP),AL.3(1)                              07345042
         DC    AL.3(0),AL.2(&SKIP),AL.3(1)                              07410042
&LASTCC  SETA  &SKIP                                                    07475042
&TEST    SETB  1                                                        07540042
&CARRCON SETC  'A&SYSNDX'                                               07605042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                07670042
.DD      ANOP                                                           07735042
.NOCHANG ANOP                                                           07800042
         MEND                                                           07865042
         EJECT                                                          07930042
         SPACE 2                                                        07995042
*  ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO     ROUTINE MACRO* 08060042
         MACRO                                                          08125042
&NAME    ROUTINE &LOGITEM,&RNAME                                        08190042
         GBLC  &DSECT,&CSECT                                            08255042
         GBLC  &ITEM(1000)                                              08320042
         GBLA  &SHIFT(1000),&ITEMNBR                                    08385042
         GBLA  &NRENTS                                                  08450042
         LCLA  &ISHIFT,&NDX                                             08515042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           08580042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   08645042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      08710042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  08775042
         MNOTE *,'LOG ITEM NOT DEFINED'                                 08840042
         MEXIT                                                          08905042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           08970042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             09035042
&NAME    DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'D'                           09100042
         DC    AL.4(&ISHIFT),AL.12(&RNAME-&CSECT)                       09165042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                09230042
         MEND                                                           09295042
*  DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO     DSGEN MACRO        * 09360042
         SPACE 2                                                        09425042
         MACRO                                                          09490042
&NAME    DSGEN &X1,&X2,&X3,&X4,&X5,&X6,&X7,&X8,&X9,&X10,&X11,&X12,&X13,X09555042
               &X14,&X15,&X16,&X17,&X18,&X19,&X20,&X21,&X22,&X23,&X24, X09620042
               &X25,&X26,&X27,&X28,&X29,&X30,&X31,&X32                  09685042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES ONE DSECT WORD       09750042
.*                                 FORMATTED FOR THE SUBJECT LOG RECORD 09815042
.*                                 EACH OPERAND HAS TWO SUB LISTS. THE  09880042
.*                                 FIRST IS THE NAME OF THE LOG ITEM    09945042
.*                                 WHILE THE SECOND IS THE # OF BITS TO 10010042
.*                                 ALLOCATE FOR THIS ITEM. ITEMS MUST   10075042
.*                                 BE DEFINED CONTIGUOUSLY WITHOUT GAPS 10140042
.*                                 UNUSED BIT GROUPS MUST BE GIVEN      10205042
.*                                 DUMMY NAMES. THE NAMES PROVIDED FOR  10270042
.*                                 THE LOG ITEMS MAY THEN BE USED IN    10335042
.*                                 THE CONVERSION MACRO INSTRUCTIONS.   10400042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000)                                               10465042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000)                         10530042
         LCLC  &SYMBOL                                                  10595042
         LCLA  &OP,&COUNT,&BYTE                                         10660042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           10725042
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    10790042
&ITEMNBR SETA  &ITEMNBR+1                                               10855042
&SYMBOL  SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP,1)'                                        10920042
         AIF   ('&SYSLIST(&OP,2)' NE '').OK1                            10985042
         MNOTE *,'NULL BIT COUNT FIELD'                                 11050042
         MEXIT                                                          11115042
.OK1     ANOP                                                           11180042
         AIF   ('&SYMBOL' NE '').OK                                     11245042
         MNOTE 'LOG ITEM SYMBOL NOT PROVIDED'                           11310042
         AGO   .CNT                                                     11375042
.OK      ANOP                                                           11440042
         AIF   ('&SYMBOL'(1,1) EQ '''').CNT                *TEMP*       11505042
&SYMBOL  EQU   *+&BYTE                                                  11570042
&ITEM(&ITEMNBR)  SETC '&SYSLIST(&OP,1)'                                 11635042
&BITS(&ITEMNBR) SETA &SYSLIST(&OP,2)                                    11700042
&SHIFT(&ITEMNBR) SETA &COUNT-&BYTE*8                                    11765042
.CNT     ANOP                                                           11830042
&COUNT   SETA  &COUNT+&SYSLIST(&OP,2)                                   11895042
&BYTE    SETA  &COUNT/8                                                 11960042
         AIF (&OP LT N'&SYSLIST).LOOP                                   12025042
         AIF   (&COUNT NE 32).NOT32                                     12090042
&NAME    DS    4C                                                       12155042
         MEXIT                                                          12220042
.NOT32   AIF   (&COUNT NE 64).ERR                                       12285042
&NAME    DS    8C                                                       12350042
         MEXIT                                                          12415042
.ERR     MNOTE '**BIT COUNT FIELDS DO NOT TOTAL 32 OR 64**'             12480042
         MEND                                                           12545042
         MACRO                                                          12610042
         LINEND                                                         12675042
.*                            THIS MACRO IS USED ONLY BY THE LINE       12740042
.*                                 MACRO TO SET THE NUMBER OF ENTRIES   12805042
.*                                 ASSOCIATED WITH EACH LINE.           12870042
         GBLA  &NRENTS                                                  12935042
         GBLC &NRENTSX                                                  13000042
         ORG   &NRENTSX                                                 13065042
         DC    FL1'&NRENTS'                                             13130042
         ORG                                                            13195042
&NRENTS  SETA  0                                                        13260042
B&SYSNDX EQU   *                                                        13325042
&NRENTSX SETC  'B&SYSNDX'                                               13390042
         MEND                                                           13455042
         SPACE 2                                                        13520042
         EJECT                                                          13585042
*  LABEL MACRO     LABEL MACRO     LABEL MACRO     LABEL MACRO        * 13650042
         SPACE 2                                                        13715042
         MACRO                                                          13780042
&NAME    LABEL &LABEL1,&LABEL2,&LABEL3,&LABEL4,&LABEL5,&LABEL6,        C13845042
               &LABEL7,&LABEL8                                          13910042
.*                            THIS MACRO ALLOWS UP TO ACHT LABELS TO    13975042
.*                                 BE SPECIFIED FOR A GIVEN LINE. THE   14040042
.*                                 LABELS SHOULD BE ENCLOSED IN QUOTA-  14105042
.*                                 TION MARKS. THE COLUMN AND LINE END  14170042
.*                                 CONTROLS WILL BE INSERTED BY THE     14235042
.*                                 MACRO. OMITTED OPERANDS MEAN NO      14300042
.*                                 LABEL REQUIRED FOR RESPECTIVE        14365042
.*                                 COLUMN. THIS MACRO WILL ALSO ALERT   14430042
.*                                 THE PROGRAMMER TO EXACTLY WHERE THE  14495042
.*                                 TABLE MUST BE BROKEN IF NECESSARY    14560042
.*                                 TO AVOID EXCEEDING THE MAXIMUM LIMIT 14625042
         GBLC &LABELS(2000)                                             14690042
         GBLC  &LBL(100)                                                14755042
         GBLA  &LBLCTR(100)                                             14820042
         GBLA  &LABELNR                                                 14885042
         GBLA  &NRENTS,&LPTR                                            14950042
         LCLC  &MARGIN,&TACK                                            15015042
         LCLC  &TEXT                                                    15080042
         LCLA  &OP,&K,&START,&NRCHAR,&REMAIN                            15145042
&MARGIN  SETC  '*'                                                      15210042
         AIF   ('&NAME' EQ '').LOOPOUT                                  15275042
&LPTR    SETA  &LPTR+1                                                  15340042
&LBL(&LPTR) SETC '&NAME'                                                15405042
&LBLCTR(&LPTR) SETA &LABELNR+1                                          15470042
.LOOPOUT ANOP                                                           15535042
&OP      SETA  &OP+1                                                    15600042
&K       SETA  K'&SYSLIST(&OP)                                          15665042
         AIF (&K GE 2).NORM                                             15730042
&K       SETA  2                                                        15795042
.NORM    ANOP                                                           15860042
&START   SETA  2                                                        15925042
         AIF (&OP LT N'&SYSLIST).NOTLAST                                15990042
&MARGIN  SETC  '$'                                                      16055042
.NOTLAST ANOP                                                           16120042
&NRCHAR  SETA  8                                                        16185042
&TACK    SETC  ''                                                       16250042
.LOOPIN  ANOP                                                           16315042
&REMAIN  SETA  &K-&START                                                16380042
         AIF (&REMAIN GE 8).MORE                                        16445042
&TACK    SETC  '&MARGIN'                                                16510042
&NRCHAR  SETA  &REMAIN                                                  16575042
.MORE    ANOP                                                           16640042
&TEXT    SETC  ''                                                       16705042
         AIF (&REMAIN EQ 0).ENDTEXT                                     16770042
&TEXT    SETC  '&SYSLIST(&OP)'(&START,&NRCHAR)                          16835042
.ENDTEXT ANOP                                                           16900042
&LABELNR SETA  &LABELNR+1                                               16965042
&LABELS(&LABELNR) SETC '&TEXT'.'&TACK'                                  17030042
&START   SETA  &START+8                                                 17095042
         AIF ('&TACK' EQ '').LOOPIN                                     17160042
         AIF ('&TACK' EQ '*').LOOPOUT                                   17225042
         MEND                                                           17290042
         SPACE 2                                                        17355042
         MACRO                                                          17420042
         LSTART                                                         17485042
.*                            THIS MACRO IS ISSUED WHEN THE LABEL AREA  17550042
.*                                 OF THE TABLE IS TO BEGIN.            17615042
         GBLC &LABELS(2000)                                             17680042
         GBLA  &LABELNR                                                 17745042
         GBLC  &LBL(100)                                                17810042
         GBLA  &LBLCTR(100)                                             17875042
         LCLA  &NDX,&CTR                                                17940042
         LINEND                                                         18005042
&CTR     SETA  1                                                        18070042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           18135042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   18200042
         AIF   (&LBLCTR(&CTR) NE &NDX).NOLBL                            18265042
&LBL(&CTR) DC  C'&LABELS(&NDX)'                                         18330042
&CTR     SETA  &CTR+1                                                   18395042
         AGO   .LOOPCTL                                                 18460042
.NOLBL   ANOP                                                           18525042
         DC    C'&LABELS(&NDX)'                                         18590042
.LOOPCTL AIF   (&NDX LT &LABELNR).LOOP                                  18655042
         MEND                                                           18720042
         SPACE 2                                                        18785042
*  BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO     BIN MACRO  * 18850042
         SPACE 2                                                        18915042
         MACRO                                                          18980042
         BIN   &LOGITEM,&SKIP$OR                                        19045042
.*                                 &LOGITEM - NAME OF ITEM IN LOG       19110042
.*                                      RECORD DSECT                    19175042
.*                                 &SKIP$OR - NBR OF SPACES TO SKIP ON  19240042
.*                                 MULTIPLE PRINT OR NBR OF SPACES      19305042
.*                                      TO BACK UP FROM COLUMN FOR      19370042
.*                                      START OF PRINTING. THE LETTER   19435042
.*                                      B PRECEEDS THE NUMBER (B5) IF   19500042
.*                                      THE LATTER IS DESIRED. OMISSION 19565042
.*                                      OF THIS OPERAND FORCES OPTION 2 19630042
.*                                      WITH BACKUP SPACING EQUAL TO    19695042
.*                                 THE NUMBER OF BITS IN THE ITEM       19760042
.*                                 DEFINITION (VIA MACRO 'DSGEN').      19825042
.*                            A LIMIT OF 15 BITS IS IMPOSED FOR THE     19890042
.*                                 TOTAL NUMBER OF BITS TO PRINT.       19955042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000)                                               20020042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000),&NRENTS                 20085042
         GBLC  &DSECT                                                   20150042
         LCLB  &B                                                       20215042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&K                                   20280042
         LCLA  &TEMP,&T                                                 20345042
         LCLC  &S                                                       20410042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           20475042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   20540042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      20605042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  20670042
         MNOTE *,'YOU BLEW IT'                                          20735042
         ROUTINE DUM,SKIPPER                                            20800042
         MEXIT                                                          20865042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           20930042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             20995042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              21060042
&T       SETA  &IBITS-1                                                 21125042
&B       SETB  0                                                        21190042
         AIF   ('&SKIP$OR' EQ '').BACKUP                                21255042
&K       SETA  K'&SKIP$OR                                               21320042
&B       SETB  ('&SKIP$OR'(1,1) EQ 'B')                                 21385042
&S       SETC  '&SKIP$OR'(&B+1,&K-&B)                                   21450042
&T       SETA  &S                                                       21515042
.BACKUP  ANOP                                                           21580042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                21645042
&TEMP    SETA  &ISHIFT                                                  21710042
A&SYSNDX DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'&TEMP'                       21775042
         AIF (&IBITS EQ 1 AND &B EQ 0).OUT                              21840042
         ORG   A&SYSNDX                                                 21905042
&B       SETB  1                                                        21970042
         DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'C'                           22035042
         DC    BL.1'&B',AL.7(&T),AL.4(&IBITS),FL.4'&ISHIFT'             22100042
.OUT     ANOP                                                           22165042
         MEND                                                           22230042
         EJECT                                                          22295042
*  HEX MACRO     HEX MACRO     HEX MACRO    HEXN MACRO     HEX MACRO  * 22360042
         SPACE 2                                                        22425042
         MACRO                                                          22490042
         HEX   &LOGITEM,&SKIP$OR,&BYTES                                 22555042
.*                            THIS MACRO FACILITATES GENERATION OF THE  22620042
.*                                 TABLE ENTRIES SPECIFYING HEX TYPE    22685042
.*                                 CONVERSIONS.                         22750042
.*                            &LOGITEM - NAME OF DATA ITEM TO BE        22815042
.*                                 CONVERTED                            22880042
.*                            &SKIP$OR - NUMBER OF SPACES TO SKIP ON    22945042
.*                                 MULTIPLE PRINT OR NBR OF SPACES TO   23010042
.*                                 BACK UP FROM COLUMN FOR START OF     23075042
.*                                 PRINTING. THE LETTER B PRECEEDS THE  23140042
.*                                 NUMBER (B8) IF THE LATTER OPTION IS  23205042
.*                                 DESIRED. OMISSION OF THIS OPERAND    23270042
.*                                 FORCES OPTION 2 WITH BACKUP SPACING  23335042
.*                                 EQUAL TO THE NUMBER OF BYTES SPECI-  23400042
.*                                 FIED BY THE NEXT OPERAND (TWICE THIS 23465042
.*                                 NUMBER IF SUFFIX IS EXPLICITLY OR    23530042
.*                                 IMPLICITLY B).                       23595042
.*                            &BYTES - NUMBER OF TOTAL INPUT BYTES TO   23660042
.*                                 PROCESS. THIS NUMBER IS SUFFIXED     23725042
.*                                 WITH AN L,R, OR B TO STIPULATE       23790042
.*                                 PRINTING OF THE LEFT HALF, RIGHT     23855042
.*                                 HALF, OR BOTH HALVES OF THE BYTE     23920042
.*                                 RESPECTIVELY. OMISSION OF THIS       23985042
.*                                 OPERAND DEFAULTS TO B WITH THE NUM-  24050042
.*                                 BER OF BYTES EQUAL TO THE ITEM LNGTH 24115042
.*                            A NEW ENTRY IS GENERATED ONLY WHEN NECES- 24180042
.*                                 SARY. THIS MACRO MUST BE THE FIRST   24245042
.*                                 MACRO INSTRUCTION ISSUED FOR THE     24310042
.*                                 SUBJECT LINE(S).                     24375042
         GBLC &ITEM(1000),&DSECT                                        24440042
         GBLA &ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000),&NRENTS                 24505042
         LCLB  &B                                                       24570042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&K,&T,&CODE,&BYTESP                  24635042
         LCLC  &S,&LETTER                                               24700042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           24765042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   24830042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      24895042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  24960042
         MNOTE *,'LOG ITEM NOT DEFINED'                                 25025042
         MEXIT                                                          25090042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           25155042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             25220042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              25285042
&CODE    SETA  1                                                        25350042
&K       SETA  K'&BYTES                                                 25415042
         AIF   (&IBITS-(&IBITS/4)*4 EQ 0).OK                            25480042
         MNOTE *,'BIT LENGTH SPECIFICATION INCONSISTENT WITH CONTROL'   25545042
         MEXIT                                                          25610042
.OK      AIF   ('&BYTES' EQ '').USEDEFN                                 25675042
&LETTER  SETC  '&BYTES'(&K,1)                                           25740042
&S       SETC  '&BYTES'(1,&K-1)                                         25805042
&BYTESP  SETA  &S                                                       25870042
         AIF   ('&LETTER' EQ 'B').BOTH                                  25935042
         AIF   (&ISHIFT EQ 0 OR &ISHIFT EQ 4).OK2                       26000042
.ERR     MNOTE *,'DATA NOT ALLIGNED ON HEX OR BYTE BOUNDARY'            26065042
         MEXIT                                                          26130042
.USEDEFN ANOP                                                           26195042
&BYTESP  SETA  &IBITS/8                                                 26260042
.BOTH    AIF   (&ISHIFT NE 0).ERR                                       26325042
&CODE    SETA  3                                                        26390042
&T       SETA  &BYTESP*2-1                                              26455042
&S       SETC  '&T'                                                     26520042
.OK2     AIF   (&ISHIFT EQ 0).L                                         26585042
&CODE    SETA  2                                                        26650042
.L       ANOP                                                           26715042
&B       SETB  1                                                        26780042
         AIF   ('&SKIP$OR' EQ '').BACKUP                                26845042
&K       SETA  K'&SKIP$OR                                               26910042
&B       SETB  ('&SKIP$OR'(1,1) EQ 'B')                                 26975042
&S       SETC  '&SKIP$OR'(&B+1,&K-&B)                                   27040042
.BACKUP  ANOP                                                           27105042
&NRENTS  SETA  &NRENTS+1                                                27170042
         DC    AL.12(&LOGITEM-&DSECT),XL.4'A'                           27235042
         DC    BL.1'&B',FL.7'&S',FL.4'&BYTESP',FL.4'&CODE'              27300042
.OUT     ANOP                                                           27365042
         MEND                                                           27430042
         MACRO                                                          27495042
         SPECIAL  &ROUTINE,&PARAM,&SPACE=                               27560042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES A SPECIAL ROUTINE    27625042
.*                                 ENTRY TO BE PROCESSED BY THE SUM. M. 27690042
.*                            &ROUTINE - SYMBOL ON SPECIAL ROUTINE EWT. 27755042
.*                            &PARAM - AN 8 BIT BINARY REPRESENTATION   27820042
.*                                 TO OCCUPY THE 'MASK' FIELD BUT TO BE 27885042
.*                                 INTERPRETED AS AN ARGUMENT OF THE    27950042
.*                                 SPECIAL ROUTINE.                     28015042
.*                            &SPACE - THE NUMBER OF 2BYTE COUNTERS TO  28080042
.*                                 ALLOCATE FOR REQUIRED PROCESSING.    28145042
         GBLC  &CSECT                                                   28210042
         GBLA  &COUNTR                                                  28275042
         LCLA  &ADD                                                     28340042
         DC    AL1(128)                                                 28405042
         DC    BL.8'&PARAM'                                             28470042
         DC    AL2(&ROUTINE-&CSECT)                                     28535042
         DC    AL2(&COUNTR)                                             28600042
&ADD     SETA  1                                                        28665042
         AIF   ('&SPACE' EQ '').NORM                                    28730042
&ADD     SETA  &SPACE                                                   28795042
.NORM    ANOP                                                           28860042
&COUNTR  SETA  &COUNTR+&ADD                                             28925042
         MEND                                                           28990042
         MACRO                                                          29055042
         SUM   &LOGITEM,&MASK                                           29120042
.*                            THIS MACRO GENERATES A NORMAL EDIT ENTRY  29185042
.*                                 FOR PROCESSING BY THE SUMMARY MODULE 29250042
.*                            &LOGITEM - NAME OF DATA ITEM TO BE SUMMED 29315042
.*                            &MASK - BYTE MASK FOR BITS TO BE TESTED.  29380042
.*                                 THIS OPERAND SHOULD BE OMITTED FOR   29445042
.*                                 SINGLE BIT ITEMS IN WHICH CASE THE   29510042
.*                                 MASK WILL BE SET ACCORDING TO THE    29575042
.*                                 OFF BYTE BIT DISPLACEMENT OF THE     29640042
.*                                ITEM AS DEFINED BY THE MACRO 'DSGEN'  29705042
         GBLA  &COUNTR,&ITEMNBR,&BITS(1000),&SHIFT(1000)                29770042
         GBLC  &ITEM(1000),&DSECT                                       29835042
         LCLA  &IBITS,&NDX,&ISHIFT,&M,&BITNBR                           29900042
.LOOP    ANOP                                                           29965042
&NDX     SETA  &NDX+1                                                   30030042
         AIF   ('&ITEM(&NDX)' EQ '&LOGITEM').FOUND                      30095042
         AIF   (&NDX LT &ITEMNBR).LOOP                                  30160042
         MNOTE *,'LOGITEM NOT FOUND'                                    30225042
         MEXIT                                                          30290042
.FOUND   ANOP                                                           30355042
         DC    AL1(0)                                                   30420042
&ISHIFT  SETA  &SHIFT(&NDX)                                             30485042
&IBITS   SETA  &BITS(&NDX)                                              30550042
         AIF   ('&MASK' EQ '').FORM                                     30615042
         DC    B'&MASK'                                                 30680042
         AGO   .ITEM                                                    30745042
.FORM    ANOP                                                           30810042
&BITNBR  SETA  &ISHIFT-7                                                30875042
&BITNBR  SETA  0-&BITNBR                                                30940042
&M       SETA  1                                                        31005042
.LOOP2   ANOP                                                           31070042
         AIF   (&BITNBR EQ 0).GOTIT                                     31135042
&M       SETA  &M*2                                                     31200042
&BITNBR  SETA  &BITNBR-1                                                31265042
         AGO   .LOOP2                                                   31330042
.GOTIT   ANOP                                                           31395042
         DC    AL1(&M)                                                  31460042
.ITEM    DC    AL2(&LOGITEM-&DSECT)                                     31525042
         DC    AL2(&COUNTR)                                             31590042
&COUNTR  SETA  &COUNTR+1                                                31655042
         MEND                                                           31720042
         GBLC  &DSECT,&CSECT                                            31785042
&CSECT   SETC  'IFCSXXX9'                                               31850042
&DSECT   SETC  'XXX9'                                                   31915042

COMMON   SR    R1,R1                                                    49920042
         L     R8,REG8             GET CURRENT PTR                      49985042
         IC    R1,L1(R8)           PICK UP NUMBER OF ITERATIONS         50050042
         LR    R5,R1               PLACE VALUE IN R5                    50115042
         SLL   R5,L2               MULTIPLY BY 2                        50180042
         AR    R5,R3               SET PTR TO POS PAST CTRS HOLDING     50245042
*                                  DATA - SUM COUNTER                   50310042
         LH    R4,HEXFF            PICK UP FULL FLG                     50375042
LOOP1    CH    R4,L0(R3)           IS THIS COUNT EMPTY                  50440042
         BNE   STORE               BR-YES NOT FFFF                      50505042
         CH    R7,L2(R3)           IS DATE EQUAL TO STORED              50570042
         BE    BUMP                YES                                  50635042
         LA    R3,L4(R3)           BUMP DATA PTR                        50700042
         LA    R5,L2(R5)           BUMP SUM PTR                         50765042
         BCT   R1,LOOP1            LOOP TILL DONE                       50830042
         B     RETURN              FULL RETURN                          50895042

         STH   R7,L2(R3)           STORE DATA                           51090042

         LH    R5,L0(R4)                PICK UP DEVICE TYPE             67275042

         BE    FOUND                    YES                             67535042

         BCT   R6,LOOP                  LOOP TILL DONE                  67665042
         B    RETURNA                                                   67795042

         SR    R5,R5                    CLEAAR R5                S21021 68120042
         IC    R5,0(R4)                 PICK UP                  S21021 68185042
         SLL   R5,R8                      CPU TYPE               S21021 68250042
         IC    R5,L1(R4)                    FIELD                S21021 68315042
         LTR   R5,R5                    IS TI ZERO?              S21021 68380042
         BNZ   RETURNA                  NO, LINE IS GOOD, RETURN S21021 68445042
         LA    R6,L64                   ELSE, BACK UP DATA PTR   S21021 68510042
         SR    R3,R6                    TO PUT IN NEW INFO       S21021 68575042
         MVC   0(L6,R3),SHARED            SAY MODEL SHARED     @Z427VLS 68640042
         B     RETURNA                  RETURN                   S21021 68770042

         STM   R5,R8,XSAVE              SAVE REGS                S21088 69030042
         LA    R5,STATSECT-4            PNT TO EDITS FOR STATS   S21088 69095042

         BE    STLBLTFD                 YES, GO MOVE LABELS      S21088 69615042
         LA    R8,L18(R8)               NO, BUMP TO NEXT         S21088 69680042
         BCT   R6,STLBCOMP              NOT DONE, GO BACK        S21088 69745042
         LA    R8,STLBDFLT              DONE, USE DEFAULT        S21088 69810042
STLBLTFD DS    0H                  LABELS FOUND                  S21088 69875042
         LA    R8,L2(R8)                USE LABELS               S21088 69940042
         LA    R7,L16(R8)               DETERMINE END POINT      S21088 70005042
         ST    R7,STLBLEND              SAVE FOR COMPARE         S21088 70070042
STLABLP  DS    0H                                                S21088 70135042
         CLI   0(R8),XFF                IS THIS 'NOT USED'       S21088 70200042
         BE    STLBLNUS                 YES, LABEL = 'NOT USED'  S21088 70265042
         SR    R7,R7                    CLEAR R7                 S21088 70330042
         IC    R7,0(R8)                 GET INDEX TO LABEL       S21088 70395042
         MH    R7,HW13                  MULTIPLY TO GET LABEL    S21088 70460042
         A     R7,STLBTBAD              SET TO LABEL             S21088 70525042
         MVC   L0(L13,R5),L0(R7)        MOVE IN LABEL            S21088 70590042
         B     STLBL001                                          S21088 70655042

         MVC   L0(L13,R5),STLBNTUS      'NOT USED' LABEL         S21088 70785042
STLBL001 DS    0H                                                S21088 70850042
         LA    R5,L14(R5)               BUMP R5                  S21088 70915042
         LA    R7,STLBTABL              GET PROPER LABEL         S21088 70980042
         LA    R8,L1(R8)                POINT TO NEXT INDEX      S21088 71045042
         C     R8,STLBLEND              AT END OF LIST?          S21088 71110042
         BNE   STLABLP                  NO, CONTINUE             S21088 71175042
         B     RETURNA                                           S21088 71240042

         DC    X'FF'                                             S21088 99450042
         DC    XL6'00'                                           S21088 99515042
         DC    C'$'                                                     99580042
LABELS   EQU   *                                                        99645042
         LSTART                                                         99710042
         END                                                            99775042
./  ADD  SSI=63150019,NAME=IFCSYMCD
         TITLE 'IFCSYMCD-FILTER FOR FAULT SYMPTOM CODE                 *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
IFCSYMCD CSECT ,                                                   0001 00003000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                                  0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                               0001 00005000
         B     @PROLOG                                             0001 00006000
         DC    AL1(16)                                             0001 00007000
         DC    C'IFCSYMCD  76.315'                                 0001 00008000
         DROP  @15                                                      00009000
@PROLOG  ST    @14,12(,@13)                                        0001 00010000
         STM   @00,@12,20(@13)                                     0001 00011000
         BALR  @12,0                                               0001 00012000
@PSTART  DS    0H                                                  0001 00013000
         USING @PSTART,@12                                         0001 00014000
*/********************************************************************/ 00015000
*/*                                                          @Z427VLS*/ 00016000
*/* IF THE FAULT SYMPTOM CODE IN SENSE BYTES 22 AND 23 IS WITHIN     */ 00017000
*/* THE RANGE SPECIFIED IN THE SYMCODE TABLE, THEN PASSFLG IS SET TO */ 00018000
*/* REMAIN ON.  ELSE IT IS TURNED OFF.                       @Z427VLS*/ 00019000
*/*                                                          @Z427VLS*/ 00020000
*/********************************************************************/ 00021000
*IF (LRTKEY1 & '30'X) = '30'X THEN                                 0052 00022000
         MVC   @TS00001(1),LRTKEY1(R7)                             0052 00023000
         NI    @TS00001,X'30'                                      0052 00024000
         CLI   @TS00001,X'30'                                      0052 00025000
         BNE   @RF00052                                            0052 00026000
*  DO;                                                     /*@Z427VLS*/ 00027000
*    R6 = ADDR(OBRVOL) + EIGHT * OBRDEVDC + OBRLSDRC + 22; /*@Z427VLS*/ 00028000
         LA    R6,OBRVOL(,R7)                                      0054 00029000
         SLR   @03,@03                                             0054 00030000
         IC    @03,OBRDEVDC(,R7)                                   0054 00031000
         SLA   @03,3                                               0054 00032000
         ALR   R6,@03                                              0054 00033000
         SLR   @03,@03                                             0054 00034000
         IC    @03,OBRLSDRC(,R7)                                   0054 00035000
         ALR   R6,@03                                              0054 00036000
         AL    R6,@CF00745                                         0054 00037000
*    IF SYM33XX >= SYMVAL1(1) & SYM33XX <= SYMVAL2(1) THEN         0055 00038000
         L     @03,SYMCDPTR(,R2)                                   0055 00039000
         CLC   SYM33XX(2,R6),SYMVAL1(@03)                          0055 00040000
         BL    @RF00055                                            0055 00041000
         CLC   SYM33XX(2,R6),SYMVAL2(@03)                          0055 00042000
         BH    @RF00055                                            0055 00043000
*      PASSFLAG = ON;                                      /*@Z427VLS*/ 00044000
         OI    PASSFLAG(R2),B'00000001'                            0056 00045000
*    ELSE                                                          0057 00046000
*      PASSFLAG = OFF;                                     /*@Z427VLS*/ 00047000
         B     @RC00055                                            0057 00048000
@RF00055 NI    PASSFLAG(R2),B'11111110'                            0057 00049000
*  END;                                                    /*@Z427VLS*/ 00050000
@RC00055 DS    0H                                                  0059 00051000
* RESPECIFY (R15) RESTRICTED;                              /*@Z427VLS*/ 00052000
@RF00052 DS    0H                                                  0060 00053000
* R15 = ZERO;                                              /*@Z427VLS*/ 00054000
         SLR   R15,R15                                             0060 00055000
*RETURN;                                                   /*@Z427VLS*/ 00056000
@EL00001 DS    0H                                                  0061 00057000
@EF00001 DS    0H                                                  0061 00058000
@ER00001 L     @14,12(,@13)                                        0061 00059000
         LM    @00,@12,20(@13)                                     0061 00060000
         BR    @14                                                 0061 00061000
*RESPECIFY (R2,R6,R7,R15) UNRESTRICTED;                    /*@Z427VLS*/ 00062000
*END   IFCSYMCD;                                           /*@Z427VLS*/ 00063000
@DATA    DS    0H                                                       00064000
         DS    0F                                                       00065000
         DS    0F                                                       00066000

         DS    0D                                                       00068000

         END   IFCSYMCD,(C'PLS0300',0701,76315)                         00734000
./  ADD  SSI=81071771,NAME=IFCSYSUM
         TITLE 'IFCSYSUM-SYSTEM SUMMARY FOR EREP PROCESSING            *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
IFCSYSUM CSECT ,                                                   0001 00003000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                                  0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                               0001 00005000
         B     @PROLOG                                             0001 00006000
         DC    AL1(16)                                             0001 00007000
         DC    C'IFCSYSUM  78.108'                                 0001 00008000
         DROP  @15                                                      00009000
@PROLOG  ST    @14,12(,@13)                                        0001 00010000
         STM   @00,@12,20(@13)                                     0001 00011000
         BALR  @10,0                                               0001 00012000
@PSTART  LA    @11,4095(,@10)                                      0001 00013000
         LA    @12,4095(,@11)                                      0001 00014000
         USING @PSTART,@10                                         0001 00015000
         USING @PSTART+4095,@11                                    0001 00016000
         USING @PSTART+8190,@12                                    0001 00017000
         ST    @13,@SA00001+4                                      0001 00018000
         LA    @14,@SA00001                                        0001 00019000
         ST    @14,8(,@13)                                         0001 00020000
         LR    @13,@14                                             0001 00021000
         B     @PB00002                                            0145 00022000
CONVBIN  STM   @14,@12,@SA00002                                    0145 00023000
* R8 = BINWORD;                  /*LOAD THE ITEM TO CONVERT  @Z427VLS*/ 00024000
         L     R8,BINWORD                                          0146 00025000
* GEN(CVD   R8,DBLWORD);         /*CONVERT THE NUMBER        @Z427VLS*/ 00026000
         CVD   R8,DBLWORD                                               00027000
* GEN(UNPK   WORK(8),DBLWORD);   /*UNPACK THE CONVERTED NUMBER       */ 00028000
         UNPK   WORK(8),DBLWORD                                         00029000
* GEN(OI  WORK+7,X'F0');         /*MAKE SURE NO PROBLEM      @Z427VLS*/ 00030000
         OI  WORK+7,X'F0'                                               00031000
* SWITCH4 = OFF;                 /*CLEAR THE SWITCH PRIOR TO START   */ 00032000
         NI    SWITCH4,B'11101111'                                 0150 00033000
* DO L = 1 BY 1 TO 7 WHILE (SWITCH4 = OFF);                /*@Z427VLS*/ 00034000
         LA    @03,1                                               0151 00035000
         ST    @03,L                                               0151 00036000
@DL00151 TM    SWITCH4,B'00010000'                                 0151 00037000
         BNZ   @DC00151                                            0151 00038000
*  IF WORKOVER(L)  = 'F0'X       /*IS IT A 0 IF SO MAKE IT A BLANK   */ 00039000
*    THEN                                                          0152 00040000
         LA    @01,WORKOVER-1(@03)                                 0152 00041000
         CLI   0(@01),X'F0'                                        0152 00042000
         BNE   @RF00152                                            0152 00043000
*      WORKOVER(L) = '40'X;      /*SET TO A BLANK            @Z427VLS*/ 00044000
         LA    @01,WORKOVER-1(@03)                                 0153 00045000
         MVI   0(@01),X'40'                                        0153 00046000
*    ELSE                                                          0154 00047000
*      SWITCH4 = ON;             /*SET SWITCH TO TERMINATE DO LOOP   */ 00048000
         B     @RC00152                                            0154 00049000
@RF00152 OI    SWITCH4,B'00010000'                                 0154 00050000
* END;                                                     /*@Z427VLS*/ 00051000
@RC00152 LA    @03,1                                               0155 00052000
         AL    @03,L                                               0155 00053000
         ST    @03,L                                               0155 00054000
         C     @03,@CF00080                                        0155 00055000
         BNH   @DL00151                                            0155 00056000
@DC00151 DS    0H                                                  0156 00057000
* IF (TEN   - L) > BNDECNUM      /*IS THE CONVERTED NUMBER TO LARGE  */ 00058000
*    THEN                                                          0156 00059000
         L     @03,TEN                                             0156 00060000
         SL    @03,L                                               0156 00061000
         C     @03,BNDECNUM                                        0156 00062000
         BNH   @RF00156                                            0156 00063000
*      DO;                                                 /*@Z427VLS*/ 00064000
*        GEN(MVI   WORKOVER,X'F9');  /*SET FIRST NINE IN THE MEASSAGE*/ 00065000
         MVI   WORKOVER,X'F9'                                           00066000
*        GEN(MVC   WORKOVER+1(7),WORKOVER);/*FILL WITH NINES @Z427VLS*/ 00067000
         MVC   WORKOVER+1(7),WORKOVER                                   00068000
*      END;                                                /*@Z427VLS*/ 00069000
* R8 = ADDR(WORKOVER) + (8-BNDECNUM);/*SET WHERE TO MOVE FROM ADDRESS*/ 00070000
@RF00156 LA    R8,WORKOVER                                         0161 00071000
         L     @03,BNDECNUM                                        0161 00072000
         LA    @15,8                                               0161 00073000
         SLR   @15,@03                                             0161 00074000
         ALR   R8,@15                                              0161 00075000
* R9 = BNDECNUM - ONE;           /*NUMBER OF BYTES TO MOVE   @Z427VLS*/ 00076000
         SL    @03,ONE                                             0162 00077000
         LR    R9,@03                                              0162 00078000
* RESPECIFY (R6) RESTRICTED;                               /*@Z427VLS*/ 00079000
* R6 = DECADDR;                  /*ADDRESS TO MOVE TO        @Z427VLS*/ 00080000
         L     R6,DECADDR                                          0164 00081000
* GEN(EX    R9,MVCINS);          /*MOVE DATA TO REQUESTED LOCATION   */ 00082000
         EX    R9,MVCINS                                                00083000
* GENERATE DATA;                                           /*@Z427VLS*/ 00084000
* RESPECIFY (R6) UNRESTRICTED;                             /*@Z427VLS*/ 00085000
*END;                                                      /*@Z427VLS*/ 00086000
@EL00002 DS    0H                                                  0168 00087000
@EF00002 DS    0H                                                  0168 00088000
@ER00002 LM    @14,@12,@SA00002                                    0168 00089000
         BR    @14                                                 0168 00090000
*/********************************************************************/ 00091000
*/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  * * * * * * * * * * */ 00092000
*/*    THIS PROC WILL CONVERT THE HEX DATA INTO PRINTABLE    @Z427VLS*/ 00093000
*/*                                                          @Z427VLS*/ 00094000
*/*    IF IT IS NECESSARY TO CONVERT ONLY 1/2 OF FIRST BYTE(CUA FOR  */ 00095000
*/*    EXP. THEN THE USER SHOULD SET THE SWITCH1 TO THEON CONDITION  */ 00096000
*CONVERT: PROC;                                            /*@Z427VLS*/ 00097000
CONVERT  STM   @14,@12,12(@13)                                     0169 00098000
* DO P = NUMBER BY -1 TO 1;      /*# = # OF BYTES TO CONVERT TO PRINT*/ 00099000
         L     @03,NUMBER                                          0170 00100000
         ST    @03,P                                               0170 00101000
         B     @DE00170                                            0170 00102000
@DL00170 DS    0H                                                  0171 00103000
*   R8 = NEXTBYTE(P);            /*LOAD THE NEXT BYTE TO CONVERT     */ 00104000
         L     @01,NEXTBY                                          0171 00105000
         BCTR  @01,0                                               0171 00106000
         SLR   R8,R8                                               0171 00107000
         IC    R8,NEXTBYTE(@03,@01)                                0171 00108000
*   X =  TWO * P;                /*OUTPUT INDEX MUST BE TWICE INPUT  */ 00109000
         L     @01,TWO                                             0172 00110000
         MR    @00,@03                                             0172 00111000
         ST    @01,X                                               0172 00112000
*   SRDL  (R8,FOUR);             /*MOVE 1/2 IN TO NEXT REG   @Z427VLS*/ 00113000
         SRDL  R8,4                                                0173 00114000
*   SRL   (R9,TWOEIGHT);         /*SHIFT THE REG 28 BITS     @Z427VLS*/ 00115000
         L     @15,TWOEIGHT                                        0174 00116000
         SRL   R9,0(@15)                                           0174 00117000
*   R9  =  R9 + NUMBER1;         /*INSURE INDEX BY 0 DOES NOT AFFECT */ 00118000
         L     @15,NUMBER1                                         0175 00119000
         ALR   R9,@15                                              0175 00120000
*   R8  =  R8 + NUMBER1;         /*SAME                      @Z427VLS*/ 00121000
         ALR   R8,@15                                              0176 00122000
*   IF SWITCH1 = ON & P = ONE    /*DO WE NOT PUT THE HALF BYTE OUT   */ 00123000
*    THEN                                                          0177 00124000
         TM    SWITCH1,B'10000000'                                 0177 00125000
         BNO   @RF00177                                            0177 00126000
         C     @03,ONE                                             0177 00127000
         BNE   @RF00177                                            0177 00128000
*     SWITCH1 = OFF;             /*TURN OFF THE SWITCH       @Z427VLS*/ 00129000
         NI    SWITCH1,B'01111111'                                 0178 00130000
*    ELSE                                                          0179 00131000
*     ADDNUM(X-ONE) = CHARS(R8);/*PUT THE PRINT CHAR INTO THE OUTPUT*/  00132000
         B     @RC00177                                            0179 00133000
@RF00177 L     @03,X                                               0179 00134000
         SL    @03,ONE                                             0179 00135000
         L     @01,ADDNXT                                          0179 00136000
         ALR   @01,@03                                             0179 00137000
         BCTR  @01,0                                               0179 00138000
         LA    @03,CHARS-1(R8)                                     0179 00139000
         MVC   ADDNUM(1,@01),0(@03)                                0179 00140000
*     ADDNUM(X)  = CHARS(R9);   /*FINSH THE BYTE             @Z427VLS*/ 00141000
@RC00177 L     @03,ADDNXT                                          0180 00142000
         AL    @03,X                                               0180 00143000
         BCTR  @03,0                                               0180 00144000
         LA    @01,CHARS-1(R9)                                     0180 00145000
         MVC   ADDNUM(1,@03),0(@01)                                0180 00146000
* END;                                                     /*@Z427VLS*/ 00147000
         SLR   @03,@03                                             0181 00148000
         BCTR  @03,0                                               0181 00149000
         AL    @03,P                                               0181 00150000
         ST    @03,P                                               0181 00151000
@DE00170 LTR   @03,@03                                             0181 00152000
         BP    @DL00170                                            0181 00153000
*END;                                                      /*@Z427VLS*/ 00154000
@EL00003 DS    0H                                                  0182 00155000
@EF00003 DS    0H                                                  0182 00156000
@ER00003 LM    @14,@12,12(@13)                                     0182 00157000
         BR    @14                                                 0182 00158000
*/********************************************************************/ 00159000
*/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  * * * * * * * * * * */ 00160000
*/*    THIS PROC WILL FORMAT THE DATE OF THE RUN & THE START STOP    */ 00161000
*/*    DATES OF THE DATA AND PRINT THE TOP THREE LINES OF THE HEADING*/ 00162000
*/*    FOR THE PART-1 OUTPUT                                 @Z427VLS*/ 00163000
*/*                                                          @Z427VLS*/ 00164000
*HEADING1:  PROC;                                          /*@Z427VLS*/ 00165000
HEADING1 STM   @14,@12,@SA00004                                    0183 00166000
*  SPACING = UPSPACE;      /*SET FOR A NEW PAGE              @Z427VLS*/ 00167000
         MVC   SPACING(1),UPSPACE                                  0184 00168000
*  CALL PRINTIT;                                           /*@Z427VLS*/ 00169000
         BAL   @14,PRINTIT                                         0185 00170000
*  SPACING = SINGLE;                                       /*@Z427VLS*/ 00171000
         MVC   SPACING(1),SINGLE                                   0186 00172000
*  DAYSDATE = DATENOW;     /*MOVE TODAYS DATE FROM PARM TABLE        */ 00173000
         MVC   DAYSDATE(6),DATENOW(R2)                             0187 00174000
*  HEADMOVE= LINE1;        /*MOVE IN THE FIRST LINE OF THE HEADING   */ 00175000
         MVC   HEADMOVE(59),LINE1                                  0188 00176000
*  CALL PRINTIT;           /*GO PRINT THE FIRST LINE OF THE HEADING  */ 00177000
         BAL   @14,PRINTIT                                         0189 00178000
*  NUMBER = TWO;           /*SET UP TO CONVERT TWO BYTES OF DATA     */ 00179000
         L     @03,TWO                                             0190 00180000
         ST    @03,NUMBER                                          0190 00181000
*  SRL(EVSDAY,FOUR);      /*DROP THE SIGN 1/2 BYTE           @Z427VLS*/ 00182000
         LH    @03,EVSDAY(,R2)                                     0191 00183000
         N     @03,@CF00907                                        0191 00184000
         SRL   @03,4                                               0191 00185000
         STH   @03,EVSDAY(,R2)                                     0191 00186000
*  NEXTBY = ADDR(EVSDAY);  /*SET WHERE TO FIND THE DATA TO CONVERT   */ 00187000
         LA    @03,EVSDAY(,R2)                                     0192 00188000
         ST    @03,NEXTBY                                          0192 00189000
*  ADDNXT = ADDR(FROMDATE)-1;/*  WHERE TO PUT THE CONVERTED TO PRINT */ 00190000
         LA    @03,FROMDATE                                        0193 00191000
         BCTR  @03,0                                               0193 00192000
         ST    @03,ADDNXT                                          0193 00193000
*  SWITCH1 = ON;           /*SET SO WILL NOT CONVERT THE LAST 1/2 BYT*/ 00194000
         OI    SWITCH1,B'10000000'                                 0194 00195000
*  CALL CONVERT;           /*GO AND CONVERT THE DATA TO PRINTABLE    */ 00196000
         BAL   @14,CONVERT                                         0195 00197000
*  NUMBER = ONE;           /*SET UP TO CONVERT ONE BYTE  OF DATA     */ 00198000
         L     @03,ONE                                             0196 00199000
         ST    @03,NUMBER                                          0196 00200000
*  NEXTBY = ADDR(EVSYEAR); /*SET WHERE TO FIND THE YEAR TO CONVERT   */ 00201000
         LA    @03,EVSYEAR(,R2)                                    0197 00202000
         ST    @03,NEXTBY                                          0197 00203000
*  ADDNXT = ADDR(FROMYEAR);/*SET WHERE TO PUT CONVERTED YEAR @Z427VLS*/ 00204000
         LA    @03,FROMYEAR                                        0198 00205000
         ST    @03,ADDNXT                                          0198 00206000
*  CALL CONVERT;           /*GO AND CONVERT THE YEAR TO PRINTABLE    */ 00207000
         BAL   @14,CONVERT                                         0199 00208000
*  HEADMOVE= LINE2;        /*MOVE SECOND LINE OF THE HEADING INTO LNE*/ 00209000
         MVC   HEADMOVE(59),LINE2                                  0200 00210000
*  CALL PRINTIT;           /*GO AND PRINT THE SECOND LINE OF HEADING */ 00211000
         BAL   @14,PRINTIT                                         0201 00212000
*  SRL(EVDAY,FOUR);        /*HAVE TO SHIFT OUT THE F IN THE DAY      */ 00213000
         L     @03,EVPTR(,R2)                                      0202 00214000
         SLR   @15,@15                                             0202 00215000
         ICM   @15,3,EVDAY(@03)                                    0202 00216000
         SRL   @15,4                                               0202 00217000
         STCM  @15,3,EVDAY(@03)                                    0202 00218000
*  NEXTBY = ADDR(EVDAY);   /*SET UP ADDRESS OF THE LAST DAY OF INPUT */ 00219000
         LA    @03,EVDAY(,@03)                                     0203 00220000
         ST    @03,NEXTBY                                          0203 00221000
*  ADDNXT = ADDR(TODATE)-1;/*WHERE TO PUT THE CONVERTED DAY  @Z427VLS*/ 00222000
         LA    @03,TODATE                                          0204 00223000
         BCTR  @03,0                                               0204 00224000
         ST    @03,ADDNXT                                          0204 00225000
*  SWITCH1 = ON;           /*AS DAY IS 3 BYTES SET TO DROP 1/2 BYTE  */ 00226000
         OI    SWITCH1,B'10000000'                                 0205 00227000
*  NUMBER = TWO;           /*SET TO PROCESS TWO BYTES OF DATA        */ 00228000
         L     @03,TWO                                             0206 00229000
         ST    @03,NUMBER                                          0206 00230000
*  CALL CONVERT;           /*GO AND CONVERT THE DAY TO PRINTABLE     */ 00231000
         BAL   @14,CONVERT                                         0207 00232000
*  NUMBER = ONE;           /*SET UP FOR ONE BYTE IN 2 OUT IN PRINTABL*/ 00233000
         L     @03,ONE                                             0208 00234000
         ST    @03,NUMBER                                          0208 00235000
*  ADDNXT = ADDR(TOYEAR);  /*ADDRESS OF WHERE TO PUT CONVERTED DATA  */ 00236000
         LA    @03,TOYEAR                                          0209 00237000
         ST    @03,ADDNXT                                          0209 00238000
*  NEXTBY = ADDR(EVYEAR);  /*ADDRESS OF WHERE THE DATA TO CONVERT IS */ 00239000
         L     @03,EVPTR(,R2)                                      0210 00240000
         ST    @03,NEXTBY                                          0210 00241000
*  CALL CONVERT;           /*GO CONVERT THE DATA TO PRINTABLE        */ 00242000
         BAL   @14,CONVERT                                         0211 00243000
*  HEADMOVE= LINE3;        /*MOVE THE LAST HEADING TO PRINT BUFFER   */ 00244000
         MVC   HEADMOVE(59),LINE3                                  0212 00245000
*  CALL PRINTIT;           /*GO AND PRINT THE LAST LINE      @Z427VLS*/ 00246000
         BAL   @14,PRINTIT                                         0213 00247000
*  SPACING= DOUBLE;        /*SPACE THE PAGE UP 3 LINES       @Z427VLS*/ 00248000
         MVC   SPACING(1),DOUBLE                                   0214 00249000
*  CALL PRINTIT;           /*GO UPSPACE THE PRINTABLE        @Z427VLS*/ 00250000
         BAL   @14,PRINTIT                                         0215 00251000
*  R9 =SIX * EVNUM + FIVE; /*SET UP NUMBER OF CHARS/CPU + TOTAL      */ 00252000
         L     @03,EVPTR(,R2)                                      0216 00253000
         L     R9,SIX                                              0216 00254000
         MH    R9,EVNUM(,@03)                                      0216 00255000
         AL    R9,FIVE                                             0216 00256000
*  R8 = ADDR(TOTAHED);                                     /*@Z427VLS*/ 00257000
         LA    R8,TOTAHED                                          0217 00258000
*  RESPECIFY (R6) RESTRICTED;                              /*@Z427VLS*/ 00259000
*  R6 = ADDR(PRTLINE) + 20;                                /*@Z427VLS*/ 00260000
         LA    R6,PRTLINE                                          0219 00261000
         AL    R6,@CF00719                                         0219 00262000
*  RESPECIFY (R6) UNRESTRICTED;                            /*@Z427VLS*/ 00263000
*  GEN(EX   R9,MOVETOTL);  /*EXEC MOVE CHAR R9 = # OF CHARS TO MOVE  */ 00264000
         EX   R9,MOVETOTL                                               00265000
*  CALL PRINTIT;           /*GO PRINT THE LINE WITH TOTAL & CPU-A ETC*/ 00266000
         BAL   @14,PRINTIT                                         0222 00267000
*  SPACING= SINGLE;        /*GO BACK TO SINGLE SPACING       @Z427VLS*/ 00268000
         MVC   SPACING(1),SINGLE                                   0223 00269000
*  GENERATE DATA;                                          /*@Z427VLS*/ 00270000
*END;                                                      /*@Z427VLS*/ 00271000
@EL00004 DS    0H                                                  0225 00272000
@EF00004 DS    0H                                                  0225 00273000
@ER00004 LM    @14,@12,@SA00004                                    0225 00274000
         BR    @14                                                 0225 00275000
*/********************************************************************/ 00276000
*/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  * * * * * * * * * * */ 00277000
*/*   THIS PROC WILL CONTROL THE OUTPUT FOR PART-1 BY CALLING PROCS  */ 00278000
*/*   TO PROCESS EACH DIFFERENT SECTION OF THE REPORT        @Z427VLS*/ 00279000
*/*                                                          @Z427VLS*/ 00280000
*TOTAL1:  PROC;                                            /*@Z427VLS*/ 00281000
TOTAL1   STM   @14,@12,@SA00005                                    0226 00282000
* ADDRSAVE = SYSUMPTR;       /*SAVE ADDRESS OF THE FIRST TABLE       */ 00283000
         L     ADDRSAVE,SYSUMPTR(,R2)                              0227 00284000
* CALL IPLWORK;                /*GO FORMAT CONVERT AND PRINT IPL DATA*/ 00285000
         BAL   @14,IPLWORK                                         0228 00286000
* CALL MCHWORK;                /*GO PROCESS INFO ABOUT MCH RECORDS   */ 00287000
         BAL   @14,MCHWORK                                         0229 00288000
* CALL CCHWORK;                /*GO PROCESS CCH TYPE DATA    @Z427VLS*/ 00289000
         BAL   @14,CCHWORK                                         0230 00290000
* CALL PROGERR;               /*HANDLE SOFTWARE DATA         @Z427VLS*/ 00291000
         BAL   @14,PROGERR                                         0231 00292000
* CALL EODWORK;                /*GO PROCESS EOD RECORDS IF ANY       */ 00293000
         BAL   @14,EODWORK                                         0232 00294000
* CALL PRT1TOT;                /*PRINT THE TOTAL FOR ALL     @Z427VLS*/ 00295000
         BAL   @14,PRT1TOT                                         0233 00296000
* IF DEBUG21 = ON THEN         /*REQUESTING HEX-DUMP OF PART 1 INFO  */ 00297000
         TM    DEBUG21(R2),B'00000100'                             0234 00298000
         BNO   @RF00234                                            0234 00299000
*  DO;                                                     /*@Z427VLS*/ 00300000
*   DDTYPE = 'F1'X;           /*MOVE OUTPUT TO TOURIST  DD   @Z427VLS*/ 00301000
         MVI   DDTYPE,X'F1'                                        0236 00302000
*   DO I = 1 BY 1 TO NUMTODO;                              /*@Z427VLS*/ 00303000
         LA    @15,1                                               0237 00304000
         ST    @15,I                                               0237 00305000
         B     @DE00237                                            0237 00306000
@DL00237 DS    0H                                                  0238 00307000
*    ADDNXT = ADDR(PRTLINE);  /*ADDRESS OF WHERE TO PUT OUTPUT       */ 00308000
         LA    @15,PRTLINE                                         0238 00309000
         ST    @15,ADDNXT                                          0238 00310000
*    NEXTBY = SYSUMPTR;       /*WHERE THE DATA IS TO HEX DUMP        */ 00311000
         L     @15,SYSUMPTR(,R2)                                   0239 00312000
         ST    @15,NEXTBY                                          0239 00313000
*    NUMBER = 52;             /*HAD TO STOP SOMEWHERE TO MANY FOR 1  */ 00314000
         MVC   NUMBER(4),@CF00820                                  0240 00315000
*    CALL CONVERT;            /*SET UP CORE DATA FOR PRINTING        */ 00316000
         BAL   @14,CONVERT                                         0241 00317000
*    CALL PRINTIT;            /*PRINT THE FIRST LINE         @Z427VLS*/ 00318000
         BAL   @14,PRINTIT                                         0242 00319000
*    NEXTBY = NEXTBY + 52;    /*MOVE POINTER PAST ALREADY DONE DATA  */ 00320000
         LA    @15,52                                              0243 00321000
         AL    @15,NEXTBY                                          0243 00322000
         ST    @15,NEXTBY                                          0243 00323000
*    NUMBER = 48;             /*SET UP TO PRINT REST OF TABLE        */ 00324000
         MVC   NUMBER(4),@CF00821                                  0244 00325000
*    CALL CONVERT;            /*GO CONVERT DATA TO PRINTABLE @Z427VLS*/ 00326000
         BAL   @14,CONVERT                                         0245 00327000
*    CALL PRINTIT;                                         /*@Z427VLS*/ 00328000
         BAL   @14,PRINTIT                                         0246 00329000
*    SYSUMPTR = SYSUMNXT;     /*SET ADDRESSABILITY FOR NEXT TABLE    */ 00330000
         L     @01,SYSUMPTR(,R2)                                   0247 00331000
         L     @15,SYSUMNXT(,@01)                                  0247 00332000
         ST    @15,SYSUMPTR(,R2)                                   0247 00333000
*   END;                                                   /*@Z427VLS*/ 00334000
         LA    @15,1                                               0248 00335000
         AL    @15,I                                               0248 00336000
         ST    @15,I                                               0248 00337000
@DE00237 C     @15,NUMTODO                                         0248 00338000
         BNH   @DL00237                                            0248 00339000
*  SYSUMPTR = ADDRSAVE;       /*RESTORE ADDRESS POINTER TO START     */ 00340000
         ST    ADDRSAVE,SYSUMPTR(,R2)                              0249 00341000
*  DDTYPE = 'F0'X;            /*RETURN TO THE CORRECT PRINT DATA SET */ 00342000
         MVI   DDTYPE,X'F0'                                        0250 00343000
* END;                                                     /*@Z427VLS*/ 00344000
*END;                                                      /*@Z427VLS*/ 00345000
@EL00005 DS    0H                                                  0252 00346000
@EF00005 DS    0H                                                  0252 00347000
@ER00005 LM    @14,@12,@SA00005                                    0252 00348000
         BR    @14                                                 0252 00349000
